NK048(tshi)004:1: // ga m+b+hi r+aa r+tha +aa lo ka s+ya u da
NK048(tshi)004:2: ya mu khya ma na bi ts+aa ra ba tsa
NK048(tshi)004:3: s+ya +aa da r+sha n+aa ma ni dz+ny+aa nam ra
NK048(tshi)004:4: t+na s+ya di p+aam s+ya bi har ti sma //
NK048(tshi)004:6: / nges shes rin po che'i sgron me'i 'grel chung zab
NK048(tshi)004:7: don snang ba'i 'char sgo yid dpyod tshig gi me
NK048(tshi)004:8: long zhes bya ba bzhugs so //
NK048(tshi)004:9: na mo gu ru many+dzu sh+ri ku ma ra ye /
NK048(tshi)004:10: rnam 'dren lha ma'i ston pa sh+aakya'i tog /
NK048(tshi)004:11: rgyal sras brgyad dang gnas brten brgyad gnyis sde //
NK048(tshi)004:12: shing rta mchog gnyis 'dzam gling rgyan chen drug /
NK048(tshi)004:13: ston mchog brgyud 'dzin bcas la dad brgyas bsnyen //
NK048(tshi)004:14: mkhan slob chos rgyal pan chen bi ma la //
NK048(tshi)004:15: bee ro ka cog zhang dang gnyag gnubs zur //
NK048(tshi)004:16: kun mkhyen rong klong rnam gnyis kahthoga pa //
NK048(tshi)004:17: yab sras brgyud par bcas pa rgyal gyur cig /
NK048(tshi)004:18: smra ba'i seng ge kun mkhyen mi pham rje //
NK048(tshi)004:19: pan chen bla ma byams mgon snang ba'i gter //
NK048(tshi)004:20: mkhan chen rnam gsum mchog sprul ma ti'i mtshan //
NK048(tshi)004:21: grub mchog dbang po rnams la phyag byas te //
NK048(tshi)004:22: zab lam gdams pa'i de nyid sbyin pa'i dpal //
NK048(tshi)004:23: nges shes rin po che yi sgron me zhes //
NK048(tshi)004:24: legs bshad nor bu'i snang ba 'bum 'jo ba'i //
NK048(tshi)004:25: tshul 'dir dang ba'i yid kyis 'jug par bya //
NK048(tshi)004:26: de la 'dir khyab bdag rgyal ba gnyis pa kun
NK048(tshi)004:27: mkhyen 'jam dbyangs bla ma mi pham rnam par rgyal
NK048(tshi)004:28: ba nyid sku na shin tu gzhon pa'i dus su
NK048(tshi)004:29: zab cing rgya che ba'i don gyi dka' gnad gsal
NK048(tshi)004:30: bar byed pa'i gzhung bzang sdeb sbyor gyi spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:31: spang ba gang shar stan gcig tu brtsam par mdzad
NK048(tshi)004:32: pa'i legs bshad rmad du byung ba nyid 'chad pa
NK048(tshi)004:33: la gsum / thog mar dge ba klad kyi don bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i yan lag /
NK048(tshi)004:34: bar du dge ba gzhung gi don bstan bcos kyi dngos don bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:35: tha mar dge ba mjug gi don bstan bcos rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:40: nges shes rin po che'i sgron me bzhugs so zhes pas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:41: gzhung bzang 'di la legs par brten na zab pa
NK048(tshi)004:42: dang rgya che ba'i don shin tu rtogs par dka'
NK048(tshi)004:43: ba'i gnas zab mo'i de kho na nyid la sgro
NK048(tshi)004:44: skur kun dang bral ba'i ngesa pa'i shesa pa the
NK048(tshi)004:45: tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba'i yid ches
NK048(tshi)004:46: kyi blo mig yang dag par rang rgyud la bde
NK048(tshi)004:47: blag tu skyed pa'i phyir dper na mun pa sel
NK048(tshi)004:48: zhing snang ba sbyin pa'i rina po che'i sgron me
NK048(tshi)004:49: rin thang dang bral ba lta bu 'di na bzhugs
NK048(tshi)004:50: so zhes dpe don zung du 'brel ba'i sgo nas
NK048(tshi)004:54: shwa lo ka gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:55: lung rigs zab mo'i de kho na nyid du gnyer
NK048(tshi)004:56: ba'i gang zag ganga zhig zab pa dang rgya che
NK048(tshi)004:57: ba'i don rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas la 'jug pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:58: yida kyi blo gros yin nam ma yin snyam pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:59: the tshoma gyi d+r+wa ba'i sbubsa su 'thumsa nas gcig
NK048(tshi)004:60: tu thag chod med par khas len ci bya gtol
NK048(tshi)004:61: med du 'phyan pa las dngos su 'byed cing zab
NK048(tshi)004:62: rgyas chos kyi de nyid mngon sum du rtogs par
NK048(tshi)004:63: byed pa'i mkhyen rab 'ajama dapala rdo rje'i mara me
NK048(tshi)004:65: rdul bral zag pa med pa so so rang rig
NK048(tshi)004:66: pa'i ye shes nges pa don gyi 'jam dpal gzhon
NK048(tshi)004:67: nu yin la / de nyid phyin ci ma log
NK048(tshi)004:68: par dbang rnon chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba rnams
NK048(tshi)004:69: kyi snying la gsal bar 'char ba'i thabs ni yid
NK048(tshi)004:70: gnyis dang sgro skur kun dang bral ba'i ngesa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:71: shesa pa zaba mo'i tshul sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:72: rnam par dag pa 'dren cing 'jug par byed pa
NK048(tshi)004:73: yang dag pa'i tshad ma gnyis nas bden gnyis zung
NK048(tshi)004:74: du 'jug pa'i lam bazanga po gsal bar mthonga ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:75: tshad ma'i miga tu gyur pa dera rag las par
NK048(tshi)004:76: mthong nas bstan bcos rtsom pa po badga nyid kyang
NK048(tshi)004:79: 'di ni brjod bya'i don dang mthun par basngagasa pa
NK048(tshi)004:80: ste shes bya bden gnyis kyi don tshul gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)004:81: phyin ci ma log par nges pa'i shes pa la
NK048(tshi)004:82: brten nas yul dang yul can gyi gnyis snang gi
NK048(tshi)004:83: spros pa dang bral ba'i de bzhin nyid dang gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:84: su med pa'i ye shes nyid mthong ba la phyag
NK048(tshi)004:85: mdzad pas / de ni 'phags mchog klu sgrub kyis //
NK048(tshi)004:86: ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang //
NK048(tshi)004:87: ji ltar mar la mar bzhin du //
NK048(tshi)004:88: rang gis ngang gi ye shes ni //
NK048(tshi)004:89: legs mthong gang yin 'dir phyag yin //
NK048(tshi)004:90: zhes gsungs pa ltar yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:91: de'ang dbye na 'jam dpal zhes pas gzhi lam 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:92: bu'i de nyid dang rdo rje zhes pas de gsum
NK048(tshi)004:93: dbyer mi phyed par bstan to //
NK048(tshi)004:94: kyang sgras zab rgyas kyi de nyid zab mo mthong
NK048(tshi)004:95: bar 'dod pas tshad ma'i mig bzang dad pas skyed
NK048(tshi)004:97: gnyis pa bar du dge ba gzhung gi don bstan
NK048(tshi)004:98: bcos dngos kyi don rnam par dbye ba la gsum
NK048(tshi)004:99: / tshad ma'i 'jug yul legs par mthong ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:100: shing rta'i lam srol spyir bstan te gzhi bzung ba
NK048(tshi)004:101: / / tshad ma'i blo gros gsal bar sgrub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:102: phyir brjod bya'i yan lag rgyas par bshad de bye
NK048(tshi)004:104: tshad ma'i rtogs pa rgyud la skyed pa'i phyir gzungs
NK048(tshi)004:105: spobs sgrubs pa'i sgo la gdams te mjug bsdu ba'o
NK048(tshi)004:107: nges shes med pa'i skyon dang lam yang log gi shan 'byed bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:108: nges shes gang las skye ba tshad ma'i lam srol ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:109: de la nges par zhugs pa'i blo mchog mnga' ba rnams la basngagasa pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:111: kye ma zab mo'i sogs shwa lo ka gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:112: kye ma'o tha snyad dang don dam pa'i zaba mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:113: gansa lugsa ma nor bar rtogs pa la yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:114: par sbyor bar byed pa'i bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad
NK048(tshi)004:115: mas drang ba'i ngesa shesa rina po che yi sgron
NK048(tshi)004:116: me lta bur gyur pa khyod nyid rang rgyud la
NK048(tshi)004:117: ma skyed cing meda pasa na srid pa 'di na
NK048(tshi)004:118: gang zag phal che ba gnas lugs yang dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:119: don la thos bsam sgom pa'i nges pa dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:120: nas the tshom gyi sgyu ma'i rgyar ni 'thumsa shinga
NK048(tshi)004:121: blang dor mkhas len la rmongsa par gyur pa'i skyon
NK048(tshi)004:123: des na mdo sngags kyi theg pa la gang la
NK048(tshi)004:124: zhugs kyang gzhi snang stong ngam stong dang rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:125: / lam thabs shes sam tshogs gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:126: 'bras bu sku gnyis sam mkhyen gnyis la sogs pas
NK048(tshi)004:127: bsdus pa'i chosa rnams la rang gis lung rigs tshad
NK048(tshi)004:128: ma'i lam nas drangs pa'i ngesa pa'i yida chesa sus
NK048(tshi)004:129: kyang mi 'phrogs pa rgyud la 'drong ba dang gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:130: las thosa pasa dad para byed pa tshig tsam la
NK048(tshi)004:131: brten zhing nges pa ma 'drong ba gnyis ni lam
NK048(tshi)004:132: dngos dang de yi gzugsa brnyan bzhina du yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:133: dang lta snang gi khyad par yod pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:135: rmad byung chos kyi sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:136: tha snyad tshad ma'i tshul dang don dam dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:137: tshul gnyis dngos stobs kyi rigs pas ji lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:138: bzhin du gtan la dbab pas shing rta'i srol 'byed
NK048(tshi)004:139: gnyis kyi dgongsa pa mthar thug gsal bar mdzad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:140: rmad du byung ba'i slob dpon chen po rigs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:141: dbang phyug chos kyi grags pa dang mkhyen pa'i gter
NK048(tshi)004:142: chen dpal ldan zla ba'i gragsa pa zung ni 'od
NK048(tshi)004:143: dkar can gyi gzugs su bkod pa ste /
NK048(tshi)004:144: mtshan nyid 'dzin pa'i chos kyang yin la de'i dngos ming du'ang grangs pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:145: des na slob dpon de gnyis kyis tshad ma dang
NK048(tshi)004:146: dbu ma'i gzhung gi legas par bashada pa'i gsung gi
NK048(tshi)004:147: 'oda zer gyi snang ba dang chaba gciga para ston
NK048(tshi)004:148: mchog thub pa'i dbang po'i zab cing rgya che ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:149: bdag nyid can gyi bstan pa'i lha lam ste nam
NK048(tshi)004:150: mkha' yangas pora shara ba ste byon pa yisa bden
NK048(tshi)004:151: pa gnyis kyi gnas lugs la ma rtogs log rtog
NK048(tshi)004:152: the tshoma gyi mun pa thiba po ma lus pa
NK048(tshi)004:153: rnam para 'jomas par mdzad cing shing rta'i lam srol
NK048(tshi)004:154: gsal bar byas pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:155: de yang gsung gi 'od kyis ji ltar gsal na /
NK048(tshi)004:157: rgya che ba tha snyad kyi de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)004:158: dpyod pa'i tshad ma dri ma med pa dngos po'i
NK048(tshi)004:159: stobs las grub pa yisa tha snyad kyi snang tshul
NK048(tshi)004:160: yang dag par gsal bar byas pas tha snyad kyi
NK048(tshi)004:161: blang ngora la 'jug ldog mi nora zhing mi 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:162: pa dang / khyad para du bstan pa yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:163: pa'i 'jug ngogs tshad ma dang ston pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:164: mkhyen pa yang dag pa'i skyes bu tshad ma yin
NK048(tshi)004:165: par sgrubs pa la 'gro ba lha dang bcas pa
NK048(tshi)004:166: sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i yida chesa mchog tu gyur
NK048(tshi)004:167: pa rnyed pa'i sgo gciga pu bar gyur pa rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:168: pa'i bstan bcos tshad ma rnam par 'grel ba la
NK048(tshi)004:169: sogs pa'i tshad ma'i gzhung dang /
NK048(tshi)004:170: dpal ldan zla ba'i zhabs kyis gansa lugas zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:171: spros bral stong pa nyid kyi dona rigs pa'i lam
NK048(tshi)004:172: nas gtan la 'bebas byed dona dam dpyod pa'i rigas
NK048(tshi)004:173: shesa kyi tshad ma dri ma meda pas gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:174: zab mo'i de nyid ji bzhin du gasla bar byed
NK048(tshi)004:175: pa 'jug pa rtsa 'grel la sogs pa'i thega mchoga
NK048(tshi)004:176: dbu ma'i gzhung dang rnam pa gnyis kyis bstan pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:177: lha lam gsal bar mdzad pa yin pas 'di gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:178: kho na lam gyi snying po yang dag par mthong
NK048(tshi)004:179: ba'i mig tu gyur pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:180: de'ang snga ma tshul bzhin du nges na /
NK048(tshi)004:181: de las gnas yongs gyur gyi tshad ma la nges
NK048(tshi)004:182: par 'jug cing mthar thug rang bzhin lhun grub kyi
NK048(tshi)004:183: ye shes kyang tshegs med par rtogs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:184: phyi ma legs par nges na /
NK048(tshi)004:185: rnam grangs min pa'i don dam tshul bzhin du mthong
NK048(tshi)004:186: zhing mthar thug ngo bo ka dag gi ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:187: la'ang bde blag tu 'jug par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)004:188: gsum pa legs par sbyangs pa'i sogs shwa lo ka gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:189: de ltar bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)004:190: legas para sbyangsa pa'i blo gros kyi miga mchog dang
NK048(tshi)004:191: phul du gyur pa zung ste gnyis po zum pa
NK048(tshi)004:192: med par bgrad de ston pa thams cad mkhyen pasa
NK048(tshi)004:193: legs par bstan pa'i lam zab cing rgya che ba
NK048(tshi)004:194: dera ni gazhana dring mi 'joga para te sus kyang
NK048(tshi)004:195: gzhan du drang mi btub pas yang dag par tshul
NK048(tshi)004:196: bzhin du zhugsa pa'i gang zag dam pa de la
NK048(tshi)004:197: mchog tu mos shing basngagasa pas bstod do //
NK048(tshi)004:198: gnyis pa tshad ma'i blo gros gsal bar sgrubs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:199: phyir brjod bya'i yan lag rgyas par bshad de bye
NK048(tshi)004:200: brag tu dbye ba la gsum /
NK048(tshi)004:201: ldom bu pas dris pa'i tshul gyis gleng bslangs te brjod bya'i lus don rnam par bzhag pa /
NK048(tshi)004:202: drang srong gi lan gyi tshul du so so'i yan
NK048(tshi)004:203: lag rgyas par spros te dngos don gtan la dbab
NK048(tshi)004:204: pa / dri ba po gus pa'i tshul gyis bstan
NK048(tshi)004:205: pa mchog la basngagasa shing ngo mtshar chos kyi sgron
NK048(tshi)004:206: me gzhan la gsal bar bskul ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:208: de ltar sems pa'i sogs tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:209: gong du bshad pa'i de ltar sa mas pa'i rnam
NK048(tshi)004:210: par dpyod pa'i blo gros gzu bor gnas pa'i drang
NK048(tshi)004:211: srong chen po'i gzugs su bkod pa de la /
NK048(tshi)004:212: rang gar thol gyis byung ba'i rnam dpyod kyi rtog
NK048(tshi)004:213: pa shar ba ni ldoma bu pa zhiga gi tshul
NK048(tshi)004:214: du bkod nas de yis rtogs par dka' ba zab
NK048(tshi)004:215: mo'i gnas la rtog ge'i brgal zhing brtag par bya
NK048(tshi)004:216: ba'i phyir dri ba bdun po 'og nas 'byung ba
NK048(tshi)004:217: 'di ltar dris te de yang 'di dang 'di yi
NK048(tshi)004:218: lan rnams mkhas pa gzhan gyi sngar nas yang yang
NK048(tshi)004:219: bstan pa'i rjes su de nyid slar yang bskyar zlos
NK048(tshi)004:220: sam rjes brjod tsam byas pa la makhasa pa rnams
NK048(tshi)004:221: kyis basngagasa pa'i gnas su ci zhig tu mthong ste
NK048(tshi)004:223: de ltar ma yin par rtogs par dka' ba zab
NK048(tshi)004:224: mo'i gnas 'di dag la ranga gi rnam par dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:225: pa yang dag par gzu bor gnas shing baga phoba
NK048(tshi)004:226: ste zhib mo'i blo gros kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:227: tshul bzhin du dpyod la gang zhig dris pa'i lana
NK048(tshi)004:228: 'di rnams lung rigs tshad ma dang ldan pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:229: nas nye bar ldon par mdzoda cig dang /
NK048(tshi)004:230: da gzod ngag gi 'bras rtags de las nanga gi
NK048(tshi)004:231: rnam par dpyod pa'i blo gros de yang mngon sum
NK048(tshi)004:232: mthonga ba bzhina du gasla bar 'gyur bas basngagasa shing
NK048(tshi)004:234: de las gzhan du gzhung tshogs manga du thosa pas
NK048(tshi)004:235: lus bsgyings shing dgag sgrub kyi sna zhagas ringa du
NK048(tshi)004:236: brkyangsa nas mkhas par grags shing snyems par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:237: yanga / shin tu zab pa'i khron pa'i chu mig
NK048(tshi)004:238: la btung bar mi nus pa bzhin te dpe nyid
NK048(tshi)004:239: kyang rtsal gyis bshad na khron pa chung ngu la
NK048(tshi)004:240: gnas pa'i rus sbal gyis phyis su rgya mtsho chen
NK048(tshi)004:241: po mthong nas shi ba ltar rang rang gis ji
NK048(tshi)004:242: ltar mthong ba'i tshur mthong gi yul la dgag sgrub
NK048(tshi)004:243: phyogs re nges pa tsam gyis khengs shing /
NK048(tshi)004:244: de las 'das pas shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:245: gnas rgya che zhing gting zab pa'i chosa kyi rnam
NK048(tshi)004:246: grangs rgya mtsho chen po'i chu ltar tshad med cing
NK048(tshi)004:247: mtha' las 'das pa'i chos tshul bsam gyis mi khyab
NK048(tshi)004:248: pa gzhan dang gzhan dag mthong thos su ma gyur
NK048(tshi)004:249: pas don gyi gnad kyang tshul bzhin du ma myong
NK048(tshi)004:250: bar rang gi spyod yul min pa la sems mi
NK048(tshi)004:251: zhum par ma zad da dung mdo rgyud zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:252: rnams la makhasa pa'i gragsa pa dang snyan pa la
NK048(tshi)004:253: re zhing chags te kheng basa dper na rigas ngana
NK048(tshi)004:254: gdol pa'i bu zhig rgyal po mnga' thang dang dar
NK048(tshi)004:255: ba'i btsun mora chagas pa dang 'dra ste de 'dra'i
NK048(tshi)004:256: dbang thang med pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:257: der yang ma zad dgag sgrub ltar snang gi tshig
NK048(tshi)004:258: tshogs rang gar spro ba ni rigs ngan de yang
NK048(tshi)004:259: g.yem la zhugs na srog dang bral ba'i phung khrol
NK048(tshi)004:260: chen po 'byung ba bzhin du zab mo'i chos rnams
NK048(tshi)004:261: spangs pa'i rgyu las rang bzhan du ma mnar med
NK048(tshi)004:262: dmyal ba chen por bskal ba nas bskal pa'i bar
NK048(tshi)004:263: du 'bar zhing bsregs pa'i gnas su 'gyur bas bdag
NK048(tshi)004:264: legs su 'dod pa dag gis bag yod par byos
NK048(tshi)004:265: shig / don gnad zab mo gang zhig 'dri na
NK048(tshi)004:266: 'di ltar mkhas dbang dam pa rnams kyis grub mtha'i
NK048(tshi)004:267: shig / zhal 'dzin dang / lung don 'grel tshul dang /
NK048(tshi)004:268: blo gros kyi gshog rtsal 'gran pa'i phyir phan tshun
NK048(tshi)004:269: brgal brtags kyi dgag sgrub sna tshogs zhig dgos dbang
NK048(tshi)004:270: gis rgya cher mdzad kyang lung rigs man ngag dang
NK048(tshi)004:271: mi 'gal ba'i zhal bzhes skyon med cig gang la'ang
NK048(tshi)004:272: dka' bar snang ba'i gnas 'di dag 'dri ste /
NK048(tshi)004:273: mthar thug gi lta ba mkhas dbang la las med
NK048(tshi)004:274: dagga dang la las ma yin dgag tu gsungs pa
NK048(tshi)004:275: gnyis las ganga ltar smra ba lung dang rigs pas
NK048(tshi)004:277: de bzhin du nyan ranga dgra bcom pas chos dang
NK048(tshi)004:278: gang zag gi badga meda gnyis ka rtogsa sama ma
NK048(tshi)004:279: rtogs par smra ba gang 'thad dang /
NK048(tshi)004:280: gnas lugs kyi don la mnyam par bazhaga pa'am 'jog
NK048(tshi)004:281: pa'i tshe 'dzina stangsa yoda dama meda pa gang ltar
NK048(tshi)004:282: 'thad dang / sgom pa la'ang dpyad nasa sgom ma
NK048(tshi)004:283: ma dpyad pa med par bazhaga nasa bsgom pa gang
NK048(tshi)004:284: 'thad dang / 'thad dang / bdena pa gnyis la
NK048(tshi)004:285: kun rdzob dang don dam ganga zhiga gtso bor smra
NK048(tshi)004:287: chu lta bu gcig la rigs drug gi 'gro bas
NK048(tshi)004:288: mthong ba mi gciga pa drug tu snang ba de
NK048(tshi)004:289: la mthun snang gi blta bya thun mong pa yod
NK048(tshi)004:291: dbu ma chen por rang lugs kyi khasa lena yoda
NK048(tshi)004:292: dam meda par smra ba dag las su la lung
NK048(tshi)004:293: rigs kyis sgrub byed rnam par dag pa yod cing
NK048(tshi)004:294: sgrub tshul ji ltar yin zhes de skad gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:295: stong pa nyid lasa brtsamsa pa'i zaba mo'i don can
NK048(tshi)004:296: gyi dri ba bdun po 'dira bde bar gshegs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:297: lung tshad ma dang 'agla ba meda par lung don
NK048(tshi)004:298: bzhina du dngos stobs kyi rigas pasa grub pa'i lana
NK048(tshi)004:299: gyi khyad par yang dag par thongas shiga /
NK048(tshi)004:300: lung bzhin rigs pas ma grub pa'i lan gyis dgos pa med do //
NK048(tshi)004:301: de ltar rtog ge'i ngag dang thal ba'i tshiga gi
NK048(tshi)004:302: phreng ba ltar snang gi rigs pa tsher ma'i mdung
NK048(tshi)004:303: dang 'dra ba 'bum gyis cig char du bsnun kyang
NK048(tshi)004:304: cung zad tsam yang mi phiga pa'am mi shig pa
NK048(tshi)004:305: ste dgag sgrub gang yang mi nus pas de sngon
NK048(tshi)004:306: mkhas par grags pa'i che ba'am chen po rnams kyang
NK048(tshi)004:307: rmongsa shing 'khrul bar gyur nas ji bzhin du rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:308: pa'i smra ba dkon zhing daka'a ba'i ganda zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:309: 'di dag la / lung rigs tshad mas grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:310: lan gyi khyad par smra ba'i ljagsa rtse mi thung
NK048(tshi)004:311: bar riing po glog bzhina du myur bar rkyongsa la
NK048(tshi)004:312: lan gdab par mdzod cig ces /
NK048(tshi)004:313: de ltar rnam par dpyod pa'i blo grosa kyis rab
NK048(tshi)004:314: tu bskul ba'i ngag gi rlung cung zad dam chung
NK048(tshi)004:315: ngur g.yos te dris pa desa kyang gzu bor gnas
NK048(tshi)004:316: pa'i drang srong de yi snying dper na dus mtha'i
NK048(tshi)004:317: rlung gisa ri bo bskyod pa bzhina du bsgul bar
NK048(tshi)004:318: gyur nas lan gyi rnam pa gang yang mi smra
NK048(tshi)004:319: ba'i brtul zhugsa dara cig bzung ba ste ci bya
NK048(tshi)004:320: gtol med du cung zad gyur pa'i mathara /
NK048(tshi)004:321: 'di ltar kyee ma'o yun ring sbyong brtson gyi 'bad
NK048(tshi)004:322: pa brgya phrag du ma'i daka'a ba'i khur chen rtag
NK048(tshi)004:323: tu brten cing yanga dang yanga du rnam par dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:324: pa'i blo gros rnona po'i me nyid bar chad pa
NK048(tshi)004:325: med par brgyud mara chesa cher sbar ba'i mkhas pa
NK048(tshi)004:326: chen por gyur pa de dang des kyang dri ba
NK048(tshi)004:327: 'di rnams la tshad mas grub pa'i lan gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:328: par skyon thams cad dang bral ba'i khas len gser
NK048(tshi)004:329: zhun ma lta bu'i khams su bsgrub para ma nus
NK048(tshi)004:331: sngon sbyang gi lhan cig skyes pa spobsa pa'i blo yi nus pa zhan par gyur cinga /
NK048(tshi)004:332: da ltar 'bad pa chen pos yuna ringa sbyang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:333: dka' ba'i khur brgya phrag dag kyang ma bzung ba
NK048(tshi)004:334: damna pa badga gisa 'di dag la lan gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:335: par skyon med cig smra ba ga la nus zhes
NK048(tshi)004:336: / lhag pa'i lha mchog rje btsun 'ajama pa'i dbyangs
NK048(tshi)004:337: la snying nas dad pa drag pos gdung ba'i shugsa
NK048(tshi)004:338: kyis bosa shing gsol ba tab pa de yi tshe
NK048(tshi)004:339: na lhag pa'i lha de yi byin rlabs kyi mthu
NK048(tshi)004:340: lasa byung ba yina nam snyam pa ste lhag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:341: lha'i byin rlabs snying la zhugs pa'i stobs kyis gzur
NK048(tshi)004:342: gnas dpyod pa'i yida kyi shes rab la dper na
NK048(tshi)004:343: tho rangas nam langs pa'i dus kyi mngon sum skyon
NK048(tshi)004:344: med kyi snang ba ltar lan gyi khyad par khas
NK048(tshi)004:345: len skyon bral lung rigs tshad mas grub pa som
NK048(tshi)004:346: nyi thams cad dang bral ba smra bar nus pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:347: spobsa pa'i go skabsa yangs pa cung zada thoba pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:348: / 'phral te / de ma thag tu legas par
NK048(tshi)004:349: gsungsa pa'i bka' lung dri ma med pa mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:350: man ngag gi dgongs dona ji lta ba bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:351: dngos stobs kyi rigas pa yang dag pasa dpyad de
NK048(tshi)004:354: gnyis pa la dris pa'i rim pa ltar lan gyi rnam par bzhag pa la'ang bdun las /
NK048(tshi)004:355: dri lan dang po lta ba dgag gnyis gang ltar smra ba'i lan la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:356: gzhan lugs brjod cing rang lugs kyi lta ba'i ngo bo ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:357: de yi dgongs don lung dang rigs pa'i lam nas dgag sgrub kyis gtan la dbab pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:359: dga' ldan lta ba sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:360: de la spyir ston mchog bu ram shing pas chos
NK048(tshi)004:361: nyid bde bar gshegs pa'i snying po'i gnas lugs gsal
NK048(tshi)004:362: bar mdzad pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo rim pa gsum
NK048(tshi)004:363: gdul bya'i blo dang mthun par bskor ba ste /
NK048(tshi)004:365: bsod nams ma yin dang por bzlog /
NK048(tshi)004:366: bar du bdag ni bzlog pa ste //
NK048(tshi)004:367: tha mas lta gzhi kun bzlog par //
NK048(tshi)004:368: gang gis shes te mkhas pa yin //
NK048(tshi)004:370: 'khor lo dang por mtshon tshul gyis bstan pa tsam las rtsal du bton nas ma gsungs la /
NK048(tshi)004:371: bka' bar ba las ni 'di ltar bde gshegs snying
NK048(tshi)004:372: po rang gi ngo bos mi stong bar gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:373: phyi rol pa'i rtag bdag dang khyad par med pas
NK048(tshi)004:374: rnam thar sgo gsum gyi rang bzhin du bstan pa
NK048(tshi)004:375: dang / bka' tha ma las ni 'od gsal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:376: ye shes kyang med par phyang chad nam mkha' lta
NK048(tshi)004:377: bu gyur na gcer bu pa dang khyad par med
NK048(tshi)004:378: pas 'od gsal ba'i ye shes 'dus ma byas par
NK048(tshi)004:379: bstan pas ngo bo stong pa dang rang bzhin gsal
NK048(tshi)004:380: ba gnyis so so'i rnam par bzhag pa rtsal du
NK048(tshi)004:381: bton nas bka' stsal ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:383: dpal ldan klu yi dbang pos bar ba'i dgongs pa
NK048(tshi)004:384: rigs tshogs dang tha ma'i dgongs pa bstod tshogs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:385: bkral zhing khyad par dngos bstan stong nyid gtso bor
NK048(tshi)004:386: byas te zab mo lta ba'i lam srol gsal bar
NK048(tshi)004:387: phyes shing / de'i rjes su dbu ma rtsa ba
NK048(tshi)004:388: sogs kyi dgongs pa sangs rgyas bskyang dang legs ldan
NK048(tshi)004:389: 'byed dpal ldan zla ba sogs kyis so sor bkral
NK048(tshi)004:390: zhing dgag bya la don dam gyi khyad par sbyar
NK048(tshi)004:391: ma sbyar dang de'i dbang gis tha snyad la rang
NK048(tshi)004:392: mtshan gyis grub pa zhal gyis bzhes mi bzhes sogs
NK048(tshi)004:393: kyi khyad par la phan tshun dgag sgrub sna tshogs
NK048(tshi)004:394: phyes shing / mdzad cing / de la brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:395: bod 'dir yang dbu ma thal rang zhes ches mi
NK048(tshi)004:396: mthun pa zhig tu go zhing mkhas mchog la las
NK048(tshi)004:397: dbu ma rang rgyud pa'i stong nyid ma yin dgag
NK048(tshi)004:399: 'jug pa rtsa 'grel dang spyod 'jug shes rab le'u
NK048(tshi)004:400: sogs kyi dgongs pa 'grel ba po gangs can gyi
NK048(tshi)004:401: mkhas pa rnams kyang phan tshun zla ba dang zhi
NK048(tshi)004:402: ba lha'i dgongs pa lon ma lon sogs kyis dgag
NK048(tshi)004:403: sgrub sna tshogs par mdzad pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:404: rgyal tshab mi pham mgon pos bar ba'i dgongs pa rgyan dang /
NK048(tshi)004:405: tha ma'i dgongs pa rgyud bla ma sogs kyis bkral
NK048(tshi)004:406: zhing shing rta thogs med kyis de gnyis kyi rnam
NK048(tshi)004:407: bshad dang sa sde sogs mdzad nas shugs bstan lam
NK048(tshi)004:408: gyi mngon rtogs dang snying po'i chos nyid sogs gtso
NK048(tshi)004:409: bor byas te rgya chen spyod pa'i lam srol gsal
NK048(tshi)004:410: bar phyes shing / de dag gi dgongs don la
NK048(tshi)004:411: thun mong ba kun brtags gzhan dbang yongs grub gsum
NK048(tshi)004:412: dang thun mong min pa kun brtags dang yongs grub
NK048(tshi)004:413: gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa sogs 'chad tshul mang
NK048(tshi)004:414: du byung zhing tha snyad kyi de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)004:415: rigs pa'i dbang phyug rnam gnyis kyis gsal bar mdzad
NK048(tshi)004:416: pa yin la de bzhin du ljongs 'dir yang rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:417: bla ma sogs kyi dgongs pa drang nges so sor
NK048(tshi)004:418: 'grel tshul ma mthun pa'i dbang gis phan tshun dgag
NK048(tshi)004:419: sgrub sna tshogs pa spro bar gyur na yang /
NK048(tshi)004:420: gzu bor gnas pa'i blos don la rton pa'i rigs
NK048(tshi)004:421: lam dri ma med pas gnad kyi dgongs don nyams
NK048(tshi)004:422: su bstar na rgyal ba'i phrin las gdul bya'i dbang
NK048(tshi)004:423: gis so so'i dgongs gnad re rtsal 'don mdzad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:424: tha snyad kyi zhal bzhes cung zad mi 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)004:425: tsam las don la rgya bod pan grub dgongs pa
NK048(tshi)004:426: gcig zer ba ltar mthar thug gi dgongs pa dbu
NK048(tshi)004:427: ma chen po spros bral mnyam pa nyid du dbye
NK048(tshi)004:428: bsri med par gcig tu gzhol zhing 'bab pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:429: la / de yi tshul rgyas pa ni /
NK048(tshi)004:430: rje 'jam dbyangs bla mas dbu ma rgyan gyi 'grel bshad /
NK048(tshi)004:431: snying po'i stong thun seng ge'i nga ro /
NK048(tshi)004:432: gzhung spyi'i dka' gnad rin po che'i za ma tog
NK048(tshi)004:433: la sogs pa sa gsum na rnyed par dka' ba
NK048(tshi)004:434: rnams las shes par bya dgos la /
NK048(tshi)004:435: des na don gyi gnad la 'gal ba med na
NK048(tshi)004:436: tha snyad kyi zhal bzhes mi 'dra ba tsam gyis
NK048(tshi)004:437: chos de lta log dang chos min du mi 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:438: te tshig la mi rton don la rton dgos par
NK048(tshi)004:439: gsungs pa'i phyir / de lta'ang rang gzhan su yin
NK048(tshi)004:440: kyang gzhan zer rjes brjod kyi brag char ma song
NK048(tshi)004:441: bar yang dag pa'i rigs lam gyis tha snyad skyon
NK048(tshi)004:442: med pa zhig la 'jug pa gal che ste /
NK048(tshi)004:444: tha snyad la ni ma brten par //
NK048(tshi)004:445: dam pa'i don ni rtogs mi 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:447: des na tshul 'di dang 'di 'dra'i sgo nas dri
NK048(tshi)004:448: lan thams cad kyi skabs su'ang gzu bor gnas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:449: blos legs par dpyad de log par mi lta bar
NK048(tshi)004:450: yang dag pa'i don nyid tshol ba la 'bad pa
NK048(tshi)004:451: ni mkhas pa rnams kyis snying nor dam par rnal
NK048(tshi)004:453: dngos don la gangs can na mngon par mtho ba
NK048(tshi)004:454: ri bo dag'a ldan pa sogs snga phyir byon pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:455: mkhas mchog phal che ba zhig gis dbu ma'i lta
NK048(tshi)004:456: ba mthar thug pa dgag bya bden grub bcad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:457: stong nyid meda dagga tu 'dod dgos zhes zer ba
NK048(tshi)004:458: dang / gazhana snga phyir byon pa'i mkhas mchog la
NK048(tshi)004:459: la rnams gnas lugs mthar thug don dam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:460: gnyis snang 'khor ba'i chos kyi stong pas stong nyid
NK048(tshi)004:461: ma yina dagga tu smra ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:462: 'o na snga 'gyur gyi ranga lugsa gzhan dang ma 'dres pa'i khas len ganga yin zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:463: gnas lugs mthar thug pa sgro 'dogs so gnyis dang
NK048(tshi)004:464: bral ba'i spros bral mnyam pa nyid dam zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:465: ye shesa chena po'i ngora med dgag cesa bya ba
NK048(tshi)004:466: dagga bya bden grub bakaga shul gyi meda rkyang ngam
NK048(tshi)004:467: stong pa phyang chad dang ni ma yina dgag zhesa
NK048(tshi)004:468: dgag bya bakaga shul du chos nyid la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:470: de gnyis ka blo yisa gzhan sel ba'i sgo nas
NK048(tshi)004:471: brtagsa pa tsam las rang gi ngo bos ma grub
NK048(tshi)004:472: pa'i phyir na gshis lugs mthar thug pa'i dona la
NK048(tshi)004:473: khas len thams cad dang bral ba yin pas med
NK048(tshi)004:474: dgag dang ma yin dgag gnyis kara khasa mi lena
NK048(tshi)004:475: te / gnas lugs rang gi ngo bo mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:476: pa ni dgag pa med dgag dang sgrub pa ma
NK048(tshi)004:477: yin dgag la sogs pa'i gnyis chos thams cad dang
NK048(tshi)004:478: bral ba yi blo 'adsa smra bsam brjod med so
NK048(tshi)004:479: so rang rig pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul gdoda
NK048(tshi)004:480: ma'i chosa nyid yina pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:481: de lta na'ang gnas skabs chos thams cad kyi ngo
NK048(tshi)004:482: bo stong pa nyid gtan la 'beb tshul kho nara
NK048(tshi)004:483: bsam nasa ni med dgag dang ma yin dgag gang
NK048(tshi)004:484: yin zhes dri na meda dagga nyid du khas len
NK048(tshi)004:485: dgos pa yina te 'aphagas pa'i yul du dapala ldan
NK048(tshi)004:486: zla ba grags pa dang boda kyi ljongs na kun
NK048(tshi)004:487: mkhyen ronga zom chosa bazanga gnyis thugs kyi dgongsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:488: gciga dang gsung gi dbyangs gciga gisa 'khor 'das kyis
NK048(tshi)004:489: bsdus pa'i chos so cog thams cad gdod ma nas
NK048(tshi)004:490: dag pas ka daga stong pa chena po lung dang
NK048(tshi)004:491: rigs pas bsgrub par mdzad pa bzhin du spros bral
NK048(tshi)004:492: med dgag chen por 'dod pa yin pas 'di ltar
NK048(tshi)004:493: 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chosa 'di thams cad ka
NK048(tshi)004:494: nasa daga pa'am gdod ma nasa rang bzhina gyis grub
NK048(tshi)004:495: pa cung zad kyang meda pa'i phyir kun rdzob dang
NK048(tshi)004:496: don dam pa'i bdena pa gnyis char mtha' bzhi las
NK048(tshi)004:497: ma skyes pasa na meda cesa brjod pa la ci
NK048(tshi)004:498: zhiga tshom ste the tshom ci yang mi dgos pa
NK048(tshi)004:499: mdo las gzugs med sgra med sogs gzugs nas rnams
NK048(tshi)004:500: mkhyen gyi bar la khyad par gang yang ma sbyar
NK048(tshi)004:501: bar med par gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:503: mi 'thad pa gzhan lugs dngos po stobs zhugs kyi rigs pas dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)004:504: 'thad ldan rang lugs lung rigs tshad ma'i sgo nas sgrubs tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:506: gzhan gyis med dgag ma yin dgag tu 'gyur zhing
NK048(tshi)004:507: zung 'jug mi rung bas tshig dang don gyi gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:509: de gnyis la mi 'thad pa'i gnod pa so sor bshad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:510: dang po ka ba ka nas sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:511: de la 'dir ngo bo stong pa'i dbang du byas na spros bral med dgag tu 'dod pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:512: rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i dbang du byas na stong
NK048(tshi)004:513: pa'i dbyings dang 'du 'bral med pa'i sku dang ye
NK048(tshi)004:514: shes sogs dbyings ye gnyis su med pa 'dus ma
NK048(tshi)004:515: byas pa'i rang gdangs lhun gyis grub pa'i sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:516: kyi yon tan bla na med pa ji skad gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:517: pa rnams kyang de bzhin du 'dod pa ni rjes
NK048(tshi)004:518: thob shan 'byed pa'i skabs kyi khas len yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:519: gnod byed gang yang med cing sgrub byed rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:520: dag pa yod pa'i phyir mi 'thad pa spu tsam
NK048(tshi)004:521: med par ma zad yon tan phul du byung ba
NK048(tshi)004:522: yang bde blag tu thob par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)004:523: de las gzhan du don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:524: ji snyed pas 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos can
NK048(tshi)004:525: gang la'ang don dam dang bden grub sogs kyi dgag
NK048(tshi)004:526: bya'i khyad par sbyar nas de kho na 'gogs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:527: gzhan chos can gyi snang ba rnams ni 'gogs kyang
NK048(tshi)004:528: mi nus la 'gog na'ang tha snyad la skur ba
NK048(tshi)004:529: btab pa sogs kyi skyon yang che'o zhes rnam grangs
NK048(tshi)004:530: pa'i don dam bden stong med dgag tsam kho na
NK048(tshi)004:531: zab mo dbu ma'i lta ba mthar thug tu zhal
NK048(tshi)004:532: gyis bzhes shing rtsal 'don mdzad na /
NK048(tshi)004:535: tha snyad bden pa rigs pas dpyad bzod du thal ba /
NK048(tshi)004:536: don dam pa'i skye ba mi khegs par thal ba /
NK048(tshi)004:537: 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag dngos po'i 'jig rgyur thal ba'i skyon gsum gsungs pa bzlog med du 'bab cing /
NK048(tshi)004:540: rang rgyud 'og ma'i bye brag slob dpon dpal sbas
NK048(tshi)004:541: sogs snang stong tha dad du 'dod pa dag gi
NK048(tshi)004:543: snang ba ma yin pa'i stong pa bden pa gnyis char mi srid pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:544: de nyid rtogs byar mi rung ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:545: tha dad du gyur na spang gnyen du'ang mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:546: de rdzun snang la zhen nas chags sdang la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:547: skyes pa logs su stong par shes pas ci yang
NK048(tshi)004:548: mi phan pas de 'dra'i rtogs pa la dgos pa
NK048(tshi)004:549: ci yang med pa'i rigs pa gang gsungs pa bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:550: no // ting 'dzin rgyal po las kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:551: su dag bu mor 'du shes gnas //
NK048(tshi)004:553: 'du shes dag ni rnam bshig na //
NK048(tshi)004:555: zhes gsungs pa bzhin yin pas /
NK048(tshi)004:556: 'dir yang chos can gyi snang ba ka pa la
NK048(tshi)004:557: sogs par rang rang gi ngo bo ka nas te
NK048(tshi)004:558: ye nas stong pa'am daga pa yi rang bzhin yin
NK048(tshi)004:559: pa'i phyir de ltar rigs pas gtan la dbab pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:560: shul na mi stong pa cung zad tsam yang lus
NK048(tshi)004:561: pa meda la / gal te yod na de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:562: rigs pas dpyad bzod du 'gyur ba des na mthar
NK048(tshi)004:563: thug dpyod pa'i rigs pas chos can ka ba rang
NK048(tshi)004:564: nyid meda cesa ma bakaga na ste mi 'gogs par
NK048(tshi)004:565: ka ba bden grub mina zhesa brjod pas 'gogs mi
NK048(tshi)004:566: nus pa'i chos can gyi ka ba 'di ci zhig
NK048(tshi)004:567: yina te nam yang mi 'thad la /
NK048(tshi)004:568: de ltar na bden grub kyi ka ba khegas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:569: bden pa'i stong pa nyid dang mi khegs par shul
NK048(tshi)004:570: na lusa pa'i snang ba yi ka ba zhiga ste
NK048(tshi)004:571: stong pa dang mi stong pa'i ngo bo tha dad
NK048(tshi)004:572: du gyur ba de gnyis me dang tsha ba ltar
NK048(tshi)004:573: snang stong dbyer med dam zung 'jug tu mi rung
NK048(tshi)004:574: ste dper na srad bu dkar nag bsgril ba zung
NK048(tshi)004:575: 'jug gam dbyer med min pa bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:576: des na chos can gyi ka ba ka basa te
NK048(tshi)004:577: ka ba rang nyid rang gis mi stong par dgag
NK048(tshi)004:578: bya bden grub gzhan gyis stong par 'dod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:579: chos nyid chos nyid rang gis mi stong bar gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:580: ka ba sogs gnyis snang 'khor ba'i chos kyis stong
NK048(tshi)004:581: ngo zhes stong gzhi ka ba dang chos nyid bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:582: nas bden grub dang ka ba la sogs pa gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:583: gyis stong par 'dod pa dag ni snga ma tshiga
NK048(tshi)004:584: gi gzhan stong dang phyi ma dona gyi gzhan stong
NK048(tshi)004:585: du 'gyur la de gnyis gang la'ang snang ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:586: stong pa chos can dang chos nyid du mi rung
NK048(tshi)004:587: ba dang de bzhin du bden gnyis zung 'jug spros
NK048(tshi)004:588: bral mnyam pa nyid sogs rnam pa kun tu mi
NK048(tshi)004:589: rung ba'i rigs pas gnod pa thun mong du bzlog
NK048(tshi)004:590: pa med par 'bab pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:592: tshig gi gzhan stong la lung rigs khas blang dang 'gal ba'i skyon gsum bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:593: don gyi gzhan stong la stong go mi chod cing
NK048(tshi)004:594: chos dang chos nyid sogs mi rung bas 'gal skyon
NK048(tshi)004:596: e ma des de sogs tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:597: de yang 'khor 'das kyi chos 'di thams cad ming
NK048(tshi)004:598: dang rtogs pas phar btags tsam zhig bsnyon med du
NK048(tshi)004:599: yod pas / thal 'gyur ba rang gi lugs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:600: lta ba mthar thug 'jog pa'i tshe yang rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:601: gi rnam bzhag 'di rnams 'khrul ngo 'ba' zhig tu
NK048(tshi)004:602: skyel mi dgos par dngos gnas la'ang tshad grub tu
NK048(tshi)004:603: bzhag chog ste tha snyad tshad ma yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:604: zhes sogs kyis dgag bya nges pa'i gnad 'di gal
NK048(tshi)004:605: che bar nan gyi sgrub nas snang ba ling ling
NK048(tshi)004:606: gi dngos po rangs sar bzhag ste dgag bya bden
NK048(tshi)004:607: grub zhes pa'i rwa reng nge ba zhig tu 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:608: pa la lung rigs khas blang dang 'gal ba'i skyon
NK048(tshi)004:610: e ma ka ba dang gzugs la sogs pa de
NK048(tshi)004:611: dang desa ka ba dang gzugs la sogs pa rang
NK048(tshi)004:612: gi ngo bo de dang de ma stong pa'am mi
NK048(tshi)004:613: stong bar dgag bya bden grub la sogs pa kho
NK048(tshi)004:614: nas stong pa yin na stong gzhi ka ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:615: gzugs la sogs pa mi stong par lhag mar lus
NK048(tshi)004:616: te rang rang gi ngo bos grub par 'gyur la
NK048(tshi)004:617: / de ltar na gzugsa ni gzugs kyis stong ngo
NK048(tshi)004:618: zhes sogs gzugs nas rnam mkhyen gyi bar chos thams
NK048(tshi)004:619: cad rang rang gi ngo bos stong par gsungs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:620: yum rgyas 'bring sogs nges pa don gyi lung dang
NK048(tshi)004:621: de'i dgongs 'grel dbu ma 'jug pa sogs kyi bstan
NK048(tshi)004:623: de nyid rigas pa rnam par dag pas sgrub tshul dang bcas pa lasa kyang 'agla te /
NK048(tshi)004:624: 'di ltar chos can ka ba la sogs pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:625: dgag bya ka ba'i bdena grub la sogs pa de
NK048(tshi)004:626: gnyis ngo bo gcig gam tha dad gang yin /
NK048(tshi)004:627: dang po ltar ngo bo gciga yin no zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:628: dgag bya bden grub la sogs pa gcig shos khega
NK048(tshi)004:629: pas chos can ka ba la sogs pa gciga shos
NK048(tshi)004:630: kyang khega par 'gyur te de gnyis gcig yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:631: phyir dper na me nyid med pas tsha ba'ang med
NK048(tshi)004:632: pa bzhin no // des na bden grub 'gogs kyis ka ba mi 'gogs zhes pa don med do //
NK048(tshi)004:633: gnyis pa ltar ngo bo gazhana yin no zhes chos
NK048(tshi)004:634: can ka ba la sogs pa rang rang ma yina
NK048(tshi)004:635: pa'i dgag bya gzhan bdena grub ces pa de khega
NK048(tshi)004:636: kyang chos can ka ba la sogs pa rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:637: ngo bo ni don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pa gang
NK048(tshi)004:638: gisa kyang mi stong par dpyad bzod pas bden grub
NK048(tshi)004:639: tu 'gyur la de ltar na tha snyad bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:640: rigs pas dpyad bzod du thal ba la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:641: skyon gong du bstan pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:642: kho na re bdena grub tha snyad du'ang yod ma
NK048(tshi)004:643: myong pa'i phyir na de gnyis 'di ltar gcig dang
NK048(tshi)004:644: tha dada gang yin zhes dpyad mi dgosa so zhe
NK048(tshi)004:645: na yang don la 'khor 'das kyi chos gang yang
NK048(tshi)004:646: bden par grub pa zhig meda kyang so skye'i ngora
NK048(tshi)004:647: ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa bdena par
NK048(tshi)004:648: 'dzina pa yod pa'i phyir de ltar nges par dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:650: srid pa'i sa bon rnam shes te //
NK048(tshi)004:651: yul rnams de yi spyod yul yin //
NK048(tshi)004:652: yul la bdag med mthong nas ni //
NK048(tshi)004:653: srid pa'i sa bon ldog par 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:655: des na dbu ma thal 'gyur pa'i lugs kyi dgag
NK048(tshi)004:656: bya'i ngos 'dzin kyang don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas
NK048(tshi)004:657: dpyad bzod kyi mi stong pa'i bum pa'am 'gog mi
NK048(tshi)004:658: nus pa'i bum pa'i pha rola te gzhan logs shig
NK048(tshi)004:659: na dgag bya bdena para grub rgyu dpyad mi bzod
NK048(tshi)004:660: pa su zhig yina te yan gar du med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:661: phyir na dagga bya'i snang tshul kyang gzhan dag gis
NK048(tshi)004:662: ngos ma zin la khyed cag kho nas ngos zin
NK048(tshi)004:663: par nges so lo zhes ma rangs pa'i tshig go
NK048(tshi)004:664: // 'on kyang bdena par grub pa sogs kyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:665: para gang zhig dagga byar sbyar ba'am dgag bya la
NK048(tshi)004:666: don dam gyi khyad par sbyar nasa ston pa ni
NK048(tshi)004:667: bden gnyis so sor phyes nas tshad ma so so'i
NK048(tshi)004:668: rnyed don so sor 'chad pa dbu ma rang rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:669: pa'i gzhung la ches grags shing grub moda kyang 'dir
NK048(tshi)004:670: don dam pa'i gnas lugs mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigs
NK048(tshi)004:671: pas dabnga du byas na ka ba dang bum pa
NK048(tshi)004:672: la sogs pa des de mi stong zhes pa de
NK048(tshi)004:673: sbyar ba la dgosa nus kyi 'thad pa ci zhig
NK048(tshi)004:674: yod ces ci yang med de /
NK048(tshi)004:675: dang po nas mtha' bzhi'i spros bral du gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:677: gang tshe ngas dam bcas 'ga' yod //
NK048(tshi)004:678: de tshe nga la skyon de yod //
NK048(tshi)004:679: nga la dam bca' med pa na //
NK048(tshi)004:680: nga ni skyon med kho na yin //
NK048(tshi)004:681: gal te mngon sum la sogs pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:682: don gyis 'ga' zhig dmigs na ni //
NK048(tshi)004:683: sgrub pa'am dgag par bya na de //
NK048(tshi)004:684: med phyir nga la klan ka med //
NK048(tshi)004:686: gal te bum pa bum pas sam ka ba ka
NK048(tshi)004:687: bas stong par gyur na kun rdzob tha snyad tsam
NK048(tshi)004:688: du yanga ka ba dang bum pa la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:689: de dag meda pa ltar zhes gtan med lta bur
NK048(tshi)004:690: 'gyur bar semsa nas tha snyad la skur pa 'debs
NK048(tshi)004:691: pa sogs pa'i tshiga 'khri'i dogas pasa ka ba ka
NK048(tshi)004:692: bas mi stong zhes pa la sogs pa 'di sbyar
NK048(tshi)004:693: bar byas kyang tshiga 'khri'i 'agla ba bzlog tu med
NK048(tshi)004:694: pa 'di la lhag par che ste /
NK048(tshi)004:695: ji ltar na kun rdzob tsam ste ma brtags ma
NK048(tshi)004:696: dpyad pa'i tha snyad tsam du ka ba ni yoda
NK048(tshi)004:697: cesa brjod par byas pasa mi choga para ka ba
NK048(tshi)004:698: desa ka ba de mi stong ngo zhes ci la
NK048(tshi)004:700: de gnyis dona gciga yina pas mi 'thad pa med
NK048(tshi)004:701: do zera na de gnyis don gcig ma yina te
NK048(tshi)004:702: / 'di ltar ka ba yoda cesa brjod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:703: ka ba la ka ba yoda cesa brjod pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:704: mi mtshungsa pas phyi ma ka ba la zhes rten
NK048(tshi)004:705: dang ka ba yod ces brten para don gyis khasa
NK048(tshi)004:706: blangsa su songa ba dper na rten ka ba gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:707: la brten pa ka ba gzhan zhig brten par khas
NK048(tshi)004:709: gzhan yang des de mi stong zhes pa 'di bden pa gnyis char mi 'thad do //
NK048(tshi)004:710: dona dama par don dam dpyod pas dpyad bzod kyi
NK048(tshi)004:711: ka ba la sogs pa 'khor 'das kyi chos gang
NK048(tshi)004:712: yang ma dmigas pa'am yod pa min na ka ba
NK048(tshi)004:713: des ka ba de mi stong zhes pa 'di ci
NK048(tshi)004:714: ste brjod de 'di la dgos nus ci yang med
NK048(tshi)004:715: la / kun rdzob tu'ang ka ba ka bas zhes
NK048(tshi)004:716: lana gnyis brjod pa 'di ni brda dang tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:717: la rmongsa shing don dang 'gal ba tsam las dgos
NK048(tshi)004:719: rang gi khas blangs dang yang 'gal te /
NK048(tshi)004:720: ka ba la sogs pa ranga rang rnams ni ranga
NK048(tshi)004:721: gisa te rang rang gi ngo bos mi stong par
NK048(tshi)004:722: gyur na rang gi ngo bo yoda bzhina du bden
NK048(tshi)004:723: grub sogs dgag bya gzhan dang gazhana gyis stong pas
NK048(tshi)004:724: gzhan stong du khas mi len par rang stong du
NK048(tshi)004:725: khas len pa 'gal zhing ka ba la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:726: snang ba 'di las dagga bya gazhana tha dad du
NK048(tshi)004:727: meda pas rang rang ngo bos stong par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:728: ka ba ka ba rang gisa mi stong par khasa
NK048(tshi)004:729: lena pa'ang 'agla ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:731: spyir na gzhan gyis sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:732: spyir rgol snga phyi sogs grub mtha' smra ba su
NK048(tshi)004:733: ltar na yang chos nyid myang 'das la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:734: rang rang gis mi stong par dgag bya 'khor ba
NK048(tshi)004:735: la sogs pa gazhana gyis stong par gyur pa desa
NK048(tshi)004:736: chos nyid la sogs pa rang gi ngo bos stong
NK048(tshi)004:737: par gyur pa'i go ngesa para mi chod de /
NK048(tshi)004:738: de dag chos can dang de'i chos nyid /
NK048(tshi)004:739: snang ba dang de'i stong nyid ma yin par tha dad pa yin pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:740: dper na rta nyid ba lang min la ba lang
NK048(tshi)004:741: rta nyid ma yin pas mngon sum ma 'khrul pas
NK048(tshi)004:742: mthong ba'i rta de nyid yongs gcod du grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:743: la de yi steng du gzhan ba langa zhig ma
NK048(tshi)004:744: mthong bas ma grub par shes kyang ba lang rnams
NK048(tshi)004:745: gcod la khegs pa tsam des rta de yang rang
NK048(tshi)004:746: gi ngo bos stong nyid yin para ga la ngesa
NK048(tshi)004:747: te / de gnyis 'brel med tha dad yin pa'i phyir te de gnyis chos can dang chos nyid /
NK048(tshi)004:749: thabs dang thabs byung gang yang ma yin pas stong
NK048(tshi)004:750: rten 'byung zung 'jug dang snang stong dbyer med kyi
NK048(tshi)004:751: don ci yang med pas so //
NK048(tshi)004:752: des na rta nyid mthonga ba de yisa kyang ba
NK048(tshi)004:753: langa stong par mthong ba la ci zhiga phana te
NK048(tshi)004:754: mi mthong ba la'ang ci zhiga gnoda de phan gnod
NK048(tshi)004:756: de yi phyir na rang gi ngo bos mi stong pa'i myang 'das la sogs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:757: rang gi ngo bos stong pa'i 'khor ba la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:758: pa'nga chosa can dang chosa nyid du mi rung ste
NK048(tshi)004:759: rta nyid pa lang gis stong pa'am bum pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:760: ri rwa la chos can dang chos nyid kyi don
NK048(tshi)004:762: de'i phyir de gnyis snang ba dang stong pa dbyer med dam zung 'jug dang /
NK048(tshi)004:763: srid pa 'khor ba dang zhi ba myang 'das gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:764: mnyam pa nyid du gsungs pa de nyid lugs 'di
NK048(tshi)004:765: la mi rung bas rnam pa kun tu meda de
NK048(tshi)004:766: dper na yod pa'i rta dang med pa'i ba lang
NK048(tshi)004:767: ngam bu ma pa dang ri rwa la zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:768: dang mnyam pa nyid kyi don med pa bzhin no
NK048(tshi)004:769: // de yang 'di ltar chu yi zla ba mngon
NK048(tshi)004:770: sum du snang ba la 'di nyid nam mkha'i zla
NK048(tshi)004:771: ba dngos mina no zhesa gnam zlas stong pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:772: chu zla ranga nyid gsal bar snang ba de gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:773: zung 'jug yina na ko ste yin na ni /
NK048(tshi)004:774: de 'dra'i snang stong zung 'jug de nyid rtogsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:775: mkhas blun sras kyang sla basa blun po ba lang
NK048(tshi)004:776: rdzis kyang rtogs par 'gyur la ba langa rta mina
NK048(tshi)004:777: pa'am rtas stong par mkhas blun kun gyis shesa shing
NK048(tshi)004:778: ba langa snang bar mngona sum du yang mkhas blun
NK048(tshi)004:779: kun gyis mthong bar gyur pa yin na de 'dra'i
NK048(tshi)004:780: rtogsa pa de la mchog tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes
NK048(tshi)004:781: pa'i basngagasa brjod rmad du byung ba badga nyid chen
NK048(tshi)004:782: po sangs rgyas dang bcas pas ci ste gsungs te
NK048(tshi)004:784: gnyis pa des na rang gi sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:785: ji skad bstan pa desa na snga 'gyur ba ranga
NK048(tshi)004:786: gi lugsa 'khrul ba'i dri ma dang bral ba'i khas
NK048(tshi)004:787: len rnam par dag pa la ni dper na chu
NK048(tshi)004:788: yi zla ba'i snang ba de la rigs pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:789: dag gis brtagsa shing dpyad na chu zla de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:790: phyi nang gzhan sogs gang du'ang rang gi ngo bo
NK048(tshi)004:791: cung zada tsam yang mi rnyed pas meda pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:792: bzhina du rnam pa chu zla nyid du snang bar
NK048(tshi)004:793: mngon sum du mthong ba'i tshe chu zla de yod
NK048(tshi)004:794: med la sogs pa'i spros pa kun dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:795: meda dagga yina kyang rten 'byung 'gags pa med pas
NK048(tshi)004:796: snang du rung ba de ltar du snang srid 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:797: 'das kyi bsdus pa'i chos 'di thams cad rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:799: rang bzhin snang ba'am yod pa gnyis ye nas rnam
NK048(tshi)004:800: dbyer med pa me dang tsha ba bzhin du gnas
NK048(tshi)004:801: pa de nyid so skye'i blor ma shong bas 'agla
NK048(tshi)004:802: ba ltar snang na yanga 'dira ni mngona sum nyid
NK048(tshi)004:803: du stong dang rten 'byung ngam snang stong gnyis mi
NK048(tshi)004:804: 'gal bar ma zad chu dang rlan bzhin dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:805: dam zung 'jug tu mthong ba 'di la e ma
NK048(tshi)004:806: ho rmad du byung ba'o zhes ngo matshara ba'i tshiga
NK048(tshi)004:807: gisa mkhas pa chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
NK048(tshi)004:808: thugs kyi sras mchog dang bcas pa rnams kyis mgrin
NK048(tshi)004:809: gcig tu basngagasa pa'i me tog rgya cher 'thor zhing
NK048(tshi)004:810: ched du brjod pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:812: tshig bral dag gi lam gyis mi mtshon pas //
NK048(tshi)004:813: de bzhin nyid chos rang bzhin nam mkha' 'dra //
NK048(tshi)004:814: sems dang yid kyi rgyu ba rnam spangs pa //
NK048(tshi)004:815: mchog rab ngo mtshar che ba dam pa shes //
NK048(tshi)004:818: chos rnams stong pa 'di shes nas //
NK048(tshi)004:819: las dang 'bras bu brten pa gang /
NK048(tshi)004:820: ngo mtshar bas kyang 'di ngo mtshar //
NK048(tshi)004:821: rmad byung bas kyang 'di rmad byung //
NK048(tshi)004:822: zhes sogs basngagasa 'os mchog la basngagasa brjod kyang che thang du mdzad pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:823: de ltar gnas lugs zung 'jug gi ngo bor chos
NK048(tshi)004:824: kun gdod nas gnas pa'i phyir ngo bo stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:825: ngosa nasa gazhala ba'am gtan la dbab na 'khor 'das
NK048(tshi)004:826: kyis bsdus pa'i chos so cog kun la rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:827: ngo bos mi stong pa cung zada tsam du grub
NK048(tshi)004:828: pa yoda pa mina pa de'i phyir chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:829: meda cesa sam stong pa nyid yin no zhes mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:831: de lta na'ang med pa'am stong pa de'i meda tshugsa
NK048(tshi)004:832: sam stong tshugs ma shora bzhina du rten 'byung gi
NK048(tshi)004:833: snang ba sus kyang 'goga tu meda pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:835: snang tshul la cir yang 'char du rung bas rten
NK048(tshi)004:836: 'byung gi snang cha nas gzhal na snang ba de'i
NK048(tshi)004:837: snang tshugsa sam snang tshul ma shor bzhina du gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:838: meda rtsa ba dang bral ba'i stong pa chena por
NK048(tshi)004:839: ye nas gansa pas dbyings ye gnyis su med par
NK048(tshi)004:840: lhun gyis grub pa nyid de /
NK048(tshi)004:843: gzugs las kyang stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin //
NK048(tshi)004:844: stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gzhan ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:846: rgyu mtshan des na zung 'jug mnyam nyid chen po
NK048(tshi)004:847: snang stong ris su ma chad pas spros pa kun
NK048(tshi)004:848: dang bral ba'i gnas lugs de la ka ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:849: myang 'das la sogs pa'i chos can dang chos nyid
NK048(tshi)004:851: bden grub dang 'khor ba la sogs pa dgag bya
NK048(tshi)004:852: 'di dang 'disa stong zhes pa dang 'di ni snang
NK048(tshi)004:853: ba kun rdzob kyi chos so 'di ni stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:854: don dam pa'i cha'o zhes pa la sogs pa'i gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:855: chos kyi dbye ba zhiga nam yang rnyed pa meda
NK048(tshi)004:856: pa spros kun bral ba'i snang stong ris su ma
NK048(tshi)004:857: chad pa la nges shes kyi kho thaga nanga nasa
NK048(tshi)004:858: choda par gyur pa'i tshe na gnas lugs mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:859: gi rtogs pa dona du gnyer zhing tshola ba la
NK048(tshi)004:860: 'bad pa'i makhana po mkhas pa rnams la stong na
NK048(tshi)004:861: snang mi rung snang na stong mi rung snyam du
NK048(tshi)004:862: snang stong 'gal bar 'dzin pa la sogs dona meda
NK048(tshi)004:863: pa'i the tshom dang log par rtog pasa zab don
NK048(tshi)004:864: rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas la sgyid lugs shing yi
NK048(tshi)004:865: chada pa'am yi mug skye zhing gzhan la 'gram chu
NK048(tshi)004:866: ldang ba meda par ma zad yid ches kyi steng
NK048(tshi)004:867: du slar yang snang stong mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas
NK048(tshi)004:868: tshul mthong nas tshong pa khe spogs grub pa ltar
NK048(tshi)004:869: yid bde bla na bral ba thoba par nges pa
NK048(tshi)004:870: 'di ni shin tu ngo matshara che zhing mchog dang
NK048(tshi)004:871: phul du gyur pa ste snga 'gyur rig 'dzin brgyud
NK048(tshi)004:872: pa'i rang lugs bzang po'i 'bras rtags rnam par dag
NK048(tshi)004:873: pa'o // de ltar na mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i gsang tshig /
NK048(tshi)004:874: gangs ljongs snga phyi'i mkhas pa rnams kyi zhal bzhes /
NK048(tshi)004:875: gsang sngags gsar rnying gi bka' srol du ma'i tha snyad /
NK048(tshi)004:876: lta sgom spyod pa'i khas len dang chos skad kyi khyad par /
NK048(tshi)004:877: phyag bzhes phrin sgrub kyi rnam bzhag sna tshogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:878: 'di snyed cig dar zhing bzhugs pa'i nang pa sangs
NK048(tshi)004:879: rgyas pa mnyam med sh+aakya'i rgyal po'i bstan pa rin
NK048(tshi)004:880: po che 'di la rang gzhan sus kyang 'gal 'dur
NK048(tshi)004:881: mi rtog par gdul bya'i khams dbang bsam pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:882: mthun par rgyal ba'i phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab
NK048(tshi)004:883: par 'gogs pa med par dus su smin pa'i dbang
NK048(tshi)004:884: gis gang la gang 'dul du rang shar bar mthong
NK048(tshi)004:885: nas / dad cing gus pas yid ches par byas te tshul bzhin du rtogs dgos par /
NK048(tshi)004:887: rang byung rnams kyi don dam ni //
NK048(tshi)004:888: dad pa nyid kyis rtogs bya nyid //
NK048(tshi)004:890: dad pas legs par zhugs te gzu bor gnas pa'i blo gros kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:891: rgyu mtshan nyid kyi theg pa drang nges ldem dgongs /
NK048(tshi)004:892: sngags rdo rje'i theg par mtha' drug tshul bzhi'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:893: nas bstan pa thams cad dad pas chu las 'o
NK048(tshi)004:894: ma bzhin du tshig la mi rton don la rton
NK048(tshi)004:895: pas / gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi dgongs gnad
NK048(tshi)004:896: ji bzhin du nyams su bstar bas bstan pa thams
NK048(tshi)004:897: cad 'gal med du rtogs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:898: gzhung lugs mtha' dag gdams par 'char ba'i bshad sgrub
NK048(tshi)004:899: ni mang du thos pa'i mkhas pa rnams kyis nyams
NK048(tshi)004:901: thugs dam gyi mthil dang snying nor du bgyi bar
NK048(tshi)004:902: 'os pa'i mkhas btsun dam pa rnams kyi bzang po'i
NK048(tshi)004:903: bzhed srol rma med pa yin pas /
NK048(tshi)004:904: chos dang gang zag gzhan la zhen lta dang rang mthong gis sdang zhugs mi bya zhing /
NK048(tshi)004:905: rang nyid sngon las btsan pos dang po nyid nas
NK048(tshi)004:906: gsar rnying gang la 'phrad pa'i chos dang gang zag
NK048(tshi)004:907: la sun 'byin dang log par mi lta bar bshad
NK048(tshi)004:908: pa dang sgrub pa'i bka' srol la rang nus gang
NK048(tshi)004:909: yod kyis bzung zhing bskyang ste don gnyer byas na
NK048(tshi)004:910: bstan 'gro la phan pa 'byung zhing don gnyis kyi
NK048(tshi)004:911: 'byor pa'i dpal dang ldan par 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)004:912: de las gzhan du rang gar sdang zhugs kyis sun
NK048(tshi)004:913: ci phyin dang sgro skur ci thon byas na ci
NK048(tshi)004:914: yang mi shes pa'i blun po ba lang rdzi yan
NK048(tshi)004:915: chad kyang ri bong cal sgrogs kyis de'i ra mdar
NK048(tshi)004:916: bsnyags nas yang dag pa'i chos dang gang zag la
NK048(tshi)004:917: log par lta zhing skur 'debs kyi nyes pa shin
NK048(tshi)004:918: tu che bas gzhan rnams phung la sbyor zhing rang
NK048(tshi)004:919: yang dam pa'i rnam thar las ring ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:920: mdo las gsungs pa'i smra la dga' ba'i nyes pas kyang zin nas nang cha mngon pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:921: dam tshig nyams pa'i chad pa mi bzad pas phog
NK048(tshi)004:922: nas 'di phyir phung khrol mtha' yas par 'gyur ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:923: phyir ro // des na rigs pa'i gnas chen lnga
NK048(tshi)004:924: la sogs par skyes sbyang gi blo gros che zhing
NK048(tshi)004:925: nyams myong gi drod tshad rnyed pas bla ma lhag
NK048(tshi)004:926: pa'i lhas mngon sum rjes su bzung zhing lung bstan
NK048(tshi)004:927: legs par thob pa'i mkhas grub dam pa rnams kyis
NK048(tshi)004:928: bstan 'gror sman par nges pa'i mkhas pa'i bya ba
NK048(tshi)004:929: 'acha da rtsod rtsom gsum gyi dgag sgrub kyi rtsod
NK048(tshi)004:930: rigs don ldan su la yod kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:931: rang gzhan sus kyang de la log par mi lta
NK048(tshi)004:932: bar dgongs gnad legs par tshol bar byas na blo
NK048(tshi)004:933: gros zab mo'i gsos su 'gyur bas phan pa mchog
NK048(tshi)004:934: las gnod pa ci yang med de /
NK048(tshi)004:935: bdag cag gi ston mchog gis mdo sde dgongs pa nges 'grel las /
NK048(tshi)004:936: chos 'khor gsum las rim par tha ma la mchog tu basngagasa shing /
NK048(tshi)004:937: dang po dang bar gnyis la sun 'byin gyi smad
NK048(tshi)004:938: par mdzad pa la sogs pa sde snod gsum por
NK048(tshi)004:939: dgag sgrub ci rigs pas bstan par mdzad pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:940: / rdo rje'i theg pa la'ang rgyud sde gong 'og
NK048(tshi)004:941: nang gi dbye ba dang bcas pa'i khyad par dang
NK048(tshi)004:942: dgag sgrub sna tshogs pas gsal bar byas pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:943: / / bsregs bcad brdar bas gser bzhin du legs par brtags te blangs dgos pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:944: yang dag par brtags pa'i phan yon kyang mtha' las 'das par gsungs shing /
NK048(tshi)004:945: brtags tshul kyang mgon po byams pa'i man ngag las /
NK048(tshi)004:946: go rim rig pa snga phyi dag /
NK048(tshi)004:947: mi 'gal ba ni gnyis las so //
NK048(tshi)004:948: zhes brgal lan gyi sgo nas brtag par gsungs pa yin pas /
NK048(tshi)004:949: de ltar brtags nas gzhan la gnod par gyur kyang nyes pa med par yang /
NK048(tshi)004:951: chos 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis //
NK048(tshi)004:952: rtsod pa'i ched du ma bstan te //
NK048(tshi)004:953: de lta'ang ma yi bud shing bzhin //
NK048(tshi)004:954: 'di yi phas kyi rgol ba sreg /
NK048(tshi)004:957: bstan bcos las dpyad rtsod la chags pa'i phyir //
NK048(tshi)004:958: ma mdzad rnam grol phyir ni de nyid bstan //
NK048(tshi)004:959: gal te de nyid rnam par bshad pa na //
NK048(tshi)004:960: gzhan gzhung 'jig par gyur na nyes pa med //
NK048(tshi)004:962: nyes pa med par ma zad de lta bu'i tshul 'di chos srung ba'ang yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:964: de la chos srung ba gang zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:965: 'di lta ste sangs rgyas kyi chos la smod pa rnams chos dang mthun par tshar gcod pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:968: nam mkhar mdzod kyis zhus pa las //
NK048(tshi)004:969: rgyal ba'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang brnyes pa //
NK048(tshi)004:970: chos kyi mtshan nyid de nyid yang 'dzin cing //
NK048(tshi)004:971: gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa //
NK048(tshi)004:972: de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin //
NK048(tshi)004:974: chos bzung ba de ni sangs rgyas la byas pa bzo ba'ang yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:975: de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying rje chen po nges par bstan pa'i mdo las /
NK048(tshi)004:976: 'di ltar rgyal ba'i chos kyis nyer gnas shing //
NK048(tshi)004:977: chos kyis nges par 'byung gis zang zing min //
NK048(tshi)004:978: de bas gang zhig bde gshegs chos 'dzin pa //
NK048(tshi)004:979: de ni sangs rgyas kun la byas pa gzo //
NK048(tshi)004:981: de dag la brten nas bsod nams tshad med pa'ang thob ste /
NK048(tshi)004:982: nam mkha' mdzod kyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK048(tshi)004:983: ji ltar bskal ba bye ba stong brjod kyang //
NK048(tshi)004:984: sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin ltar //
NK048(tshi)004:985: de bzhin gshegs kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:986: bsod nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:988: de'i phyir 'phags bod kyi yul du byon pa'i mkhas
NK048(tshi)004:989: dbang dam pa dag gis dgos pa'i dbang gis rnam
NK048(tshi)004:990: par dpyod pa'i dgag sgrub ji snyed cig bzhugs pa
NK048(tshi)004:991: gang la'ang log par mi rtog par blo gzu bor
NK048(tshi)004:992: gnas pas dgongs gnad legs par btsal na /
NK048(tshi)004:993: rang gi rnam dpyod kyi rtsal rdzogs shing mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:994: nges don gyi dgongs gnad zab mo nyams su bstar
NK048(tshi)004:995: zhing yon tan gyi lus zung btab ste bstan 'gro'i
NK048(tshi)004:996: gsos sman chen por 'gyur bar nges pa'i dam pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:997: rnam thar nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur bas na
NK048(tshi)004:998: / 'dir yang da ltar bzhugs shing slad nas 'byon
NK048(tshi)004:999: pa rnams la snying nas gsol ba yang yang 'debs
NK048(tshi)004:1000: pa lags na chos mthun sprang po'i ngag las kyang
NK048(tshi)004:1001: blang bar 'os phyir phyogs dus kyi mkhas pa rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1002: kyis thugs dam snying nor du bcings te dgag pa
NK048(tshi)004:1003: dang sgrub pa'i tshul gyis brtags pa 'di dang gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:1004: 'og ma 'og ma la'ang thugs dam rgyud bskul du
NK048(tshi)004:1005: dang len mdzad nas bag yod pa rnal 'byor du
NK048(tshi)004:1006: / bya'o // zhes gong 'og kun gyi bar gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1007: gsal byed lta bur bstan pa 'di dag bsnyel ba
NK048(tshi)004:1008: med par thugs la bcings te blta zhing nyams su
NK048(tshi)004:1010: rang stong gzhan stong phan tshun cher rtsod kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:1011: snang stong phyogs su lhung na su la'ang skyon /
NK048(tshi)004:1012: snang stong mi 'gal zung 'jug grub mtha'i mchog /
NK048(tshi)004:1013: 'di 'dzin phyogs las rnam par rgyal min nam //
NK048(tshi)004:1015: 'di rnams rje mkhan chen bla ma'i legs gsung don
NK048(tshi)004:1016: yang zab la tshig kyang snyan pas rtog ge'i tshig
NK048(tshi)004:1017: phreng brgyus pa la snying po med pas de rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1018: kho na bris pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1019: dri lan gnyis pa nyan rang 'phags pas bdag med
NK048(tshi)004:1020: gnyis ka rtogs sam ma rtogs gang 'thad kyi lan
NK048(tshi)004:1021: la gsum / mi 'thad pa gzhan lugs lung rigs tshad ma'i sgo nas so sor dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1022: 'thad ldan rang lugs shing rta'i bzhed gzhung bzhin du gsal bar sgrubs pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1023: tshul 'di legs par rtogs na klu dang byams pa dgongs gnad gcig tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1025: 'ga' zhig nyan rang sogs tshigs bcad dgu dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1026: de la snga rabs kyi mkhas pa 'ag'a zhiga gis
NK048(tshi)004:1027: nyan ranga dgra bcoma pasa gang zag gi bdag med
NK048(tshi)004:1028: pa tsam rtogs kyi chosa kyi bdag med stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:1029: nyid ni ma rtogsa te de ltar na theg chen
NK048(tshi)004:1030: bstan pa don med du 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1032: zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de /
NK048(tshi)004:1033: ji ltar na phung po lnga pora ma brtags ma
NK048(tshi)004:1034: dpyad par brten nas btags pa'i nga tsam du 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:1035: pa'i badga de ni ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen
NK048(tshi)004:1036: yul yin la de ma khega pa de srid du
NK048(tshi)004:1037: de'i yul can ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyang mi khegs
NK048(tshi)004:1038: la de ma khegs na de'i nus pasa chags sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1039: nyon mongas pa rnams spongs pa meda pas lam des
NK048(tshi)004:1040: thar ba tsam yang thob par mi nus pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:1041: / badga de'ang phung po la ma brtags ma dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:1042: par brten nasa 'byung ba'am btagsa pa tsam ste de
NK048(tshi)004:1043: nyid ngara 'dzina lhan skyes kyi zhen yul yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:1044: / / phung po'i tshogs pa la brten nas btags pa'i gang zag gi bdag de dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1045: yan lag la sogs pa'i tshogs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1046: lto ldir zhabs zhum la sogs pa'i rnam pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1047: brten nas btags pa'am 'byung ba'i phung po dang bum
NK048(tshi)004:1048: pa la sogas pa'i chos kyi bdag dang de gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:1049: la brten nas btags pa'i stong gzhi'i chos can gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1050: dbye ba tsam ma gtogsa para chos dang gang zag
NK048(tshi)004:1051: rang gi ngo bos grub pa med pas stong tshul
NK048(tshi)004:1052: la khyad para 'ag'a yang meda par stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1053: desa chosa dang ganga zaga gi bdag gnyis ka so
NK048(tshi)004:1054: sora yanga rigs pa yang dag pas dpyad na ranga
NK048(tshi)004:1055: bzhina gyis grub pa med pasa stong pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:1056: mtshungs pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:1057: des na shing dang sha ba bzhin du bdag gnyis spyi dang bye brag dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1058: bdag med gnyis kyang spyi dang bre brag tsam du shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1060: de ltar yin par rgyal ba'i yum las shes rab
NK048(tshi)004:1061: kyi pha rol du phyin pa sras bzhi bskyed pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1062: yum yin pas de la bslab par bya bar gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:1063: pa dang / klu sgrub yab sras kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:1064: ji srid phung por 'dzin yod pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1066: yul la bdag med mthong na ni //
NK048(tshi)004:1067: zhes pa la sogs pa'i lung dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1068: brten nas btags pa'am rten 'byung gi chos de stong
NK048(tshi)004:1069: pa nyid du ma rtogs na phyi rol ba'i chags
NK048(tshi)004:1070: bral bzhin du slar nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:1071: zhing srid pa las mi grol ba dang brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:1072: btags pa'am rten 'byung gi de nyid rtogs na rnam
NK048(tshi)004:1073: par grol pa'i thar pa thob pas stong nyid zhi
NK048(tshi)004:1074: sgo gnyis su med par sgrubs pa'i rigas pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:1075: bcas pasa kyang mngona sum bsnyon med du grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:1077: nyan rang dgra bcom pas brten nas btags pa'i stong
NK048(tshi)004:1078: pa nyid ma rtogsa zhes mtha' gcig tu smra ba
NK048(tshi)004:1079: rnams ni dama bca' ba tsam du zad de lung
NK048(tshi)004:1080: rigs kyis sgrub byed med pas phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:1081: yang de la phyi rabs kyi bdag nyid chen po
NK048(tshi)004:1082: kha ciga ha cang thal chesa nasa theg pa gsum
NK048(tshi)004:1083: char gyi mthonga lam spang rtogs mnyam pas gciga pa
NK048(tshi)004:1084: dang nyan rang byang sems 'phags pa gsum char lta
NK048(tshi)004:1085: ba bdag med gnyis ka rdzogs par rtogs pas rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1086: pa la mtho damna rdul tsam yang meda para 'doda
NK048(tshi)004:1087: cing de dang 'gal ba theg gsum gyi mthong lam
NK048(tshi)004:1088: spang rtogs mi 'dra ba dang rtogs pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:1089: la mtho dman yod par gsungs pa'i sher phyin dang
NK048(tshi)004:1090: sngagsa rdo rje'i theg pa la sogsa pa mdo dang
NK048(tshi)004:1091: rgyud sde'i gzhung nges don du gsal bar grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:1092: kun kyang drang ba'i dona du 'grel zhing 'chad pa
NK048(tshi)004:1093: de dag la / mkhas pa gzhan dag gis brgal
NK048(tshi)004:1094: pa de ltar na dman pa nyan rang gi lam
NK048(tshi)004:1095: sngona du songa ba'i dgra bcom pa dag slar theg
NK048(tshi)004:1096: chena du zhugs nas bskal pa grangs med pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1097: sogs par tshogs gnyis bsags te mthonga lam gyi ye
NK048(tshi)004:1098: shes thoba pa dang sa nas sar 'phar ba'i sgom
NK048(tshi)004:1099: lam gyi ye shes thob pa la sogas pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:1100: na nyon sgrib ni spangs zin la shes sgrib ni
NK048(tshi)004:1101: ma dag sa bdun du mi spong bar 'dod pas
NK048(tshi)004:1102: de dag la / na / spang bya cung zada dam phra ba yang meda pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1103: de med pas rtogs pa'i ye shes de la dgos nus med pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1104: grangs med kyi tshogs gnyis don med par 'gyur ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1105: theg pa mchog dman dang lam zab mi zab dbang
NK048(tshi)004:1106: po rno rtul dang drang nges go bzlog pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1107: sogsa pa'i 'gal 'du'i skyon gyi phung po 'gal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1108: khur chen gyi rigas pasa gnoda pa ji snyed brjod
NK048(tshi)004:1109: pa kun kyang lan gyis bzlog tu meda par thog
NK048(tshi)004:1110: ltar du 'abba par 'gyur ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:1111: skyon gazhana yanga rtogsa bya bdag med gnyis ji lta
NK048(tshi)004:1112: ba bzhin du rtogsa par gyur kyang rtogs pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:1113: shes des spang bya shes sgrib spong bar byed pa
NK048(tshi)004:1114: la grogsa bsod nams kyi tshogs mtha' yas pas brgyan
NK048(tshi)004:1115: nas sgrub dgosa pas sa dang po nas shes sgrib
NK048(tshi)004:1116: spang bas bar chad med lam sogs mtshan nyid par
NK048(tshi)004:1119: ye shes kyi tshogs la yang yang mnyam par bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:1120: cing bsod nams kyi tshogs sbyin dang tshul khrims sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1121: gong nas gong du 'phel ba la chad med lam
NK048(tshi)004:1122: sogs lam mtshan nyid pa 'jog tu med cing ye
NK048(tshi)004:1123: shes des sa brgyad pa'i shes sgrib spang nus kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1124: gnyen po'i nus pa mthu brtas par 'gyur bas don
NK048(tshi)004:1125: med du mi 'gyur ro zhes zer na yang mi
NK048(tshi)004:1126: 'thad de / dman lam sngon song des rtogs bya
NK048(tshi)004:1127: bdag med gnyis ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1128: par gyur na de rtogsa para rang gis khas blang
NK048(tshi)004:1130: gal te ji bzhin du rtogs nas rtogsa pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1131: mtho dman med par gyur na des spang bya mi
NK048(tshi)004:1132: spong ba yang 'agla ba yin te gnyen po'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:1133: shes kyis spang bya mi spong na gzhan srid pa
NK048(tshi)004:1134: gsum na spang bya spong nus kyi gnyen po mi
NK048(tshi)004:1136: dper na nyi ma sprin dang bral ba yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:1137: par shar yanga muna pa'i dpung bsal ba'am 'jomas pa
NK048(tshi)004:1138: la ni grogs sgron me sogs gazhana la ltos dgos
NK048(tshi)004:1139: par khas len pa dang mtshungs pas 'di ni ches
NK048(tshi)004:1140: ngo matshara ba zhig ste bzhad gad kyi gnas so
NK048(tshi)004:1141: // yang phyi rabs kyi mkhas pa kha ciga gis
NK048(tshi)004:1142: nyan ranga dgra bcom pas ranga rgyud kyi phung po
NK048(tshi)004:1143: lnga po stong nyid du rtogsa pa yum dang dbu
NK048(tshi)004:1144: ma'i bstan bcos rnams dang 'jug pa le'u dang po'i
NK048(tshi)004:1146: le'u drug par de nyid nang stong pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:1147: bsdus nas gzhan rnams theg chen thun min gyi rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:1148: rigs su bshad pas gzugs la sogs pa'i chosa gazhana
NK048(tshi)004:1149: thams cad bdag meda stong pa nyid du mi rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1150: so zhes zer ba'ang mi 'thad do //
NK048(tshi)004:1151: ji ltar na 'dus byas kyi chos gzugs la sogs pa phra ba'am rags pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1152: ngan pa'am gya nom la sogs pa thams cad spungs
NK048(tshi)004:1153: pa'i don gyi phung po lngar 'dus par mngon pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1154: mdo dang mdzod sogs las gsal bar bstan pa ltar
NK048(tshi)004:1155: phung po lnga po stong pa nyid du rtogsa par
NK048(tshi)004:1156: gyur na de las gzhan nam mkha' la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1157: 'dus ma byas pa tsam zhig ma gtogsa pa'i chos
NK048(tshi)004:1158: stong pa nyid du ma rtogsa pa'i dngosa po gazhana
NK048(tshi)004:1159: ci zhiga yoda de ci yang med la /
NK048(tshi)004:1160: 'jug pa rtsa 'grel sogs kyi dgongs pa'ang min te /
NK048(tshi)004:1161: stong nyid bcu drug po theg chen thun mong min par dngos su gsung pa'i phyir dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1162: rgyan dang yang 'gal te nyan thos kyi rtogs rigs
NK048(tshi)004:1163: bshad pa'i kun shes kyi mdo 'chad pa rnams dang
NK048(tshi)004:1165: rang rgyal gyi skabs su gzung don rtog pa spong phyir dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1166: 'dzin pa mi spong phyir dang ni /
NK048(tshi)004:1167: zhes gsungs na rang rgyud kyis zin pa'i phung po
NK048(tshi)004:1168: lnga po stong nyid du rtogs na 'dzin pa spong
NK048(tshi)004:1169: par grub pa la sogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:1170: gzhan yang mkha' sogs 'dus ma byas pa ni /
NK048(tshi)004:1172: nam mkha' mo gsham bu dang mtshungs //
NK048(tshi)004:1173: zhes pa ltar tha snyad du'ang ma grub na don dam par lta ci /
NK048(tshi)004:1174: des na rigs par smra bas brtags byar yang mi mdzad pas na rtogs par sla ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1175: nyan thos mdo sde ba rang gis kyang 'dus ma
NK048(tshi)004:1176: byas rnams btags pa tsam las dngos po med par
NK048(tshi)004:1179: nyan rang 'phags pa'i rtogs rigs kyi ngo bo lung rigs tshad ma dang mthun par spyir bshad pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1180: de nyid gtan la 'beb pa'i 'phags pa yab sras kyi lung don bye brag tu bshad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1182: shing rta'i lam srol bzhin du rtogs pa rang gi mtshan nyid ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:1183: de nyid tshad mar sgrub phyir lung dang rigs pas 'thad tshul gsal bar bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1185: 'phags yul dpal ldan zla bas ji ltar bstan tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:1186: bod 'dir kun mkhyen chos rjes de ltar bzhed tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:1187: de nyid shing rta mchog gnyis kyi dgongs par rigs pas sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1189: des na rang lugs sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1190: desa na snga 'gyur ranga lugsa 'khrul ba dang bral ba gang nyid yin zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:1191: dapala ldan zla ba'i zhabs kyis 'jug pa le'u dang
NK048(tshi)004:1192: po rtsa 'grel dang drug pa'i gang zag bdag med
NK048(tshi)004:1193: kyi skabs su nyan rang gis kyang zhi sgo gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:1194: su med pa'i stong pa nyid ji bzhin du rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:1195: dgos par lung dang rigs pas rgya cher bsgrubs nas
NK048(tshi)004:1196: slar stong nyid de'i rab tu dbye ba /
NK048(tshi)004:1197: bdag med 'di ni 'gro ba rnams dgrol phyir zhes pa'i thad kyi rang 'grel lasa /
NK048(tshi)004:1198: nyan rang dang byang sems kyis rtogs pa'i stong nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1199: kyi rab dbye 'di ltar bstan te nyon mongas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1200: sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir nyan ranga rnams la rgyal
NK048(tshi)004:1201: basa ganga zaga gi bdag meda pa'i stong nyid bstan
NK048(tshi)004:1202: pa dang / shesa bya'i sgrib pa spang ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:1203: rgyal sras byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos thams
NK048(tshi)004:1204: cad stong pa'am badga meda pa rdzogsa para bstan par
NK048(tshi)004:1206: 'o na nyan ranga gnyis po la sngar stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:1207: nyid rtogsa pa yod do zhes lung dang rigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1208: gang smras pa de rnams ji ltar yina zhe na
NK048(tshi)004:1209: zhes / rang gzhung la rang gis dogs pa bslangs
NK048(tshi)004:1210: te bsal ba nyan ranga de daga rang 'bras dgra
NK048(tshi)004:1211: bcom pa don du gnyer bas de thob par byed
NK048(tshi)004:1212: pa la gtso bor kun nas nyon mongs pa'i sgrib
NK048(tshi)004:1213: pa tsam spangsa dgos par grub pa'i phyir de'i rtsa
NK048(tshi)004:1214: ba ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen yul ganga zaga
NK048(tshi)004:1215: gibadaga de med pa'i stong pa nyid rtogs nas sgom
NK048(tshi)004:1216: gyi gzhan cha med gnyis sogs chosa kyi badga meda
NK048(tshi)004:1217: pa'i stong pa nyid rdzogsa para ni rtogs shing sgom
NK048(tshi)004:1218: pa meda cesa gsal bar bstan cing stong nyid nyi
NK048(tshi)004:1219: shu po thams cad theg chen thun mong min par
NK048(tshi)004:1220: bshad pas rang bzhed rang gis legs par bkral te
NK048(tshi)004:1221: gsungsa pa bzhina du shes par bya ba kho na
NK048(tshi)004:1222: yin gyi gzhan du rtogs par mi bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1223: gnyis pa klong chen rab 'byams sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1224: dpal ldan zla bas ji ltar gsungs pa de bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:1225: du rgyal ba'i dbang po kun mkhyen klong chen rab
NK048(tshi)004:1226: 'byamsa kyi zhal snga nas 'di ltar sngona gyi slob
NK048(tshi)004:1227: dpona mkhas pa thamsa cada ni /
NK048(tshi)004:1228: nyan rang la chos kyi bdag med rtogs pa yoda
NK048(tshi)004:1229: dang meda cesa phan tshun rtsod par mdzad na yanga
NK048(tshi)004:1230: kho bo rang gis bzheda pa ni sngona ston pa
NK048(tshi)004:1231: zhal bzhugs dus kyi nyan thos rnams la'ang bdag yod
NK048(tshi)004:1232: med smra ba gnyis byung ba sogs dang phyis su
NK048(tshi)004:1233: yang bye mdo sogs grub mtha' 'dzin pa sde bdun
NK048(tshi)004:1234: dang mdo sde'i rjes su 'brang ba mang zhig byung
NK048(tshi)004:1235: ba dang rang rgyal la'ang bse ru dang tshogs na
NK048(tshi)004:1236: spyod pa la sogs dbang po rno rtul ci rigas
NK048(tshi)004:1237: par yod pa lung las gsal bar snang na'ang don
NK048(tshi)004:1238: la de dag gis rang 'bras dgra bcoma pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1239: thob pa la ni phung pora brten nas btags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1240: nga'o snyam du 'dzina pa'i ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1241: zhen yul du gyur pa'i badga de rang bzhin gyis
NK048(tshi)004:1242: grub pa med pa'i stong nyid yin para ma rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1243: pa de srid du rang 'bras thara ba de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1244: thob pa mina pasa brten nas btags pa'i rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:1245: ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi bdag rang bzhin med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1246: stong pa nyid de tsam zhig ji bzhin du rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1247: pa yoda pas dgra bcom thob par gyur pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:1248: na yanga cha med gnyis sogs chos thams cad badga
NK048(tshi)004:1249: meda pa'i stong pa nyid rdzogsa para rtogsa pa meda
NK048(tshi)004:1250: de / dper na chung ngu yung 'bru srin gyis
NK048(tshi)004:1251: zosa shing phug pa yi nanga gi nam mkha'a bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:1252: du nyan ranga gi badga meda rtogs pa'i stong nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1253: chung ngur mdo las gsungsa pa ste de yi phyir
NK048(tshi)004:1254: na stong nyid rtogs pa yod kyang chung ngur gyur
NK048(tshi)004:1255: pa la dgongs nas damna pa la dagga pa'i sgras
NK048(tshi)004:1256: chosa kyi bdag med stong pa nyid ma rtogsa zhesa
NK048(tshi)004:1257: bzheda pa yin par yid bzhin rin po che'i mdzod
NK048(tshi)004:1258: kyi 'grel pa pad+ma dkar por gsungsa pa yin no
NK048(tshi)004:1260: 'di ni phul byung sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1261: 'di 'dra'i lung rigs tshad mas grub pa'i bzhed pa
NK048(tshi)004:1262: ni sngon chad su yang ma byung bas phul du
NK048(tshi)004:1263: byung ba'i legas par bshad pa nyid de 'di dang
NK048(tshi)004:1264: mtshungsa pa'i nges pa don gyi bka' dang shing rta'i
NK048(tshi)004:1265: dgongs pa gsal bar byed pa gcig kyang rang gazhana
NK048(tshi)004:1267: dpera na rgya mtsho chena po'i chu las hub ganga
NK048(tshi)004:1268: tsam zhig btung na yanga de tsam gyi rgya mtsho
NK048(tshi)004:1269: chen po'i chu ni ma btung ngo zhesa su khasa
NK048(tshi)004:1270: len du mi runga ba ltar chosa kyi bye brag
NK048(tshi)004:1271: ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen yul nga tsam po
NK048(tshi)004:1272: de nyid stong pa'am bdag meda par mthonga ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:1273: na stong pa nyid mthonga bar 'doda dgos pas rin
NK048(tshi)004:1275: ji ltar mig ni 'khrul ba yis //
NK048(tshi)004:1278: rgyu med pa yi me bzhin du //
NK048(tshi)004:1279: gnas med len med mya ngan 'das //
NK048(tshi)004:1280: zhes pa'i bar tshigs bcad dgu dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1282: mi rtag sdug bsngal stong pa zhes //
NK048(tshi)004:1283: bya ba gsum pos sems sbyong byed //
NK048(tshi)004:1284: mchog tu sems ni sbyong byed pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:1285: chos ni rang bzhin med pa yin //
NK048(tshi)004:1286: zhes sogs rgya cher sgrub pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1288: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur gyi //
NK048(tshi)004:1289: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin zhes sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1290: 'on kyang rgya mtsho'i chu la hub gciga btung bas
NK048(tshi)004:1291: rgya mtsho chen po'i chu yongs su rdzogsa para khonga
NK048(tshi)004:1292: du ma songa ba ltar du mtha'a daga shesa bya'i
NK048(tshi)004:1293: ranga bzhina ma lus pa kun stong para rtogsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:1294: med pa'i phyir na chos kyi badga meda dam stong
NK048(tshi)004:1295: pa nyid rdzogsa para ma mthonga bar 'doda dgos pas
NK048(tshi)004:1297: cher 'os sems bskyed spang ba'i skye bo dag /
NK048(tshi)004:1298: gzhan don sems dang de yi thabs rnyed dang //
NK048(tshi)004:1299: dgongs chen don dang de nyid mchog mthong bas //
NK048(tshi)004:1300: bde ba de spangs zhi bar 'gro bar 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:1301: zhes sogs rnam grangs du mas sgrub pa dang slob dpon gyis /
NK048(tshi)004:1302: khyod kyis theg pa chen po las /
