NK048(tshi)004:1303: rang gi chos la bdag med rtogs //
NK048(tshi)004:1304: de bzhin blo dang ldan rnams la //
NK048(tshi)004:1305: thugs rje'i dbang gis ston par mdzad //
NK048(tshi)004:1306: ces sogs gsungs pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1308: gnas skabs rdzogs par ma rtogs pa'i 'thad sgrubs grub mtha'i nges 'byed dang bcas pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1309: mthar thug rdzogs par rtogs pa'i lung don rigs pas sgrub tshul dang bcas pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1311: gal te chos gcig sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1312: dper na 'dam bu gcig khong stong du mthong na
NK048(tshi)004:1313: 'dam bu thams cad khong stong du mthong ba ltar
NK048(tshi)004:1314: 'dir yang gala te chosa gciga ces gang zag gi
NK048(tshi)004:1315: bdag stong pa nyid du mthong zhing rtogs na /
NK048(tshi)004:1316: chos gzhan thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du mtho
NK048(tshi)004:1317: zhing rtogs rigs na yang chos gzhan thamsa cada stong
NK048(tshi)004:1318: pa nyid du mi mthonga ba la rigs pas 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:1319: pa ci zhig yod zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:1321: nyan rang de gasa te de dag rnams kyis gzugs
NK048(tshi)004:1322: la sogs pa'i chos thams cad rang bzhin med par
NK048(tshi)004:1323: ston pa nges pa'i lung dang de ltar dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1324: yang dag pa'i rigas pa dang zab mo'i man ngaga
NK048(tshi)004:1325: dag gisa tshul bzhin tu brtagsa shing mthong ba don
NK048(tshi)004:1326: du gnyer na chos gcig stong par mthong ba de
NK048(tshi)004:1327: ltar chos gzhan thams cad kyang stong pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:1329: 'on kyang re zhiga dman pa nyan thosa kyi rigas
NK048(tshi)004:1330: cana rnams ni rang nyid 'khor bar sgrags nas zhi
NK048(tshi)004:1331: bde'i thar ba tsam zhig thob par 'dod nas ganga
NK048(tshi)004:1332: zaga gi bdag meda tsam kho na rtogs shing nyon
NK048(tshi)004:1333: mongs spangs pa'i lam la zhena pasa sgom pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:1334: rang rgyal gyi rigs can rnams kyang rang don du
NK048(tshi)004:1335: zhi bde'i 'bras bu thob par 'dod pas ston pa
NK048(tshi)004:1336: sangs rgyas dang nyan thos rnams las gang zag gi
NK048(tshi)004:1337: bdag med dang rten cing 'brel 'byung lugs 'byung ldog
NK048(tshi)004:1338: gi lam sogs ston pas theg dman gyi sde snod
NK048(tshi)004:1339: tsam la bskal pa brgya yi bar sogs su tshogs
NK048(tshi)004:1340: lam du goms pas mthar rang 'bras byang chub thob
NK048(tshi)004:1341: pa yin pas mtha'a gazhana chos thams cad stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:1342: nyid du rtogs pa don du mi gnyer bas shin
NK048(tshi)004:1343: tu rtogsa par daka'a ste dper na bum pa btagsa
NK048(tshi)004:1344: para te btags yod du 'doda pa nyan thos pa
NK048(tshi)004:1345: rnams kyis kyang rdul phran te phra rdul btags yod
NK048(tshi)004:1346: du mi 'dod par rdzas su yod par 'doda pa
NK048(tshi)004:1347: bzhina yin no // gala te nyan thos rnams kyis
NK048(tshi)004:1348: kyang bum pa btagsa para ni zhes btags yod tsam
NK048(tshi)004:1349: du rtogsa pa'i blo rigas des phra rdul la yanga
NK048(tshi)004:1350: legs par dpyad na btags yod tsam du rtogsa para
NK048(tshi)004:1351: rigas pa yin moda kyi de lta na'ang re zhiga
NK048(tshi)004:1352: phra rdul btags yod du ma rtogsa par rdzas yod
NK048(tshi)004:1353: kyis stong par mthong mi dgos pa de bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:1354: chos gcig stong par mthong yang chos thams cad stong
NK048(tshi)004:1355: par mthong dgos pa min no //
NK048(tshi)004:1356: der ma zad ragas pa'i gzhi cha bcas btags yod
NK048(tshi)004:1357: dang cha meda kyi phra rdul rdzas yod bden grub
NK048(tshi)004:1358: dag don la dngos su 'gal bar snang ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:1359: na yanga 'gal 'du'i dngos po yin par ma rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:1360: nas nyan rang de daga la re zhiga tu phra
NK048(tshi)004:1361: rdul rang bzhin med par ston pa'i nges pa'i lung
NK048(tshi)004:1362: dang mana ngag zab mo dag gis dbena cing med
NK048(tshi)004:1363: pa'i phyir na mi 'agla ba'i grub mtha'a bzung nas
NK048(tshi)004:1364: rang gi rigs pas kyang snang gzhi med na snang
NK048(tshi)004:1365: ba rnams kyang snal ma med pa'i snam bu bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:1366: du 'gyur ba sogs kyis sgrub pa la 'bad par
NK048(tshi)004:1367: byed do // de bzhina du de ltar ma yin
NK048(tshi)004:1368: par chos gcig stong par mthong bas chos kun stong
NK048(tshi)004:1369: pa nyid du rtogs par 'gyur na theg chen semsa
NK048(tshi)004:1370: tsam pa dag gisa kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1371: snang ba kun brtags rnams rang bzhin meda pa'i stong
NK048(tshi)004:1372: pa nyid du rtogs pa yin na blo des 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:1373: pa'i ngo bo shes pa rang rig rang gsal yanga
NK048(tshi)004:1374: rang bzhin med pa'i stong pa nyid du ci yi
NK048(tshi)004:1375: phyir mi rtogsa te rtogs dgos pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1376: dbu ma rang rgyud pasa kyang dona dama par chos
NK048(tshi)004:1377: thams cad bdena grub meda pa'i stong pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:1378: rtogs pa'i rigas pa des tha snyad du yanga ranga
NK048(tshi)004:1379: matshana gyis grub pa meda pas stong pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)004:1380: para cisa mi rtogsa te rtogs par 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)004:1381: de ltar 'gyur ba des na grub mtha' smra ba
NK048(tshi)004:1382: de dag thamsa cada dbu ma thal 'gyur ba 'ab'a
NK048(tshi)004:1383: zhiga gam kho na nyid du khyod la thal bar
NK048(tshi)004:1384: 'gyur ro // de ltar gyur na nyan ranga rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1385: kyis theg pa chena po yum rgyas 'bring sogs la
NK048(tshi)004:1386: sangs rgyas kyi bka' ma yin pas la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1387: skur ba 'debs shing smod pa'ang ga la srid de
NK048(tshi)004:1388: dgongs don tshul bzhin du longs pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:1389: de 'dra med bzhin du rgyan dang spyod 'jug sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1390: las theg chen bka' sgrub bstan pa rnams kyang skyon
NK048(tshi)004:1391: med la skyon 'gal du zad pas mi 'thad par
NK048(tshi)004:1392: 'gyur ro // rgyu mtshan des na chos gciga gi
NK048(tshi)004:1393: ranga bzhina chos kyi dbyings nyid chos kun la mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:1394: pa nyid yina pas rnam dbyer med na yanga phyi
NK048(tshi)004:1395: dang nanga gi yongas 'dzin la sogs pa'i rkyen gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1396: tshogas pa ji lta ba bzhin du ma tshanga ba
NK048(tshi)004:1397: de srid du chos thams cad spros pa dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:1398: ba'i chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa chen por rtogsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1399: ye shes tshul bzhin du skye bar 'gyur ba shin
NK048(tshi)004:1400: tu bul ba yin pas re zhig rtog par mi
NK048(tshi)004:1401: 'gyur ro // 'gyur te / spyir na dbang po'i
NK048(tshi)004:1402: khyad par las dabnga po shin tu rnona pos ranga
NK048(tshi)004:1403: stobsa kyis spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1405: dbang po rtul po yisa kyang de ltar gzhan la
NK048(tshi)004:1406: mi ltos par ranga gi blo stobs kho nas de
NK048(tshi)004:1407: ma thaga tu spros pa dang bral ba'i stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:1408: nyid yanga dag par ngesa para rtogsa par 'gyur ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1409: khyab pa meda pas tshul 'di ni shin tu 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:1410: pa dang bcas pa kho na yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1411: gnyis pa nam zhig ces kyang sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1412: 'on kyang nyan rang de rnams kyis nam zhiga na
NK048(tshi)004:1413: chos thams cad spros pa dang bral ba'i snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:1414: mnyam nyid chen po cis kyang yongs su rdzogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1415: rtogsa par 'gyur ba ni ngesa pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:1416: nyan rang dgra bcom pa rnams phung po lhag ma
NK048(tshi)004:1417: med pa 'gog pa'i dbyings su zhugs nas bskal pa
NK048(tshi)004:1418: stong phrag bcu yi bar du gnas la de yi
NK048(tshi)004:1419: mathara de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:1420: 'di ltar mya ngan 'das par gang bstan pa 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal dag las khyed thar yang /
NK048(tshi)004:1421: khyod ni da dung mya ngan yongs ma 'das //
NK048(tshi)004:1422: sangs rgyas theg pa mchog 'di btsal bar gyis //
NK048(tshi)004:1423: zhes pa la sogs pas bskul te 'goga pa'i dbyingsa
NK048(tshi)004:1424: de lasa slar dgra bcoma pa rnams ldang ste gzod
NK048(tshi)004:1425: theg pa chena por 'jug pa yin para dam chos
NK048(tshi)004:1426: pad+ma dkar po las gsungsa shing de nas theg chen
NK048(tshi)004:1427: tshogs lam chung ngu nas zhugs te mthar bla na
NK048(tshi)004:1428: med pa'i byang chub chen po brnyes par 'gyur bas
NK048(tshi)004:1429: dgra bcom pa mang zhig sangs rgyas su lung bstan
NK048(tshi)004:1430: pa bzhin no // 'di ltar rigs pas kyang 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:1431: de dbang rnon byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1432: phyi nang gi yongs 'dzin tshang bas tshul ji lta
NK048(tshi)004:1433: ba bzhina du theg pa chena po la yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:1434: par zhugsa pasa kyang stong nyid spros bral chen po
NK048(tshi)004:1435: bdag med mtha' dag rtogs pa la grangs meda pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1436: bskal bar thabs mkhas dang bcas pas 'bad pa chen
NK048(tshi)004:1437: pos gomas dgosa pa yin na /
NK048(tshi)004:1438: nyan thosa dang rang rgyal rang don zhi bde kho
NK048(tshi)004:1439: na dona du gnyer basa bskal pa stong phrag bcu
NK048(tshi)004:1440: po de tsam la 'gog pa'i dbyings su zhugs kyang
NK048(tshi)004:1441: dus kyi yun thung ngu de tsam la badga med
NK048(tshi)004:1442: mtha'a daga gam spros kun bral ba'i stong nyid snang
NK048(tshi)004:1443: stong mnyam nyid chen po rdzogs par ma rtogsa shing
NK048(tshi)004:1444: / da gzod rtogs dgos pa'i gansa skabsa zhig mi
NK048(tshi)004:1445: srid par ci la 'gyur te shin tu srid par
NK048(tshi)004:1446: / 'gyur ro // der ma zad theg chen 'phags
NK048(tshi)004:1447: pa sa thoba rnams la'ang rdzogs smin sbyangs pa'i stobs
NK048(tshi)004:1448: kyis sa nas sar chosa kyi dbyingsa sgrib pa las
NK048(tshi)004:1449: grol ba'i mthong ba je basa je gasla du gong
NK048(tshi)004:1450: nas gong du rdzogsa shing 'phel ba yod pa mina
NK048(tshi)004:1451: nam ste yod na nyan rang dgra bcom pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1453: de ltar rtogs pa de'ang sbyin pa dang tshul khrims
NK048(tshi)004:1454: la sogs bsod nams kyi tshogas mtha' yas pa basgas
NK048(tshi)004:1455: pa'i grogsa dang dbu ma'i gtan tshigs chen po lnga
NK048(tshi)004:1456: la sogs pa rigas pa'i sgo mtha'a yasa pa'i sgrub
NK048(tshi)004:1457: tshul zab mo rnams dang byang chub semsa dpa' rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1458: kyi rdzogs smin sbyang ba sogs kyi spyod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:1459: yongas bsngo'i rkyen rnams phun sum tshogs pa ma tshang
NK048(tshi)004:1460: ba med par legs par tshang na ngesa para dus
NK048(tshi)004:1461: yun thung ngus kyang snang stong dbyer med spros bral
NK048(tshi)004:1462: mnyam pa chen po yongs su rdzogsa para rtogsa para
NK048(tshi)004:1463: 'gyur te / dper na rdo rje theg pa'i thabas
NK048(tshi)004:1464: la mkhas pa'i rkyen phun sum tshogs pa rnams tshang
NK048(tshi)004:1465: basa nye lam zab mo sngagsa kyi thega pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1466: zhugs pa rnams kyis gnas lugs zab mo bde myur
NK048(tshi)004:1467: nyid du rtogsa pa yod pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1469: nyan rang gi stong nyid rtogs par gsungs pa'i lung
NK048(tshi)004:1470: don 'khyogs 'khrul med par rigs pas gsal bar bstan
NK048(tshi)004:1471: pa / mthar thug theg gcig tu gsungs pa'i lung
NK048(tshi)004:1472: don rang la 'thad cing gzhan la mi 'thad par
NK048(tshi)004:1474: rtag bdag spangs kyang sogs tshigs bcad lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1476: bdag ces bya ba bdud kyi sems //
NK048(tshi)004:1477: khyod ni lta bar gyur pa yin //
NK048(tshi)004:1479: 'di la sems can yod ma yin //
NK048(tshi)004:1480: ji ltar yan lag tshogs rnams la //
NK048(tshi)004:1481: brten nas shing ltar brjod pa ltar //
NK048(tshi)004:1482: de bzhin phung po rnam brten nas //
NK048(tshi)004:1483: kun rdzob sems can zhes bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1484: zhes gsungs pa ltar brten nas btags pa tsam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1485: stong pa nyid khong du ma chud par phung po
NK048(tshi)004:1486: nyid ni nges par yod kyi phung po 'di la
NK048(tshi)004:1487: dbang byed pa'i bdag por gyur pa'i bdag rtag gcig
NK048(tshi)004:1488: rang dbang can phyi rol pas kun tu btags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1489: rtag badga de 'dra med par shes nas spangsa par
NK048(tshi)004:1490: gyur kyang des ngar 'dzin phra ba mi spong ste
NK048(tshi)004:1491: 'khor rtsa lhan skyes kyi bdag 'dzin nam ngar 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:1492: de yis / phung po la yul dus kyi cha
NK048(tshi)004:1493: ma phye bar ril pora 'dzin pa la brten nasa
NK048(tshi)004:1494: nga'o snyam pa'i blo 'jug pa'am skye bar 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)004:1495: de yis / yin la / de'i phyir slob dpon 'phags pas /
NK048(tshi)004:1496: ji srid phung pora 'dzina yoda pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1497: de srid de la ngara 'dzina yoda //
NK048(tshi)004:1498: ngar 'dzin yod na yang las te //
NK048(tshi)004:1499: de las yang ni skye ba yin //
NK048(tshi)004:1500: zhes gsungsa pa'i dona ni 'di ltar bdag ngo bos
NK048(tshi)004:1501: grub pa med pa'i stong nyid ma mthong bar du
NK048(tshi)004:1502: rtag bdag spang kyang rung gadgas gzhi rang rgyud kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1503: phung po yoda par gyur cinga /
NK048(tshi)004:1504: der ril por 'dzina cing zhen pa'i semsa pa yoda
NK048(tshi)004:1505: pa ji srid du ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen
NK048(tshi)004:1506: yul du gyur pa'i bdag tu gadgas pa'i rgyu tshogs
NK048(tshi)004:1507: tshang zhing gegs byed pa med pasa 'bras bu ngar
NK048(tshi)004:1508: 'dzin lhan skyes sam bdag 'dzina lhan skyes de ni
NK048(tshi)004:1509: mi ldog pas phung por 'dzin pa spangs dgos par
NK048(tshi)004:1512: de ltar me long brten nas su //
NK048(tshi)004:1513: rang bzhin gzugs brnyan snang mod kyi //
NK048(tshi)004:1514: de ni yang dag nyid du na //
NK048(tshi)004:1515: cung zad kyang ni yod min pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1516: de bzhin phung po rnams brten nas //
NK048(tshi)004:1518: rang gi bzhin gyi gzugs brnyan bzhin //
NK048(tshi)004:1519: yang dag nyid du de 'ga' 'ang med //
NK048(tshi)004:1521: ganga gi phyir na rtag pa'i bdag de med par
NK048(tshi)004:1522: shes nas spangsa par gyur kyang lhan skyes kyi ngar
NK048(tshi)004:1523: 'dzin spang mi nus pa'i rgyu mtshan ni 'di ltar
NK048(tshi)004:1524: gadgas gzhira te gdags gzhi phung po la yul dus
NK048(tshi)004:1525: kyi cha ma phye bar ril por 'dzin pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1526: brten nasa btagsa pa'i nga'am badga tsam po de ni
NK048(tshi)004:1527: ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen yul yin pas /
NK048(tshi)004:1528: de ma bakaga pa'i phyir na ngar 'dzina skye ba
NK048(tshi)004:1529: la gegas su gyur pa brten nas btags pa'i bdag
NK048(tshi)004:1530: med dam stong nyid rtogs pa meda pas yin par
NK048(tshi)004:1531: rigs pa yang dag pas kyang grub pa nyid do
NK048(tshi)004:1532: // des na rin chen phreng ba las /
NK048(tshi)004:1533: lam gsum thog mtha' dbus med pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1535: dkyil 'khor lta bu phan tshun du //
NK048(tshi)004:1537: de ni rang bzhin gnyis ka dang //
NK048(tshi)004:1538: dus gsum nyid du'ang ma mthong phyir //
NK048(tshi)004:1540: de nas las dang skye ba yang //
NK048(tshi)004:1542: de yi phyir na thar pa tsam la sgrib pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1543: nyon mongas pa sa bon dang bcas pa spong bar
NK048(tshi)004:1544: byed pa la phung po la sogas pa'i chos thams
NK048(tshi)004:1545: cad stong pa nyid yin para ji lta ba bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:1546: du nges par rtogsa dgosa pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1547: zhes 'achada pa de dag gis ni slob dpon gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1548: lung 'di'i dona ji lta ba bzhin du bkral ba
NK048(tshi)004:1549: mina te / lung de yi dona ji skad bshad
NK048(tshi)004:1550: pa 'di bzhina du dpal ldan zla basa gsal zhing
NK048(tshi)004:1551: legs par bkral ba yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:1553: gang phyir thub pas bdag de sa chu me //
NK048(tshi)004:1554: rlung dang rnam shes nam mkha' zhes bya ba //
NK048(tshi)004:1555: khams drug dang ni mig sogs reg pa yi //
NK048(tshi)004:1556: rten drug dag la brten nas nyer bstan zhing //
NK048(tshi)004:1557: sems dang sems byung chos rnams nyer bzung nas //
NK048(tshi)004:1558: des gsungs de phyir de ni de rnams dang //
NK048(tshi)004:1559: de nyid ma yin tshogs tsam nyid min te //
NK048(tshi)004:1560: de phyir ngar 'dzin blos de rnams la min //
NK048(tshi)004:1561: bdag med rtogs tshe rtag pa'i bdag spong zhing //
NK048(tshi)004:1562: 'di ni ngar 'dzin rten du'ang mi 'dod pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1563: de phyir bdag med shes pas bdag lta ba //
NK048(tshi)004:1564: dpyis kyang 'byin zhes smra ba shin tu mtshar //
NK048(tshi)004:1565: rang khyim rtsig phug sbrul gnas mthong bzhin du //
NK048(tshi)004:1566: 'di na glang chen med ces dogs bsal te //
NK048(tshi)004:1567: sbrul gyi 'jigs pa'ang spong bar byed pa ni //
NK048(tshi)004:1568: kye ma gzhan gyi gnam por gyur nyid do zhes so //
NK048(tshi)004:1569: des na nyon mongs pa'i skyon gyi rtsa ba 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:1570: rtsa'i bdag gam ngar 'dzin lhan skyes de spong dgos
NK048(tshi)004:1571: par yang / nyon mongs skyon rnams ma lus 'jig tshogs la //
NK048(tshi)004:1572: lta las byung bar blo yis mthong gyur cing //
NK048(tshi)004:1573: bdag ni 'di yi yul du rtogs byas nas //
NK048(tshi)004:1574: rnal 'byor ba yis bdag ni 'gog par byed //
NK048(tshi)004:1576: rgyu mtshan de lta bus na phung po la brten
NK048(tshi)004:1577: nas btagsa pa'i ngar 'dzin lhan skyes kyi zhen yul
NK048(tshi)004:1578: du gyur pa'i nga tsam mam bdag de dngos por
NK048(tshi)004:1579: grub pa med pa'am stong pa nyid du shesa shing
NK048(tshi)004:1580: tshul bzhin du sgom par byas pas gsal bar rab
NK048(tshi)004:1581: gyi mthar thug nas bdag med pa'i gnas lugs mngon
NK048(tshi)004:1582: sum du mthong bar gyur na /
NK048(tshi)004:1583: nga yir 'dzin pa dang nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams
NK048(tshi)004:1584: kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i 'khor ba'i rtsa ba
NK048(tshi)004:1585: lhan skyes kyi ngar 'dzina cha dang bcas pa thams
NK048(tshi)004:1586: cad bdag med rtogs pa'i ye shes rdo rjes bcom
NK048(tshi)004:1587: shing gtan du ldog ste nyon mongs pa sa bon
NK048(tshi)004:1588: dang bcas pa rim bzhin spangs nas rgyun zhugs nas
NK048(tshi)004:1589: dgra bcom pa'i bar thob par 'gyur bas /
NK048(tshi)004:1590: rdo rje gcod pa las kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:1592: rgyun du zhugs pa 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun
NK048(tshi)004:1593: du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob bo snyam du sems
NK048(tshi)004:1595: bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so //
NK048(tshi)004:1596: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:1597: bcom ldan 'das de ni gang la'ang zhugs pa ma
NK048(tshi)004:1598: mchis pa'i slad du ste des na rgyun du zhugs
NK048(tshi)004:1600: bcom ldan 'das gal te rgyun du zhugs pa de
NK048(tshi)004:1601: 'di snyam du bdag gis rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:1602: bu thob bo snyam du sems par gyur na de
NK048(tshi)004:1603: nyid de yi bdag tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba lags
NK048(tshi)004:1604: so // sems can du 'dzin pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1606: gang zag tu 'dzin par 'gyur lags so //
NK048(tshi)004:1607: zhes pa nas 'bras gnas phyi ma gsum la'ang de bzhin du gsungs so //
NK048(tshi)004:1608: de bzhin du rang rgyal rnams kyang srid pa tham
NK048(tshi)004:1609: pa'i skabs su dur khrod kyi rus gong la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1610: pa'i rkyen las rten 'brel yan lag bcu gnyis kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1611: dgongs don tshul bzhin du rtogs nas lam bzhi stan
NK048(tshi)004:1612: thog gcig tu mngon par byas te rten 'brel gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1613: rtogs pa gsal zhing zab pas gzungs don rtog pa
NK048(tshi)004:1615: des na nyan rang de dag gis rang 'bras thob pa la rtogs rigs de kho nas choga pas /
NK048(tshi)004:1617: skyes pa shes pas 'jig pa shes //
NK048(tshi)004:1618: 'jig pa shes pas mi rtag shes //
NK048(tshi)004:1619: mi rtag nyid la 'jug shes pas //
NK048(tshi)004:1620: dam pa'i chos kyang rtogs par 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:1622: skye dang 'jig pa rnam spang bar //
NK048(tshi)004:1623: shes par gyur pa de dag ni //
NK048(tshi)004:1624: ltar gyur srid pa'i rgya mtsho brgal //
NK048(tshi)004:1627: gang la rtag tu 'gro rnams ngar 'dzin blo //
NK048(tshi)004:1628: rab tu 'byung zhing de yi gang yin der //
NK048(tshi)004:1629: nga yir 'dzin blo 'byung ba'i bdag de ni //
NK048(tshi)004:1630: ma brtags grag par gti mug las yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1631: gang phyir byed po med can las med pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1632: de phyir bdag gi bdag med par yod min //
NK048(tshi)004:1633: de phyir bdag dang bdag gis stong lta zhing //
NK048(tshi)004:1634: rnal 'byor pa de rnam par grol bar 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:1636: de las gzhan theg chen nas bshad pa'i chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1637: bdag med rdzogs par rtogs pa 'phags pa yab sras
NK048(tshi)004:1638: kyi dgongs par 'chad pa ni shin tu mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:1639: pa zhig ste rigs tshogs dang 'jug pa sogs dang
NK048(tshi)004:1641: des na rang don du zhi bde tsam gyi thar
NK048(tshi)004:1642: pa thob pa la phung po lnga du ma dang
NK048(tshi)004:1643: skad cig gi tshul gyis mi bden par mthong nas
NK048(tshi)004:1644: rnam bdun shing rta'i rigs pas gang zag gi bdag
NK048(tshi)004:1645: med ji lta bar rtogs pa kho nas 'grub pas
NK048(tshi)004:1646: na gzhan phung sogs chos thams cad theg chen nas
NK048(tshi)004:1647: bshad pa ltar stong par rtogs mi dgos de dper
NK048(tshi)004:1648: na thag pa mthong ba la brten nas rkyen gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1649: dbang gis 'khrul te sprul du 'dzin pa la gdags
NK048(tshi)004:1650: gzhi thaga pa rang nyid ji lta ba bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:1651: stong pa'am meda para ma shesa kyang sbrul 'dzina de
NK048(tshi)004:1652: ni yul thag pa de'i dkar nag la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1653: rnam pa gsal nas sbrul du 'khrul ba skyed pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1654: cha ma grub cing sbrul nyid meda par mngon sum
NK048(tshi)004:1655: du mthonga basa ldog par 'gyur ba ltar du yin
NK048(tshi)004:1657: 'khor ba'i 'khor lo cha lnga pa g.yo ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:1658: mi g.yo ba 'di nyid rig ste zhes sogs gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:1659: pa bzhin no // gzhan yang nyan rang la chos
NK048(tshi)004:1660: kyi bdag med stong nyid rtogs pa med par rang
NK048(tshi)004:1661: lam gyis 'bras bu mi thob na /
NK048(tshi)004:1662: dbu ma theg gsum thun mong ba'i lam du 'gyur ba sogs skyon mang ngo //
NK048(tshi)004:1664: mthar ni nges pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1665: chos thams cad bdag med pa'i gnas lugs chos dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:1666: de bzhin nyid snang stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:1667: pa chen po ji lta ba de bzhin du mthar
NK048(tshi)004:1668: ni nyan rang de dag gis kyang ngesa para rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1670: 'od srung chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs na mya ngan las 'das pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:1671: de yang gcig yin gyi gnyis dang gsum ni ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:1673: 'khor 'das kyi bsdus pa'i chosa rnams kun gyi chos
NK048(tshi)004:1674: dbyings de bzhin nyid la rnam dbyer med pas gciga
NK048(tshi)004:1675: yina cing de nyid sgrib pa phra mos kyang ma
NK048(tshi)004:1676: gos par shin tu gsal bar mthonga ba'i yul can
NK048(tshi)004:1677: gyi gzigs tshul la'ang rnam dbyer med par gciga yin
NK048(tshi)004:1678: pasa mthar thug thega pa gcig nyid du 'grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:1679: yi rigas pa'i gnad dam pa 'di nyid 'phags mchog
NK048(tshi)004:1680: klu sgrub yaba sras kyi smra ba bla na med
NK048(tshi)004:1682: chos kyi dbyings la dbyer med kyir //
NK048(tshi)004:1683: gtso bor theg dbyer ma mchis kyang //
NK048(tshi)004:1684: khyod kyi theg pa gsum bstan pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1685: sems can rnams ni bzhugs phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:1688: gang phyir 'di na de nyid shes las dri ma mtha' dag sel ba ni /
NK048(tshi)004:1689: lhur byed gzhan med chos rnams de nyid rnam 'gyur dbye la'ang bsten min zhing /
NK048(tshi)004:1690: de nyid yul can blo gros 'di yang tha dad 'gyur ba ma yin pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1691: de yi phyir na khyod 'gro la theg pa mi mnyam dbyer med bstan /
NK048(tshi)004:1692: zhes legs par gsungs pa yin na /
NK048(tshi)004:1693: gal te khyod kyi 'dod pa'i lugsa 'di ltar na
NK048(tshi)004:1694: rnam dbyer bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings de nyid nyan
NK048(tshi)004:1695: ranga dgra bcom pa rnams kyis sngar nas mthonga zina
NK048(tshi)004:1696: pa yin pasa sngar ma mthong bar da gzod de
NK048(tshi)004:1697: dag gis de nyid mthong ba'i rigas pa de yisa
NK048(tshi)004:1698: mthar thug thega pa gciga tu ci zhiga 'grub ste
NK048(tshi)004:1699: sgrub byed med pa'i dama baca'a tsam du 'gyur te
NK048(tshi)004:1700: / sgrub byed med kyang bsgrub bya 'grub na gang yang 'grub par 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)004:1701: tshad mas grub pa'i rang lugs 'dir ni gsal stong
NK048(tshi)004:1702: zung du 'jug pa'i ye shesa ganga zhig mathara thug
NK048(tshi)004:1703: pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzigas pa de kho
NK048(tshi)004:1704: na nyid la yul dang yul can gyi spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:1705: sogs gang yang ma grub pas chos dbyings de bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:1706: nyid la rnam dbyer med pas gciga ces su gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:1707: pa de la theg pa rnams mthar phyin par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:1708: pa yin te / dbyings de ni ngo bos mi
NK048(tshi)004:1709: stong pas rtag pa dang stong pa phyang chad kyang
NK048(tshi)004:1710: ma yin par zung 'jug gdod ma'i chos nyid ji
NK048(tshi)004:1711: lta ba bzhin mngon du gyur pa yin pas nyan
NK048(tshi)004:1712: rang byang 'aphagas kun kyang dngos sam brgyud nas de
NK048(tshi)004:1713: la gzhola zhing 'abba pas mthar thug par gyur pa
NK048(tshi)004:1714: las gzhan gang yang med pa'i gnad kyis de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1715: rtogs pas mthar thug gcig tu sgrub pa 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1716: shin tu 'thad pa dang bcas pa kho na yin
NK048(tshi)004:1717: pa yin te / no // gsum pa des na tshul 'di sogs tshig bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1718: des na gong du bshad pa'i tshul 'di ltar legs
NK048(tshi)004:1719: para rtogsa par gyur na nges pa don gyi bka'
NK048(tshi)004:1720: dang de'i dgongs 'grel klu sgrub yab sras kyi lugs
NK048(tshi)004:1721: dbu ma rtsa 'jug la sogs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:1722: rgyal tshab byamsa pa'i gzhung bzang rgyan rnam gnyis sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1723: nas ji skad bstan pa rnams la nang 'gal gyi
NK048(tshi)004:1724: nyes cha phra ba tsam yang med par rtogs pas
NK048(tshi)004:1725: / phana tshun dper na bu rama sbrang rtsi ro
NK048(tshi)004:1726: gcig pas spang blang med par yid la bde bar
NK048(tshi)004:1727: 'bab pa bzhina du gcig spang gcig sgrub mi dgos
NK048(tshi)004:1728: par lhan ciga yi gara der te bde ba 'aju
NK048(tshi)004:1729: yi ste dgongs pa gcig tu rtogs pas yid ches
NK048(tshi)004:1730: bde blag tu skye bar 'gyur gyi /
NK048(tshi)004:1731: de las gazhana du bkral ba dag ni dper na
NK048(tshi)004:1732: mi 'phrod pa'i zasa zos pas khong skran gso med
NK048(tshi)004:1733: du gyur pa bzhina du nges pa don gyi mdo
NK048(tshi)004:1734: rgyud dang dbu ma rtsa 'jug dang sher phyin sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1735: kyi dgongs don phan tshun 'gal 'dur rtogs pas gcig
NK048(tshi)004:1736: spang gcig sgrub tu dgos pas khonga na mi bde'i
NK048(tshi)004:1737: skran chen po lta bus shin tu spos par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:1738: pa'i tshe de la mdo rgyud bstan bcos zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:1739: lung dang yang dag pa'i rigas pa phyogs rer ma
NK048(tshi)004:1740: song ba sna tshogs kyi gatsaga bu gcig rno gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:1741: rno lta bu brgya phrag du ma lhan cig gdengas
NK048(tshi)004:1742: shinga 'debas par gzas pa la yida gting nas sngar
NK048(tshi)004:1743: zhing mi bzod pa'i dbang gis chos dang gang zag
NK048(tshi)004:1744: la log par lta bas skur 'debs kyi ngag gi
NK048(tshi)004:1745: ca co sna tshogs pas gdung zhing shin tu phung
NK048(tshi)004:1746: khrol chen por 'gyur bar nges pas bag yod par
NK048(tshi)004:1747: bya'o // nges pa'i mdo rgyud bstan bcos nang 'gal ba'i /
NK048(tshi)004:1748: lung rigs bgrod dkar 'phyan pa'i 'phyang mo nyug /
NK048(tshi)004:1749: 'di tshul 'di bzhin smra ba'i rta bdun dbang //
NK048(tshi)004:1750: lung rigs mkha' la rang dbang 'byor min nam /
NK048(tshi)004:1752: dris lan gsum pa mnyam bzhag 'dzin stangs yod med gang 'thad kyi lan la gsum /
NK048(tshi)004:1753: mnyam bzhag 'dzin stangs med par bzhed pa'i shan 'byed gol sgrib bsal ba'i gtan tshig dang bcas pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1754: 'dzin stangs yod med gnyis po lam gyi sbyor dngos
NK048(tshi)004:1755: su sgrub pa'i mnyam bzhag gi 'jug tshul 'khrul med
NK048(tshi)004:1756: du bstan pa / mthar thug nges shes kyis drangs
NK048(tshi)004:1757: pa'i sgom stobs las 'dzin stangs kun dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1758: mnyam bzhag ye shes klong du 'gyur tshul lo //
NK048(tshi)004:1760: 'dzin stangs med par gsung ba'i yang log gi 'dod tshul ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:1761: yang dag pa'i don nyid gsal bar rtogs phyir gol sgrib kyi 'khrul cha rigs pas bsal ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1763: legs par rtogs pa mtha' bral 'phags pa'i ye shes su bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1764: log par rtog pa tha mal 'khrul shes sor bzhag tu bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1766: lta ba'i dngos gzhi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1767: de la gnas lugs lta ba'i dngosa gzhi la mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:1768: pa bzhag ste skyong ba'i dus kha ciga yod med
NK048(tshi)004:1769: la sogs pa gang cir yanga mi 'dzina de 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:1770: du mi rung ngo zhes zer ba 'di rigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1771: yang dag pas legs par brtags na cira yanga mi
NK048(tshi)004:1772: 'dzina zhesa pa'i dona de nyid legas para rtogsa pas
NK048(tshi)004:1773: yang dag pa zhig dang loga par rtog nas 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:1774: bar 'phyan pa zhig dang gnyis su yod pas dang
NK048(tshi)004:1775: po ni yod pa dang med pa la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1776: mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i chos
NK048(tshi)004:1777: dbyings snang stong zung 'jug rang byung gi ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:1778: tshul bzhin du rtogs nas bsam brjod mtha' dag las
NK048(tshi)004:1781: gang tshe dngos dang dngos med dag /
NK048(tshi)004:1782: blo yi mdun na mi gnas pa //
NK048(tshi)004:1783: de tshe rnam pa gzhan med pas //
NK048(tshi)004:1784: dmigs pa med par rab tu zhi //
NK048(tshi)004:1785: zhes gsungs pa ltar gnyis snang nub pa'i 'aphagas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1786: mnyam bzhag so so rang rig pa'i ye shesa kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1787: mdun na ma ngos na stong dang mi stong yod
NK048(tshi)004:1788: pa dang med pa la sogs pa'i spros pa ganga
NK048(tshi)004:1789: yanga gansa pa meda par mngon sum du mthonga basa
NK048(tshi)004:1790: yod med la sogs pa'i 'dzina stangsa thams cad chos
NK048(tshi)004:1791: kyi dbyings su chu la chu bzhag pa bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:1792: rang gi ngang gisa zhig nas med par gyur ba
NK048(tshi)004:1793: ste / stong gasla spros pa dang bral ba'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:1794: shes mthong ba de gzhan gyis bsnyad par mi nus
NK048(tshi)004:1795: pas nam mkha' dwangs ba'i dbyings la lta ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:1797: rgyal yum sdud pa las nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1798: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong zhes don 'di brtags par gyis //
NK048(tshi)004:1799: de ltar chos mthong ba yang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
NK048(tshi)004:1800: mthong ba dpe gzhan gyis ni bsnyad par nus ma yin //
NK048(tshi)004:1803: gnyis pa dran med sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1804: cir yang mi 'dzin pa'i don la log par rtog
NK048(tshi)004:1805: pas gnyis pa lta ba'i nges shes dang bral nas
NK048(tshi)004:1806: dran meda tho me ba'i tshul du 'jog par 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:1807: pa ni / gnas lugs ma mthong bzhin du byar
NK048(tshi)004:1808: med du 'jog pa ha shanga gi lugsa dang mtshungs
NK048(tshi)004:1809: te 'di ltar gnas lugs spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:1810: ji lta ba bzhin du gtan la phebs bar ma
NK048(tshi)004:1811: dpyad cing ma rtogs par rang gar ci yang yid
NK048(tshi)004:1812: la mi byed do zhes 'dzin stangs kyis dran med
NK048(tshi)004:1813: tho me ba'i tshul du rtsol med du tsena ner
NK048(tshi)004:1814: bazhaga pa yisa ngo bos stong pa'i rang bzhin lhag
NK048(tshi)004:1815: par mthonga bas gasla ba'i ye shes kyi mkhyen cha
NK048(tshi)004:1816: meda para dper na mtsho gting zab mor rdo 'phang
NK048(tshi)004:1817: ba bzhina du ji yin 'di yin med par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:1818: nas shes rgyud sngar las bzang du mi 'gro bar
NK048(tshi)004:1819: tha mala du gansa pa ni chags sdang la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1821: byams snying rje byang chub kyi sems dang rgyu 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:1822: la yid ches snying nas skye ba sogs lam rtags
NK048(tshi)004:1823: kyi yon tan gang yang mi 'byung bas log rtog
NK048(tshi)004:1825: lam gyi rnal 'byor gang yang min no //
NK048(tshi)004:1826: de yang dper na ci yanga meda pa 'di la /
NK048(tshi)004:1827: dbu mas spros pa ci yang meda par rigs pas
NK048(tshi)004:1828: mthong ba dang gzugsa meda kyis ci yang meda para
NK048(tshi)004:1829: mos pas sgom pa gnyis tshig tsam zhig mtshungs kyang
NK048(tshi)004:1830: don la gtan nas mi mtshungs pa ltar cir yang
NK048(tshi)004:1831: mi 'dzin zhes pa'i tshig tsam mtshungsa pa'am 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)004:1832: 'di dag kyang dona la rnam pa kun tu mi
NK048(tshi)004:1833: mtshungsa pas mi 'dra ba ste mchog dman gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:1834: par ganma dang sa bzhina du mchis shing shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:1835: tha dad pa yin pas legs par shan 'byed dgos
NK048(tshi)004:1837: ngo bo stong cha la gol sa bsal phyir la bzla ba'i man ngag rigs pas bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:1838: rang bzhin rig cha la sgrib pa spong phyir shan 'byed kyi 'gags don gnad du dril ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1839: dang po de ltar mtha' bzhi'i sogs tshigs bcad dgu dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1840: de ltar yul chos kyi dbyings yod med la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1841: pa'i mtha' bzhi'i spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1842: snang stong zung 'jug mnyam pa chen po la yul
NK048(tshi)004:1843: can ye shes kyis kyang de bzhin du mtha'a bzhi
NK048(tshi)004:1844: po ganga du'nga mi 'dzina par shin tu phra ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1845: gnyis snang thams cad nub ste gnyis su med par
NK048(tshi)004:1846: gyur na mtha' bzhi po de lasa 'adsa pa'am de
NK048(tshi)004:1847: ma yin pa'i 'dzina stangsa gzhan zhiga gtan nas meda
NK048(tshi)004:1848: cing mi srid pasa 'dzina stangsa mtha' dag meda para
NK048(tshi)004:1849: 'doda pa yin pas 'di ni cir yang mi 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:1850: zhes pa'i don tshul bzhin du gtan la phebs pa
NK048(tshi)004:1851: yin no // de las gzhan du gal te 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:1852: stangsa ci yang meda ces brjod pa'i tshig des don
NK048(tshi)004:1853: de nyid yang dag par ma rtogs pasa blun po
NK048(tshi)004:1854: kha ciga man ngag gi gnad ma lung rigs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:1855: dpyad pa med par dang po nasa gang du'ang 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:1856: du mi rung bas cira yanga mi 'dzina par tha
NK048(tshi)004:1857: mal du lhod pa zhig dgos pa nyid do zhes
NK048(tshi)004:1858: smra ba ni shin tu mi rigs pas lo zhes
NK048(tshi)004:1859: yin no // ma rangs pa'o // ji ltar mi 'thad na /
NK048(tshi)004:1860: thog ma med pa'i dus na 'gro ba 'di kun
NK048(tshi)004:1861: lung rigs man ngag don du mi gnyer bar rang
NK048(tshi)004:1862: gar tha mal du klod shin tu chesa pasa khamas
NK048(tshi)004:1863: gsum 'khor bar gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de gtan
NK048(tshi)004:1864: du 'khyams par gyur pa 'di ltar yin na da
NK048(tshi)004:1865: dung lhod dgos so zhes bklagsa pa'am bsnan te bskul
NK048(tshi)004:1866: du ci zhig dgos te mi dgosa shing bskul yang
NK048(tshi)004:1867: mi rung ngo // yang gal te sems can de
NK048(tshi)004:1868: daga lung rigs man ngag dang bral bas gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:1869: kyi rang ngo mi shesa shing ma mthong ba'i dbang
NK048(tshi)004:1870: gis zo chun gyi rgyun bzhina du 'khor ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:1871: mi rung ngo // mod / badga caga gis ni
NK048(tshi)004:1872: gnas lugs zab mo'i ranga gi ngo bo tshul bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:1873: du shes pas rtogs ldan rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug
NK048(tshi)004:1874: yin pas lhod de bzhag pas don grub bo zer
NK048(tshi)004:1875: mi rung ngo // mod / na / gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:1876: dona dam pa'i ranga ngo shesa shing rtogs pa la
NK048(tshi)004:1877: lung rigs man ngag gang rung gis phyi nang gi
NK048(tshi)004:1878: chos kun rang rang gi ngo bos gdod nas stong
NK048(tshi)004:1879: pas bdena pa'i stong pa nyid yin pa la phu
NK048(tshi)004:1880: thaga gting nas choda pa zhig nges par dgosa kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1881: de lta ma yin par rang gar 'khrul ba'i snang
NK048(tshi)004:1882: ba la 'di ni badga dang 'di ni gazhana yin
NK048(tshi)004:1883: no zhesa blun po ba lang rdzi yan chad sus
NK048(tshi)004:1884: kyang bdag nyid rang ngo shes pa yin na /
NK048(tshi)004:1885: de la 'bad pa sna tshogs pas mnyam par bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:1886: ste sgom yang ci zhig dgosa te sgom pa don
NK048(tshi)004:1888: gal te de ltar ma yin par rang gi semas
NK048(tshi)004:1889: 'di la dkar po la sogs pa kha dog gi
NK048(tshi)004:1890: mdoga dang gru bzhi la sogs pa dbyibsa dang dang
NK048(tshi)004:1891: po byung sa bar du gansa sa tha ma 'gro
NK048(tshi)004:1892: sa la brtag pa'i tshe de dag ci yang ma
NK048(tshi)004:1893: mthong ba yin pas gnas lugs stong para rtogsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:1894: yin no zhe na yang 'di ni 'khor 'das kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1895: chosa kun gyi gnas lugs gtan la 'bebs pa'i man
NK048(tshi)004:1896: ngag gi 'chad tshul shin tu zab pa'i gnad dam
NK048(tshi)004:1897: pa rtogs dka' la chod che ba ste 'di la'ang
NK048(tshi)004:1898: legs par ma brtags na gol sa shina tu che
NK048(tshi)004:1899: bar snang ste / ji ltar na semas 'di ni
NK048(tshi)004:1900: dbyibs dang kha dog sogs gzugas cana gyi dngos po
NK048(tshi)004:1901: ma yina pasa na mkhas blun sus kyang dbyibs dang
NK048(tshi)004:1902: mdoga la sogas par mthonga ba mi srid pas de
NK048(tshi)004:1904: de tsam la gnas lugs spros pa dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:1905: stong pa nyid ngo 'phrod pa'am rtogs pa yin no
NK048(tshi)004:1906: snyam na shina tu gol ba yin te dper na
NK048(tshi)004:1907: lan gcig ma yin par lana brgyar yang nas yang
NK048(tshi)004:1908: du brtagsa kyang mi yi mgora ba lang la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1909: phyugs kyi rwa co yod pa min pas mthonga ba
NK048(tshi)004:1910: mi srid la rwa co de ma mthonga basa mi'i
NK048(tshi)004:1911: mgo bo de nyid stong pa nyid yin para rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1912: so zhe na stong nyid sus kyang rtogs par sla
NK048(tshi)004:1913: bas blun po ba lang rdzi yang stong nyid 'bad
NK048(tshi)004:1914: med du rtogs nas grol bar thal ba la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:1916: des na sems kyi khang bu bshig pa'i man ngag
NK048(tshi)004:1917: la brten nas sems la dbyibs dang kha dog byung
NK048(tshi)004:1918: gnas 'gro gsum sogs la brtags pa'i rigas pa'i dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:1919: pa desa / sems kyi chos nyid chos dbyings de
NK048(tshi)004:1920: bzhin nyid kyi gansa lugsa skyon med pa'i yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:1921: pa thiga po zhig mthonga bar gyur pa yin na
NK048(tshi)004:1922: pa desa / / rang gi semsa de ni snang
NK048(tshi)004:1923: tsam 'gags pa med pas sgyu ma lta bu la
NK048(tshi)004:1924: ngo bo ye stong bdena pa meda pas rig stong
NK048(tshi)004:1925: dbyer med chen por gting nasa riga cing rtogs par
NK048(tshi)004:1926: pa desa / / 'gyur la / de yi tshe
NK048(tshi)004:1927: rang gi thada ka'i mdun gyi nam mkha'a la pa
NK048(tshi)004:1928: ltas pas ci yang mthong ba med pa bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:1929: ranga gi semas nyid ci yang mthong ba med par
NK048(tshi)004:1930: ye stong rtsa ba dang bral bas stong pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:1931: bzhin du de nyid rnam pa 'gyu bar snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:1933: bzhina pa'i rnam pa 'di yanga ngo bo spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:1934: dang bral ba'i stong pa yi bdag nyid can du
NK048(tshi)004:1935: ngesa pa'i shesa pa the tshom thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:1936: nas kho thag nang nas chod cing stong rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:1937: ngam gsal stong ngam rig stong gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1938: gnas lugs yang dag par rtogs pa zhig nges par
NK048(tshi)004:1941: yang ni khyod kyi sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:1942: da dung yang ni khyod nyid kyi semsa zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:1943: de ni ci yang meda pa nam mkha'a dang 'dra
NK048(tshi)004:1944: ba zhiga yin par 'dug gama yang na sna tshogas
NK048(tshi)004:1945: shes pa gsal rig zhig las ganga yina zer zhes
NK048(tshi)004:1946: 'dri na / ci yang med pa nam mkha' lta
NK048(tshi)004:1947: bu zhig ma yin par sna tshogs 'char ba'i shes
NK048(tshi)004:1948: pa rtse gcig tu gnas pa'am skad ciga tu'ang mi
NK048(tshi)004:1949: sdod pas g.yo zhing 'gyu ba'i semas gsal rig can
NK048(tshi)004:1950: 'di sems can gyi dngos po su la'ang yoda pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:1951: phyir na rang rang so so'i rgyud na de 'dra'i
NK048(tshi)004:1952: rig pa'am shes pa zhiga yod pa'am 'dug para mkhas
NK048(tshi)004:1953: blun sus kyang mthong bas de nyid rang ngo rang
NK048(tshi)004:1954: gis mthong ba yin par ngesa para smra na /
NK048(tshi)004:1955: de tsam gyis sems kyi gnas lugs rig stong dbyer
NK048(tshi)004:1956: med spros pa dang bral ba'i ngo bo yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:1957: par mthong ba ga la yin te min la /
NK048(tshi)004:1958: gal te de tsam min par de nasa sems gsal
NK048(tshi)004:1959: rig gi ngo bo de la brtags pas dbyibs dang
NK048(tshi)004:1960: kha dog sogs med pas yoda pa ma yina la
NK048(tshi)004:1961: 'gyu ba'am gnas pa gsal rig gi ngo bor yod
NK048(tshi)004:1962: pas phyang chad nam mkha' lta bu'i meda pa'ang mina
NK048(tshi)004:1963: pa'i semsa kyi ngo bo de nyid gnas lugs rdzogs
NK048(tshi)004:1964: pa chen po 'od gsal chos kyi sku yin la
NK048(tshi)004:1965: / de mthong ba ni 'oda gasla chosa sku'i mthong
NK048(tshi)004:1966: ba yina no zhesa zer nas de ltar mthong ba
NK048(tshi)004:1967: des kyang 'od gsal chos sku ngo 'phrod pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:1968: no zhes rang yang mngon par rlom pa dang bacasa
NK048(tshi)004:1969: pas thugs dam du mdzad cing gzhan la'ang ngo sprod
NK048(tshi)004:1970: par byed pa dag gis gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos
NK048(tshi)004:1971: kun med ces skur ba 'debs shing mdo rgyud kyi
NK048(tshi)004:1972: gzhung la thosa pa slob gnyer manga po ma byas
NK048(tshi)004:1973: bar ma zad dgra ltar bltas kyang gcig shesa kun
NK048(tshi)004:1974: grol gyi 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:1975: chos kyi sku mthong ba'am shes so lo zhes shin
NK048(tshi)004:1976: tu mi 'thad pas ma rangs ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:1977: ji ltar mi 'thad na chos thams cad kyi gnas
NK048(tshi)004:1978: lugs mthar thug rig stong zung 'jug 'od gsal rdzogsa
NK048(tshi)004:1979: pa chena po'i rang lugs kyi chos sku'i rang byung
NK048(tshi)004:1980: gi ye shes ni rig pa rang gi ngo bo
NK048(tshi)004:1981: ye stong spros pa dang bral ba yin pas yoda
NK048(tshi)004:1982: pa min zhing rang bzhin 'od gsal lhun grub gdal
NK048(tshi)004:1983: khyab chen po'i ye shes yin pas meda pa mina
NK048(tshi)004:1984: la de gnyis dbye ba med pa'i thugs rje kun
NK048(tshi)004:1985: khyab zang thal rig pa rjen pa ni yod med
NK048(tshi)004:1986: la sogs pa'i mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa thams cad dang
NK048(tshi)004:1987: bral ba bsam brjod las 'das pa gnyug sems don
NK048(tshi)004:1989: khyod kyi mthong zhing sgom pa'i sems ngo 'di ni
NK048(tshi)004:1990: legas par brtagsa shing dpyad na dbyibs dang kha dog
NK048(tshi)004:1991: sogs med pas yod para smra ru mi btub cinga
NK048(tshi)004:1992: 'gyu ba gsal rig tu yod pas meda par yanga
NK048(tshi)004:1993: ni smrar meda pa ste dona du gsal rig gi
NK048(tshi)004:1994: ngo bor yoda pa yin pa dang dbyibs dang kha
NK048(tshi)004:1995: dog sogs kyi ngo bor meda pa yin pas gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:1996: yin nama ste gnyis yin gyi gazhi'am yanga na gsal
NK048(tshi)004:1997: rig gi ngo bo med pa min pa dang dbyibs
NK048(tshi)004:1998: sogs kyi ngo bor yod pa min pas gnyis ka
NK048(tshi)004:1999: min pa'i mu ste gnyis min gyi gzhi gang rung
NK048(tshi)004:2000: zhig lasa rnam pa kun tu ma 'adsa para sems
NK048(tshi)004:2001: de ni yoda mina mid mina gyi gzhi ru yod
NK048(tshi)004:2002: pa zhig tu zhe la mchog tu brnag cing zhen
NK048(tshi)004:2003: gyin gad'a bas sems ngo de ni phyi rol gsang
NK048(tshi)004:2004: ba pa dag gis yod med la sogs par bsam
NK048(tshi)004:2005: gyis mi khyab pa'i badga chen por 'dod pa de
NK048(tshi)004:2006: dang 'di gnyis minga gi rnam grangsa mi 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)004:2007: tsam las dona gyi ngo bo la 'doda tshul tha
NK048(tshi)004:2008: dad par khyad para ci yang meda pa nyid do
NK048(tshi)004:2009: // des na gnad kyi don la rang gi semas
NK048(tshi)004:2010: 'di nyid dang sems de lasa gazhana gyi chos su
NK048(tshi)004:2011: snang ba 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa kun kyang rang
NK048(tshi)004:2012: rang gi ngo bos ye gdod ma nas stong pas
NK048(tshi)004:2013: bden meda du rtogs shing tshul bzhin du ngesa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2014: steng du 'khor 'das kyi snang ba rab 'byams mu
NK048(tshi)004:2015: mtha' med par rten 'byung 'gags med du ranga shar
NK048(tshi)004:2016: basa stong dang rten 'byung dbyer med dam gsal stong
NK048(tshi)004:2017: zung du 'jug pa'i gnas lugs yod med yina mina
NK048(tshi)004:2018: la sogs par sems kyis bsam pa dang ngag gis
NK048(tshi)004:2019: brjod pa thams cad lasa 'adsa pa mtha'a bzhi'i spros
NK048(tshi)004:2020: pa ma lus pa kun dang bral ba'i ganda don
NK048(tshi)004:2021: zab mo yang dag par mthong bas yod med la
NK048(tshi)004:2022: sogs pa'i 'dzin stangs kyi dmigs gtan ci yang meda
NK048(tshi)004:2023: pa'i rig stong dbyer med zang ma thal byung ngo
NK048(tshi)004:2024: zhes zang thal rig pa rjen pa ye grol khyab
NK048(tshi)004:2025: pa rang dag gi ngo bo mthong nas 'dzin stangs
NK048(tshi)004:2026: ci yang med par mnyam par bzhag pa ni cir
NK048(tshi)004:2027: yang mi 'dzin pa'i don yang dag pa yin no
NK048(tshi)004:2028: // // de lta ma yin par khyod kyis sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2029: pa'i sems ngo 'di ni gong du bshad pa ltar
NK048(tshi)004:2030: yina mina gnyis dang bral ba zhig yin zhes blo
NK048(tshi)004:2031: yi mdun na dmigs gtad kyi gzhi zhig 'bena bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:2032: du gansa shing mi 'dor bar 'dzin to zhes 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:2033: stangs yod bzhin cir yang mi 'dzin zhes log par
NK048(tshi)004:2036: dang po'i las can rim gyis pas ji ltar sgom pa lam gyi rim pa'i gzhi 'dzugs pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2037: de la nor 'khrul legs par bsal phyir shan 'byed rig pa'i 'phyongs bshad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2039: thog mar thos pa'i shes rab kyis spros bral med
NK048(tshi)004:2040: dgag gi don la 'dzin stangs dang bcas te ji
NK048(tshi)004:2041: ltar sgom tshul / bar du bsam pa'i shes rab
NK048(tshi)004:2042: kyi zung 'jug spros bral chen po'i don la nges
NK048(tshi)004:2043: pa'i 'dzin stangs dang bcas te yang yang mnyam par
NK048(tshi)004:2044: ltar sgom tshul / 'jog tshul / dngos gzhi bsgom
NK048(tshi)004:2045: pa'i shes rab la brten nas spros bral blo 'das
NK048(tshi)004:2046: chen po'i don la 'dzin stangs kun bral du ji
NK048(tshi)004:2049: bdag gzhan dngos 'dzin sogs tshigs bcad lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2050: 'khor ba'i sems can mtha' dag dang po rang zhes
NK048(tshi)004:2051: bdag la zhen cing bdag gi 'di zhes dngos la
NK048(tshi)004:2052: chags pas badga dang bdag gi ba sogs gazhana du
NK048(tshi)004:2053: rtog cing zhen pa'i dngosa por 'dzina pa 'dira brten
NK048(tshi)004:2054: nasa srid pa khams gsum 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2055: chu bora yang nas yang du brgyud mara 'jug cing
NK048(tshi)004:2056: 'khor ba yin pas na dngos 'dzin 'di daga bzlog
NK048(tshi)004:2057: cing spong bar byed pa'i gnyen po ni gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2058: badga meda pa yi don ji bzhin du rtogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:2059: yis 'dzina stangsa don mthun de nyid yina la /
NK048(tshi)004:2060: de yanga yang dag pa'i rigs pa'i lam gyis bdag
NK048(tshi)004:2061: meda pa'i gnas tshul ji ltar yin pa tshul bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:2062: du ma shesa para rang gar bdag meda para mos
NK048(tshi)004:2063: pasa te mos pa tsam gyis bdag 'dzin bzlog pa
NK048(tshi)004:2064: la ci yang mi phan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2065: dper na rkyen gyi dbang gis thag khral sbrul nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2066: du 'khrul ba las 'jigs shing skrag pa skye ba
NK048(tshi)004:2067: la 'di na sbrul dngos meda do snyam du mos
NK048(tshi)004:2068: pasa 'jigs skrag sel ba la ci yang mi phana
NK048(tshi)004:2069: kyang snang ba la sogs pa'i rkyen la brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:2070: tshul bzhin brtags pas thag khra tsam las sbrul dngos
NK048(tshi)004:2071: meda pa'i yin tshul ji bzhin du mthong bar gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2072: na sbrul gyi 'jigs skrag rtsa ba nas spangsa nus
NK048(tshi)004:2073: pa ji lta ba de bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:2074: de yi phyir na rigs lam yang dag par tshul
NK048(tshi)004:2075: bzhin du dpyad pasa dang po nyid du bdag med
NK048(tshi)004:2076: pa'i gnas lugs tshul bzhin du rtogsa par byas nasa
NK048(tshi)004:2077: de nas dpyad pa tsam kho nas chog par mi
NK048(tshi)004:2078: 'dzin pa'am de tsam nyid du mi bazhaga para thog
NK048(tshi)004:2079: ma meda pa nas bdag gzhan du rtogs pa'i dngosa
NK048(tshi)004:2080: zhen la shin tu gomas ches par de nyid bzlog
NK048(tshi)004:2081: par dka' basa yanga nas yanga du de'i dngos gnyen
NK048(tshi)004:2082: bdag med lta ba nges shes kyi 'dzina stangsa don
NK048(tshi)004:2083: mthun dang bacasa te manyamapara bzhag cing sgom pa ni
NK048(tshi)004:2084: shin tu gal che ba nyid de /
NK048(tshi)004:2085: 'di ltar bdag meda pa'i gnas lugs ji bzhin par
NK048(tshi)004:2086: rtogs shing gomas pasa 'khor ba'i rtsa ba bdag tu
NK048(tshi)004:2087: lta ba nyid drung nas 'byin cing spong bar byed
NK048(tshi)004:2088: pa'i phyir na bdag med kyi 'dzin stangs don mthun
NK048(tshi)004:2089: 'di nyid cis kyang dgosa so zhes gnas lugs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2090: dona ji bzhin du gzigas pa'i dam pa du mas
NK048(tshi)004:2091: nan tan du sgrub par mdzad pa ltar yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:2092: gal shin tu che la dang po'i lasa cana nam
NK048(tshi)004:2093: rim gyis pa'i gang zag las dang po ba rnams
NK048(tshi)004:2094: thar lam la 'jug pa'i sgo yang dag pa gol
NK048(tshi)004:2095: sa dang 'chugsa sa cung zad tsam yang meda pa
NK048(tshi)004:2096: ni bdag med par rtogs pa'i 'dzin stangs don mthun
NK048(tshi)004:2097: la goms pa 'di kho na yina na /
NK048(tshi)004:2098: las dang po ba nyid kyi gnas skabs nasa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:2099: de nyid nges par spong la rang gar 'jog pa
NK048(tshi)004:2100: dgos zhes smra zhing ston pa 'di ni thar 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:2101: kyi gang zag bslu ba'i phyir bdud kyi gasnga tshiga
NK048(tshi)004:2102: rngam po che bkye ba yina pas rim gyis pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2103: gang zag las dang po pas nyan par yang mi
NK048(tshi)004:2104: 'os na nan tan gyis nyams su len mi 'os
NK048(tshi)004:2105: par lta yang ci smos pas bag yod par bya'o
NK048(tshi)004:2106: // gnyis pa 'dzin stangs des drang sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2107: chos kun bdag med pa'i 'dzina stangsa don mthun des
NK048(tshi)004:2108: drang ste 'khor 'das kyi chos kun gdod ma nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2109: nas rang rang gi ngo bos stong pas bdena pas
NK048(tshi)004:2110: stong pa nyid yin pa la nges shesa sus kyang
NK048(tshi)004:2111: mi 'phrog pa mchoga tu gyur pa 'drongsa pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:2112: na / da gdoda gzhan sel gyi meda dgag stong
NK048(tshi)004:2113: rkyang tsam po ba rnam par rtog pa'i gzugs brnyan
NK048(tshi)004:2114: de ni chos kun gyi gansa lugsa mathara thug yang
NK048(tshi)004:2115: dag pa ma yina pasa der yang 'dzin pa med
NK048(tshi)004:2116: par 'dzin pa'i mtha' shin tu phra ba'ang spangs te
NK048(tshi)004:2117: sgro 'dogas so gnyis po thams cad dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:2118: yi spros pa kun dang bral ba'i stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2119: snang stong zung 'jug mnyam nyid chena po de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2120: gtan la phab cing yang dag par mnyam par bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:2121: ste sgom par bya dgos so //
NK048(tshi)004:2122: de ltar na chos kun gdod ma nas ma skyes
NK048(tshi)004:2123: par ngo bos stong pas bdena stong yin par phu
NK048(tshi)004:2124: thag gting nas chod cing nges shes mchog tu gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2125: pa 'drongs nasa slar yang stong pa de nyid rten
NK048(tshi)004:2126: 'byung gi snang ba 'gags med nyid du rang shar
NK048(tshi)004:2127: ba yi zung 'jug gi don la nges shes yang
NK048(tshi)004:2128: dag pa bskyed de goms par gyur pa la brten
NK048(tshi)004:2129: nas mthar snang ba dang stong pa'i phyogs gang du'ang
NK048(tshi)004:2130: cira yanga mi 'dzina pas spros bral mnyam pa chen
NK048(tshi)004:2131: po'i don ji lta bar rtogs par smra ba de
NK048(tshi)004:2132: nyid la ni dper na me yi kha nasa lan
NK048(tshi)004:2133: grangs du mar sbyangs shing dag pa'i gsera btso ma
NK048(tshi)004:2134: ji lta ba bzhina du yida ches mchog tu gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2135: pa skye bar rung moda kyi /
NK048(tshi)004:2136: de las gazhana du chesa cher zaba pa'i gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2137: snang stong dbyer med spros bral mnyam pa chen po'i
NK048(tshi)004:2138: ganda dam pa 'phagsa boda kyi makhasa shing grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2139: dbang phyug che ba'am chen po rnams kyis yun ring
NK048(tshi)004:2140: po'i bar du brtson pa chen pos 'bad de rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:2141: par bya dgos pa'i dona phul du byung ba de
NK048(tshi)004:2142: nyid kye ma deng gi dus su blun posa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:2143: 'bad mi dgos par yud tsam zhig la ji bazhinadu
NK048(tshi)004:2144: rtogsa para smra ba 'di la bden nam mi bden
NK048(tshi)004:2145: snyam du the tshoma g.yo bar 'gyur bas yid ches
NK048(tshi)004:2146: skye bar dka' ba zhig go //
NK048(tshi)004:2148: dngos gzhi snang srid sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2149: gnas lugs lta ba'i dngosa gzhi mthar thug pa ni
NK048(tshi)004:2150: snang srid 'khor 'adsa kyis bsdus pa'i chos kun gdod
NK048(tshi)004:2151: ma nas yod meda la sogs pa gnyis chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2152: spros pa kun lasa 'adsa pa dona gyi gshisa lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2153: mngon du gyur pa yin pas de la yoda meda
NK048(tshi)004:2154: la sogs pa'i spros pa cira yang ma grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:2155: yin na de la snang stong la sogs pa phyogsa
NK048(tshi)004:2156: rera rtog cing 'dzina pa thams cad ni spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:2158: de yi phyir na mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigas pasa 'khor 'das kyi chos ma lus pa kun la /
NK048(tshi)004:2159: gshis lugs chos kyi dbyings bzhin du yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:2160: rnam par dpyad cing gtan la dbab pa'i tshe yod
NK048(tshi)004:2161: med la sogs pa'i gnyis chos kyi mtha' yi spros
NK048(tshi)004:2162: pa gang cir yanga grub pa ma mthong basa chos
NK048(tshi)004:2163: kyi dbyings spros bral mnyam pa chen po ji bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:2164: du gsal bar mthong ba la yul can blo yis
NK048(tshi)004:2165: cira yang 'dzina pa'i spros pa zhig ga la skye
NK048(tshi)004:2166: ste skye ba gnas med cing skabs med pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:2167: pas 'dzin stangs kun dang bral ba'i mnyam bzhag gi
NK048(tshi)004:2168: ye shes mthar thug pa gtan la phebs pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:2170: rtogs don lta ba'i shan 'byed spangs rtogs kyi bogs skyed las dbye bar bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2171: sgom pa'i mngon rtogs kyi shan 'byed skyon yon 'phel 'grib las dbye tshul bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2173: 'on kyang mtha' bzhi'i sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2174: 'khor 'das kyi chos kun gdod nas spros pa kun
NK048(tshi)004:2175: dang bral bas mthar 'dzin skye ba'i gnas med mod
NK048(tshi)004:2176: / 'on kyang skal ldan 'ga' las kun gyis de
NK048(tshi)004:2177: ltar 'bad med du rtogs par dka' bas na yod
NK048(tshi)004:2178: med la sogs pa'i mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa kun dang
NK048(tshi)004:2179: bral ba'i gnas lugs rtogs pa'i tshul ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2180: dang po thos bsam yang dag pa la brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:2181: yod med la sogs pa mtha' bzhi so sor dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2182: pa'i rigas pasa tshul bzhin du drangs pa'i mtha' bral
NK048(tshi)004:2183: snang stong zung 'jug gnas lugs mnyam pa nyid la
NK048(tshi)004:2184: ngesa shesa mchog tu gyur pa skyes par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:2185: / de la goms shing blo gros las su rung
NK048(tshi)004:2186: ba las ni ranga byung gdod ma'i gnas lugs 'oda
NK048(tshi)004:2187: gsal chen po yang dag par mthong ba'i shesa raba
NK048(tshi)004:2188: kyi lhag mthonga gi ye shes mar me 'od 'bar
NK048(tshi)004:2189: zhing gsal ba'i bzhina du mchog tu gsal zhing dag
NK048(tshi)004:2190: pa phyin ci ma log pa nyid skye bar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2191: / la / lhag mthong de dang rnam pa shin
NK048(tshi)004:2192: tu 'agla ba yi yod med la sogs pa'i mtha'a
NK048(tshi)004:2193: bzhi'i spros pa la 'dzin cing zhen pa'i blo ngan
NK048(tshi)004:2194: mun pa'i smag rum 'thug po mtha' dag drung nas
NK048(tshi)004:2195: 'byin cing spong bar byed pa'i gnyen po dngos ni
NK048(tshi)004:2196: lhag mthong gi ye shes 'di kho na yina pasa
NK048(tshi)004:2197: nam yang sgom pa ngesa shesa dang ma bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:2198: gal che bas nges shes mchog tu skye ba zhig
NK048(tshi)004:2199: nges par dgosa kyi gzhan du mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:2200: thams cad kun dus ciga chara nyid du khega nas
NK048(tshi)004:2201: med pa blo las 'das pa'i chos nyid gnyug ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:2202: chos dbyingsa rig stong dbyer med bsam brjod las 'das
NK048(tshi)004:2203: pa'i ye shes de nyid 'ching ba kun ldan gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2204: so so'i skye bo'i sa tha mal ba'i dus 'di
NK048(tshi)004:2205: nyid na cig char ram cara phoga gi tshul gyis
NK048(tshi)004:2206: ji lta ba bzhin du mthonga bar daka'a basa na
NK048(tshi)004:2207: dang po'i lam can rnams kyis mtha' bzhi'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:2208: rnams rim gyis sam resa 'joga tu 'goga par byed
NK048(tshi)004:2209: pa 'di ni thosa bsam gyi sgo nas gtan la
NK048(tshi)004:2210: phab pa'i lta ba'i gnad don tshul bzhin du sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2211: pa'i lugsa srol rmad du byung ba yin pas de
NK048(tshi)004:2212: la ci tsam goma pa de bzhina du cir yang
NK048(tshi)004:2213: ma grub pas mtha' dang bral ba'i gnas lugs snang
NK048(tshi)004:2214: stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid kyi lta
NK048(tshi)004:2215: ba la ngesa shesa zab mo je basa je gsal
NK048(tshi)004:2216: dang gong nas gong 'phel du gyur nas yod pa
NK048(tshi)004:2217: dang med pa la sogs pa'i phyin ci loga gi
NK048(tshi)004:2218: sgro 'dogas bzhi'am brgyad dam so gnyis po rim par
NK048(tshi)004:2219: bsnub par byas nas gnas lugs rtogs pa'i blo gros
NK048(tshi)004:2220: yara ngo'i zla ba lta bur 'phela te spang rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:2221: kyi yon tan phun sum tshogs pa gsar du rgya
NK048(tshi)004:2223: gzhan du gnas lugs kyi lta ba ji bzhin ma
NK048(tshi)004:2224: rtogs shing nges shes med pas blun pos rang gar
NK048(tshi)004:2225: cir yanga mi 'dzina pa'i stong par lta bas rgyu
NK048(tshi)004:2226: 'bras dang tshogs gnyis sogs khyad du gsod pa'i lta
NK048(tshi)004:2227: ba ngana pa la ji tsam goms kyang phyi nang
NK048(tshi)004:2228: gi dngosa po mtha' dag gdod nas cira yanga ma
NK048(tshi)004:2229: grub pa'i gnas lugs snang stong dbyer med spros bral
NK048(tshi)004:2230: mnyam pa nyid la ngesa shesa bzang po skye ba
NK048(tshi)004:2231: ga la yod de med do //
NK048(tshi)004:2232: de med pas lhag mthong gi ye shes 'byung ba
NK048(tshi)004:2233: gnas med cing skabs med pa desa na yod med
NK048(tshi)004:2234: la sogs pa'i phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2235: sgrib pa rnams spong bar mi nus pas spang rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:2236: kyi yon tan gang cung zad kyang skye bar mi
NK048(tshi)004:2238: de phyir 'di gnyis sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gnyis kyi bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2239: de phyir mkhas pas yang dag par rtogs pa'i sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2240: pa dang blun pos log par rtog pa'i sgom pa
NK048(tshi)004:2241: 'di gnyis mi 'dra ba'i khyad para yanga dper na
NK048(tshi)004:2242: du ba'i rtagsa yang dag lasa lkog gyur gyi me
NK048(tshi)004:2243: yod par dpog pa la mi 'khrul bzhina du spangsa
NK048(tshi)004:2244: dang rtogsa pa'i yon tan gong nas gong du 'phel
NK048(tshi)004:2245: zhing boga skyed yod pa'i tshul gyi lus ngag gi
NK048(tshi)004:2246: 'bras bu'i rtags lasa mi 'khrul bar shes nus te
NK048(tshi)004:2247: / rgyu mtshan gang gi phyir na blun sgom log
NK048(tshi)004:2248: par rtog pas rnam rtog tha mala pa la ci
NK048(tshi)004:2249: tsam sgom kyang spangsa dang rtogsa pa'i yon tan skye
NK048(tshi)004:2251: der ma zad spang rtogs kyi yona tan skye ba'i gegas su'ang che ba yina pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:2252: dper na rgya ja tshagas la drangsa na snying po
NK048(tshi)004:2253: zag cing snyigs ma lus pa bzhina du lung dang
NK048(tshi)004:2254: rtogsa pa'i yon tan 'grib cinga chags sdang la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:2255: pa'i nyon mongas pa rnams ches cher 'phel bar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2256: ba dang / khyad para du dge sdig rgyu 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:2257: bslu med la yida chesa chung bar gyur nas dge
NK048(tshi)004:2258: sdig rgyu 'bras la mi 'dzems pas dge ba 'grib
NK048(tshi)004:2259: cing nyon mongs pa 'phel bar 'gyur ba yin la
NK048(tshi)004:2260: ba dang / / de ltar ma yin par mkhas
NK048(tshi)004:2261: pas yanga dag par rtogs pa'i lta ba'i miga mchog
NK048(tshi)004:2262: dang ldan na rang rgyud la sngar meda pa'i thos
NK048(tshi)004:2263: sogs lung gi yon tan nyamsa rtogsa kyi yon tan
NK048(tshi)004:2264: gong 'phel du 'abra zhing skye bar 'gyur ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:2265: ba dang / / / khyad par du'ang zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:2266: stong pa nyid mthonga ba de yi yona tan lasa
NK048(tshi)004:2267: stong nyid yin pa'i gnad kyis rten 'byung 'gags pa
NK048(tshi)004:2268: med pa'i dge sdig rgyu 'bras rten cing 'brel 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:2269: bslu ba meda pa nyid la sus kyang mi 'phrog
NK048(tshi)004:2270: pa'i yida chesa skye bar gyur nas las rgyu 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:2271: la blang dor shin tu phra ba nas bgyid cing
NK048(tshi)004:2272: stong nyid snying rje'i snying po can yin pas byams
NK048(tshi)004:2273: dang snying rje byang chub kyi sems rin po che
NK048(tshi)004:2274: ngam ngam shugs kyis skyes te tshogs gnyis kyi dge
NK048(tshi)004:2275: ba gong du 'phel zhing chags sdang la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2276: nyon mongas pa rnams chung zhing 'grib para 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)004:2277: ni stong nyid rtogs pa'i 'bras rtags yang dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:2278: ba dang / / / nyid do // gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2279: dpyad pas nges shes sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2280: de ltar zab mo'i lung gi snang ba la brten
NK048(tshi)004:2281: nas yang dag pa'i rigs pas dpyad pasa snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:2282: zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid la the tshom
NK048(tshi)004:2283: gyi smag dang bral ba'i nges shes bzang po mchog
NK048(tshi)004:2284: tu drangsa par byas pa'i nges shes de ka'i nganga
NK048(tshi)004:2285: la gzhan du mi yengs bar rtse gciga tu mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:2286: par bazhaga pa'i zhi lhag zung 'jug gi ting nge
NK048(tshi)004:2287: 'dzina zab mo la goms par byas nas mthar rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:2288: pa klong du gyur nas spros pa gang yang ma
NK048(tshi)004:2289: mthonga bas mtshan ma'i dmigs pa thams cad zhi zhing
NK048(tshi)004:2290: de nyid gnas lugs tshul bzhin du mthonga ba dam
NK048(tshi)004:2291: pa'i dona du gsungs pa gang de ji lta bar
NK048(tshi)004:2292: mngon du gyur pas mthonga dona de yang snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:2293: la sogs pa gang gi phyogsa su'ang ma lhung ba
NK048(tshi)004:2294: yin pasa snang stong sogs cira yanga blos bzung ba
NK048(tshi)004:2295: meda mod kyi de ltar na'ang lkugsa pasa bu ram
NK048(tshi)004:2296: gyi ro myong ba na 'di zhes smrar mi btub
NK048(tshi)004:2297: kyang rang la yid ches thob tu yod pa ltar
NK048(tshi)004:2298: snang stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam nyid chen po
NK048(tshi)004:2299: ma mthong mthong ba dam pa'i don la yid chesa
NK048(tshi)004:2301: gnas lugs la mnyam par bzhag pa'i sgoms pa'am sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2302: pa'i rnal 'byor yang dag pa la brten nas skye
NK048(tshi)004:2303: yi rigs pas dpyad pa kho nasa de ltar skye
NK048(tshi)004:2304: ba min pas chos nyid kyi gnas lugs dngos sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2305: pa'i stobs kyis rtogs par 'gyur bas na sgom pa
NK048(tshi)004:2307: gnas lugs don la mnyam par 'jog pa na //
NK048(tshi)004:2308: 'dzin stangs dgos dang mi dgos cher smra yang //
NK048(tshi)004:2309: gang la'ang legs par rtogs dang nyes par rtog /
NK048(tshi)004:2310: shan 'byed blo gros dri med mchog gi dpyid //
NK048(tshi)004:2312: dri lan bzhi pa bsgom pa dpyad 'jog gang 'thad kyi lan la gsum /
NK048(tshi)004:2313: phyogs rer song ba gzhan gyi lugs mi 'thad par bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2314: gnyis ka dgos pa rang gi lugs lung rigs man ngag gis sgrub tshul bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2315: de gnyis kyi skyon yon ngos bzung ba'i tshul gyis don bsdu ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2317: theg mchog lta ba sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2318: theg mchoga nges don zab mo'i lta ba yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:2319: par bsgom pa la rigs pas dpyad pa kho nas
NK048(tshi)004:2320: sgom pa dang ma dpyad par 'joga pa'am bzhag ste
NK048(tshi)004:2321: sgom pa gnyis ganga 'thad ce na /
NK048(tshi)004:2322: la lasa chos gang la'ang stong mi stong sogs rigs
NK048(tshi)004:2323: pas ci yang mi dpyad par mnyam par bzhag ste
NK048(tshi)004:2324: bsgom dgos kyi rnam rtog gi dpyad pasa gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2325: zab mo'i dona mthong ba la bsgribsa par 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)004:2326: yin pasa na ma dpyad par rang gar spom pora
NK048(tshi)004:2327: zhoga dang de kho na man ngag gi gnad dam
NK048(tshi)004:2328: pa yin no zhes zer ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2329: yang la lasa chos gang la'ang stong pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:2330: rigs pas dpyad pa kho na yang yang byed dgos
NK048(tshi)004:2331: kyi rigs pas dpyad pa dang bral ba'i bsgom pa
NK048(tshi)004:2332: ni gnyid du songa ba ltar ci yin 'di yin
NK048(tshi)004:2333: med par bsgom pas ci yang mi phan pasa dus
NK048(tshi)004:2334: nam du yang rigs pas dpyad pa kho na dgosa
NK048(tshi)004:2335: kyi dpyad pa dang bral bas stong pa nyid mi
NK048(tshi)004:2337: de la bsgom pa yang dag pa'i don la dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2338: pa dang 'joga pa 'di nyid gang rung la mtha'a
NK048(tshi)004:2339: gciga tu zhen nas phyogsa rera kho nar 'dzina para
NK048(tshi)004:2340: sgrub tu mi rung ste stong pa nyid rigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:2341: yang dag pas gtan la ma dbab cing ma dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2342: pa yi spom por 'joga pa'i bsgom pa phal cher
NK048(tshi)004:2343: gyis legs na zhi gansa tsam zhiga ste bsam gtan
NK048(tshi)004:2344: dang gzugs med kyi ting nge 'dzin tsam re 'grub
NK048(tshi)004:2345: srid kyang / de la 'bad de bsgom pasa stong
NK048(tshi)004:2346: pa nyid la ngesa shes cung zad tsam yang mi
NK048(tshi)004:2347: skye ba'am skye bar mi 'gyur bas na /
NK048(tshi)004:2348: thar lam yang dag pa nyid mthong ba'i miga gciga
NK048(tshi)004:2349: pur gyur pa ni stong pa nyid la ngesa shes
NK048(tshi)004:2350: legs par skyes pa nyid yin na de spang nasa
NK048(tshi)004:2351: lhag mthong gi ye shes rgyud la mi skye bas
NK048(tshi)004:2352: phyin ci log gi sgrib pa gang yang bsal mi
NK048(tshi)004:2353: nus pa'i phyir thar pa tsam yang mi thob la
NK048(tshi)004:2354: / de yi phyir dang po dpyad de rtogs dgos
NK048(tshi)004:2355: kyang mthar rtogs pa klong du gyur pa na'ang dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2356: pas grub zin sgrus pa la dgos pa gang yang
NK048(tshi)004:2357: med cing 'jog pa nyid du 'thad pas de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:2358: shan legs par phyed de rtogs par bya dgos te
NK048(tshi)004:2359: / / dper na mig gi rab rib sel ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:2360: ched du mig sman bsku dgos kyang rab rib sangs
NK048(tshi)004:2361: pa na'ang bsku ba don med pa bzhin te /
NK048(tshi)004:2363: so so'i skye bo rnams ni rtog pas bcings //
NK048(tshi)004:2364: mi rtog rnal 'byor pa ni grol 'gyur bas //
NK048(tshi)004:2365: rtog rnams log par gyur pa gang yin te //
NK048(tshi)004:2366: rnam par dpyod pa'i 'bras bur mkhas rnams gsungs //
NK048(tshi)004:2369: sgom pa yang dag la dpyad 'jog gnyis ka dgos
NK048(tshi)004:2370: shing gang zhig bsgom pa mdo sngags lam gyi zab
NK048(tshi)004:2372: de nyid gsal bar mthong phyir thabs dang bsgom don
NK048(tshi)004:2373: zab mo'i tshad ma'i lam dang brgyud pa'i bka' srol
NK048(tshi)004:2376: chos kyi rang bzhin sogs tshigs bcad bcu gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2377: theg mchog nges don zab mo'i bsgom pa yang dag pa la ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2378: thog mar chosa thams cad kyi ni gnas lugs ranga
NK048(tshi)004:2379: bzhina stong pa nyid rigs pa rnam par dag pas
NK048(tshi)004:2380: tshul bzhin du dpyad nas gtan la 'bebs pa dgos
NK048(tshi)004:2381: kyi / de ltar ma shes na gnas lugs stong
NK048(tshi)004:2382: nyid zab mo ci zhiga bsgom ste sgom du med
NK048(tshi)004:2383: kyi / la / sgrib pa spong ba dang rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:2384: pa'i ye shes skye ba la rang gar tha mala
NK048(tshi)004:2385: gyi rnam rtog gcig nyid yang nas yang du sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2386: par byas pasa ci la phana te thar lam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2387: snang ba cung zad kyang mi rnyed pas /
NK048(tshi)004:2388: dper na miga gnyis med pa lam du zhugsa na lam yang dag pa mi rnyed pa bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:2389: des na 'di ltar thoga ma meda pa nas bdag
NK048(tshi)004:2390: dang gzhan du 'dzin pas 'khrul ba'i baga chagas ches
NK048(tshi)004:2391: cher goms pa'i stobs kyis chos thams cad kyi ranga
NK048(tshi)004:2392: bzhina spros bral stong pa nyid las gol te bdag
NK048(tshi)004:2393: tu lta ba dang mtshan mar lta ba la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:2394: pa'i sgo nas phyin ci loga para zhena par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2395: pa'i dbang gis dngos por 'dzin pa a 'thas su
NK048(tshi)004:2396: song ba 'di la thabas tshul yang dag pa'i riga
NK048(tshi)004:2397: pa mi 'dra ba'i sgo bargya phrag dag gisa 'abda
NK048(tshi)004:2398: de dpyad cing ma brtagsa na spros bral stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:2399: nyid kyi ngo bo tshul bzhin du rtogsa para dka'
NK048(tshi)004:2400: ste / ganga gi phyir na 'khrul ba'i snang ba la dngos por zhena pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2401: 'khrul snang stong par shes pas yang daga pa'i dona
NK048(tshi)004:2402: mthonga ba dag phan tshun snang mun ltar 'agla bar
NK048(tshi)004:2403: gyur pasa na thog med nas chesa cher gomsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2405: de kho na nyid spros bral stong pa nyid mthong
NK048(tshi)004:2406: ba'i snang ba yang dag pa zhig shin tu rnyed
NK048(tshi)004:2408: 'on kyang sngon nas lam yang dag pa legs par
NK048(tshi)004:2409: spyad pa'i lasa kyi 'phro bzang po sad cing rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:2410: legs par smin zin pa'i skal ldan mchog dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2411: rtogs ldan bla ma'i byin rlabsa zab mo snying la
NK048(tshi)004:2412: 'phos pa lasa ni rang gi sems kyi byung sa
NK048(tshi)004:2413: dang gansa sa dang 'gro 'onga med pa tsam yang
NK048(tshi)004:2414: dag par brtagsa shing dpyad par byas pasa chos kun
NK048(tshi)004:2415: gdod nas spros kun bral bas bdena pas stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:2416: nyid la ngesa shes bzang pos sus kyang mi 'phrog
NK048(tshi)004:2417: pa skye nas gnas lugs ji bzhin du gtan la
NK048(tshi)004:2418: phebs par gyur nas grol ba cig car du thob
NK048(tshi)004:2419: par 'gyur ba'ang srid moda kyi skal ba bzang po'i
NK048(tshi)004:2420: gang zag de 'dra bargya lam na srid mtha' ma
NK048(tshi)004:2421: bkag pas resa 'ag'a tsam ste gang zag mchog dman
NK048(tshi)004:2422: med par kun gyis de ltar spros kun bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:2423: stong pa nyid rtogsa par mi nus so //
NK048(tshi)004:2424: des na theg mchog rdzogs pa chen po'i rang lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2425: kyi 'khor 'das kyi chos kun ka nas dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2426: spros bral blo 'das chen por the tshom cung zad
NK048(tshi)004:2427: tsam yang med par gadra sha gting nas chod par
NK048(tshi)004:2428: byed pa la / dbu ma'i mthar thug thal 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2429: ba'i lta ba ye stong spros bral chen por dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2430: pa mthar phyin pa zhig dgosa te /
NK048(tshi)004:2431: yul chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2432: spros pa thams cad dang bral ba yin pa tsam
NK048(tshi)004:2433: gyi cha nas bskrun na ni rdzogs chen gyi ka
NK048(tshi)004:2434: dag dang thal 'gyur ba'i spros bral de gnyis la
NK048(tshi)004:2435: khyad para ci yang meda do zhes yul chos dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:2436: ngo bos stong pa'i cha nas gsungsa pa'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:2437: // 'on kyang ngo sprod sogs kyi thabs zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:2438: gnad las rtogs pa'i ye shes yang dag par skye
NK048(tshi)004:2439: ba la ni khyad par yod de /
NK048(tshi)004:2440: ngo bo stong par ram stong pa phyang chad du
NK048(tshi)004:2441: 'dzin cing zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir du gsang sngagsa
NK048(tshi)004:2442: rdo rje'i theg pa las ni bde ba chena po'i
NK048(tshi)004:2443: ye shes sam 'od gsal ba'i ye shes sam rig
NK048(tshi)004:2444: pa rang byung gi ye shes 'gyur ba med pa
NK048(tshi)004:2446: de ltar bde ba'i ye shes dang stong pa'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:2447: gnyis ye nas gnyis su dbyer meda pa'i chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2448: dbyingsa zung 'jug mnyam pa chen po yul dang yul
NK048(tshi)004:2449: cana gnyis snang gi 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:2450: ba yi tshul gyis mngon sum du nyamsa su myong
NK048(tshi)004:2451: bar byed pa ni rdo rje'i theg pa spyi dang
NK048(tshi)004:2452: mthar phyin par rtsal du bton pa ni a ti
NK048(tshi)004:2453: yo ga kho na'i khyad chos bla na med pa'o
NK048(tshi)004:2454: // de yi phyir dbu ma chen po'i skabs su 'gags pa med pa'i snang ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2455: phyag rgya chen po las ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2456: rang bzhin 'od gsal gyi ye shes dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2457: rdzogs pa chen po'i skabs su riga pa rang byung
NK048(tshi)004:2458: gi ye shes gsum du bstan pa de'ang bde ba
NK048(tshi)004:2459: chena po'i ye shes 'dus ma byas pa de yi
NK048(tshi)004:2460: mtshan gyi rnam grangsa tsam yina don gyi ngo bo
NK048(tshi)004:2461: la tha dad med pa nyid do //
NK048(tshi)004:2462: des na 'gags pa med pa'i snang cha longs spyod
NK048(tshi)004:2463: rdzogs pa'i sku la sogs pa gzugs kyi sku 'disa
NK048(tshi)004:2464: ni srid pa 'khor ba ji srid ma stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:2465: de srid du gnas skabs kyi phana pa dang mthar
NK048(tshi)004:2466: thug gi bde ba la 'god pa'i phrin las mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:2467: dang bral ba yisa phyogs dang ris med pa'i gdul
NK048(tshi)004:2468: bya dag pa dang ma dag pa'i 'gro ba kun
NK048(tshi)004:2469: dus rtag pa rgyun gyi 'khor lor rgud pa mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:2470: dag kun las skyobsa para madzada pa yin pasa na
NK048(tshi)004:2471: mathara thug gi bde ba chen po de nyid thugs
NK048(tshi)004:2472: rje chen po'i bdag nyid dam dmigs pa med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2473: snying rje'i ranga bzhina can du gyur pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)004:2474: no // de yi phyir na ranga bzhina nam ngo
NK048(tshi)004:2475: bo nyid kyis kyang srid zhir te srid zhi'i mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:2476: gang du'ang mi gansa pa'i stong dang snying rje dbyer
NK048(tshi)004:2477: med dam bde stong zung 'jug gi ye shes che
NK048(tshi)004:2478: ba'am chen po 'dus ma byas pa nyid gzhi la
NK048(tshi)004:2479: bri gang dang bral bar ji ltar bzhugs pa de
NK048(tshi)004:2480: ltar bde stong lam gyi ngo bo stong pa'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:2481: e dang rang bzhin 'od gsal bde ba chen po
NK048(tshi)004:2482: ye shes wam gyis te bde stong zung 'jug gam
NK048(tshi)004:2483: dbyer med kyi ye shes kyis sgrubsa pasa snyigs dus
NK048(tshi)004:2484: kyi tshe thung 'di nyid la yanga zung 'jug rdo
NK048(tshi)004:2485: rje 'chang gi go 'phar 'bras bu bla na med
NK048(tshi)004:2486: pa de nyid mngona du 'gyur ba yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:2487: de ltar na gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum char nges
NK048(tshi)004:2488: pa'i don nyid du na tha dad par dbyer mi
NK048(tshi)004:2489: phyed pa'i zung 'jug bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:2490: shes thabs mchog rdo rje'i legs pa yi brjod bya
NK048(tshi)004:2491: zab mo mthar thug gi 'bras bu dbang bzhi pa'am
NK048(tshi)004:2492: bzhi pa'i dabnga gi lam mchog riga stong dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:2493: ranga byung gi ye shesa de nyid rgyud gzhan chen
NK048(tshi)004:2494: po rnams su'ang gab cing sbas pa nyid du gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2495: kyang ma gab ma sbas par de kho na shin
NK048(tshi)004:2496: tu gsal bar rtsal du bton nas ston par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2497: pa ni theg mchog 'oda gsal snying po a ti
NK048(tshi)004:2498: rdo rje rtse mo'i rang lugs sde gsum rdzogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:2499: chen po kho nar nges pa'i phyir na 'di ni
NK048(tshi)004:2500: mthar thug theg pa ma lus pa'i skyel so phul
NK048(tshi)004:2501: dang mchog tu gyur pa yina pas gzhan dang thun
NK048(tshi)004:2502: mong ma yin pa'i 'bras bu'i thus ka bla na
NK048(tshi)004:2503: med pa nyid du mthong nas ji bzhin du gtan
NK048(tshi)004:2504: la phebs pa zhig dgos so //
NK048(tshi)004:2506: gang gis sgoms shing rtogs pa thabs mchog lam gyi ngo bo spyir bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2507: gang zhig sgom zhing rtogs pa bla med theg mchog rgyal po'i dgongs don bye brag tu dbye ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2509: thog mar lam mchog nges shes bzang po 'dren phyir
NK048(tshi)004:2510: zab don rigs pas dpyad de ji ltar sgom tshul
NK048(tshi)004:2511: / bar du nges shes zab mo gong du 'phel
NK048(tshi)004:2512: zhing sgro 'dogs sel phyir dpyad 'jog spel mar byas
NK048(tshi)004:2514: tha mar nges shes ngang gis gsal zhing 'phags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2515: rtogs rigs thob tshe bzhag nas sgom gyi dpyad pa
NK048(tshi)004:2518: ji srid nges shes sogs tshigs bcad bdun dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2519: de la lam gyi 'dren pa mchog tu gyur pa
NK048(tshi)004:2520: ni nges shes yin pas dang por ji srid gnas
NK048(tshi)004:2521: lugs snang stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2522: la ngesa pa'i shes pa the tshom dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:2523: ma skyes kyi bar du thabsa sna tshogs dang rigs
NK048(tshi)004:2524: pa mang pos tshul bzhin du dpyad pasa ngesa shesa
NK048(tshi)004:2525: bzang po drangsa dgos la ngesa shesa yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:2526: skyes bar gyur na nges shes de'i ngang du gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:2527: la mi yengs par ngesa shesa de nyid dang ma
NK048(tshi)004:2528: 'bral ba'i tshul gyis rtse gcig tu sgom pa la
NK048(tshi)004:2530: de ltar sgom pas ngesa shesa bzang po je bas
NK048(tshi)004:2531: je gsal du gyur nas mara me 'od gsal ba
NK048(tshi)004:2532: lta bu'i sgo nas rgyun chad pa med par gong
NK048(tshi)004:2534: de kho nas yang dag pa mina par phyin ci
NK048(tshi)004:2535: log tu sgro 'dogs pa'i gnyis chos kyi rtog pa
NK048(tshi)004:2536: phra rags thams cad bsnub par byed pa yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:2537: de nyid la dus rtag tu brtson pa drag pos
NK048(tshi)004:2538: nan tan gyis 'bad par bya ba kho na gal
NK048(tshi)004:2539: che la / nges shes de dang nam bral na
NK048(tshi)004:2540: yang slar yanga dpyada pasa de nyid drangsa bar byas
NK048(tshi)004:2541: te sgom par bya dgos so //
NK048(tshi)004:2542: des na rim gyis gang zag gis dang pora zab
NK048(tshi)004:2543: mo'i lung gi snang ba la brten nas rigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:2544: mang dag pas 'khor 'das kyi chos kun snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:2545: dbyer med dam zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2546: du gtan la dbab pa'i dpyad pa kho na gal
NK048(tshi)004:2547: che ste / ji ltar na rang rang gis lung
NK048(tshi)004:2548: rigs tshad ma'i dpyad pa bazanga posa yang yang ma
NK048(tshi)004:2549: drangsa na gnas lugs snang stong zung 'jug spros bral
NK048(tshi)004:2550: mnyam pa nyid la ngesa shesa bazanga po rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:2551: rgyud la ga la skye ste skye mi nus la
NK048(tshi)004:2552: che ste / / ngesa shesa bazanga po de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2553: legs par ma skyes na bdag dang gzhan du dngos
NK048(tshi)004:2554: por rtog pa sogs kyi sgro 'dogas ngana pa sna
NK048(tshi)004:2555: tshogs pa 'di dag ga la nub ste nub par
NK048(tshi)004:2557: ngana pa de rnams ma nub na 'khrul ba'i g.yo
NK048(tshi)004:2558: bskyed pas lasa rlung ngana pa sna tshogs pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:2559: dag ga la 'aggas te 'gags mi nus la /
NK048(tshi)004:2560: las rlung ngana pa de rnams ma 'agga na 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:2561: ba'i snang ba ngan pa sna tshogs pa 'di rnams
NK048(tshi)004:2562: ga la spong ste spang mi nus la /
NK048(tshi)004:2563: 'khor ba'i snang ba ngan pa ji snyed pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:2564: rnams ma spang na sdug bsngal gyi rnam grangs ngan
NK048(tshi)004:2565: pa 'di rnams ci la 'adzada de 'dzad par mi
NK048(tshi)004:2566: nus so // 'o na nges shes bzang po de ci lta bu zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:2567: srid pa 'khora ba dang zhi ba mya ngan las
NK048(tshi)004:2568: 'adsa pa gnyis la nges pa'i dona du ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:2569: bzang ngana med par mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa
NK048(tshi)004:2570: yin pas gnas lugs chos kyi dbyings la khyad par
NK048(tshi)004:2571: cung zad tsam yang yod pa ma yina pas de
NK048(tshi)004:2572: bzhin du bazanga ngan cung zad tsam yang meda para
NK048(tshi)004:2573: 'khor 'das dbyer med spros bral mnyam pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:2574: yang dag par rtogsa pa yi nges shes the tshom
NK048(tshi)004:2575: gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba ni bazanga po
NK048(tshi)004:2576: yina la / de lta na ngesa shes bazanga posa
