NK048(tshi)004:2577: 'khora ba ngan pa 'di nyid spangsa nas myang 'adsa
NK048(tshi)004:2578: bzang po gzhan zhig ma sgrubsa pasa spang blangs med
NK048(tshi)004:2579: par mnyam pa nyid du rtogs pa yin cing de
NK048(tshi)004:2580: yang snang tshul la 'khor ba spang nas myang 'das
NK048(tshi)004:2581: thob bar snang bas na 'khor 'das gnyis la bzang
NK048(tshi)004:2582: ngan med par mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:2583: dang 'agla ba ltar ston par snang ba'i tshiga gi
NK048(tshi)004:2584: dona 'di nyid la'ang cung zad kyang mi 'gal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:2585: gnad don zab mo yod de /
NK048(tshi)004:2586: 'di ltar snang tshul la 'khor 'das su snang yang
NK048(tshi)004:2587: gnas tshul la bsal bzhag gam spang blang med par
NK048(tshi)004:2588: 'khor 'das dbyer med mnyam pa nyid du lhun gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2589: grub pa nyid ni lam gyi gnad dam gal mdo
NK048(tshi)004:2591: des na lta ba bsal bzhag med par 'khor 'das
NK048(tshi)004:2592: dbyer med mnyam pa nyid dang spyod pa blang dor
NK048(tshi)004:2593: bya rtsol dang bral bar gsungs pas mana ngaga gi
NK048(tshi)004:2594: gnad gasnga zab mo 'di nyid legs par dpyad de
NK048(tshi)004:2595: dona gyi ro mchog zab mo tshul bzhin du nyams
NK048(tshi)004:2596: su myong bar gyis shig ces gdams par mdzad do
NK048(tshi)004:2597: // gnyis pa bar du dpyad 'jog sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2598: bar du tshul bzhin legs par dpyad pa dang des
NK048(tshi)004:2599: drangs pa'i nges shes bzang po'i ngang la mnyam par
NK048(tshi)004:2600: 'joga pa gnyis po spel ma'i tshul du dpyad sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2601: dang 'jog sgom gnyis ka dgosa te /
NK048(tshi)004:2602: dpyad na gnas lugs spros bral mnyam pa nyid la ngesa shesa bzang po skye bar 'gyur zhing /
NK048(tshi)004:2603: ma dpyad pas tha mara dngos por 'dzin cing zheena
NK048(tshi)004:2604: par gyur pa'i tshe na slar yang legs par dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2605: cing dpyad cing gnas lugs zab mo'i don la ngesa
NK048(tshi)004:2606: shesa legs par drangsa nas ngesa shesa bzang po yang
NK048(tshi)004:2607: dag par skyes par gyur na nges shes de ga'i
NK048(tshi)004:2608: nganga du gzhan du ma yengas par rtse gciga nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2609: du mnyam pa bzhag ste sgom dgos te gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2610: snang stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2611: ngesa shes dang ni bdag gzhan dang yod med la
NK048(tshi)004:2612: sogs par phyin ci log tu sgro 'dogsa pa'i yida
NK048(tshi)004:2613: rtog gnyis snang mun ltar phan tshun shin tu 'gal
NK048(tshi)004:2614: bar gyur pa nyid kyi phyir na zab mo'i rigs
NK048(tshi)004:2615: pa yang dag pas dpyad pasa sgro 'dogas kyi rtog
NK048(tshi)004:2616: pa thams cad sun phyung bar byed pasa snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:2617: dbyer med spros bral mnyam pa nyid rtogs pa'i ngesa
NK048(tshi)004:2618: shes bzang po gong nas gonga du spel bar byed
NK048(tshi)004:2619: dgos so // gsum pa la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:2621: de la log rtog bsal te dpyod shes kyi 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:2622: stangs kun dang bral ba'i mnyam bzhag ye shes nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2623: theg chen lam gyi dngos gzhi theg pa dang chen
NK048(tshi)004:2626: tha mar dpyad pas sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2627: tha mara rigs pas dpyad pasa yang dang yang du
NK048(tshi)004:2628: ma drangsa kyang ngesa shesa bzang po ngang gisa skye
NK048(tshi)004:2629: bar gyur pa na nges shes de ga'i ngang du
NK048(tshi)004:2630: gzhan la mi yengs par rtse gcig tu mnyam pa
NK048(tshi)004:2631: 'joga cing sgom pa lasa slar yang rigs pas dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2632: pasa legs par grub zin pa'i don de nyid yang
NK048(tshi)004:2633: dang yang du bskyar te sgrubsa pas ngal ba ci
NK048(tshi)004:2634: zhig dgosa te / dper na thaga para sbrul meda par ji lta ba bzhin du rtogsa pa na /
NK048(tshi)004:2635: sbrul med par nges pa'i ngesa shesa de gasa sbrul
NK048(tshi)004:2636: 'dzina lhag med du ldoga par gyur na da dung
NK048(tshi)004:2637: yang sbrul ni 'dir meda do zhes yanga yanga rigs
NK048(tshi)004:2638: pas dpyad dgos zhes zer ba ni blo gros blun
NK048(tshi)004:2639: mina nam ste blun pa'i 'bras rtags so //
NK048(tshi)004:2640: gzhan yang 'aphagas lam gyi rtogsa pa spros bral mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:2641: pa nyid mngona sum du gyur pa'i tshe na da
NK048(tshi)004:2642: dung yang rigs pas dpyad pasa mi sgom te mngona
NK048(tshi)004:2643: sum du rtogsa pa so so rang rig pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:2644: shes la rgyu mtshan gyi'am rtags la brten pa'i yida
NK048(tshi)004:2645: dpyod kyi gtan tshigs sbyor ba ci zhiga dgosa te
NK048(tshi)004:2646: dgos pa ci yang med pas dper na mngon sum
NK048(tshi)004:2647: ma 'khrul bas mi nyid mthong ba la du ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:2648: rtags sbyor byed pa shin tu 'khrul pa bzhin no
NK048(tshi)004:2649: // gnyis pa gal te dpyad pas sogs tshigs bcad bcu gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2650: gong du rim pas bstan pa de ltar ma yin
NK048(tshi)004:2651: par gal te rnam pa kun tu dpyad pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:2652: bral ba'i tshe gnas lugs dona dam bden pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:2653: dag par mthonga zhing rtogsa pa nyid nam yang mi
NK048(tshi)004:2655: 'aphagas pa rnams kyi mnyam bzhag gi ye shes dang
NK048(tshi)004:2656: rgyal ba'i ye shesa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
NK048(tshi)004:2657: dang / gzhan 'jig rten gnoda meda kyi shes pa
NK048(tshi)004:2658: ste 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa'i mngon sum de dang
NK048(tshi)004:2659: de yisa rang yul gzung ba yang dag pa rang
NK048(tshi)004:2660: mtshan rnams khyod la phyin ci loga gi bzung ba
NK048(tshi)004:2662: gang phyir mngon sum de daga ni rang yul ji
NK048(tshi)004:2663: lta ba bzhin du rtogsa zina pa yina pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:2664: na de dag la ranga dus de dang de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2665: na yid rtog gis dpyad pa meda pa'i phyir te
NK048(tshi)004:2666: dpyad pa dang bral na don dam mi rtogs par
NK048(tshi)004:2668: de yi phyir na mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa ma lus
NK048(tshi)004:2669: pa kun dang bral ba zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2670: ji bzhin du rtogs pa yi nges shesa shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:2671: gsal ba khyad para cana gyi ngora ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2672: 'di dang 'di'o sogs su snyam pa yi dmigas gtad
NK048(tshi)004:2673: kyi dpyod pa shin tu phra ba yang gnas dang
NK048(tshi)004:2674: skabsa mi thoba pas dmigs gtad thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:2675: ba yin no // ganga gi tshe yid rtog gi
NK048(tshi)004:2676: dpyod pas stong dang mi stong la sogs par 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:2678: dar gyi srin bu rnams kyis rang gis rang nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2679: bcings pa ji lta ba bzhina du yid rtog gis
NK048(tshi)004:2680: dpyod pa'i 'dzin pa de yisa gnas lugs 'dzin stangs
NK048(tshi)004:2681: thams cad dang bral ba'i mnyam bzhag ye shes de
NK048(tshi)004:2682: bcingsa te sgrib par byas nas gnas tshul yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:2683: pa'i don ji lta ba bzhina du mi mthonga bar
NK048(tshi)004:2684: 'gyur ro // des na spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2685: kyi ngesa shesa khyad para can skyes pa 'disa ni
NK048(tshi)004:2686: yina lugas sam gnas lugs la sgrib pa'i sgro 'dogs
NK048(tshi)004:2687: kyi smag thams cad basla ba'i tshe na chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2688: dbyings rang byung gnyug ma dona gyi ye shes 'od
NK048(tshi)004:2689: gsal ba'i ngang mdangs de nyid ma nora bar ji
NK048(tshi)004:2690: lta ba bzhin du mthonga ba ganga yin pa de
NK048(tshi)004:2691: ni gnyis snang thams cad dang bral ba'i 'phags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2692: mnyam bzhag so so ranga gi'am rang rig pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:2693: 'gyur ro // shesa yin te / de ni semsa
NK048(tshi)004:2694: byung shesa raba gzung 'dzin can de dag ga la
NK048(tshi)004:2696: 'o na de gnyis kyi khyad par ci zhe na
NK048(tshi)004:2697: sems byung shesa raba kyis rang yul rnams la 'di
NK048(tshi)004:2698: ni 'di'o zhes sogs so sor rnam para 'gyed cinga
NK048(tshi)004:2699: de dang de la dmigs shing rtogsa pa yin la
NK048(tshi)004:2700: / ganga phyir gzugs la sogs pa'i yul dang de
NK048(tshi)004:2701: dang der 'dzin pa'i yul cana dang snang ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:2702: stong pa re re ganga du yanga mi dmigas pa'am
NK048(tshi)004:2703: mi rtog par zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2704: du rtogs pas 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:2705: 'di ni semsa dang semsa lasa byung ba yi matshana
NK048(tshi)004:2706: nyid gzung 'dzin cana du rnam pa kun tu gansa
NK048(tshi)004:2707: pa ma yina te zhes mdor na 'dzin stangs yod
NK048(tshi)004:2708: med kyi khyad par can du rtogs par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2709: de phyir yang dag pa'i dpyad pasa legs par drangsa
NK048(tshi)004:2710: pa yi spros kun bral ba'i mnyam pa nyid la
NK048(tshi)004:2711: ngesa shesa mchoga tu gyur pa 'drongs nas /
NK048(tshi)004:2712: de la mnyam par bazhaga pa'i shes raba rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:2713: dag pa dri ma meda pa'i rgyus sam rgyu des
NK048(tshi)004:2714: 'bras bu snang stong zung 'jug spros bral mnyam pa
NK048(tshi)004:2715: nyid rtogs pa'i ye shesa dngos nyid thob par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:2716: ro // des na gnas tshul lam gnas lugs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2717: lta ba ji bzhin du gtan la phaba par byed
NK048(tshi)004:2718: ro // pa dang / ngesa pa'i grub mtha'a phyin
NK048(tshi)004:2719: ci ma log pa sgrub par byed pa ni chos
NK048(tshi)004:2720: rnams la rang mtshan dang spyi mtshan ngo bo dang
NK048(tshi)004:2721: rang bzhin snang ba dang stong pa yod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:2722: med pa la sogs par gtan la 'bebs shing shana
NK048(tshi)004:2723: 'byed par byed pa'i so sora yang dag par rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:2724: pa yi shesa raba 'khrul ba'i dri ma med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2726: gnas lugs mnyam pa nyid kyi don la shes rab
NK048(tshi)004:2727: dri ma med pa desa legs par drangsa pa'i ngesa
NK048(tshi)004:2728: shesa khyad par can gyi lam yang dag par sgom
NK048(tshi)004:2729: pa la brten nas chos thams cad kyi yina lugsa
NK048(tshi)004:2730: sam gnas lugs chos kyi dbyings gnyug ma don gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2731: 'od gsal ba'i gshisa su phebas pa'am son pa'i 'phags
NK048(tshi)004:2732: pa'i mnyam bzhag gnyis snang thams cad nub pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:2733: shesa ganga yina pa de ni nges don thega pa
NK048(tshi)004:2734: chena po'i lam gyi dngosa gzhi yang dag pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2735: do // 'di dang yang dag par ldan na mi
NK048(tshi)004:2736: slob pa'i zung 'jug rdo rje 'chang gi go 'aphanga
NK048(tshi)004:2737: snyigs dus kyi tshe lus 'dira bde myur du ster
NK048(tshi)004:2738: ba'i phyir na 'di nyid theg pa'i nang nas theg
NK048(tshi)004:2739: pa bla na med pa yina la /
NK048(tshi)004:2740: de dang mnyam pa gzhan med pas mchog dang chena po'ang yina no //
NK048(tshi)004:2742: theg mchog rdzogs pa chen po'i lugs kyi zab cing
NK048(tshi)004:2743: rgya che ba'i rang byung rig pa'i ye shes gsal
NK048(tshi)004:2744: bar bstan pa / de nyid kun gyi 'byung gnas
NK048(tshi)004:2745: su gyur pas sgrub brgyud gzhan gyi bstan don mthar
NK048(tshi)004:2746: thug thams cad rdzogs chen sems sde'i man ngag tu
NK048(tshi)004:2747: mnyam zhing dbye ba med tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:2748: ye shes de nyid so so'i skye bo'i sa nas
NK048(tshi)004:2749: kyang rjes mthun par sgom du yod par bstan pa'o
NK048(tshi)004:2751: gnyis med rgyud sde'i dgongs don rgya che ba bka'
NK048(tshi)004:2752: ma'i lugs kyi dbang bzhi pa'i ye shes 'khrul med
NK048(tshi)004:2753: tshad ma'i lam nas spyir sgrubs pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2754: man ngag thig le gsang skor gyi dgongs don zab
NK048(tshi)004:2755: mo gter ma'i lugs kyi thun mong min pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:2756: shes ji ltar sgrubs tshul khyad par du bstan pa'o
NK048(tshi)004:2758: rgyud sde bzhi yi sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2759: tshul de ltar na gsang sngags kyi rgyud sde de la bya spyod rnal 'byor /
NK048(tshi)004:2760: rnal 'byor bla med dang bzhi ru dbye ba yi
NK048(tshi)004:2761: lugsa ltar na yang bla na meda pa'i rgyud rnams
NK048(tshi)004:2762: kyi tshiga dabnga ste dbang bzhi pa'i lam gyi dngos
NK048(tshi)004:2763: gzhi 'di ni don gyi 'od gsal zung 'jug gi
NK048(tshi)004:2764: ye shesa mathara thug pa yin moda rgyud gang las
NK048(tshi)004:2765: de nyid rtsal du bton nas bstan pa tsam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:2766: sgo nas rgyud de logas su thega pa'i rtse mo
NK048(tshi)004:2767: gzhan zhig yin par ma bzhag kyang don la gnas
NK048(tshi)004:2768: pas bzhag dgos te dper na 'khor 'das kyi chos
NK048(tshi)004:2769: kun mnyam nyid kyi ye shesa 'gyur med bde ba
NK048(tshi)004:2770: chen po'i sku nyid rtsal du bton nasa gsal bar
NK048(tshi)004:2771: 'chad pa yi gnyis med kyi rgyud mchog dpal ldan
NK048(tshi)004:2772: dus kyi 'khora lo nyid la rgyud thams cad kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2773: rgyal po'am mthar thug yin par bzhed cing bzhag pa
NK048(tshi)004:2774: bzhina du rgyud kyi mthar thug dang theg pa'i rtse
NK048(tshi)004:2776: des na gsang sngags bla na meda pa'i nang gi
NK048(tshi)004:2777: rgyud sde'i ma h+aa a nu a ti ste gsang
NK048(tshi)004:2778: mchog yo ga gsum gyi nang nasa kyang dabnga bzhi'i
NK048(tshi)004:2779: zhes dbang bzhi pa tshig dbang rin po che'i lam
NK048(tshi)004:2780: gyi ye shesa rig stong rang byung ye shes zung
NK048(tshi)004:2781: 'jug 'dus ma byas gang nyid ma gab ma sbas
NK048(tshi)004:2782: par rtsal du bton nasa shin tu gsal bar bstan
NK048(tshi)004:2783: cing 'achada pa theg mchog a ti yo ga'i sems
NK048(tshi)004:2784: phyogs kyi rgyud sde chen po 'di rnams ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2785: rgyud sde bla na med pa kun gyi mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:2786: gi dgongsa pa'i mthila dang skyel so dam pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:2787: te / dper na lana grangsa bcu drug gi bar
NK048(tshi)004:2788: du bzhus pa'i gsera btso ma shin tu rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:2789: dag pa de bzhina du 'og ma'i thega pa gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:2790: kun gyi grub mtha'a lung rigs man ngag gis dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:2791: pa yisa je basa je daga gam je gsal du
NK048(tshi)004:2792: bstan pas rig stong dbyer med rang byung gi ye
NK048(tshi)004:2793: shes ji bzhin pa nyid a ti yo ga'i rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:2794: 'dira yang dag par mathara phyin pa kho na yin
NK048(tshi)004:2795: pas 'di ni rgyud thams cad kyi mthar thug dang
NK048(tshi)004:2796: theg pa thams cad kyi rtse mor legs pa grub
NK048(tshi)004:2797: te / pa yin no // de phyir zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:2798: shes raba dri meda kyi tshad mas rig stong zung
NK048(tshi)004:2799: 'jug rang byung gi ye shes 'od gsal 'dus ma
NK048(tshi)004:2800: byas pa 'di yi dona nyid yang dag pa grub
NK048(tshi)004:2801: te / pa yin no // pa'i tshul ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2802: bkra shis dus tshod 'dzin pa khu byug gi rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:2803: te / pa yin no // pa'i tshul ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2804: dang / yon tan rtsal chen rdzogsa pa'i rgyud la
NK048(tshi)004:2805: sogs pa bzla ba rgyal po'i skar dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2806: nam mkha' klong yangs ye shes gting rdzogs /
NK048(tshi)004:2807: rang byung bde ba 'khor lo'i rgyud sogs shan 'byed pa bram ze'i skor dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2809: rig pa gnad la 'bebs pa sgom pa'i skor /
NK048(tshi)004:2810: chos nyid ma bu sprad pa rdzong phreng gi skor /
NK048(tshi)004:2811: lta ba mtha' dbus med par ston pa kun byed
NK048(tshi)004:2812: rgyal po la sogs pa rgyud tha ma'i skor sogs
NK048(tshi)004:2813: rang grol mngon sum ston pa man ngag gi skor
NK048(tshi)004:2815: de dag gi dgongas pa 'grel pa'ang 'phags yul du
NK048(tshi)004:2816: yang sprul dga' rab rdo rjes la shan lta ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:2817: me long / pra khrid nyams rim bzhi pa /
NK048(tshi)004:2818: bsam gtan nyams kyi sgron ma /
NK048(tshi)004:2819: klong rab 'byams rgyal po'i rgyud 'grel sogs nas rgya
NK048(tshi)004:2820: gar mkhas pa nyer gcig gis gsungs pa rnams dang
NK048(tshi)004:2823: la bzla ba'i rgyud sde rnams dang rtsa rgyud gsang
NK048(tshi)004:2824: ba snying po'i man ngag gi le'u sogs la brten
NK048(tshi)004:2825: nas man ngag lta ba'i phreng ba sogs rgyal po
NK048(tshi)004:2828: chu bo ri'i sgom grwa pa sogs la gdams pa'i bod yul spyi grags kyi skor dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2829: rgyal ba kahthoga pa chen pos /
NK048(tshi)004:2830: theg pa'i spyi mdzod chen po /
NK048(tshi)004:2831: rtogs ldan sh+aakya rdo rjes kun 'dus rig pa'i sgron
NK048(tshi)004:2832: me sogs rgyud kyi dgongs 'grel ngo mtshar ba rnams
NK048(tshi)004:2833: dang / bram ze dang man ngag skor gyi chos sde gnyis la'ang /
NK048(tshi)004:2834: lo chen bee ro tsa na dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2835: rgyal mo g.yu sgra snying po'i bka' drin las rim bzhin brgyud de /
NK048(tshi)004:2836: a don bco brgyad 'grel ba bco brgyad kyis gtan
NK048(tshi)004:2837: la dbab pa sogs dang gsang bdag sgro phug pas
NK048(tshi)004:2839: rog shes rab 'byung gnas kyis khog don snang ba'i 'od zer /
NK048(tshi)004:2840: kun mkhyen dam pa rin po ches /
NK048(tshi)004:2841: rdzogs pa chen po bsam gtan spyi 'grel /
NK048(tshi)004:2842: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i spyi bcings chen mo /
NK048(tshi)004:2843: yig chung gnad kyi man ngag tshan bu sna tshogs /
NK048(tshi)004:2844: 'dra mthun khyad par ngang pa'i rgyal po sogs tshig
NK048(tshi)004:2845: nyung la don zam cing rgya che ba rnams dang
NK048(tshi)004:2846: / chos rje gtsang ba chen po nas /
NK048(tshi)004:2847: lta sgom spyod pa'i don gsal /
NK048(tshi)004:2848: bya bral nam mkha' rdo rjes khams lugs rdzogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:2849: chen po'i khrid yig sogs bka' srol rmad du byung
NK048(tshi)004:2851: de las brgyud pa'i bka' bab la'ang /
NK048(tshi)004:2852: bla chen dge ba rab gsal nas brgyud pa'i khams lugs /
NK048(tshi)004:2853: a ro ye shes 'byung gnas nas brgyud pa'i a ro lugs /
NK048(tshi)004:2854: nyang ban nas zur la brgyud pa'i nyang lugs /
NK048(tshi)004:2855: rong ban nas rong zom la brgyud pa'i rong lugs
NK048(tshi)004:2856: sogs rig 'dzin brgyud pa'i lugs zab mo'i man ngag
NK048(tshi)004:2857: gis 'chad tshul gzhan dang ma 'dres pa kun dang
NK048(tshi)004:2858: / khyad par du pan+di ta chen po kun mkhyen
NK048(tshi)004:2859: rong zom chosa bazanga gis tshad ma yang dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2860: rigas pa sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i rnam par dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:2861: pa'i lung rigs man ngag zab mo'i bstan don rnams
NK048(tshi)004:2862: la tshul bzhin du bsam par byas na bdud dang
NK048(tshi)004:2863: phas kyi rgol ba'i yul lasa 'ad'a zhing sus kyang
NK048(tshi)004:2864: glags phra ba tsam yang mi rnyed par gang gis
NK048(tshi)004:2865: kyang mi 'phrog pa'i shesa raba zab mo yongs su
NK048(tshi)004:2866: smin para byed pa'i mtshan nyid dang yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:2867: ldan pa yin pas de la goms par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2868: rgyal tshab byams pas mdo sde rgyan las kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:2869: chos bzang rigs pas rnam dpyad bsam pa can //
NK048(tshi)004:2870: rtag tu bdud kyi bar chad byed pa med //
NK048(tshi)004:2871: khyad par rnyed dang gzhan gyi phyogs sun 'byin //
NK048(tshi)004:2872: mi 'phrog yongs su smin pa'i mtshan nyid do //
NK048(tshi)004:2873: zhes yongs smin gyi mtshan nyid ji skad bstan pa
NK048(tshi)004:2874: 'dis pan+di ta 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar lung
NK048(tshi)004:2875: bstan par yang rig par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:2876: gong du bshad pa'i sems phyogs rdzogs pa chen po
NK048(tshi)004:2877: 'di la yongs su grags pa'i sems klong gnyis ka'ang
NK048(tshi)004:2878: 'du ste / la bzla ba'i rgyud la klong rab 'byams rgyal po'i rgyud sogs yod cing /
NK048(tshi)004:2879: bram ze la'ang rtsa ba'i rgyud dang man ngag gi
NK048(tshi)004:2880: rgyud gnyis las ye shes gsang sgron la sogs man
NK048(tshi)004:2881: ngag gi rgyud du bzhugs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2882: man ngag gi skor la'ang brgyud pa tha mal /
NK048(tshi)004:2887: bsam bstan gyi sde'i skor dang lngar gsungs pas gsal lo //
NK048(tshi)004:2888: snyan rgyud rdo rje zam pa'ang ye shes gsang ba
NK048(tshi)004:2889: la brten pas klong sde'i man ngag gi 'chad tshul
NK048(tshi)004:2891: don 'di dag la kun mkhyen chos rjes bskyed rdzogs
NK048(tshi)004:2892: la mi ltos par sems nyid ye nas sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:2893: pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa zhes bzhed do //
NK048(tshi)004:2895: 'on kyang lta ba'i sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:2896: de ltar gnas lugs mthar thug lta ba'i dngos gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:2897: rig stong zung 'jug rang byung gi ye shes bsal
NK048(tshi)004:2898: bzhag dang bral ba mdo rgyud nges don zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:2899: rnams las yang dag par bstan mod kyi /
NK048(tshi)004:2900: 'on kyang de ltar tshul bzhin du rtogs nas mngon
NK048(tshi)004:2901: du gyur pa'i gnas lugs lta ba'i dngosa gzhi mthar
NK048(tshi)004:2902: thug pa ni rig stong dbyer med blo 'das smra
NK048(tshi)004:2903: bsam brjod med kyi ye shes mchog nyid yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:2904: de nyid snang ba dang stong pa phyogs rera 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:2905: pa sogas gzung 'dzin can gyi semsa dang semsa las
NK048(tshi)004:2906: byung ba'i gnyis snang gi spyod yul can du lta
NK048(tshi)004:2907: ba'i dngos gzhi 'di yi dona nyid lung rigs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:2908: bkral zhing ston para byed pa rnams kyis ni sems
NK048(tshi)004:2909: las 'das pa'i brjod par bya ba mina pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:2910: brjod byar byas pa yin pa'i phyir rgyud don tshul
NK048(tshi)004:2911: bzhin du gzigs pas zab mo'i man ngag la makhasa
NK048(tshi)004:2912: shing don la mnga' dbang 'byor pa'i grub pa'i dbang
NK048(tshi)004:2913: po rnams kyi dgongsa pa yang dag pa nyid dang
NK048(tshi)004:2914: shin tu 'agla bar gyur pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:2915: ganga phyir rdzogs pa chen po a ti yo ga
NK048(tshi)004:2916: yi lta ba 'di ni snang ba dang stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:2917: yod pa dang med pa la sogs gang du'ang bsam
NK048(tshi)004:2918: gyis mi khyab pa'i rig stong dbyer med rang byung
NK048(tshi)004:2919: gi ye shesa mchog nyid yina slad /
NK048(tshi)004:2920: tha mal ma daga pa'i gzung 'dzin can gyi semsa
NK048(tshi)004:2921: dang semsa las byung ba kun lasa 'adsa pa kho
NK048(tshi)004:2922: na'i ste kho na yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:2923: des na gnas lugs mthar thug rang byung gi ye
NK048(tshi)004:2924: shes de nyid gsal bar ston pa'i man ngag gi
NK048(tshi)004:2925: rgyud sde'i yang zab thig le gsang skor gyi dgongs
NK048(tshi)004:2926: don zab mo 'di nyid la'ang ngo bo ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:2927: dag pa ka daga stong pa'i cha nyid ji bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:2928: par gtan la 'bebas par byed pa la bzla ba
NK048(tshi)004:2929: khregsa chod kyi lta ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2930: rang gsal lhun gyis grub pa'i sku dang ye shesa
NK048(tshi)004:2931: kyi ranga bzhina yang dag par gtan la 'bebsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:2932: lasa dbyings nang gasla sgrib bral 'dus ma byas pa
NK048(tshi)004:2933: gzhona nu bum pa'i skur sus kyang ldog tu med
NK048(tshi)004:2934: par yida chesa mngon sum du mthong ba'i rgya che
NK048(tshi)004:2935: ba 'oda gasla thoda rgal gyi lta ba dang gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:2936: yin la / de gnyis ka'ang tha dad med pas
NK048(tshi)004:2937: so sora dbyer meda de ngo bo ka daga gi
NK048(tshi)004:2938: dbyings dang rang bzhin lhun grub kyi 'od gsal zung
NK048(tshi)004:2939: du 'jug pa'i thugs rje kun khyab rang byung gi
NK048(tshi)004:2940: ye shesa shin tu rnam par dag pas 'dus ma
NK048(tshi)004:2941: byas pa chena po nyid de 'di ni man ngag
NK048(tshi)004:2942: gsang ba snying tig gi mtha' grol yongs rdzogs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2943: lta ba mthar phyin pa kho na yina no //
NK048(tshi)004:2944: der ma zad rgyud sde chen po gazhana lasa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:2945: mi shiga pa'i ye shesa ti la ka zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:2946: la sogs par mtshon tsam du gsungs pa yang lhun
NK048(tshi)004:2947: grub gzhon nu bum sku 'di dang ming gi rnam
NK048(tshi)004:2948: grangsa tsam las don la tha dad ma mchis mod
NK048(tshi)004:2949: kyi / 'on kyang yang gsang bla na med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:2950: man ngag sde'i rgyud sde zab mo 'dira ni gab
NK048(tshi)004:2951: sbas med par ches shina tu gasla bora bstan cing
NK048(tshi)004:2952: gtan la pheb par mdzad pas na 'di ni rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:2953: dang theg pa gzhan thams cad las mchog dang phul
NK048(tshi)004:2954: dang rab dang rtse mor gyur pa nyid do //
NK048(tshi)004:2955: de yang snying tig ma bu'i chos yongs su rdzogs
NK048(tshi)004:2956: pa rnams ni pan+di ta chen po bi ma mi
NK048(tshi)004:2957: tra'i bka' drin las gangs ljongs dpal gyi ri la
NK048(tshi)004:2958: bsod nams kyis mgron du bos pa yin zhing /
NK048(tshi)004:2959: 'di la'ang nang gseng du dbye na /
NK048(tshi)004:2960: phyi 'khrul gzhi rtsis kyi skor dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2961: nang bshad tig spros pa'i skor dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2962: sna tshogs thabs kyi skor sogs bdun du gsungs la /
NK048(tshi)004:2963: de'ang nang bshad tig spros pa'i skor ni /
NK048(tshi)004:2964: rgyud bcu bdun bstan pa srung ba'i rgyud dang bco brgyad /
NK048(tshi)004:2965: rgya che ba man ngag brgya bcu dgu sogs ldang mas gter nas byon pa rnams yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:2966: de dag gi don 'grel kun mkhyen chen pos gsungs rab mdzod chen bdun dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2967: ngal bso skor gsum sogs dang /
NK048(tshi)004:2968: kun mkhyen 'jigs bral gling pas yon tan rin po
NK048(tshi)004:2969: che'i mdzod la sogs pa dgongs gter bstan bcos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:2970: tshul du bstan pa mtha' dag yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:2971: mngon sum 'od gsal gyi skor sogs bye brag tu
NK048(tshi)004:2972: bstan pa ni gu ru mtsho skyes rdo rjes mkha'
NK048(tshi)004:2973: 'gro ye shes mtsho rgyal dang lha lcam pad+ma gsal
NK048(tshi)004:2974: la gdams pa las 'brel gyi gter nas byon pa
NK048(tshi)004:2976: gong du bshad pa'i man ngag brgya bcu dgu bi
NK048(tshi)004:2977: ma la'i zab pa pod bzhi dang bcas pa lce
NK048(tshi)004:2978: btsun chen pos gter nas byon pa bi ma snying
NK048(tshi)004:2980: kun mkhyen snga mas yang tig rnam gsum dang kun
NK048(tshi)004:2981: mkhyen phyi mas snying tig gi khrid yig chen mo
NK048(tshi)004:2982: sogs bzhugs pa'o // 'di nyid la kun mkhyen chos
NK048(tshi)004:2983: rjes ye shes rang snang ba'i ngo bor sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:2984: pa'i rang bzhin du bstan pa zhes phyogs bcu'i mun
NK048(tshi)004:2987: gter chen gu ru chos dbang gis yang ti sangs rgyas mnyam sbyor /
NK048(tshi)004:2988: mnyam med rdo rje gling pas lta ba klong yangs /
NK048(tshi)004:2989: lha btsun mkha' 'gro dbang phyug gis /
NK048(tshi)004:2991: 'gro mgon dung mtsho ras pas yang ti gser gyi 'bru gcig /
NK048(tshi)004:2992: byang ba rig 'dzin chen pos rdzogs chen dgongs pa zang thal /
NK048(tshi)004:2993: 'dren mchog karma gling pas zhi khro dgongs pa rang grol /
NK048(tshi)004:2994: mchog sprul mi 'gyur rdo rjes gnam chos thugs kyi gter kha /
NK048(tshi)004:2995: chos rgyal gter bdag gling pas a ti zab don snying po /
NK048(tshi)004:2996: rig 'dzin 'jigs med gling pas klong chen snying gi thig le /
NK048(tshi)004:2997: 'jam dbyangs mkhyen rtse'i dbang pos lce btsun snying thig
NK048(tshi)004:2998: la sogs pa chos sde mang zhig byon pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:2999: no // de las klong chen snying tig gi bstan
NK048(tshi)004:3000: pa 'dis ni gangs ljongs 'dzin ma'i tha gru mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:3001: dag zlum por bcings te 'jig rten yongs kyi sgron
NK048(tshi)004:3002: ma dam par bzhugs shing man ngag yang gsang bla
NK048(tshi)004:3003: med snying tig rdo rje snying po'i bstan pa gzhir
NK048(tshi)004:3004: bzhengs su byas pas bka' drin gzhal las 'das pa'o
NK048(tshi)004:3005: no // // 'dir bka' gter rdzogs pa chen po'i rnam bzhag nyung ngu zhig bstan pa 'di ni /
NK048(tshi)004:3006: bdag cag gi bla ma dam pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3007: byams chen thugs rje'i gter mdzod rgyal bstan yongs rdzogs kyi mnga' bdag kun gzigs ma h+aa pan+di ta /
NK048(tshi)004:3008: don gyi slad du mtshan nas smos te /
NK048(tshi)004:3009: thub bstan chos kyi rgya mtsho bshad sgrub bstan pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3010: nyi ma dpal bzang po gang gi zhal lung bdud
NK048(tshi)004:3011: rtsi'i cha shas blo yi dbul ba sel ba'i nor
NK048(tshi)004:3012: bu lags so // gnyis pa rdzogs chen sems sde'i sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3013: de la 'od gsal rdzogas pa chena po la phyi semsa sde /
NK048(tshi)004:3015: gsang ba mana ngaga sde gsum las sems sde'i zab
NK048(tshi)004:3016: gsal gnyis su med pa'i ye shes sgrub pa'i man
NK048(tshi)004:3017: ngag thor bu'i nyams len gyi gnad re rera makhasa
NK048(tshi)004:3018: shing grub pa'i dbang phyug so so'i rtsal du bton
NK048(tshi)004:3019: nas thugs nyamsa su bzhesa pa rnams lasa /
NK048(tshi)004:3020: bka' rgyud pa sogs kyi phyag rgya chena po dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3021: chos rjes sa skya pas lam 'bras bu dang bcas pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3022: mnyam med dam pa sangs rgyas kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:3023: dam chos sdug bsngal zhi byed dang ma cig ye shes mkha' 'gros zab don gcod kyi gdams skor /
NK048(tshi)004:3024: jo bo bka' gdams pa rnams zung 'jug dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:3025: chena po sogas mtshan gyi rnam grangsa mi 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)004:3026: so sora gragsa mod kyang dona la de ltar phyin
NK048(tshi)004:3027: ci ma log par rtogs par gyur na lam gang
NK048(tshi)004:3028: nas sgrubs kyang semsa dang sems lasa byung ba las
NK048(tshi)004:3029: 'adsa pa yi rang byung 'od gsal ba'i ye shesa
NK048(tshi)004:3030: nyid du rnam dbyer med pa yina pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:3031: kun kyang mnyam pa nyid de bzang ngan gang yang
NK048(tshi)004:3032: med do // des na sangas rgyas rnams dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3033: grub thob thams cad dgongsa pa ni gciga yin no
NK048(tshi)004:3034: zhesa makhasa grub kun gyis mgrin gciga tu smra zhing
NK048(tshi)004:3035: gsung par mdzad pa yang tshul de lta bu la
NK048(tshi)004:3037: gzhan la lasa ranga lugsa 'od gsal rdzogsa pa chena
NK048(tshi)004:3038: po ni gzhan phyag rgya chena po la sogas pa
NK048(tshi)004:3039: lasa khyad par du 'aphagas so zhes zer na'ang /
NK048(tshi)004:3040: de ltar sems las 'das pa'i ye shes de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3041: ji lta ba bzhin du ma rtogsa na ni gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3042: lugs chos kyi dbyings zung 'jug spros pa dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:3043: ba'i ye shes mnyam pa nyid dngos su mthong ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3044: lam gyi tha snyad yang dag pa nyid meda la
NK048(tshi)004:3045: de nyid ji bzhin du rtogsa par gyur na sems
NK048(tshi)004:3046: las 'das pa'i ye shes su dgongsa pa gcig tu
NK048(tshi)004:3047: gyur pa la rigs pa yang dag pasa 'athada pa
NK048(tshi)004:3048: dang bcas pa'i phyir na dbye ba bzang ngan mi
NK048(tshi)004:3049: 'dra ba 'di dang 'adi'o zhes brjod du meda do
NK048(tshi)004:3050: // de bzhina du sngags bla meda kyi rgyud sde
NK048(tshi)004:3051: thams cad kun gyi bzhi pa'i dabnga gi'am dbang bzhi
NK048(tshi)004:3052: pa'i ye shesa don gyi 'od gsal yang dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:3053: kun kyang rig stong zung 'jug 'od gsal rdzogsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:3054: chen por 'du bas dbye ba gang yang meda do
NK048(tshi)004:3055: // // 'ona kyang phyag rgya chen po la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3056: pa'i ye shes de dag thamsa cad kyi 'byung gansa
NK048(tshi)004:3057: ye shes thams cad kyi spyi gzugs zung 'jug rang
NK048(tshi)004:3058: byung gi ye shes kho na gab sbas med par
NK048(tshi)004:3059: rtsal du bton par mdzad pa'i rdzogsa pa chen po'i
NK048(tshi)004:3060: rgyud sde la yang phyi semsa sde /
NK048(tshi)004:3062: gsang ba man ngaga gi sdes phye ba'i zab rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:3063: kyi khyad para du mas 'aphagas pa'i gnad don zhal
NK048(tshi)004:3064: nas snyan du brgyud pa'i man ngaga zab mo thor
NK048(tshi)004:3065: bus nyamsa su len pa yi tshul shin tu gsal
NK048(tshi)004:3066: ba gazhana pa su la'ang ming tsam ma gragsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:3067: mang po yoda pasa na 'di ni khyad chosa yina
NK048(tshi)004:3068: zhesa gsang thon du smra bar ci zhig dgosa zhes
NK048(tshi)004:3069: mi dgos te / gser ri'i dbus na lhun po bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3071: de la rdzogs chen sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3072: de la rig stong dbyer med 'od gsal rdzogsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:3073: chena po rang byung gi ye shes mathara thub pa
NK048(tshi)004:3074: zab zhi spros pa dang bral ba'i 'od gasla 'dus
NK048(tshi)004:3075: ma byas pa nyid ni sangas rgyas kyi ye shesa
NK048(tshi)004:3076: dngos nyid yina na yanga theg mchog rdzogs pa chen
NK048(tshi)004:3078: mtshan ldan gyi bla mas smin byed kyi dbang dang
NK048(tshi)004:3079: grol byed kyi gdams ngag zab mo la brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:3080: mos gus phun sum tshogs pa'i skal ldan slob mas
NK048(tshi)004:3081: 'ching ba kun ldan so so'i skye bo'i gnas skabs
NK048(tshi)004:3082: su yang rdzogs pa chen po'i man ngag gi lam
NK048(tshi)004:3083: gnad daga la tshul bzhin du zhugs nas sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:3084: kyi ye shesa dngos de dang rjes su mthun para
NK048(tshi)004:3085: dang po man ngag zab mo'i ngo sprod la brten
NK048(tshi)004:3086: nas dpe yi ye shes dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3087: de la goms pas dona gyi ye shes dang mthar
NK048(tshi)004:3088: phyin nas zung 'jug gi ye shes gsum po rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3089: la dper na ri mora bris pa'i zla ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:3090: chu nang gi zla ba dang nam mkha'i zla ba
NK048(tshi)004:3091: dngos bzhina du ye shes de dag rim pasa gciga
NK048(tshi)004:3092: gisa gcig 'dren cinga mngon du gyur pa yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:3093: na rgyu rkyen rtsol sgrub las 'das pa'i ranga byung
NK048(tshi)004:3094: zaga pa meda pa'i ye shesa ganga de ranga gi
NK048(tshi)004:3095: blo stobs kyi nus pa dang bstun te tshul ji
NK048(tshi)004:3096: lta ba bzhin du nyamsa su lena pa yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:3097: par yod pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
NK048(tshi)004:3098: dpera na mdo lam du'ang spros pa dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3099: 'aphagas pa'i ye shesa ganga nyid thob par bya ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3100: phyir du de nyid rigs pas gtan la dbab ste
NK048(tshi)004:3101: rjes su mthun pa so so'i skye bo'i sa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3102: nas kyang sgom du yod pa bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:3103: des na spros kun bral bar chosa nyid snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3104: zung 'jug gi ye shesa che ba'am chen po mngona
NK048(tshi)004:3105: sum du yang dag par gtan la pheba cing sgom
NK048(tshi)004:3107: stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i yida dpyod kyi
NK048(tshi)004:3108: 'dzina pa'i gnyis chos kyi lta ba rags pa thams
NK048(tshi)004:3109: cad kun rim pas ngesa para nub nasa spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:3110: dang bral ba'i rang byung gi ye shes nyid rjen
NK048(tshi)004:3111: par mthonga bar 'gyur ba yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3113: de phyir skabs shan sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3114: de yi phyir na gong du ji skad bshad pa
NK048(tshi)004:3115: ltar skabsa kyi shan so sor ma phyed para sgom
NK048(tshi)004:3116: pa la 'dzina stangsa dang bcas pa'i dpyad pa yoda
NK048(tshi)004:3117: pa zhig nges par dgos zer ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3118: dpyod pa'i 'dzin stangs meda par 'jog sgom kho na
NK048(tshi)004:3119: dgos zhes phyogsa sam mtha' gcig tu 'dod cing smra
NK048(tshi)004:3120: ba la skyon gyi cha re dang legas pa'i cha
NK048(tshi)004:3121: re yod pa dper na zla ba'i 'phela 'grib kyi
NK048(tshi)004:3122: skyon yon bzhina du gansa pa yin pas mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3123: cing / rang lugs so sor phye ste bshad pa
NK048(tshi)004:3124: 'di ni mdo rgyud kyi ngesa pa'i lung gi bstan
NK048(tshi)004:3125: don ji lta ba bzhina du 'khrul ba'i dri ma
NK048(tshi)004:3126: med par rig pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par grub
NK048(tshi)004:3128: theg mchog lta ba sgom pa dpyad 'jog tu //
NK048(tshi)004:3129: phyogs rer 'dzin la skyon dang legs cha re //
NK048(tshi)004:3130: nyes pa'i skyon bral ji bzhin shan 'byed pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:3131: lung rigs nyi ma theg mchog lta ba'i mig /
NK048(tshi)004:3133: dri lan lnga pa bden pa gnyis las gang zhig gtso ba'i lan la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:3134: phyogs su lhung ba gzhan gyi lugs la lung rigs zab mos gnod pa ji ltar 'byung tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:3135: bden gnyis zung du 'jug pa rang gi lugs la
NK048(tshi)004:3136: 'khrul med tshad ma'i lam srol ji ltar 'thad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3138: bden pa gnyis la sogs tshigs bcad bcu gcig dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3139: de la bdena pa gnyis la ganga zhig gtso che
NK048(tshi)004:3140: bar smra ba la lung rigs kyis sgrub tshul ji
NK048(tshi)004:3142: snang stong dbyer med mnyam pa chen po thugs su
NK048(tshi)004:3143: ma chud par stong par thugs zhen che ba kha
NK048(tshi)004:3144: ciga stong pa nyid dona dam pa nyid gtso chera
NK048(tshi)004:3146: 'di ltar snang ba kun rdzob rnams ni 'khrul ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3147: snang ba kho na yin no zhesa spang byar rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:3148: shing 'dzin la stong nyid dona dam pa ni ma
NK048(tshi)004:3149: 'khrul pa yang dag pa nyid yin pasa dona dam
NK048(tshi)004:3150: pa der lta ba ni rnam par dag pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:3151: no zhes zer ba mi 'thad de /
NK048(tshi)004:3152: ji ltar na snang ba kun rdzob rnams ma 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:3153: bar snang ba ltar bdena par grub par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:3154: de dona dama pa stong pa nyid yin par yang
NK048(tshi)004:3155: mi rung ba'i phyir na kun rdzob 'khrul ba'i snang
NK048(tshi)004:3156: ba'o // zhes de skad du ni gsungsa pa yin moda kyi /
NK048(tshi)004:3157: 'on kyang snang ba kun rdzob 'di spang ba'i pha
NK048(tshi)004:3158: rol te snang ba de las gzhan na de'i stong
NK048(tshi)004:3159: pa dona dam zhes pa yan gar du 'ag'a cung
NK048(tshi)004:3160: zad tsam yanga mi 'grub ste de gnyis las kun
NK048(tshi)004:3161: rdzob thabas dang don dam thabas las byung ba nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3162: yin pas na / gang brtagsa bya'i dngosa po ka
NK048(tshi)004:3163: ba la sogs pa'i snang ba kun rdzob nyid la
NK048(tshi)004:3164: ma brten para de yi dngosa meda dam stong nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3165: don dam par yan gar du yoda pa mina te
NK048(tshi)004:3166: yin pas na / / desa na dngosa po dang
NK048(tshi)004:3167: dngosa po meda pa de gnyis ka yang rten 'brel
NK048(tshi)004:3168: tsam du mtshungsa pas rten 'brel nyid yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:3169: dngos po rnams brten nas skyes pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3170: dngos med rnams brtan nas btags pa yin pas so //
NK048(tshi)004:3171: gal te snang ba nyid las stong pa sogs su
NK048(tshi)004:3172: med pa de lta ma yin par stong nyid don
NK048(tshi)004:3173: dam pa gtso che zhes stong para zhena cing 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:3174: pa desa snang ba rnam para bacada pa'am spang bar
NK048(tshi)004:3176: ngo bo skye ba med pa'i stong pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)004:3177: pa'i gnad kyis snang ba 'gags pa med pa'i rten
NK048(tshi)004:3178: 'byung du rang shara bas snang stong dbyer med rtag
NK048(tshi)004:3179: chad thams cad dang bral ba'i zab mo dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:3180: lta ba dpal ldan klu sgrub kyi lugsa bazanga snang
NK048(tshi)004:3181: stong ya ma bral ba nyid phyin ci log gi
NK048(tshi)004:3182: rtog pas dkrugs shing rnyogsa mara byas pa yin la
NK048(tshi)004:3183: / de lta'i snang ba las gzhan pa'i don dam
NK048(tshi)004:3184: stong par mthonga ba de yisa lam de la nan
NK048(tshi)004:3185: tan du gomas par byas nasa mthar chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:3186: stong pa'i dbyingsa phyang chad 'ab'a zhiga nyid du rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:3187: te de'i ngang du yul dang yul can gyi gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:3188: snang thams cad nub pa'i tshe na ni 'aphagas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3189: mnyam bazhaga gnyis snang thams cad nub pa'i stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:3190: nyid ni snang ba dngos po'i ste dngos po rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3191: kyi 'jig rgyur khyod la'ang thala bar 'gyur te dper
NK048(tshi)004:3192: na bum pa'i 'jig rgyu tho ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3193: gzhan yang de 'dra'i gzhan sel gyi stong pa phyang
NK048(tshi)004:3194: chad kho na la gnyis snang nub par mi srid
NK048(tshi)004:3195: cing srid na'ang chad stong du 'gyur ba'i skyon la
NK048(tshi)004:3197: de yi phyir na chos kun ye gdoda ma nasa
NK048(tshi)004:3198: rang rang ngo bos stong pa nyid yin na yanga
NK048(tshi)004:3199: snang ba rten 'byung 'gags pa med par rang shar
NK048(tshi)004:3200: bas stong rten 'byung 'bral mi shes pas dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:3201: dam zung 'jug nyid yin pa'i gnad kyis gang snang
NK048(tshi)004:3202: ba de nyid stong pa dang gang stong pa de
NK048(tshi)004:3203: nyid snang ba ste snang ba dang stong pa so
NK048(tshi)004:3204: sor risa su ma chada pa me dang tsha ba
NK048(tshi)004:3205: bzhin du rnam dbyer med par ye nas gnas pa
NK048(tshi)004:3207: stong pa nyid don dam pa kho na gtso che'o
NK048(tshi)004:3208: zhes 'dzina pa de dag ni gnas lugs mathara thug
NK048(tshi)004:3209: snang stong dbyer med kyi don la mi makhasa par
NK048(tshi)004:3211: yang snang stong dbyer med kyi gnad dam pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:3212: ma rtogs pa la lasa dona dam stong pa'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:3213: phara bacada nasa te de la mi ltos par snang
NK048(tshi)004:3214: ba yan gar pa lhar sgoms pa sogs thabs kun
NK048(tshi)004:3215: rdzob kho na tsam gyi ngosa nasa ni /
NK048(tshi)004:3216: mdo sngags kyi lta ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3217: sngags phyi nang gi rgyud sde'i lta ba rnams mtho
NK048(tshi)004:3218: damna du byed par 'dod pa 'di yang mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3219: de / 'di ltar dona dam pa stong pasa ma
NK048(tshi)004:3220: zina pasa thabs kun rdzob pa ranga nyid kho nas
NK048(tshi)004:3221: mdo sngags rgyud sde gong 'og gi lta ba yi
NK048(tshi)004:3222: mtho damna gyi khyad par byed chasa su mi 'athada
NK048(tshi)004:3223: de / pa'i phyir te / ji ltar na /
NK048(tshi)004:3224: stong pa'i dbyings dang snang ba'i ye shes ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3225: 'du 'bral med pa'i gnad kyis snang ba lhar ye
NK048(tshi)004:3226: nas dag par gnas pa'i lha sgom pa don dang
NK048(tshi)004:3227: ldan pa yin gyi gzhan du dona dam stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3228: dbyings kyi gdengas dang mi ldan pa'am des ma zin
NK048(tshi)004:3229: para snang ba kun rdzob 'khrul ba rang gi ngo
NK048(tshi)004:3230: bo ma dag par lta bzhin du rnam pa lha
NK048(tshi)004:3231: ru sgom pa tsam ni lha min pa la yin
NK048(tshi)004:3232: par mos pa tsam yina gyi gnas lugs dang mthun
NK048(tshi)004:3233: pa'i lta ba yang dag pa nyid mina pas na
NK048(tshi)004:3234: / dper na mu stegsa byed kyi rigas sngagsa 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:3235: pa 'ag'a zhiga kyang sngags bzla ba'i tshe ranga nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3236: rang min pa gzhan du mosa nas bzla dgos par
NK048(tshi)004:3238: yang la lasa rten 'brel gyi snang ba kun rdzob nyid gal che ba ste /
NK048(tshi)004:3240: gnas lugs snang stong bdena gnyis zung du 'jug pa
NK048(tshi)004:3241: zhig dgosa so zhes zera nas yanga nas yanga du
NK048(tshi)004:3242: kun rdzob rten 'brel snang ba'i phyogsa la thugs zhen
NK048(tshi)004:3243: gyis ha cang thal ches te don dam dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3244: rigs pa gang gis kyang snang ba 'gog mi rung
NK048(tshi)004:3245: ste / 'gog na tha snyad la skur pa btab
NK048(tshi)004:3246: cing chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba sogs skyon che
NK048(tshi)004:3247: zhing 'gog kyang mi nus zhes basngagasa shing sgrub nas
NK048(tshi)004:3248: dang po lta ba gtan la phab par mdzad na'ang
NK048(tshi)004:3249: ste / / nyams len dngos gzhi snang stong zung
NK048(tshi)004:3250: 'jug gam dbyer med kyi lta ba skyong zhing sgom
NK048(tshi)004:3251: pa'i dus na zung 'jug gi nyams len dora ba'am
NK048(tshi)004:3252: spang nasa meda rkyang ngam med 'dzina la thugs rtse
NK048(tshi)004:3253: gtod cing nyams len gyi gnad du mdzad pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:3254: yang dang po snang stong bden gnyis dbyer med dam
NK048(tshi)004:3255: zung 'jug tu gtan la 'bebs dgos zhes pa'i bashada
NK048(tshi)004:3256: pa bazanga po gnas lugs mthun pa'i ma lta bu
NK048(tshi)004:3257: de yi rjes su dngos gzhi'i nyams lena snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3258: dbyer med kyi bu chung gis sleb par ma nus
NK048(tshi)004:3259: pas snang stong ya bral gyi sgom pa 'di yang
NK048(tshi)004:3260: gnas lugs mthar thug gi nyams len ma yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:3263: theg mchog dbu ma chen po'i skabs su bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:3264: gnyis la gtso phal med par zung 'jug rgya chad
NK048(tshi)004:3265: phyogs lhung dang bral ba'i lta ba sgrub tshul spyir
NK048(tshi)004:3266: bstan pa / thabs mchog sngags kyi theg pa'i skabs
NK048(tshi)004:3267: su dag mnyam gnyis la mchog dman med par zung
NK048(tshi)004:3268: 'jug rdo rje'i lam gyi lta bar sgrubs tshul bye
NK048(tshi)004:3270: lta ba'i khyad par gyi dbang gis theg dgur 'jog
NK048(tshi)004:3271: pa'i rgyu mtshan bstan te skabs kyi don bsdu ba'o
NK048(tshi)004:3273: des na snga 'gyur sogs tshigs bcad bcu gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3274: bden pa gnyis kyi rang bzhin gzhi lam 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)004:3275: chos kun la snang stong ngam stong rten 'byung gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:3276: la gtso che chung rgyu bzang ngan dbye nas dgag
NK048(tshi)004:3277: sgrub blang dor gyi snang stong ya bral du song
NK048(tshi)004:3278: na gnas lugs dang 'gal bar gyur pa des na
NK048(tshi)004:3279: snga 'gyur gyi ranga lugs grub mtha' rnam par dag
NK048(tshi)004:3280: pa 'dira ni / phung khams skye mched sogs gzhi dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3281: byang phyogs so bdun dang phyin drug sogs lam dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3282: bral smin gyi yon tan 'bras bu'i chosa skad dam
NK048(tshi)004:3283: tha snyad gang la yang rtag dang mi rtag snang
NK048(tshi)004:3284: stong bdena gnyis sogas rgya gang du yang chada pa
NK048(tshi)004:3285: dang phyogs gang du yang lhung ba bral ba ste
NK048(tshi)004:3286: rgya chad phyogs lhung med pa yi snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)004:3287: gnyis dbyer med dam zung 'jug kho na'i rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:3288: grub mtha'a bskyangsa te 'jog pa yin pas 'di las
NK048(tshi)004:3289: gzhan du snang ba kun rdzob dang ni stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:3290: dona dam pa ya bral re re'i steng du ni
NK048(tshi)004:3291: / gzhi dang lam dang 'bras bu yi rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:3292: bzhag pa gang yang skyon med cig 'jog mi nus
NK048(tshi)004:3293: pa'i phyir na gzhi lam 'bras bu gsum char gang
NK048(tshi)004:3294: dang gang du'nga bden pa gnyis la rtsis che chung
NK048(tshi)004:3295: byas nas 'di ni spang bya dang 'di ni blang
NK048(tshi)004:3296: / bya'o zhes / bzang ngan gyi dbye ba cung
NK048(tshi)004:3297: zad kyang meda par mgo mnyam du ye nas gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3298: pas na blang dor du lta ba mi 'thad de
NK048(tshi)004:3299: / bya'o zhes / / snang ba kun rdzob 'di
NK048(tshi)004:3300: nyid spangsa pa'i pha rol lam gzhan zhig na stong
NK048(tshi)004:3301: pa dona dam pa gang yang meda pas mi rnyed
NK048(tshi)004:3302: / bya'o zhes / / la / stong pa dona
NK048(tshi)004:3303: dam pa spangsa pa'i pha rol na kun rdzob gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:3304: zhig rnam pa kun tu meda pa nyid yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:3305: dper na me nyid spang ba'i tsha ba dang tsha
NK048(tshi)004:3306: ba spang ba'i me nyid med pa bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3307: des na gzhi lam 'bras bus bsdus pa'i chos ganga
NK048(tshi)004:3308: yang snang ba de la stong pasa khyab pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:3309: ganga stong pa de la snang basa khyab pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:3312: gzugs las kyang stong pa nyid gzhan ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3313: zhes rgyal ba'i yum las gsungs pas me dang tsha ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3315: mchog gi don gzigs pa'i dam pa rnams kyis /
NK048(tshi)004:3316: snang de ci'i phyir stong pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:3317: stong de ci'i phyir snang ba'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:3318: zhes gsungs pa bzhin chos ganga snang na de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3319: rang gi ngo bos mi stong pa zhig mi srid
NK048(tshi)004:3320: cinga gal te srid na de 'ba' zhig ma gtogs
NK048(tshi)004:3321: pa gzhan phyogs dus kyis bsdus pa'i shes bya gcig
NK048(tshi)004:3323: 'di ltar brtags mtha' bzung ste shes bya'i khong na
NK048(tshi)004:3324: gcig bden zhig srid na cha med gcig yin dgos
NK048(tshi)004:3325: la / gal te rdul phra rab lta bu cha
NK048(tshi)004:3326: med gcig bden par grub pa yod na phyogs dus
NK048(tshi)004:3327: kyi shes pa gang ji snyed pas de 'ba' zhig
NK048(tshi)004:3329: phyogs dus kyis bsdus pa'i 'khor 'das kyi chos gcig
NK048(tshi)004:3330: kyang mi snang bar de 'ba' zhig snang dgos pa
NK048(tshi)004:3331: dang / mthar de yul du byed pa'i yul can
NK048(tshi)004:3332: gyi shes pa'ang mi srid cing de rang gi ngo
NK048(tshi)004:3333: bo la'ang snang mi snang dang phra rdul yin min
NK048(tshi)004:3334: gyi cha yang mi srid pa zhig dgos pas phyang
NK048(tshi)004:3335: chad nam mkha' lta bu 'ba' zhig ma gtogs 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:3336: 'das kyi snang rtog tha snyad thams cad shes bya
NK048(tshi)004:3337: la mi srid par nges par rgyun chad de gtan
NK048(tshi)004:3338: med du 'gyur dgos na'ang de ltar ma yin par
NK048(tshi)004:3339: 'khor 'das kyi snang rtog bslu med kyi tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:3340: 'gog tu med par ches bkra ba 'di nyid chos
NK048(tshi)004:3341: thams cad rang rang gi ngo bos stong pa'i gnad
NK048(tshi)004:3342: kyis rang snang ba yin par shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3343: stong pa nyid de'ang mi snang ba'am snang ba med
NK048(tshi)004:3344: pa zhig mi grub pa yin pa'i phyir na kun
NK048(tshi)004:3345: mkhyen chos rjes / snang ba ma yin pa'i stong
NK048(tshi)004:3346: pa bden pa gnyis char mi srid pa dang rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:3347: byar mi rung ba la sogs par gsungs shing /
NK048(tshi)004:3349: gang la stong pa nyid rung ba //
NK048(tshi)004:3350: de la thams cad rung bar 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:3351: gang la stong nyid mi rung ba //
NK048(tshi)004:3352: de la thams cad rung mi 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:3355: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3356: de phyir stong nyid ma gtogs pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:3357: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3359: gang zhig stong dang rten 'byung dag /
NK048(tshi)004:3360: dbu ma'i lam du don gcig par //
NK048(tshi)004:3361: gsung mchog mtshungs pa med pa yi //
NK048(tshi)004:3362: zhes sogs gsungs pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3363: de'i phyir dngosa dang dngosa meda gnyis po yanga chos
NK048(tshi)004:3364: can nam stong gzhira byas nasa rang rang ngo bos
NK048(tshi)004:3366: gang snang ba'i dngos po 'di dag brten nas skye
NK048(tshi)004:3367: zhing snang ba rmi lam gyi bu snang ltar de
NK048(tshi)004:3368: dang der btagsa pa tsam zhiga las don la grub
NK048(tshi)004:3369: pa med la / dngos med stong pa'ang brten nas
NK048(tshi)004:3370: btags pa rmi lam gyi bu shi ba ltar blo
NK048(tshi)004:3371: yisa btagsa pa tsam las grub pa med pas de
NK048(tshi)004:3372: ltar snang ba dang stong pa dngos dang dngos med
NK048(tshi)004:3373: snang btags kyi rten 'brel 'di la gnas lugs dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:3374: pa'i rigas pa yang dag pasa dpyad pa zab mos
NK048(tshi)004:3375: drangs pa'i snang stong dbyer med pa'i ngesa shesa zab
NK048(tshi)004:3376: mo la snang ba tha snyad bden pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3377: stong pa don dam bden pa 'di gnyis snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3378: thabsa dang stong pa thabas byung nyid du 'char zhing
NK048(tshi)004:3379: mthong ste / de'i phyir de gnyis las gang gciga
NK048(tshi)004:3380: shos yoda par gyur na ni gciga shos de'ang meda
NK048(tshi)004:3381: pa nyid du mi srid pas chu dang rlan ltar
NK048(tshi)004:3382: ye nas 'adu 'bral meda para gansa pa yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:3383: so sor byar med pa de yi phyir na gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:3384: lam 'bras gsum gang la'ang snang ba dang de'i stong
NK048(tshi)004:3385: pa daga so so'i char ni gnyis 'dzin can gyis
NK048(tshi)004:3386: shes shing rtogs na yanga gnas lugs kyi dona du
NK048(tshi)004:3387: nam yanga so sor dbye ba ye nas meda pa
NK048(tshi)004:3388: de yi phyir na snang stong 'di gnyis srad bu
NK048(tshi)004:3389: dkar nag bsgril ba dang gcig rjes su gcig byung
NK048(tshi)004:3390: ba lta bu ma yin par me dang tsha ba
NK048(tshi)004:3391: ltar dbyer med pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:3392: de mtshon pa'i brdar tha snyad du mdo dang rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3393: sder stong rten 'byung ngam thabs shes sam snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3395: lha yi bu rab rtsal sems kyis zhus pa'i mdo las /
NK048(tshi)004:3396: shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa //
NK048(tshi)004:3397: de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing //
NK048(tshi)004:3398: gnyis ka zung du 'jug gyur na //
NK048(tshi)004:3399: des ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:3401: bshad rgyud rdo rje phreng ba las /
NK048(tshi)004:3402: kun rdzob dang ni don dam dag /
NK048(tshi)004:3403: rtog pa gnyis pa rnam par bral //
NK048(tshi)004:3404: gang du yang dag 'dres gyur pa //
NK048(tshi)004:3405: de ni zung du 'jug par bshad //
NK048(tshi)004:3407: de ltar snang stong dbyer med pa'i gansa lugsa yang dag par mthonga ba'i ngesa shes zab mo ni /
NK048(tshi)004:3408: snang stong gang gi'ang mathara lhung ba meda pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:3409: snang stong phyogs rer lhung ba'i nges shes ni gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3410: lugs mthar thug dang mthun pa'i nges shes su mi
NK048(tshi)004:3411: 'gyur ro // des na gnas lugs yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:3412: dpyod pa'i shesa raba zab mo'i ngora gang snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3413: dang de'i stong pa nyid 'di gnyis po yod na
NK048(tshi)004:3414: yoda mnyam dang med na meda mnyam yin pas ngo
NK048(tshi)004:3415: bo gcig la ldog pa tha dada tsam gyis dbye
NK048(tshi)004:3416: 'gyur ro // bar 'doda cing / de yanga dang
NK048(tshi)004:3417: po'i lasa can gyi gang zag rnams la snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3418: 'di gnyis dagga bya dang 'goga byed lta bur so
NK048(tshi)004:3420: de tshe snang stong gnyis po gcig tu 'dres pa
NK048(tshi)004:3421: meda pas da dung zung 'jug ji bzhin par mthong
NK048(tshi)004:3422: ba ma yin pas 'di ltar snang ba'i chos kun
NK048(tshi)004:3423: gdod nas stong zhing stong pa'i gnad kyis rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:3424: du rang 'char bar nges shes yang dag par bskyed
NK048(tshi)004:3425: pa dang / de nas snang stong dbyer med zung 'jug dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3427: mnyam pa nyid de dbu ma'i lta rim bzhi po
NK048(tshi)004:3428: rang rgyud la rim gyis bskyed cing 'byung dgos pa
NK048(tshi)004:3429: yin la / de'i phyir nam zhiga na chos kun
NK048(tshi)004:3430: ye nas stong pa'i ranga bzhina nyid ni rang gsal
NK048(tshi)004:3431: ba'am snang bar 'achara ba la yida chesa thoba ste
NK048(tshi)004:3432: sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i nges shes zab mo thob
NK048(tshi)004:3433: yin la / la / de yanga 'khor 'das kyis
NK048(tshi)004:3434: bsdus pa'i chos thams cad gdoda nasa te ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3435: stong pa nyid yin pa'i gnad kyis rten 'byung 'gags
NK048(tshi)004:3436: pa med par rang snang ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3437: gang snang ba 'di daga thams cad rten cing 'brel
NK048(tshi)004:3438: 'byung yin pa'i gnad kyis stong pa nyid du ye
NK048(tshi)004:3439: nas gnas pa yisa na gzhi dang rtsa ba bral
NK048(tshi)004:3440: ba'i rang bzhin yin pas stong bzhina du snang la
NK048(tshi)004:3441: snang bzhina du stong par mthonga bas snang stong zung
NK048(tshi)004:3442: 'jug gi ngesa shesa gang gis kyang mi 'phrog par
NK048(tshi)004:3443: skye bar gyur na zab mo dbu ma'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:3444: mthar phyin pa nyid yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:3445: de ltar gnas lugs snang stong zung 'jug tu snang
NK048(tshi)004:3446: ba 'di ni nges pa don gyi mdo dang rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3447: sde mana ngaga gi lam zaba mo kun gyi rtsa
NK048(tshi)004:3448: ba'am snying por gyur pa ste thosa bsam yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:3449: pa'i lam gyis gnas lugs la sgro 'dogas thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:3450: legs par choda pa'i dona yang dag pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:3451: 'khrul ba'i dri ma meda pa nyid yina no //
NK048(tshi)004:3454: de las gzhan du 'dod cing rgyud sde la lta
NK048(tshi)004:3455: ba'i mtho dman med na dngos stobs rigs pas ji
NK048(tshi)004:3458: gnad de je bas sogs tshigs bcad dgu dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3459: gong du ji skad bshad pa'i bden gnyis zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:3460: mnyam pa chen por mthong ba'i lam gyi 'dren pa
NK048(tshi)004:3461: lta ba rnam par dag pa'i gnad de nyid gong
NK048(tshi)004:3462: nas gong du je basa je zaba tu rtogsa shing
NK048(tshi)004:3463: goms pasa rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:3464: dang gnyis su med pa'i kun rdzob kyi snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3465: gang ji snyed pa rnams la yanga tha mal ranga
NK048(tshi)004:3466: matshana gyi zhen pa rim gyis spong zhing dbyings snang
NK048(tshi)004:3467: lha dang ye shes su dag pasa gnas snang mthun
NK048(tshi)004:3468: pa'i snang ba gong 'phel du gyur pa'i rjes kyi
NK048(tshi)004:3469: nges shes kyi stobs las rgyud sde'i thega pa'i lta
NK048(tshi)004:3470: rima gyi khyad par de ltar snang ba yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:3471: snang stong zung du chub pa'i gnad la mthong goms
NK048(tshi)004:3473: dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i snod bcud ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3474: lhar dag pa'i dag mnyam gyi lta ba gong nas
NK048(tshi)004:3475: gong du 'phags rim gyis rgyud sde phyi nang mtho
NK048(tshi)004:3476: dman gyi dbye ba 'jog pa yin gyi /
NK048(tshi)004:3477: gzhan du snod bcud kyi snang ba lha dang ye
NK048(tshi)004:3478: shes su gnas pa min kyang lhar mos pa'i khyad
NK048(tshi)004:3479: par tsam las rgyud sde'i khyad par mtho dman du
NK048(tshi)004:3481: snod bcud kyi snang ba ye nas lha ma yin
NK048(tshi)004:3482: pa la yid kyis lha dang dkyil 'khor du mos
NK048(tshi)004:3483: pas bsgom pa tsam zhiga dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3484: ye nas snod bcud da ga pa'i lhar snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3485: ngesa shesa kyi lta ba mthong goms kyi gdenga du
NK048(tshi)004:3486: gyur pa gnyis khyad par gnam sa mchis pas mtshungsa
NK048(tshi)004:3487: pa'i go skabsa rnam pa kun tu mi srid pa
NK048(tshi)004:3488: nyid de dper na dbu mas chosa rnams ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3489: bdena pas stong pa'i stong nyid du nges shes skyes
NK048(tshi)004:3490: pa ganga yin pa de ni dbu ma'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:3491: yin la / sngags mkhan bram zes nad pa rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3492: la sngagas 'debas pa'i tshe na nad meda par yid
NK048(tshi)004:3493: kyis mosa pa dbu ma'i lta ba mina pa bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:3494: yin la / no // des na tshur mthong gi
NK048(tshi)004:3495: spyod yul las 'das pa'i snang stong ngam dbyings ye
NK048(tshi)004:3496: gnyis su med pa'i dona dam zab mo'i gansa lugsa
NK048(tshi)004:3497: ji bzhin du rtogsa pa yisa kun rdzob kyi snang
NK048(tshi)004:3498: ba gang ji snyed pa ye nas dag pa'i lha
NK048(tshi)004:3499: ru sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i yida chesa mchog tu
NK048(tshi)004:3501: de las gazhana du tshur mthong 'khrul ba'i kun rdzob
NK048(tshi)004:3502: kyi snang tshul 'di kho na la gansa nasa snod
NK048(tshi)004:3503: bcud lha ru ji ltar 'grub ste 'grub mi srid
NK048(tshi)004:3504: do // de'i phyir gzung 'dzina 'khrul ba'i snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3505: 'di nyid mina pa'i 'khora ba zhes bya ba ngan
NK048(tshi)004:3506: pa zhig gazhana du grub pa meda la /
NK048(tshi)004:3507: 'khor ba de nyid spong bar byed pa'i lam mtho
NK048(tshi)004:3508: dman gyi dbye ba ji snyed pa rnams kyang don
NK048(tshi)004:3509: dam stong nyid kho na'i ngosa nasa 'jog par nus
NK048(tshi)004:3510: pa mina te / dona dam stong pa'i dbyings de
NK048(tshi)004:3511: tshul gciga nyid yina pa'i phyir na de la mtho
NK048(tshi)004:3512: dman gyi dbye ba med do //
NK048(tshi)004:3513: des na chos cana kun rdzob kyi snang ba gsal
NK048(tshi)004:3514: ba'i cha ji snyed pa 'di kun chos nyid dona
NK048(tshi)004:3515: dam pa'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i gshisa su son
NK048(tshi)004:3516: pa'i snang stong ngam dbyings ye zung du 'jug pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3517: gnad la mthonga sgom gyi blo gros je gsal du
NK048(tshi)004:3518: song zhing nus pa gong 'phel du gyur pas khyad
NK048(tshi)004:3519: par dman mchog la brten nas bya ba yi rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3520: dang cha mnyam spyod rgyud dang rnal 'byor phyi pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3521: rgyud dang nang pa bla na meda pa'i rgyud de
NK048(tshi)004:3522: rgyud sde rin po che'i dbye ba bzhi'am drug tu
NK048(tshi)004:3524: des na snang stong bdena pa gnyis po so so
NK048(tshi)004:3525: ba'am re re rkyang pa yi rgyud sde'i theg rim
NK048(tshi)004:3526: gyi mtho damna mi 'byed pa'am 'byed mi nus kyang
NK048(tshi)004:3527: / dbyings ye dbyer med dam bdena gnyis zung du
NK048(tshi)004:3528: 'jug pa yi gnas lugs zab mo'i de bzhin nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3529: la ci tsam mthong goms kyi yida chesa thob pasa
NK048(tshi)004:3530: lta ba'i nges shes gong du 'phel ba dang gdeng
NK048(tshi)004:3531: du gyur pa'i khyad par bzhina du lam nyamsa lena
NK048(tshi)004:3532: gyi sgom pa dang de'i grogs spyod pa'i gnad kyi
NK048(tshi)004:3533: khyad par rnams kyang lta ba de yi rjes su
NK048(tshi)004:3534: 'brang ba kho na yin pas rgyud sde'i khyad par
NK048(tshi)004:3535: thams cad 'khrul ba med par nges par grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:3536: / yin no // de yi phyir na sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:3537: las kyang 'phrad par dka' ba'i gsang sngags bla na
NK048(tshi)004:3538: meda pa'i rdo rje'i thega pa rin po che snyigs
NK048(tshi)004:3539: dus kyi tshe lus gciga gis grol ba zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:3540: rdo rje 'chang gi go 'phang bde myur du ster
NK048(tshi)004:3541: ba'i lam zab mo ma nora ba ji bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:3542: nyamsa su lena par bzhed na sems can gyi rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3543: kyi khyad par las blta bya thun mong ba chu
NK048(tshi)004:3544: lta bu gcig la mthong ba mi gciga pa rigs
NK048(tshi)004:3545: drug gi 'gro basa khro chu dang rnag dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3547: bdud rtsi dang rnal 'byor pas ma m+aa k+ai la
NK048(tshi)004:3548: sogs pa mi 'dra ba tha dad para mthonga ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3549: chu yi dpe ji lta ba bzhina du rgyud dag
NK048(tshi)004:3550: pa'i 'phags pa chen po'i ji ltar gzigsa pa la
NK048(tshi)004:3551: brten pa'i kun tu tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:3552: nasa snod bcud kyi snang ba ye nas dag par
NK048(tshi)004:3553: rab 'byams snang srid gzhira bzhengas lha sngags ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:3554: kyi dkyil 'khor du grub cing bsgrubs pa la skal
NK048(tshi)004:3555: ba dang ldan pa su zhig yida ches par mi
NK048(tshi)004:3556: 'gyur te shin tu yid chesa sus kyang bzlog tu
NK048(tshi)004:3559: tshul de nges par ma shes na rmad byung rdo
NK048(tshi)004:3560: rje theg pa'i lam mchog gzugs brnyan tsam du 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:3561: tshul bstan pa / rgyud sde la lta ba'i mtho
NK048(tshi)004:3562: dman med na sngags phyi nang gi rim pa gong
NK048(tshi)004:3565: gal te de ltar sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3566: gal te snod bcud snang grags rigs gsum ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3567: dag pa lha sngags ye shes su grub par gong
NK048(tshi)004:3568: du bstan pa de ltar ma shesa nas sdug bden
NK048(tshi)004:3569: 'khor ba'i ranga bzhina las nyon kun 'byung gi 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:3570: bu phung khams skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i snod bcud
NK048(tshi)004:3571: snang tshul ma daga para snang ba de ltar don
NK048(tshi)004:3572: la'ang ma dag par 'doda cing lta bzhina du snang
NK048(tshi)004:3573: ba thams cad dag pa'i rten dang brten pa'i lha
NK048(tshi)004:3574: ru sgomsa pasa lha dang dkyil 'khor du grol bar
NK048(tshi)004:3575: 'dod kyang 'dod pa'i grub 'bras mngon sum mi 'byin
NK048(tshi)004:3576: te dper na rang lus ngana skyug gi bum par
NK048(tshi)004:3577: 'dra ba yi dam bde dgyes 'jigs gsang sogs su
NK048(tshi)004:3578: sgom pa dri bzang gisa legs par byugsa pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:3579: 'drar te 'dra bar snod bcud lha dang dkyil 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:3580: min pa la lha dang dkyil 'khor du yin no
NK048(tshi)004:3581: snyam du sgom pa rdo rje theg pa'i khyad chos
NK048(tshi)004:3582: su sems shing 'dod pa des na kye ma 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:3583: 'das dbyer med mnyam pa nyid mi phyed pa'i rdo
NK048(tshi)004:3584: rje'i theg pa'i lta ba dang bskyed rdzogs kyi sgom
NK048(tshi)004:3585: pa thams cad ri mo'i mara me bzhina du gzugs
NK048(tshi)004:3586: brnyan tsam du bas par 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)004:3587: des na snod bcud kyi chos gang ji snyed pa
NK048(tshi)004:3588: gnas tshul yang dag pa'i don la lha dang dkyil
NK048(tshi)004:3589: 'khor du ye nas gnas su zin kyang de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:3590: ma rtogs pa'i tshur mthong byis pas kun tu tha
NK048(tshi)004:3591: snyad pa'i ngor gnas snang mi mthun par snang tshul
NK048(tshi)004:3592: la ma daga para snang na yanga snang dus nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3593: nas ye nas dag pa chen por gnas pa ma
NK048(tshi)004:3594: mthong ba de ni tshur mthong ma dag pa 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:3595: basa grub pa'i mtha'a nyid yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:3596: 'phags pa'i gzigs pa la brten pa'i kun du tha
NK048(tshi)004:3597: snyad pa'i tshad ma'i ngor ni snod bcud kyi gansa
NK048(tshi)004:3598: tshul stong pa'i dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:3599: shes lha dang dkyil 'khor du snang ba gnas snang
NK048(tshi)004:3600: mthun pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'phags chen rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3601: kyis yang dag par gzigas pa'i don nyid gang gis
NK048(tshi)004:3602: kyang mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i theg pa'i grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3603: mathara smra zhing mchog tu 'dod pa 'di ni lung
NK048(tshi)004:3604: rigs tshad mas grub pa yin pas de lta bu
NK048(tshi)004:3606: de'i phyir snod bcud thams cad ye nas lha'i dkyil
NK048(tshi)004:3607: 'khor du dag pa'i rten dang brten para min no
NK048(tshi)004:3608: snyam du ma dag par lta bzhina du dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:3609: lha'i rten dang brten pa'i dkyil 'khor yina no snyam
NK048(tshi)004:3610: pa'i sgom pa ganga yin pa de gnyis snang mun
NK048(tshi)004:3611: ltar 'gal 'adu'i rang rtagsa ngomsa pa'i lta sgom rig
NK048(tshi)004:3612: pa dang rkang par shin tu ma 'brel ba yi
NK048(tshi)004:3613: lam de ni / rdo rje theg pa'i lam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:3614: gzugsa brnyan las kyang gzugs brnyan nyid yin te de
NK048(tshi)004:3615: ltar ci tsam 'bad pas sgom par byas kyang mthar
NK048(tshi)004:3616: 'bras snod bcud lha dang dkyil 'khor du dag pa'am
NK048(tshi)004:3617: grol ba nyid mi thob ste /
NK048(tshi)004:3618: dper na sola ba nag po 'bad pas ci tsam
NK048(tshi)004:3619: bkrus pasa kyang mi dakara ba'am dkar bar mi 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:3620: ba bzhina no // gal te snod bcud ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:3621: lhar dag pa nyid mana kyang lha yina no snyam
NK048(tshi)004:3622: du bcosa ma'i sgom pa de tsam gyis 'bras bu
NK048(tshi)004:3623: snod bcud lhar dag pa'am grol ba thob para 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:3624: na ni don dam dpyod pa'i rigs lam gyis ngo
NK048(tshi)004:3625: bos sam bden pas stong pa nyid la ngesa shesa
NK048(tshi)004:3626: ci yang meda bzhina du phyi rol mu stegsa nyi
NK048(tshi)004:3627: ma pa rnams kyis snang ba spangsa pa'am med pasa
NK048(tshi)004:3628: stong pa sogas la sgom pasa kyang rang bzhin med
NK048(tshi)004:3629: pa yang dag par mthong ste nyon moongas pa spong
NK048(tshi)004:3630: bar 'gyur dgos pas rigs pas shin tu mi 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3631: ba bzhina no // pa zhig go // gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3632: bya spyod bla med sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3633: de la rdo rje theg pa bya ba spyod pa
NK048(tshi)004:3634: rnal 'byor rnal 'byor chen po bla na med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3635: rgyud sde bzhi'am drug la gnas lugs mthong ba'i lta
NK048(tshi)004:3636: ba'i mtho damna ci yang meda par gyur na shin
NK048(tshi)004:3637: tu mi 'thad pa'i skyon gnyis te /
NK048(tshi)004:3638: ji ltar na snang srid thams cad ye nas bzang
NK048(tshi)004:3639: ngan gnyis chos dang bral ba'i dag mnyam chen por
NK048(tshi)004:3640: rtogs pa yi lta ba la goms pa gdenga du
NK048(tshi)004:3641: gyur pa'i rnal 'byor mchog la gnas bzhina du badga
NK048(tshi)004:3642: dam tshig pa dang lha ye shes pa la bazanga
NK048(tshi)004:3643: ngan dang gatsanga ba dang mi gatsanga ba sogs 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:3644: yon la blang dor so sora 'byed pa ni gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3645: lugs la ma mthonga bzhina du dbye ba sna tshogs
NK048(tshi)004:3646: pas ngal ba dang du len pa yin na ranga
NK048(tshi)004:3647: gisa ranga la shes bzhin du don med par sdug
NK048(tshi)004:3648: bsngal gyi gnoda pa byed para zada do //
NK048(tshi)004:3649: yanga na bya spyod sogs rgyud ste 'oga ma bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:3650: du bdag dang lha la bzang ngan dang gtsang sme
NK048(tshi)004:3651: sogs blang dora yod pa nyid du zhen cing chags
NK048(tshi)004:3652: bzhina du bla na meda pa'i rgyud kyi dag mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:3653: gyi dgongs spyod zab mo sbyor sgrol dang sha chang
NK048(tshi)004:3654: sogas blang dora med par mnyam pa nyid du 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:3655: yon la rang gar spyod para byed na /
NK048(tshi)004:3656: dag mnyam dbyer med kyi dgongs spyod zang mo nyams
NK048(tshi)004:3657: 'og tu ma chud bzhin du de ltar spyod pas
NK048(tshi)004:3658: na ma rtogsa tho co'i spyod pa zhesa mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3659: kun nas rgyal bas yang yang sman para gyur pa
NK048(tshi)004:3660: de nyid mina nam ste yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:3662: ji lta ji ltar sogs tshigs bcad lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3663: de la ji lta ji ltar gnas lugas snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3664: ngam dag ma nyam dbyer med zung 'jug gi dona
NK048(tshi)004:3665: nyid je bas je zab gong 'phel du mthonga ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3666: blo yi rim pa'i rjes kyi nges shes kyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:3667: par la ni lta bar brjod cing bzhag pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:3668: la / lta basa ji lta ji ltar thaga bcad
NK048(tshi)004:3669: cing gtan la phab pa de dang de bzhina bsgomsa
NK048(tshi)004:3670: pas nyams su blang ba dang spyod pasa la dor
NK048(tshi)004:3671: zhing skyong dgos pa yin pas theg pa'i khyad par
NK048(tshi)004:3672: ni gtso bor lta bas 'byed pa kho na yin
NK048(tshi)004:3673: la / no // 'o na thega pa gong 'og
NK048(tshi)004:3674: gi rim pa ni lta ba'i mtho damna gyi 'byed
NK048(tshi)004:3675: dgos pa yin pa'i phyir theg rim dgur ma ngesa
NK048(tshi)004:3676: la / no // so zhe na / de ni shin tu nges te /
NK048(tshi)004:3677: ji ltar na nanga pa'i grub mtha'a kun las dam'a
NK048(tshi)004:3678: shosa nyan thos kyi theg pa nas mathara phyin rdo
NK048(tshi)004:3679: rje rtse mo'i a ti yo ga'i bar theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3680: sde tshana dgu yi grangsa su ni 'joga pa'i rgyu
NK048(tshi)004:3681: matshana yang dag pa dbang po rab 'bring tha gsum
NK048(tshi)004:3682: re re la'ang dbang po tha ma'i tha ma sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3683: gsum gsum du dbye ba la sogs pa yoda pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3684: phyir na shin tu nges te /
NK048(tshi)004:3685: dper na thega pa mtho damna dang dbye bsdu manga
NK048(tshi)004:3686: du yoda kyang theg pa gsum la sogsa par gdul
NK048(tshi)004:3687: bya'i khams dbang mos pa sogs la ltos te dgosa
NK048(tshi)004:3688: pasa bazhaga pa ji lta ba de bzhina du yin
NK048(tshi)004:3689: no // desa na bden gnyis zung 'jug gi gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3690: lugs dag mnyam chen po mthong ba'i nanga gi ye
NK048(tshi)004:3691: shesa kyi stobsa ji lta ji ltar stobsa shugs 'phel
NK048(tshi)004:3692: bar gyur pa de lta de ltar snod bcud rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3693: gnas snang mthun par dag pa mthong ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3694: nang gi ye shes kyi stobs zhan pa de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:3695: ma dag par mthong ba ste dag pa dang ma
NK048(tshi)004:3696: daga par so sora mthonga bas blo rigs kyi mchog
NK048(tshi)004:3697: dman la ltos nas nges legs kyi theg pa'i khyad
NK048(tshi)004:3698: par yang de ltar rim pa dgur snang bas /
NK048(tshi)004:3700: dbang po gsum ni rab 'bring tha //
NK048(tshi)004:3701: des ni theg gsum 'du shes bral //
NK048(tshi)004:3702: de las gsum gsum rab dbye bas //
NK048(tshi)004:3703: dgu ste theg dgu dbang po'i gnad //
NK048(tshi)004:3705: de yi phyir na snang stong ye nas 'du 'bral
NK048(tshi)004:3706: spang bas dbyer med dam zung 'jug tu gnas pa
NK048(tshi)004:3707: gzhi yin la / gzhi de bdena gnyis zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:3708: dbyer meda pa'i tshul gyis ji lta ba bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:3710: lam de ji bzhina du gomsa pa mthar phyin pa
NK048(tshi)004:3711: lasa chos gzugs kyi sku gnyis zung 'jug mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:3712: gi ye shesa mchog nyid thoba par gyur pa ni
NK048(tshi)004:3714: stong de ci'i phyir rang bzhin snang ba'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:3715: snang de ci'i phyir ngo bos stong pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:3716: snang stong ye nas 'du 'bral spang ba'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:3717: zung 'jug 'di las gzhan gang gtso zhes bya /
NK048(tshi)004:3719: dri lan drug pa mi gcig thun mong ba lta bya gang ltar 'thad kyi lan la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:3720: mi 'thad pa gzhan lugs dngos stobs rigs pa tshad mas gsal bar dgag pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3721: 'thad ldan rang lugs lung rigs man ngag zab mos legs par sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3723: chu gcig 'gro ba sogs tshigs bcad bcu bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3724: 'di ltar snang ba'i chu gciga la rigs drug gi
NK048(tshi)004:3725: 'gro ba las snang mi gcig pa so so la
NK048(tshi)004:3727: yi dwags dud 'gro mi rnams dang //
NK048(tshi)004:3728: lha rnams ji ltar rigs rigs su //
NK048(tshi)004:3729: dngos gcig yid ni tha dad phyir //
NK048(tshi)004:3730: don ma grub par 'dod pa yin //
NK048(tshi)004:3732: khro chu dang rnag la sogs pa mi gciga pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3733: dngosa pora snang ba'i tshe na de la la lasa
NK048(tshi)004:3734: thuna monga gi blta bya yod de /
NK048(tshi)004:3735: gang zhe na chu gtsang ma nyid yina la chu
NK048(tshi)004:3736: de mthonga ba'i yul cana rnams kun kyang tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:3737: yina no zhesa zer ni mi 'thad de /
NK048(tshi)004:3738: mi la snang ba'i chu 'di la ranga bzhina gyis
NK048(tshi)004:3739: grub pa'i blta bya rigs drug po la thun mong
NK048(tshi)004:3740: du gyur pa 'ag'a zhig tshad mas grub pa yoda
NK048(tshi)004:3741: cing rigs drug gi 'gro bas kyang de dang de
NK048(tshi)004:3742: nyid mthong ba yin la yul can rnams kyang tshad
NK048(tshi)004:3743: ma yin na chu gtsang ma la rtag tu mthong
NK048(tshi)004:3744: ba la sogs pa'i rigs drug gis mthong ba so
NK048(tshi)004:3745: so ba la tshad ma dang tshad mina gyi dbye
NK048(tshi)004:3746: ba med par 'gyur bas 'khrul ba'i snang ba zhig
NK048(tshi)004:3748: gal te so so'i yul snang rnag dang chu sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3749: rang rang la gang snang ba de gzhan dang thun
NK048(tshi)004:3750: mong mina par gyur na ka ba dang bum pa
NK048(tshi)004:3751: gnyis mthonga ba'i blo la thun mong gi blta bya
NK048(tshi)004:3752: med pa bzhina du thun monga gi blta bya mi
NK048(tshi)004:3753: srid par 'gyur bas blta bya thun mong ba mi
NK048(tshi)004:3754: 'grub bo // yang la lasa thun mong gi blta
NK048(tshi)004:3755: bya rlan gshera tsam zhig yina no zhes zera ba'ang
NK048(tshi)004:3756: 'grub bo // mi 'thad de / rigs drug gi
NK048(tshi)004:3757: 'gro ba la thun monga du rang rang so sora
NK048(tshi)004:3758: rlan gsher tsam zhig ma loga par blta byar yoda
NK048(tshi)004:3759: cing de mthong ba yin na /
NK048(tshi)004:3760: de 'dra'i thun mong gi rlan gshera tsam de la
NK048(tshi)004:3761: rigs drug gi 'gro bas chu rnag sogs mi gciga
NK048(tshi)004:3762: pa'i mthonga snang mi 'dra ba manga du 'byung zhing
NK048(tshi)004:3763: phan tshun gciga gi mthonga ba de nyid gciga shos
NK048(tshi)004:3764: la snang zhing mthong ba meda pa yi chu dang
NK048(tshi)004:3765: rnaga la sogas par snang ba de las gzhan pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3766: snang gzhi rlan gsher de ganga zhig yin te de
NK048(tshi)004:3768: gazhana yanga gzugs med nam mkha'a mtha'a yasa para rlan
NK048(tshi)004:3769: gshera tsam de nyid gang snang ba thams cad nam
NK048(tshi)004:3770: mkha' 'ba' zhig tu snang ba'i gzhi ru ga la
NK048(tshi)004:3772: gcig dang tha dad du brtags na yang thun mong
NK048(tshi)004:3773: gi blta bya rlan gsher tsam de chu nyid dang
NK048(tshi)004:3774: gciga yina na / de nyid chu kho nar snang
NK048(tshi)004:3775: ba las rnag la sogas pa gzhan pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:3776: rnam pa kun tu snang mi rung ste chu nyid
NK048(tshi)004:3777: las gzhan du med pas so //
NK048(tshi)004:3778: gal te rlan gsher de chu la sogas pa lasa
NK048(tshi)004:3779: gzhan tha dad du gyur pa yin na tshad mas
NK048(tshi)004:3780: dmigs dgos pa la rlan gshera zhes chu las yan
NK048(tshi)004:3781: gar ba zhig ci yanga dmigas pa mana pas nam
NK048(tshi)004:3783: snang rung tshad mas ma dmigs pas so //
NK048(tshi)004:3784: de phyir chu dang rnag sogs mi gciga pa'i mthonga
NK048(tshi)004:3785: snang mi 'dra ba so so ba la thun monga
NK048(tshi)004:3786: gi blta bya 'adi'o zhes mtha' gcig tu rang dbang
NK048(tshi)004:3787: gis grub pa zhig mi srid cinga /
NK048(tshi)004:3788: tha snyad du'ang thun monga du mthun par snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3789: dngosa po gcig nyid la mi 'dra ba so sora
NK048(tshi)004:3790: snang ba sna tshogs pa yang mi srid par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:3791: ba'i phyir na phan tshun ltos nasa chu dang rnag
NK048(tshi)004:3792: la sogs pa mthong ba mi gcig par rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:3793: bazhaga pa yin kyang snang tsam zhiga mthun par snang
NK048(tshi)004:3794: ba dang mi snang ba'i gzhi ru khas blang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3796: de lasa gzhan du rigs pas dpyad pa'i chu dang
NK048(tshi)004:3797: rlan gsher sogs thun mong gi blta gzhi'am blta bya
NK048(tshi)004:3798: zhig khasa lena par byed na de gnas lugsa don
NK048(tshi)004:3799: dam pa yina para grub dgosa shing de ltar na
NK048(tshi)004:3800: rigs pas dpyad bzod la sogs pa'i skyon du 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:3801: basa gang ltar brtagsa pa'am khas blang kyang mi 'athada
NK048(tshi)004:3803: yang gal te mthun par snang ba'i thun monga gi
NK048(tshi)004:3804: blta bya zhig gtan nas med para gyur na semsa
NK048(tshi)004:3805: tsam pa'i 'dod pa bzhin du gzugs la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3806: yul phyi don du grub pa meda para nang shesa
NK048(tshi)004:3807: pa nyid bag chags kyi dbang gis gzugs la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3808: pa'i yul gzung rnam du snang bar khasa lena dgosa
NK048(tshi)004:3809: na yang / de ni yang dag par 'athada pa ma yina te /
NK048(tshi)004:3810: yul gzung ba bems po nyid don la grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:3811: meda pa de bzhina du nang 'dzina pa sems de
NK048(tshi)004:3812: yanga dona la grub pa meda para 'dra ba'am mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:3813: pa yina la / gzung 'dzina gnyis po'ang tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:3814: kun rdzob tsam du snang bar yang mnyam pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:3815: pa'i phyir na ganga snang ba kun rdzob de la
NK048(tshi)004:3816: don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas brtagsa nasa gzung 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:3817: gnyis las 'dzin pa yod la gzung ba meda do
NK048(tshi)004:3818: zhes don la so sor phye ba 'di ni mi
NK048(tshi)004:3820: gzugs la sogs pa yul snang gzung bar snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3821: yod kyang don du grub pa med pas rdzun pa
NK048(tshi)004:3822: yin pa ltar 'dzina para snang ba'i shes pa rang
NK048(tshi)004:3823: rig rang gsal 'di yang dpyad na ma grub pas
NK048(tshi)004:3824: rdzun pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:3826: de dag shes rab tshul mdor sangs rgyas kyis //
NK048(tshi)004:3827: mtshungs par spang zhing mngon pa'i chos las gsungs //
NK048(tshi)004:3829: gong du ji skad bstan pa de phyir snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:3830: ris su ma chad pas rgya chad phyogs lhung dang
NK048(tshi)004:3831: bral ba'i mi snang ba las log pa'i snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3832: tsam gyi thun monga gi blta bya ni mi dang
NK048(tshi)004:3833: lha la sogs par chu dang bdud rtsi la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3834: pa mthun para snang ba dang mi snang ba'i gzhira
NK048(tshi)004:3835: bsnyon med du yoda para grub pa'i phyir khas blang
NK048(tshi)004:3836: dgos kyi de med para 'dod du mi rung ste
NK048(tshi)004:3837: / dper na ma brtags ma dpyad pa'i snang tsam
NK048(tshi)004:3838: gyi zlos gara mkhan tha snyad yod na lha la
NK048(tshi)004:3839: sogs pa'i zlos gar gyi rnam 'gyur mi 'dra ba
NK048(tshi)004:3840: sna tshogs pa mthonga bar rung ba dang med na
NK048(tshi)004:3841: mi rung ba la sogas pa bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:3842: de yang snang stong ris su ma chad pa'i yoda
NK048(tshi)004:3843: tsam 'di kho na las ma gtogsa pa'i yoda pa
NK048(tshi)004:3844: gzhan zhig gang nasa kyang grub pa mi srid pasa
NK048(tshi)004:3845: snang stong ris su ma chad pa'i snang tsam 'di
NK048(tshi)004:3846: nyid gal te meda par gyur na ni tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:3847: kyi snang ba 'di kun gtan nas mi snang bar
NK048(tshi)004:3848: thams cad stong chad nam mkha' lta bur ci yang
NK048(tshi)004:3849: med pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur dgos na de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:3850: ma yin par snang ba sna tshogs shin tu bkra
NK048(tshi)004:3851: bas so // 'on kyang phyi dang nanga gi 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:3852: ba'i rkyen sna tshogs kyis rang snang sgrib nas 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:3853: snang gi bag chags sad pa'i mthu las ni don
NK048(tshi)004:3854: dam zung 'jug gi gnas tshul dngosa su ji lta
NK048(tshi)004:3855: ba bzhina du mi mthonga bar rnam pa gzhan dang
NK048(tshi)004:3856: gzhan du phyin ci log tu mthong bar 'gyur ba
NK048(tshi)004:3857: bas so // / dper na sgyu ma'i sngagas btab
NK048(tshi)004:3858: pa'i stobs kyis shing bu sogs la de dang der
NK048(tshi)004:3859: mi mthong bar rta dang glang po che la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3860: par snang zhing mthong ba bzhina no //
NK048(tshi)004:3861: de phyir mthun par snang ba'i thun mong gi blta
NK048(tshi)004:3862: bya ni 'di kho na'o zhesa dpyad pa'i gzhi zhig
NK048(tshi)004:3863: ngesa para bzhag tu mi rung ngo //
NK048(tshi)004:3865: gzhal byed bslu med tshad ma'i lam gyi 'jug rim
NK048(tshi)004:3866: nges pa zab mo rigs pa'i lde'u mig spyir bstan
NK048(tshi)004:3867: pa / gzhal bya thun mong blta bya'i skabs don
NK048(tshi)004:3868: gsal bar ston pa rang lugs grub mtha'i mdzod khang
