NK048(tshi)004:3870: de nyid tshul bzhin ston pa snga 'gyur mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:3871: chos kyi che bar ched du brjod de don bsdu
NK048(tshi)004:3873: brjod bya'i don gyi ngo bo zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:3874: de la tshad ma tshad min mi 'thad pa'i rtsod pa spang ste tshad ma gsal bar sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3876: des na rang gi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3877: ji skad bstan pa des na 'thad ldan rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:3878: lugsa la ni rgya chad phyogs lhung dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:3879: snang stong risa su ma chada pa'i gzhi yi gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3880: lugs zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid kyi chos dbyings rang
NK048(tshi)004:3881: gi ngo bo stong dang mi stong la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3882: spros pa cir yanga ma grub pa de nyid ganga
NK048(tshi)004:3883: cir snang ba thams cad kun la mnyam par gnas
NK048(tshi)004:3884: pa rnam kun mchog ldan gyi stong pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)004:3885: pa'i phyir na dngosa po gciga nyid dngos po sna
NK048(tshi)004:3886: tshogas para yanga snang bar shin tu rung zhing 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3888: des na ganga la snang stong mi 'gal bar ris
NK048(tshi)004:3889: su ma chad pas zung 'jug mnyam pa nyid 'di
NK048(tshi)004:3890: lung rigs tshad ma dang bcas pas rung ba'am 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3891: par gyur pa'i grub mtha' yin na /
NK048(tshi)004:3892: de la snang dang mi snang tshad ma dang tshad
NK048(tshi)004:3893: min thun mong gi blta bya la sogs pa'i tha
NK048(tshi)004:3894: snyad thamsa cada ji lta bar khas len du rung
NK048(tshi)004:3895: bar ches shin tu 'thad par 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)004:3896: ganga la snang stong zung 'jug mi rung bar snang
NK048(tshi)004:3897: stong gnyis po 'gal bar rtog pa de la snang
NK048(tshi)004:3898: dang mi snang sogs tha snyad thams cad rung bar
NK048(tshi)004:3899: mi 'gyur te tha snyad yang dag pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:3902: rang lugs la mngon rjes kyi tshad ma grub cing don med min tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:3903: de las gzhan du 'dod na tshad ma'i rnam bzhag med tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:3904: tshad mas ji ltar sgrub tshul zab don thun mong min pa khyad par du bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3906: 'o na tshad ma sogs tshigs bcad drug dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3907: 'o na snang stong zung 'jug yin na gang snang
NK048(tshi)004:3908: kun la mnyam pa nyid yin pa'i phyir na tshad
NK048(tshi)004:3909: ma dang tshad mina gyis rnam para dbye ba'ang 'thad
NK048(tshi)004:3910: pa meda par 'gyur ro zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:3911: tshur mthong gi shes pa 'phral gyi 'khrul rgyus ma
NK048(tshi)004:3912: bslad pa'i ngor chu la sogs pa'i ganga snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:3913: de nyid rnag la sogs pa gazhana pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:3914: ma snang ba'am mi snang ba de yi phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:3915: tshur mthonga gi shes pa 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa
NK048(tshi)004:3916: des gzhal bya rang mtshan mi 'grub pa ma yina
NK048(tshi)004:3918: ganga gi phyir chu la sogs pa'i dngosa por gang
NK048(tshi)004:3919: snang ba kun kyang ranga bzhina gyis rang min gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:3920: thams cad las log pa'i sra gsher dro sogs ranga
NK048(tshi)004:3921: ranga gi ngo bo thun mong ma yin pa la
NK048(tshi)004:3922: gansa pa nyid yin pas de la ldog pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:3923: nas gcig dang tha dad la sogs pa'i rnam dbye
NK048(tshi)004:3924: byar rung ba'i gzhal bya rang mtshan dang de yang
NK048(tshi)004:3925: dag dag par 'jal ba'i tshad ma bslu med du
NK048(tshi)004:3926: grub pa nyid kyi phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:3927: de yi phyir na gzhal bya gzhal byed tshad mas
NK048(tshi)004:3928: grub pa de yang gong 'og la ltos te gzhal
NK048(tshi)004:3929: bya gzhal ba'i tshad ma nyid du grub kyi ltos
NK048(tshi)004:3930: pa med par ranga dabnga kho nas chosa rnams la
NK048(tshi)004:3931: ni gzhal bya dang 'jal byed tshad mas grub par
NK048(tshi)004:3933: rang dbang gis grub pa yin na gansa lugs dang
NK048(tshi)004:3934: dpyad bzod nyid du thal bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:3935: // des na mi la snang ba'i chu gciga po
NK048(tshi)004:3936: de yang ranga 'dzina 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa rnams
NK048(tshi)004:3937: kyis tshad mas bslu med du grub pa yin kyang
NK048(tshi)004:3938: gzhan la ltos meda du ranga dabnga kho nas grub
NK048(tshi)004:3940: 'di ltar dona dam dpyod pasa dpyad bzod med pas chu nyid tshad mas mi 'grub cing /
NK048(tshi)004:3941: yi dwagsa kyi shes ngora yanga chu de tshad mas grub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:3942: de'i phyir ltos te chu sogs rang 'dzina gyi yul
NK048(tshi)004:3943: gzhal bya rnams la 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pas mngona
NK048(tshi)004:3945: rtags yang dag gis rjes dapaga tshad mas drangs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3946: ngesa pa gzhal bya la mi 'khrul ba yod na
NK048(tshi)004:3947: de yi yul rnams la tshad mas ji ltar bcad
NK048(tshi)004:3948: pa de ltar blang dor 'jug ldog gang la yang
NK048(tshi)004:3949: mi baslu ba'am bslu ba med pa yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:3950: na gnas skabs ltos te tshad ma legs par grub
NK048(tshi)004:3951: cing dpe bcad pa ltar don la'ang bslu ba med
NK048(tshi)004:3952: pas de ltar bstan pa dona med du gyur pa
NK048(tshi)004:3953: ma yin no // de'i shugs kyis ldog phyogs tshad min 'khrul ba nyid du'ang bstan no //
NK048(tshi)004:3954: des na chu gciga la zhes pa de yang rang
NK048(tshi)004:3955: 'dzin mi yi mthonga ba 'khrul rgyus ma bslad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3956: tshad ma kho na la ltos nas tshad mas grub
NK048(tshi)004:3957: pa'i chu de blta gzhir bzhag ste mthong ba 'og
NK048(tshi)004:3958: ma la ltos na tshad ma dang /
NK048(tshi)004:3959: gong ma la ltos na tshad min du 'thad pa yin gyi /
NK048(tshi)004:3960: de las gzhan lha yi 'gro ba la ltos na
NK048(tshi)004:3961: ni rang 'dzin gyis chad mas grub pa'i bdud rtsi
NK048(tshi)004:3962: gciga nyid la blta gzhir 'dzina dgos kyi chu sogs
NK048(tshi)004:3963: gzhan la blta gzhir mi 'dzin pa sogs thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:3966: chu la rnag chu sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:3967: de ltar ltos te tshad mar 'jog na tshad ma'i rnam bzhag 'thad pa yin gyi /
NK048(tshi)004:3968: de las gzhan du 'dod na chu phor ba gang
NK048(tshi)004:3969: lta bu la yi dwags kyis rnag dang mis chu
NK048(tshi)004:3970: dang lhas bdud rtsi ru mthonga bar gyur pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:3971: na de gsum ka gzhi gcig po de la ltos
NK048(tshi)004:3972: med du tshang zhing rang dbang gis tshogas nas tshad
NK048(tshi)004:3973: mas grub pa ni srid pa mina la /
NK048(tshi)004:3974: de gsum po las gciga kyang tshad mas grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:3975: blta gzhi mina na de gsum ma yin par de
NK048(tshi)004:3976: lasa dngosa po gazhana zhiga tu mthonga ba 'di ni
NK048(tshi)004:3977: chu la sogs pa'o zhes rnam pa kun tu tshad
NK048(tshi)004:3978: mas sgrubsa par mi nus pa'i phyir na mthonga dona
NK048(tshi)004:3979: rnag la sogs pa gsum ka gtan meda du thal
NK048(tshi)004:3980: bar 'gyur pasa / misa mthonga ba'i chu 'di yang
NK048(tshi)004:3981: chu nyid mina pa de ltar gyur na de las
NK048(tshi)004:3982: dngos po gazhana zhiga chu ru mthong ba dang sgrub
NK048(tshi)004:3983: pa mi 'athada pa kho na yin pasa chu zhes
NK048(tshi)004:3984: bya ba gtan meda du thal bar 'gyur la /
NK048(tshi)004:3985: de lta'i lugsa la'ang tha snyad pa'i tshad ma yi
NK048(tshi)004:3986: rnam para bazhaga pa kun kyang gtan nas 'thad para
NK048(tshi)004:3987: mi 'gyur ba dang de'i ldog phyogs tshad min kyang
NK048(tshi)004:3988: mi rung zhing mthar blang dor 'jug ldog thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:3991: 'jal byed tshad ma'i ngo bo ji ltar gzhal ba'i gtan tshigs dang bcas pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3992: de nyid snga 'gyur rang lugs kho na yin gyi gzhan la med pa'i khyad chos su bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3994: gnas skabs gnas snang gnyis la gzhal ba'i tshad ma'i rigs pa gnyis su bstan pa /
NK048(tshi)004:3995: mthar thug zung 'jug gzigs pa'i tshad ma mchog nyid rang byung ye shes gcig tu sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:3997: ma dag tshur rol mthong ba'i kun tu tha snyad pa'i tshad ma /
NK048(tshi)004:3998: dag pa'i gzigs pa la brten pa'i gnas yongs su gyur pa'i tshad ma'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4000: de phyir 'phral gyi sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4001: de phyir phyi nang gi 'phral gyi 'khrul rgyu yis
NK048(tshi)004:4002: ma bslad pa'i dabnga po'i yul du snang ba'i dngos
NK048(tshi)004:4003: po de nyid tshad grub bam rang mtshan yina para
NK048(tshi)004:4004: re zhig tshur mthong de'i ngor bsgrub dgos te /
NK048(tshi)004:4005: dper na dbang shes la chu nyid chu ru snang
NK048(tshi)004:4006: ba dang smig rgyu la chur snang ba gnyis las
NK048(tshi)004:4007: chu la chur snang ba'i shes pa 'phral gyi 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:4008: rgyus ma bslad pas ma 'khrul ba'i shes pa tshad
NK048(tshi)004:4009: ma dang / smig rgyur chur snang ba'i shes pa
NK048(tshi)004:4010: 'khrul rgyus bslad pas 'khrul pa'i shes pa tshad min
NK048(tshi)004:4011: ma dang / dang / de gnyis kyi yul yang
NK048(tshi)004:4012: tha snyad du chu la rang mtshan yod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4013: smig rgyu la rang mtshan med pa'i khyad par bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:4015: des na gnas skabsa yi dwagsa nyid la sngon las
NK048(tshi)004:4016: kyi sgrib pa ngan pasa mi rnams kyis mthong ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4017: chu gatsanga ma nyid la rnag tu snang yanga sngon
NK048(tshi)004:4018: las ngan pa'i skyon nam sgrib pa de nyid bral
NK048(tshi)004:4019: ba'am sel bar gyur na da gdoda dam da gzod
NK048(tshi)004:4020: mi rnams bzhin du chu ru snang zhing mthong ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4021: phyir de la ltos nasa re zhig misa chur mthonga
NK048(tshi)004:4022: ba de nyid tshad ma dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4023: gazhana pa yi dwags la las kyi sgrib pa ngan
NK048(tshi)004:4024: pa'i skyeen gyis bsgyur basa rnag tu mthong ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4025: re zhiga tshad min du bzhag ste de ltar tshung
NK048(tshi)004:4026: mthong ba'i ngor chu nyid ni tshad mara sgrub pa
NK048(tshi)004:4027: yin no // de bzhin du bdud rtsi la sogs pa la'ang 'dra'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4029: mthar thug rigs pas sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4030: gnas yongs su gyur bas tha snyad kyi gnas tshul
NK048(tshi)004:4031: mathara thug pa ji bzhi mthong ba'i dag pa'i gzigs
NK048(tshi)004:4032: pa la brten pa'i tshad ma'i rigas pasa dpyad pa
NK048(tshi)004:4033: na ma dag tshur rol mthong ba'i snang ba chu
NK048(tshi)004:4034: dang rnag la sogs pa de dag kun kyang baga
NK048(tshi)004:4035: chagas 'khrul ba'i dbang gis snang ba ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4036: de las gazhana du bag chags 'khrul snang spangs pas
NK048(tshi)004:4037: gnas yongs su gyur pa'i 'phags mchog rnams la mi
NK048(tshi)004:4038: rnams kyi mthong ba'i chu 'di nyid daga pa yi
NK048(tshi)004:4039: sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams dang yum chen m+aa ma
NK048(tshi)004:4040: k+ai'i skur yanga snang zhing mthong ba'i phyir na mi
NK048(tshi)004:4041: yisa mthonga ba yi chu de kho na gzhan la
NK048(tshi)004:4042: ltos pa med par mtha' gcig tu tshad mara mi
NK048(tshi)004:4043: 'grub pas bsgrub tu rung ba ma yina la /
NK048(tshi)004:4044: desa na sngon las ngan pa'i bag chags 'khrul ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4045: sgrib skyen ma dag pa rnams je bas je daga
NK048(tshi)004:4046: tu gyur pa'i rim pa bzhin du mthong ba je
NK048(tshi)004:4047: bzang je bzang du 'gyur ba yin pasa mthonga ba
NK048(tshi)004:4048: 'oga ma 'oga ma la ltos nas mthong ba gonga
NK048(tshi)004:4049: ma gonga ma tshad ma ru khasa blang ba 'di
NK048(tshi)004:4050: nyid ni tha snyad dpyod pa'i rigs pas grub cing
NK048(tshi)004:4051: gnod pa med pas shin tu 'athada pa yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:4054: mthar thug de kho sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4055: gnas lugs mathara thug chos kyi dbyings de kho na
NK048(tshi)004:4056: nyid ni bden gnyis dbyer med dam zung 'jug gciga
NK048(tshi)004:4057: lasa gnyis su meda pa'i phyir de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4058: ji bzhin mthonga ba'i tshad ma'ang mthar thug pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4059: su med pas gciga nyid yina te tshad ma mthar
NK048(tshi)004:4060: thug gnyis pa zhig rnam pa kun tu mi srid
NK048(tshi)004:4061: do // de phyir gansa lugsa mthar thug bdena pa
NK048(tshi)004:4062: dam pa gciga pu zunga 'jug dag mnyam dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:4063: spros bral mnyam nyid chen po ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4064: de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs pa'i tshad
NK048(tshi)004:4065: ma mthar thug pa'ang rang byung gi ye shesa rnam
NK048(tshi)004:4066: pa thams cad mkhyen pa gcig pu nyid las gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:4067: du med la gnas lugs de nyid mthong ba la
NK048(tshi)004:4068: sgrib pa'i spang bya gang ji snyed pa yang ma
NK048(tshi)004:4069: riga pa ste rmong pa'i rang bzhin gciga pu lasa
NK048(tshi)004:4070: meda pa'am ma 'das pa'i phyir na sangs rgyas dang
NK048(tshi)004:4071: sems can ni riga pa dang ma riga pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4072: kyi khyad par tsam du snga 'gyur gyi rgyud dang
NK048(tshi)004:4073: man ngag rnams su bstan pa nyid shin tu zab
NK048(tshi)004:4074: mo'i don nges pa'i snying po mthar thug yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:4076: de phyir tshad ma'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4077: ji skad bstan pa de phyir dag pa'i gzigs pa
NK048(tshi)004:4078: la brten pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'i 'di yisa phyi
NK048(tshi)004:4079: nang gi snang ba 'di thams cad kun gdod nas
NK048(tshi)004:4080: ranga bzhina gyis rnam par dag pa'i zhing dang lhar
NK048(tshi)004:4081: bsgrub pa 'di ni snga 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4082: ranga lugas zab mo kho na ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4083: de nyid ji lta ba bzhin du gzigs shing legs
NK048(tshi)004:4084: par ston par mdzad pa'i kun mkhyen ronga zom ma
NK048(tshi)004:4085: h+aa pan+di ta'i zhal snga nas brtsal ba'i snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:4086: lhar sgrub rigs pa tshad ma'i sgo nas gsal bar
NK048(tshi)004:4087: bstan pa la sogs pa'i legas par bshad pa senga
NK048(tshi)004:4088: ge'i nga ro lta bu rnams kyis mtshon te /
NK048(tshi)004:4089: kun mkhyen klong chen pa la sogs pa'i snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:4090: ba rnams kyis kun rdzob tu dag pa chen por
NK048(tshi)004:4091: bsgrub pa dang mthar thug tu dbyer med chen por
NK048(tshi)004:4092: bsgrub pa'i lung rigs man ngag rnams ni 'gran zla
NK048(tshi)004:4093: kun dang bral bas gzhan dang thun mong ma yin
NK048(tshi)004:4094: pa kho na yin la de las gazhana na kun
NK048(tshi)004:4095: rdzob tu dag pa chen por sgrub pa dang mthar
NK048(tshi)004:4096: thug zung 'jug 'od gsal chen por sgrubs pa'i tshul
NK048(tshi)004:4097: lugsa bzang po 'di nyid tshul bzhina du smra ba
NK048(tshi)004:4098: gcig kyang meda pasa dag pa dang dbyer med chen
NK048(tshi)004:4099: por sgrub tshul 'di yi thad nas ganga ltar khas
NK048(tshi)004:4100: blang nas sgrub par byas kyang lung rigs man ngag
NK048(tshi)004:4101: zab mo dang 'gal bar gyur pa kho nar mthonga
NK048(tshi)004:4102: bas na rgyud don zab mo ji bzhin du rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:4105: thun mong gi blta bya snang stong phyogs rer gyur
NK048(tshi)004:4106: na dngos stobs rigs pa tshad mas ji ltar gnod
NK048(tshi)004:4107: tshul / zung 'jug gzhi 'bras dbyer med dag mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:4108: spros pa dang bral bar lung rigs man ngag tshad
NK048(tshi)004:4109: mas gsal bar grub pa'i tshul lo //
NK048(tshi)004:4111: de la thun mong sogs tshigs bcad bcu gcig dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4112: de la thun monga gi blta bya zhes pa de
NK048(tshi)004:4113: nyid snang ba dang stong pa so so ba re
NK048(tshi)004:4114: resa mi rung ste so so la rgyu mtshan rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:4115: par bstan pa 'di dag gis gnod pa'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:4116: // gal te thun mong gi blta bya zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:4117: ci yang med pas stong pa rkyang pa tsam yin
NK048(tshi)004:4118: na 'gro ba mi la sogs pa su yanga rung
NK048(tshi)004:4119: la yanga ci yang med pa'i nam mkha'a bems stong
NK048(tshi)004:4120: phyang chad pa yang don byed nus pa'i dngos po
NK048(tshi)004:4121: bum pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur zhing bum
NK048(tshi)004:4122: pa la sogs pa don byed nus pa'i dngos po
NK048(tshi)004:4123: rnams kyang dngos med nam mkha' ltar ci yang med
NK048(tshi)004:4124: par mi snang bar 'gyur dgos la /
NK048(tshi)004:4125: de'i phyir snang ba dang bral ba'i ci yang med
NK048(tshi)004:4126: pas stong pa tsam thun mong gi blta byar rung
NK048(tshi)004:4127: zhing chu la sogs par snang na /
NK048(tshi)004:4128: mo gsham gyi bu dang nam mkha'i me tog la
NK048(tshi)004:4129: sogs pa thun mong gi blta byar rung zhing chu
NK048(tshi)004:4130: la sogs pa thams cad du ci yi phyir mi
NK048(tshi)004:4132: de ltar na dngosa po rnams phyogs dus gcig na
NK048(tshi)004:4133: yod pa ltar phyogs dus thams cad na rtag tu
NK048(tshi)004:4134: yoda pa'am / yang na phyogs dus gcig na med
NK048(tshi)004:4135: pa ltar phyogs dus thams cad na med para thal
NK048(tshi)004:4136: bar 'gyur te dngos po rnams rgyu med du 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:4137: pa la ji skad brjod pa'i skyon kun 'di la'ang
NK048(tshi)004:4139: gzhan yang ci yang med pa'i stong pa'i gansa skabsa
NK048(tshi)004:4140: dngos med de nyid yina bzhina du chu la sogs
NK048(tshi)004:4141: pa snang ba'i dngos po yin pa'ang rnam pa kun
NK048(tshi)004:4142: tu meda de ci'i phyir na de gnyis phan tshun
NK048(tshi)004:4144: gal te ngo bos ma stong pa yi snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:4145: thun mong gi blta bya zhig yod par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:4146: ni ci yang med pas stong nyid tsam thun mong
NK048(tshi)004:4147: gi blta bya'am snang gzhir bzhag pa'i rang tshig dang
NK048(tshi)004:4148: 'gal ba yin pas mi 'thad pa kho na'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4149: 'o na khyod kyi gonga du rang lugs la ni
NK048(tshi)004:4150: stong pa nyid dang rten 'byung gi snang ba gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4151: mi 'gal bar zung 'jug gam dbyer med bstan pa
NK048(tshi)004:4153: 'dira ni gnyis chos kyi snang ba tshur rol mthong
NK048(tshi)004:4154: ba'i dona la dpyad pa'i kun tu tha snyad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4155: tshad ma'i rnam bazhaga 'jog pa'i skabsa yina pasa na
NK048(tshi)004:4156: / de'i ngora dngos po gcig nyid yod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4157: meda pa gnyis 'gal ba ste phan tshun spang bas
NK048(tshi)004:4158: gnyis ka yin pa mi srid do //
NK048(tshi)004:4159: gong du ji ltar bstan pa'i dngosa po gciga gi
NK048(tshi)004:4160: steng gi snang stong bden pa gnyis me dang tsha
NK048(tshi)004:4161: ba bzhin du mi 'gal bar bstan pa ni 'phags
NK048(tshi)004:4162: pa'i ye shesa gnyis snang med pa'i yul yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4163: phyir de gnyis kyi shan legs par phyed pa gces
NK048(tshi)004:4164: so // yang gal te rang gi ngo bos stong
NK048(tshi)004:4165: pa dang bral ba'i mi stong pa'i snang ba ris
NK048(tshi)004:4166: su chad pa tsam zhig kho na thun mong gi
NK048(tshi)004:4167: blta bya'i snang gzhir mi rung ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4168: ji ltar na mi stong pa thun mong gi snang
NK048(tshi)004:4169: gzhi de nyid chu rnag bdud rtsi la sogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4170: snang ba rnams las ganga ltar snang ba yina zhes
NK048(tshi)004:4171: brtags na 'di ltar snang ba yin no zhesa so
NK048(tshi)004:4172: sor risa su ma chada pa'i snang ba zhig sus
NK048(tshi)004:4173: kyang bsam para mi nus pa'i phyir bsam brjod las
NK048(tshi)004:4175: de'i phyir thun mong gi blta bya'am snang gzhir ni
NK048(tshi)004:4176: mi stong pa'i snang ba tsam zhig yod ces pa
NK048(tshi)004:4177: 'di nyid grub pa ma yina te /
NK048(tshi)004:4178: ci'i phyir na shes byed tshad mas te tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:4179: gang gis ma mthonga bzhina du de 'dra'i snang gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:4180: yoda cesa sgrub byed med pa'i dam baca'a tsam du
NK048(tshi)004:4181: zad pas rnam pa kun tu mi 'grub pa kho
NK048(tshi)004:4182: na'o // skyon gzhan yang chu rnag sogs ganga snang
NK048(tshi)004:4183: ba de nyid mi stong bar risa su chada par
NK048(tshi)004:4184: gyur na ni chu sogs gang ltar snang ba de
NK048(tshi)004:4185: lasa rnag sogs gazhana du rnam pa kun tu snang
NK048(tshi)004:4186: na'o // mi runga zhing / de nyid mi stong
NK048(tshi)004:4187: ba bden grub kyi snang ba yina pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:4188: yanga snang ba de nyid don dam dpyod pa'i rigas
NK048(tshi)004:4189: pasa dpyad bzod du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4190: na'o // mi runga zhing / / gzhan yang chu
NK048(tshi)004:4191: dang rnag dang bdud rtsi sogas kyi thun mong gi
NK048(tshi)004:4192: snang gzhi nyid ni chu la sogs pa de gsum
NK048(tshi)004:4193: so so ba gang yina kyang 'agla ba yin te
NK048(tshi)004:4194: 'di ltar gal te chu ru snang ba de yi
NK048(tshi)004:4195: snang gzhi rnag nyid du grub pa yina na de
NK048(tshi)004:4196: nyid chu ru snang bar ji ltar 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)004:4197: snang gzhi rnam yin pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:4198: me nyid chur snang bar mi 'gyur ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4199: gal te chu yi snang gzhi de nyid rnag nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4200: mina par chu rang nyid yin par grub na ni
NK048(tshi)004:4201: / rnag la sogas pa gazhana du ci la snang ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4202: snang gzhi chu yin pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:4203: chu nyid me la sogs par snang du mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4204: gal te yi dwagsa kyi mthong ba'i yul du gang
NK048(tshi)004:4205: snang ba de yanga chu 'di nyid yina no zhe
NK048(tshi)004:4206: na / de ltar na yi dwags la rnag snang
NK048(tshi)004:4207: de yanga meda para khasa blang ba nyid du thal
NK048(tshi)004:4208: bar 'gyur bas mi 'thad par gsal lo //
NK048(tshi)004:4210: ganga phyir rigs drug gi 'gro ba ranga rang so
NK048(tshi)004:4211: so la chu la sogs pa thun min gyi snang
NK048(tshi)004:4212: ba de dang de lasa snang gzhi logas su tha
NK048(tshi)004:4213: dad pa ci yang yod pa mina te gal te
NK048(tshi)004:4214: yod par gyur na gang snang ba de dang de'i
NK048(tshi)004:4215: snang gzhi tha dad du 'gyur ba'i phyir thun mong
NK048(tshi)004:4216: gi blta bya'i don med de /
NK048(tshi)004:4217: dper na ka ba dang bum pa gnyis phan tshun
NK048(tshi)004:4218: gciga gi snang gzhira gciga shos 'jog tu rung ba
NK048(tshi)004:4220: des na gang snang ba de las gzhan du snang
NK048(tshi)004:4221: gzhi logs su tha dad pa nyid med par rig
NK048(tshi)004:4222: par bya'o // gnyis pa la gsum /
NK048(tshi)004:4223: gzhi yi gnas tshul mthar thug pa gnas snang rnam
NK048(tshi)004:4224: kun mthun pa'i dag mnyam dbyer med chen por rigs
NK048(tshi)004:4225: pas sgrub pa / lam la goms pas gnas snang
NK048(tshi)004:4226: mi mthun pa'i bag chags rim gyis sbyangs te dus
NK048(tshi)004:4227: med gnyug ma'i klong du btsan sa 'dzin tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:4228: mthar 'bras bsam mi khyab pa'i chos nyid la bzod
NK048(tshi)004:4229: pa skyes te rgyal ba'i skyod yul thob kyang gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:4230: gyis rtogs par dka' ba'i tshul lo //
NK048(tshi)004:4232: don dam du zung 'jug ro mnyam chen por sgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)004:4233: kun rdzob tu snang srid rnam dag chen por sgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)004:4234: mthar thug tu dbyer med blo bral chen por sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4236: des na snang stong sogs tshigs bcad gcig dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4237: gong du ji skad bstan pa des na chos kun
NK048(tshi)004:4238: gdod nas snang stong ris su ma chad pa'i zung
NK048(tshi)004:4239: 'jug gam rang gi ngo bos bdena par grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:4240: med pa'i stong pa'i dbyings dang 'du 'bral med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4241: snang ba tsam zhiga de rgya chada dang phyogsa lhung
NK048(tshi)004:4242: bral ba ste rgya gang du'ang ma chad phyogs gang
NK048(tshi)004:4243: du'ang ma lhung ba yi snang stong zung 'jug spros
NK048(tshi)004:4244: bral ro mnyam chen po ru 'khor 'das kyi chosa
NK048(tshi)004:4245: kun ye gdoda ma nasa mnyam nyid chen por gnas
NK048(tshi)004:4246: pa'i phyir na de ltar mnyam pa nyid rang byung
NK048(tshi)004:4247: gi ye shes 'od gsal rdzogsa pa chen po ru
NK048(tshi)004:4248: gdod nas grub pa'i dona de nyid rtog ge'i rigs
NK048(tshi)004:4249: pas ma dkrugs par nges pa'i mdo rgyud zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:4250: lung rigs kyis gtan la phaba par byas nas gnas
NK048(tshi)004:4251: lugs bsal bzhag med par mnyam par 'jog pa ni
NK048(tshi)004:4252: mnyam nyid rdzogs pa chen po ste de nyid shes
NK048(tshi)004:4253: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang spros bral
NK048(tshi)004:4254: dbu ma chen po'ang yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4256: tshul de goms pa'i sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4257: gong du ji skad bshad pa'i tshul de la ji
NK048(tshi)004:4258: bzhin du gomsa par byed pa'i lam gyi gnas skabsa
NK048(tshi)004:4259: su yang dang por daga pa'i gzigas pa la brten
NK048(tshi)004:4260: pa'i rigs pa tshad ma'i lam nasa phyi dang nang
NK048(tshi)004:4261: gi dngos po ma daga pa'i snang ba 'di thams
NK048(tshi)004:4262: cad ye nas dag pa'i ye shes chen por ranga
NK048(tshi)004:4263: sar grol ba'i snang srid rnam par dag pa'i chosa
NK048(tshi)004:4264: kyi sku nyid yin no zhes yin pa la yin
NK048(tshi)004:4265: par nges pa'i yida chesa pa ni bslu ba med
NK048(tshi)004:4266: pa'i rdo rje'i rgyud kyi lung gi dgongs dona la
NK048(tshi)004:4267: yang dag par 'byor zhing grub pa yin pas rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:4268: don ji bzhin du rtogs pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:4269: des na gsang ba sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba gnyis su
NK048(tshi)004:4270: med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phung po lnga
NK048(tshi)004:4271: snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu ma lta bu
NK048(tshi)004:4272: yi snang ba phyogs dang risa su ma chada pa
NK048(tshi)004:4273: de nyid ye nas rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:4274: kyi zhing dang lhar snang ba yin no zhes gang
NK048(tshi)004:4275: gsung ba'i dgongsa pa'i dona zab mo la yida chesa
NK048(tshi)004:4276: phyir mi ldog pa nyid yang dag par skye bar
NK048(tshi)004:4277: 'gyur te / 'di ltar yi dwags kyi 'gro ba
NK048(tshi)004:4278: rnams la chu gtsang ma 'di yang rnag tu mthong
NK048(tshi)004:4279: ba'i rnag nyid yin par 'dzin mod /
NK048(tshi)004:4280: 'ga' zhig gis bdag cag la snang ba'i rnag 'di
NK048(tshi)004:4281: las ngan gyis sgrib pa'i snang ba yin gyi gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:4282: mi sogs las dag pa la chu nyid du snang
NK048(tshi)004:4283: ngo zhes sgrub pa rjes su thos te rnag 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:4284: lasa bzlog tshe / rnag snang ma log kyang 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:4285: ba'i snang ba yin par rtogsa shinga de nas las
NK048(tshi)004:4286: sgrib sbyong ba la 'bad cing gomas par byas pasa
NK048(tshi)004:4287: rnag snang gi sgrib pa dag pa'i tshur mthong de
NK048(tshi)004:4288: la chu ru snang ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:4289: de bzhin du gnas snang mi mthun pa'i dbang gis
NK048(tshi)004:4290: snang tshul ma dag par gang mthong ba de dag
NK048(tshi)004:4291: 'khrul bar rtogs shing gnas tshul ye nas dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:4292: chen po lha'i dkyil 'khor du shes shing gnas snang
NK048(tshi)004:4293: mi mthun par snang ba'i las kyi bag chags sbyang
NK048(tshi)004:4294: ba'i lam la 'bad cing goms par byas pas chu
NK048(tshi)004:4296: las sgrib rab tu dag pa'i rgyal sras byang chub
NK048(tshi)004:4297: sems dpa' chen po yis ni chu de yi rdul
NK048(tshi)004:4298: phra rab rer yang grangsa meda pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4299: dag pa'i zhing khams su mthonga zhing chu de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4300: kyang yum chen m+aa ma k+air mngona sum du mthong
NK048(tshi)004:4301: zhing snang nas rol ba'i bya ba byed cing bde
NK048(tshi)004:4302: stong gi ye shes chen po'i grogs nyid du 'agyur
NK048(tshi)004:4303: ba yin la / mathara thug sgrib pa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)004:4304: bag chags phra ba dang bcas ma lus pa shin
NK048(tshi)004:4305: tu dag pa'am rnam par spangsa pa'i 'bras bu sangs
NK048(tshi)004:4306: rgyas kyi sara dag mnyam zung 'jug ro mnyam chena
NK048(tshi)004:4307: por gzigas pa yin pas de nyid ni bri gang
NK048(tshi)004:4308: dang bral ba'i gnas snang rnam kun mthun pa'i gzigs
NK048(tshi)004:4310: de yi phyir na shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4311: sangs rgyas kyi gzigas pa ni sgrib gnyis bag chags
NK048(tshi)004:4312: dang bcas pa ma lus pa zad par spangsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4313: ye shes kyis gzigs pa yin pa'i phyir dngosa po'i
NK048(tshi)004:4314: gansa tshul yang dag pa mthar thug ji bzhin ma
NK048(tshi)004:4315: nora ba nyid ni sangs rgyas de yisa mthonga ba
NK048(tshi)004:4316: kho na nyid lasa gazhana du cung zad tsam yang
NK048(tshi)004:4317: yoda pa ma yina par tshad ma mthar thug gis
NK048(tshi)004:4319: de nyid kho na mathara thug gi tshad ma ru
NK048(tshi)004:4320: nges par bzung ste phyi nang gi snang ba ma
NK048(tshi)004:4321: dag pa 'di thams cad kun ye gdod ma nasa
NK048(tshi)004:4322: kyang shin tu dag pa'i gnas lugs ye shes chosa
NK048(tshi)004:4323: kyi skur bri gang dang bral bar gansa so zhes
NK048(tshi)004:4324: dam baca'a ba gang zhig yang dag par grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4325: rtse mo mthar phyin par ru zab mo'i lung dang
NK048(tshi)004:4326: rigas pa'i blo gros kyi miga mchog dang ldan pa
NK048(tshi)004:4327: rnams la shin tu grub cing gsal ba yin gyi
NK048(tshi)004:4328: rtog ge gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4329: de lta na yanga thun mong min pa'i zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:4330: rgyud kyi thega pa gsang mchog sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba
NK048(tshi)004:4332: theg pa kun gyi rtse mo ngo mtshar rmad du
NK048(tshi)004:4333: byung ba'i che ba brgyad la sogs pa 'oda zer
NK048(tshi)004:4334: 'bum phrag stong du mnga' basa gzi ldan nyi ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:4335: dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bu 'di la damna
NK048(tshi)004:4336: pa'i yid cana lung rigs zab mo'i blo gros kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4337: mig dang bral ba'i 'byung po'i bya lta bu phal
NK048(tshi)004:4338: cher rgyud kyi zab don mthong ba la long ba
NK048(tshi)004:4339: lta bur gyur pa yin pas rgyud kyi dgongs don
NK048(tshi)004:4340: zab mo ji bzhin du ma lhongs nas gzhan dang
NK048(tshi)004:4341: gzhan du 'chad pa de byung ba yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4343: de la mthar thug sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4344: de la shin tu mthar thug pa gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)004:4345: pa'i mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyingsa de nyid gzhan gang
NK048(tshi)004:4346: du'ang mi snang bar dag pa lha yi snang cha
NK048(tshi)004:4347: kho nara snang ngo zhes phyogs gciga gam mtha' gcig
NK048(tshi)004:4348: tu bsgrub para mi nus mod kyang don la ma
NK048(tshi)004:4349: dag pa'i snang ba gang ji snyed pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:4350: ye nas grol ba'i ranga bzhin gdoda ma nyid nasa
NK048(tshi)004:4351: shin tu rnam par dag pa yi dbyingsa ka dag
NK048(tshi)004:4352: mtha' bral chen po dang rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4353: snang cha ye shes chos kyi sku gnyis ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:4354: zung 'jug 'du 'bral meda pa dbye gzhi zad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4355: dbyer med chen por gnas pa'i phyir na de yi
NK048(tshi)004:4356: snang ba'i rgyu rnams gser dang gser gyi kha dog
NK048(tshi)004:4357: bzhin du gdoda nasa ye shes kyi lha ru dag
NK048(tshi)004:4358: pa la gansa lugas dpyad pa'i rigs pasa kyang mi
NK048(tshi)004:4359: gnoda de / ganga gi phyir na sgrib gnyis bag
NK048(tshi)004:4360: chags dang bcas pa ma lus pa shin tu spangsa
NK048(tshi)004:4361: pa'am shin tu dag pa yi snang stong zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4362: dbyingsa dang ye shes dbyer med pa blo yi spyod
NK048(tshi)004:4363: yul dang bral ba de ni mthar thug gi de
NK048(tshi)004:4364: kho na nyid mngona du gyur pa yina pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4366: de las gzhan du sogs tshigs bcad bdun dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4367: gzigs pa shin tu dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzigs
NK048(tshi)004:4368: pa de kho na lasa gazhana du sems can dang
NK048(tshi)004:4369: lam pa dag gis gang ltar du brtagsa kyang de
NK048(tshi)004:4370: ni dbyings ye gnyis su med pa'i mthar thug gi
NK048(tshi)004:4371: dona yang dag pa nyid mina te sgrib gnyis bag
NK048(tshi)004:4372: chags dang bcas pa zad para ma spangsa pasa gansa
NK048(tshi)004:4373: tshul dang snang tshul rnam pa kun tu mi mthun
NK048(tshi)004:4375: des na gnas skabsa su rnal 'byor pa'i lam gyi snang ba la'ang /
NK048(tshi)004:4376: dper na miga gi skyon ci tsam dag pa'i rim
NK048(tshi)004:4377: pas raba riba kyi snang ba de tsam nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:4378: dag par 'gyur ba bzhina du yul cana sgrib pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4379: dri mas ci tsam ci tsam dag pa stobs su
NK048(tshi)004:4380: gyur pa lasa de tsam de tsam nyid du yul
NK048(tshi)004:4381: kyang de bzhina du dag pa nyid du mthonga bar
NK048(tshi)004:4382: 'gyur ba yin te yul cana dri mas dag kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4383: da dung de las logas shig na yul de la
NK048(tshi)004:4384: ma daga par lus pa zhig rnam pa kun tu
NK048(tshi)004:4385: meda pa'i phyir na dag pa kho na yin no
NK048(tshi)004:4386: // des na yul dang yul can gyi dag pa gnyis su med cing tha dad med pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4387: de lta na yanga gang zaga gciga gis ma dag
NK048(tshi)004:4388: 'khrul ba'i snang ba ma lus pa dag nas 'atshanga
NK048(tshi)004:4389: rgya ba'am sangs rgyas par gyur pa de yi tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4390: na gzhan su la yang ma dag pa'i dngosa po
NK048(tshi)004:4391: gcig kyang mi snang bar 'gyur dgos sam snyam na
NK048(tshi)004:4392: / rang ngor yul can dag pas yul kun kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4393: dag pa kho nar mthong yang de las gzhan pa
NK048(tshi)004:4394: dag la ma dag pa'i dngos po mi snang bar
NK048(tshi)004:4395: rnam pa kun tu mi 'gyur te sems can ranga
NK048(tshi)004:4396: rang gi snang ba ma dag pa'i sgrib pasa ranga
NK048(tshi)004:4397: rang la sgribsa pa'i phyir na ma dag par snang
NK048(tshi)004:4399: desa na gnas tshul yang dag pa la yul dang
NK048(tshi)004:4400: yul can rnams kyi ranga bzhina ye gdoda ma nasa
NK048(tshi)004:4401: sgrib pas gos ma myong bas shin tu rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:4402: dag na yanga rang snang 'khrul ba'i glo bura gyi
NK048(tshi)004:4403: dri mas rang rang la sgrib pa'i phyir na mkhris
NK048(tshi)004:4404: nad can gyis dung ser bzhin du dag par mi
NK048(tshi)004:4405: mthong bas dri ma de sbyang ba'i thabs la 'abda
NK048(tshi)004:4407: sbyang bya'i dri ma glo bur ba de rnams kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4408: ni ye nas ranga rang gi ngo bosa rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:4409: dag pa lasa logas shig na sbyang bya'i dri ma
NK048(tshi)004:4410: ma daga pa zhig grub pa mina pasa gdod nas
NK048(tshi)004:4411: ranga bzhina gyis rnam par dag pa'i 'oda gasla mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:4412: pa nyid du gnas pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4413: de ltar snang tshul gnas don lus la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:4414: yul dang yul can mi 'dra ba sna tshogas pa
NK048(tshi)004:4415: nyid rang bzhin mnyam pa chen por ma rtogsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4416: dus na gnas don lus sogs sna tshogs pa so
NK048(tshi)004:4417: sora snang zhing 'dzina pa yin pas byis pa so
NK048(tshi)004:4418: so'i skye bo rnams yul snang ganga la semsa chagas
NK048(tshi)004:4419: shing zhen pa de ni byis pa rnams rang snang
NK048(tshi)004:4420: la gzhan du 'khrul ba'i rmongsa pa ma rig pa
NK048(tshi)004:4421: ste rmongsa ba de yisa dar gyi srin bu ltar
NK048(tshi)004:4422: rang gis rang nyid 'ching bar byed do //
NK048(tshi)004:4423: gal te snang tshul sna tshogs pa de dag gi
NK048(tshi)004:4424: rang bzhin rang snang mnyam pa chen por rtogsa shing
NK048(tshi)004:4425: goms par gyur na 'khor 'das kyi chos kun kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4426: zung 'jug ro mnyam gyi ngang du mthar thug gi
NK048(tshi)004:4427: 'bras bu'i batsana sa zina te dus gsum gyi 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:4428: pa dang bral bas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid dus
NK048(tshi)004:4429: gsum dus meda 'od gsal gnyug ma'i klong chen por
NK048(tshi)004:4430: rgyu las ma bskyed rkyen las ma byung bas ranga
NK048(tshi)004:4431: byung gi ye shesa thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal bar
NK048(tshi)004:4432: te ye shes chos kyi sku nyid brnyes par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:4434: dag mnyam chen por sogs tshigs bcad bdun gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4435: de ltar chos kun dag mnyam chen pora ye nas
NK048(tshi)004:4436: gnas par khasa lena pa'i zab mo'i tshul 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4437: mthar thug gzigs pas legsa para rtogs shing tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:4438: mchog gis grub par gyur pa ste 'di ltar dag
NK048(tshi)004:4439: pa'i snang ba dang chos nyid ston pa nyid du'ang
NK048(tshi)004:4440: cira yanga ma grub pasa rang rang gi ngo bos
NK048(tshi)004:4441: stong pa yin pa'i gnad kyis 'khor ba dang myang
NK048(tshi)004:4442: 'das dag dang ma dag sogs cira yanga khas len
NK048(tshi)004:4443: du rung zhing shin tu 'thad de chos nyid cir
NK048(tshi)004:4444: yang ma grub pa las cir yang 'char ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:4445: la de ltar 'khor ba dang myang 'das gnas tshul
NK048(tshi)004:4446: dang snang tshul la sogs pa rten 'byung 'gags pa
NK048(tshi)004:4447: med pas rol pa cir yanga snang du rung zhing
NK048(tshi)004:4448: mi bslu ba dang phan tshun mi 'chol bar grub
NK048(tshi)004:4449: kyi / de lasa gazhana du rang gi ngo bos
NK048(tshi)004:4450: mi stong pa'i rtag pa dang snang ba med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4451: stong pa phyang chad kyi mtha' bral sogs gang dang
NK048(tshi)004:4452: gang brtagsa pa de la stong pa dang rten 'byung
NK048(tshi)004:4453: dag dang ma dag sogs cir yanga mi rung bar
NK048(tshi)004:4455: med rten cing 'brel 'byung 'di dag cira yang mi
NK048(tshi)004:4456: snang bas gtan med du 'gyur bar nges la /
NK048(tshi)004:4457: de ltar na stong dang rten 'byung gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)004:4458: par legs par gsungs pa'i bka' dang dgongs 'grel kun
NK048(tshi)004:4460: de'i phyir zung 'jug dag mnyam chen por bsgrub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4461: tshul zab mo 'di'i yid chesa phyir mi ldog pa
NK048(tshi)004:4462: snying la rnyed pa'i sgo gcig pu par gyur pa
NK048(tshi)004:4463: ni stong dang rten 'byung 'gal ba med par rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:4464: pa'i lam mchog 'di nyid kho na yina te des
NK048(tshi)004:4465: na snang stong dbyer med dam zung 'jug 'di la
NK048(tshi)004:4466: ngesa pa'i shes pa the tshom gyi smag thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:4467: dang bral ba skyes shing goms par gyur na /
NK048(tshi)004:4468: chos kun gdod nas mnyam pa chen por bri gang
NK048(tshi)004:4469: dang bral ba'i rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du rang
NK048(tshi)004:4470: grol ba yin pas de ltar srid pa 'khor ba
NK048(tshi)004:4471: stong pa dang mi stong dag pa dang ma dag
NK048(tshi)004:4472: la sogsa pa'i tha snyad kyi gnyis chos kun gyi
NK048(tshi)004:4473: mtha' dang bral ba'i chos nyid dag mnyam zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4474: chen po phal ba'i blos bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4475: don dam nyid la zab mo'i bzoda pa mchog tu
NK048(tshi)004:4476: gyur pa khong nasa skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)004:4477: de'i tshe rdul phra rab gciga gi khyon la'ang rdul
NK048(tshi)004:4478: rnyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing khams rten dang brten
NK048(tshi)004:4479: par bcas pa thams cad mthong zhing dus mtha'i skad
NK048(tshi)004:4480: ciga gcig gi yun la yanga grangs med kyi bskal
NK048(tshi)004:4481: para snang zhing mthong ba la sogs pa ste snang
NK048(tshi)004:4482: ba'i dngosa po rnams ni gdod nas bdena pas stong
NK048(tshi)004:4483: pa yin pas snang la rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu
NK048(tshi)004:4484: ma'i ngesa shes kyis rdzogs pa'i sangas rgyas kyi spyod
NK048(tshi)004:4485: yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i zab mo nyid la
NK048(tshi)004:4487: de lta bu'i phyir na chos kun ye nas snang
NK048(tshi)004:4488: stong dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med dam zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4489: tu gnas pa'i don de mtshon pa'i brdar nges pa
NK048(tshi)004:4490: don gyi mdo rgyud thun mong min pa rnams las
NK048(tshi)004:4491: ranga snang ris su ma chad pas risa meda kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4493: rgya chada phyogsa lhung kun dang bral ba zhes dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4494: gzhi dbyingsa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4495: chosa nyid spros pa cir yanga ma grub pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4496: snang stong dbyer med zung du 'jug pa zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:4497: la sogas pa rang lugs grub mtha'i chosa skad zab
NK048(tshi)004:4498: mo'i brjod tshul tsam 'di'i dona yang lo brgyar bsgrimsa
NK048(tshi)004:4499: te yang yang bsam par byas kyang rang rgyud zab
NK048(tshi)004:4500: mo'i don la sngona nas gomsa pa ches cher byas
NK048(tshi)004:4501: pa'i las 'phro bzang po dus su smin pa'i dngos
NK048(tshi)004:4502: rgyu sad pa meda na da lta shes rab kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4503: blo gros chena po dang brtson pas sbyangsa pa la'ang
NK048(tshi)004:4504: mi damna pa rab tu bzang po yod moda kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4505: ji bzhin du thugsa su chud pa ma yina pas
NK048(tshi)004:4506: yang dag par dgongs par mi 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)004:4507: 'di ni gsan rgya che yang gzhan gyi thugs su chud mi 'gyur /
NK048(tshi)004:4510: de phyir grub mtha' sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4511: de phyir mdo rgyud kyi grub mtha'a zab mo gang
NK048(tshi)004:4512: ji snyed pa mtha' dag gi dgongs pa'i gting phug
NK048(tshi)004:4513: ganga du 'bab cing gzhola ba yi brgya phrag dam
NK048(tshi)004:4514: pa'i chos kyi legas bashada mang po'i chu klung dal
NK048(tshi)004:4515: gyis 'abba pa'i rgyun thams cad 'khyil zhing rdzogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4516: pha mtha' dang bral ba'i rgya mtsho chena po'i chu
NK048(tshi)004:4517: gter lta bu'i snga 'gyur bstan pa'i phyi mo lta
NK048(tshi)004:4518: spyod rnam par dag pa 'di ni ngo mtshar bas
NK048(tshi)004:4519: kyang ches ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba kho na
NK048(tshi)004:4520: yin no // de ltar gnas lugs mthar thug gnas
NK048(tshi)004:4521: snang rnam kun mthun pa de las snang tshul gazhana
NK048(tshi)004:4522: pa dag dang ma dag la sogs pa phyogs rer
NK048(tshi)004:4523: song ba kun dang de dag sgrub pa'i tshul dang
NK048(tshi)004:4524: bcas pa rnams ni tshad ma'i lam nas yid ches
NK048(tshi)004:4525: skyed du med pas ma ngesa shing rigs pas gnod
NK048(tshi)004:4526: pa mthong na mi brtan pas 'gyur ba daga dang
NK048(tshi)004:4527: bacasa te sa zin med pa'i snang tshul tsam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:4529: sgrib pa mtha' dag spang ba'i gnas lugs ji lta
NK048(tshi)004:4530: ba bzhin du mthar phyin cing mngon du gyur pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4531: dag mnyam bden pa dbyer med zung 'jug rang byung
NK048(tshi)004:4532: gi ye shesa ni 'gyur med 'dus ma byas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4533: rang bzhin baslu meda tshad mas grub pa'i dona dam
NK048(tshi)004:4534: gnyug ma'i chos nyid tshul bzhin du gazigas pa'i yul
NK048(tshi)004:4535: dang yul can gyi spros pa kun dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4536: gnas snang rnam kun mthun pas 'bras bu'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:4537: yin zhing de ltar sgrub pa kun kyang mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:4538: dpyod pa'i rigs pas 'grub pas 'gyur ba med par
NK048(tshi)004:4539: yang dag pa'i khas len yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4540: e ma 'di las gzhan du gang brtags pa'i dam baca'i 'bras bu mngon du 'byin min la /
NK048(tshi)004:4541: rgya chad phyogs bral zung 'jug gang rung bar /
NK048(tshi)004:4542: thams cad rung bar gcig shes kun grol lags /
NK048(tshi)004:4544: dri lan bdun pa spros bral dbu ma chen por
NK048(tshi)004:4545: khas len yod med gang 'thad kyi lan la bzhi
NK048(tshi)004:4546: / khas len med par 'dod pa rang gzhung rnams dang dngos su 'gal tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:4547: khas len yod med so sor phye ba kun mkhyen chen po'i bzhed pa 'god pa /
NK048(tshi)004:4548: der brten khas len yod par ches cher sgrub pa
NK048(tshi)004:4549: dngos stobs rigs pa'i sgo nas gsal bar 'gog tshul
NK048(tshi)004:4550: / kun mkhyen chos rje'i rjes su 'brang ste dbu ma'i rang lugs rgyas par bshad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4552: spros bral dbu ma sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4553: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa'i spros bral dbu
NK048(tshi)004:4554: ma chena po thal 'gyur ba la rang lugs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4555: khas lena yoda dam meda ces dpyad pa'i tshe /
NK048(tshi)004:4556: bod snga rabs kyi mkhas pa phal che ba rnams
NK048(tshi)004:4557: mgrin gciga tu dbu ma thal 'gyur ba'i ranga lugsa
NK048(tshi)004:4559: yoda meda la sogas pa'i spros pa gang cir yanga
NK048(tshi)004:4560: ni meda pa'i phyir rnam pa kun tu cir yang
NK048(tshi)004:4561: khasa lena meda para 'doda pa mi 'thad de /
NK048(tshi)004:4562: 'di ltar dpal ldan zla ba'i ranga gzhung dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:4563: 'jug pa rtsa 'grel la sogs pa rnams lasa gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:4564: phung khams skye mched kyi rten 'brel dang lam so
NK048(tshi)004:4565: so'i skye bo'i chos gsum 'phags pa'i sa bcu dang
NK048(tshi)004:4566: 'bras bu sku gsum dang stobs bcu la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:4567: yon tan dang bcas pa snang tsam bslu med kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4568: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i grub mtha'i rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:4569: bzhag pa kun la khasa blang ba'i ranga lugsa gsal
NK048(tshi)004:4570: por yoda bzhina du khas len rnam kun med ces
NK048(tshi)004:4571: mngon sum du bsnyon nas gzhi dang lam dang 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:4572: bu la sogs pa'i tha snyad kyi rnam bzhag thamsa
NK048(tshi)004:4573: cada gazhana ngo kho na la 'jog cing skyel ba
NK048(tshi)004:4574: de ni dpal ldan zla ba'i rang gzhung gi rjod
NK048(tshi)004:4575: byed kyi tshig brjod bya'i dona gnyis gar 'gal ba
NK048(tshi)004:4576: 'du ba'i phyir de ltar 'dod du rung ba ma
NK048(tshi)004:4578: klong chen rab 'byams sogs tshigs bcad bzhis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4579: rgyal ba gnyis pa kun mkhyen chos kyi rgyal po
NK048(tshi)004:4580: klong chen raba 'byamsa bzang po'i zhal snga nas 'di
NK048(tshi)004:4581: skad du dpal ldan zla ba'i rang lugs kyi dbu
NK048(tshi)004:4582: mara te dbu ma thal 'gyur ba la tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:4583: kyi rnam bzhag khasa lena yoda dam meda pa gang
NK048(tshi)004:4585: gangs can snga rabsa kyi mkhas pa phal cher rnams
NK048(tshi)004:4586: yod med phyogs rera 'dzina te 'di ltar ba tshab
NK048(tshi)004:4587: bu bzhi'i ya gyal tshig don gnyis gar mkhas pa
NK048(tshi)004:4588: rma bya phyang brtson gyis khas len yod par 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:4589: pa dang / mkhas mchog gtsang ba ni khas len
NK048(tshi)004:4590: med par 'dod pa la'ang dpyad na lugsa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)004:4591: de re rera yang skyon dang yona tan gyi cha
NK048(tshi)004:4592: gnyis re gansa shing yod pas legs par ma phyed
NK048(tshi)004:4593: pa dang / pa'o // desa na skyon thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:4594: dang bral ba'i ranga gi bzhed pa la ni 'phags
NK048(tshi)004:4595: pa'i mnyam bzhag ye shes dang rjes su mthun par
NK048(tshi)004:4596: dona dama pa'i gansa lugsa ji bzhin du gzhal ba
NK048(tshi)004:4597: mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe gshisa lugs chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4598: dbyings la yin min yod med la sogs pa'i spros
NK048(tshi)004:4599: pa cira yanga ma grub pa de ltar khasa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:4600: yod med la sogs la ci zhiga lana para byed
NK048(tshi)004:4601: de khas len ci yang med pa nyid do //
NK048(tshi)004:4602: de phyir rang gi grub mtha'a zhes pa gnas lugas
NK048(tshi)004:4603: mthar thug gi don nyid rang gis rigs pas ji
NK048(tshi)004:4604: ltar gzhal nas gnod med du grub pa de nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4605: rang lugs kyi khasa lena yina par 'jog dgos pa
NK048(tshi)004:4606: yin pa'i phyir mnyam bzhag ye shes yul du byed
NK048(tshi)004:4607: pa dang gzhan dang rtsod pa la sogas pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4608: gshisa sam gnas lugs yod med la sogs pa'i spros
NK048(tshi)004:4609: mtshan shin tu phra ba'ang med pa'i chos kyi dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:4610: ji lta ba bzhin du yod dang med /
NK048(tshi)004:4611: stong dang mi stong sogs kyi khasa lena ci yanga meda pa nyid do //
NK048(tshi)004:4612: lam rjes thoba tha snyad pa yul du byed pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4613: tshe gzhi lam 'bras bur bcas pa'i grub pa'i mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:4614: ji lta ji snyed kyi rnam par bazhaga pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:4615: dag pa'i lung las ji skad bstan pa rnams ma
NK048(tshi)004:4616: 'khrugs shing ma 'dres par so sora khasa lena dgos
NK048(tshi)004:4618: phyin chada khas len mi len gyi tshul 'di ltar
NK048(tshi)004:4619: dam bca' zhing smra shes pa byung na kho bosa
NK048(tshi)004:4620: legas par bashada pa 'grel chen pad+ma dkar po'i mathu
NK048(tshi)004:4621: yina par blta'o zhes gsungsa so //
NK048(tshi)004:4623: der brten gangs can sogs tshigs bcad bcu gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4624: de ltar rjes thob shan 'byed kyi 'jog tshul de
NK048(tshi)004:4625: dang gzhan yang khas len yod par gsungs pa'i phyogs
NK048(tshi)004:4626: de dang der brten pa'i gangsa can gyi mkhas pa
NK048(tshi)004:4627: 'ga' dang 'agsa / dbu ma thal 'gyur ba'i ranga
NK048(tshi)004:4628: lugsa la dpyad na bden grub med pas bden grub
NK048(tshi)004:4629: kyi khas len med kyang ma dpyad ma brtags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4630: 'jig rten grags pa'i tha snyad kyi khasa lena yoda
NK048(tshi)004:4631: pa'i phyogsa kho na lung dang rigs pas yanga dang
NK048(tshi)004:4632: yanga du rtsal du bton nas chesa cher bsgrub par
NK048(tshi)004:4633: mdzad pa'ang legs par ma phyed pa ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4634: ji ltar na de yanga mnyam rjes kyi dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:4635: phra ba dang rags pa la sogs pa'i skabsa shana
NK048(tshi)004:4636: so sor legs par ma phyes para rnam kun khas
NK048(tshi)004:4637: len yod par sgrub na gshisa dona gnas lugs chos
NK048(tshi)004:4638: kyi dbyings la yod med la sogs pa'i spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:4639: cira yanga ma grub pa'i phyir na dbu ma thal
NK048(tshi)004:4640: 'gyur ba'i rang lugs la ma brtags 'jig rten grags
NK048(tshi)004:4641: pa'i tha snyad thams cad mtha' gciga tu khasa lena
NK048(tshi)004:4642: yoda pa'ang 'grub pa shin tu daka'a ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4643: 'di ltar dbu ma thal 'gyur ba ranga gi lugas
NK048(tshi)004:4644: zhesa pa dbu ma'i grub pa'i mtha' gnas lugs mathara
NK048(tshi)004:4645: thug gi dona rigs pas ji ltar gzhal ba gnod
NK048(tshi)004:4646: pa med pa nyid yina dgosa te /
NK048(tshi)004:4647: de lasa gazhana pa tha snyad kyi khas len rnams
NK048(tshi)004:4648: ni rigs pas gnod pa yod pas ranga lugsa mina
NK048(tshi)004:4649: te / ci yi slad du zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:4650: dbu ma thal 'gyur ba ranga gisa ni don dam
NK048(tshi)004:4651: dpyod byed kyi rigs pas gzhal na tha snyad kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4652: khas len de dag de ltar ma grub pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4653: ro // desa na thal 'gyur ba desa rang lugs
NK048(tshi)004:4654: kyi khasa blang yina na de nyid don dam du
NK048(tshi)004:4655: grub pas ranga dabnga can don dam dpyod rigs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:4656: dpyad nasa kyang gnod med du mthong ba'i khasa blang
NK048(tshi)004:4657: yin para rigas pa yang dag pasa 'phul nus pa
NK048(tshi)004:4658: de nyid kyi phyir na des khasa blangsa pa yi
NK048(tshi)004:4659: ma brtags grags pa'i tha snyad de yang rang lugs
NK048(tshi)004:4660: kyi khas len yin pas dona dam para bden par
NK048(tshi)004:4661: grub cinga don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod
NK048(tshi)004:4663: des na rang rgyud pa la brjod pa tha snyad bden pa rigs pas dpyad bzod du thal ba /
NK048(tshi)004:4664: don dam pa'i skye ba mi khegs par thal ba /
NK048(tshi)004:4665: 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag dngos po'i 'jig rgyur thal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4666: skyon gsum po rang la yang mtshungs par 'bab so
NK048(tshi)004:4667: // gal te ma brtags grags pa'i khas len de
NK048(tshi)004:4668: thal 'gyur ba ranga lugsa kyi khasa lena ma yina
NK048(tshi)004:4669: // no zhe na / rang lugs la 'jig rten
NK048(tshi)004:4670: rgan po'i ji ltar bzhag pa ltar khasa lena yoda
NK048(tshi)004:4671: pa yin zhes pa'i rang tshig dang dngos 'gal du
NK048(tshi)004:4673: gzhan yang gal te ranga la don dam dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4674: rigs pas dpyad nas bden grub med pa dang ma
NK048(tshi)004:4675: dpyad 'jig rten grags pa'i tha snyad thams cad gnod
NK048(tshi)004:4676: med du yod pa'i khasa lena gnyis ni yoda par
NK048(tshi)004:4677: gyur cing de gnyis ka ngesa para bdena pa'am yang
NK048(tshi)004:4678: dag par gyur na dbu ma'i ranga lugsa zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:4679: de gnyis po las re re yina nama 'on te
NK048(tshi)004:4680: gnyis ka yina / gal te gang rung re re
NK048(tshi)004:4681: nas rang lugs yina no zhe na gciga shosa rang
NK048(tshi)004:4682: lugs su mi 'thad de dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4683: gnyis ka yina / ro // gal te yoda ces pa rang lugs kyi khasa blang ma yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:4684: meda para khasa ni blang bar gyur pa de nyid rang lugs yin no zhe na /
NK048(tshi)004:4685: de ltar na yoda cesa bya ba'i khasa lena ni
NK048(tshi)004:4686: rang gi lugs la ma brtags 'jig rten grags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4687: kun rdzob tsam du yanga mi rung ste meda pa
NK048(tshi)004:4688: kho na rang lugs su khasa blang ba'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:4689: // gal te re re ma yin par yod med
NK048(tshi)004:4690: gnyis ka rang gi lugs kyi khasa blang ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:4691: // no zhe na / chos gang yang rigs pas
NK048(tshi)004:4692: dpyad mi bzod pa de khas mi len pa'am basla
NK048(tshi)004:4693: nasa su rigas pasa gnod pa meda par dpyad bzod
NK048(tshi)004:4694: pas skyon med cig khasa lena pa yina pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4695: yod med gnyis ka rigs pas dpyad bzoda du thal
NK048(tshi)004:4696: // no zhe na / bar 'gyur ro // de
NK048(tshi)004:4697: lta na yanga rigs pas dpyad pa'i stong pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4698: ma dpyad pa'i snang ba de gnyis po lhan cig
NK048(tshi)004:4699: tu dngos po gcig la 'du zhing tshogsa pa 'jig
NK048(tshi)004:4700: rten na srid pa ma yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:4701: gal te tshogas na don dam dpyod byed kyis dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:4702: pasa med pa'am stong par rtogsa pa'i tshe na yanga
NK048(tshi)004:4703: ma dpyad 'jig rten rgan po'i dus bzhina du dngos
NK048(tshi)004:4704: po de nyid yod pa nyid kyang yin pas der
NK048(tshi)004:4705: 'dzin gyi yod rtog nyid kyang bzlog mi thub par
NK048(tshi)004:4706: yoda dgos pa'i phyir na don dpyod kyi rigs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4707: dpyad pasa ci zhig phana te 'khrul rtog spong ba
NK048(tshi)004:4708: la ci yang mi phan pa'i dpyad pa don med
NK048(tshi)004:4710: der ma zad thal 'gyur ba rang gi lugs la
NK048(tshi)004:4711: bden pa gnyis kyi khas len de yang grub pa
NK048(tshi)004:4712: min te / 'di ltar kun rdzob ma brtags 'jig
NK048(tshi)004:4713: rten grags pa'i yod pa de yang rang lugs yin
NK048(tshi)004:4714: na de don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod
NK048(tshi)004:4715: du grub pa zhig dgos kyang de ltar rigas shing
NK048(tshi)004:4716: 'thad pa ma yina pa'i phyir te shes bya'i khong
NK048(tshi)004:4717: na don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad bzod kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4718: chos gang yang mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:4719: de bzhin du don dam pa dagga bya bden grub
NK048(tshi)004:4720: bcad pa'i meda dagga stong rkyang de lasa lhag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4721: gansa lugsa mthar thug pa zhig meda par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:4722: de nyid mngon du byed pa'i lam la zhugs tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4723: med dgag stong rkyang kho na 'dzin pa'i 'dzina stangsa
NK048(tshi)004:4724: de la gang snang ba'i cha zhig gnas lugs la
NK048(tshi)004:4725: yod ma myong ba'i snang phyogs kyi 'dzin stangs 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4726: pa skabsa mi thob cing mi srid pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:4727: snang cha thams cad stong rkyang med dgag gi dbyings
NK048(tshi)004:4728: su rgyas gdab pas mtha'a gciga tu lta ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:4729: sgom pa dang spyod pa'i gnas skabsa kun kyang med
NK048(tshi)004:4730: para te med pa kho nar lta ba'i yida can
NK048(tshi)004:4731: du ci yi phyir mi 'gyur te /
NK048(tshi)004:4732: 'di ltar gansa lugsa dang rjes su mthun par lta
NK048(tshi)004:4733: bas gtan la dbab cing sgoms pas dus nam sgom
NK048(tshi)004:4734: yanga lta ba dang mthun par bsgomsa dgosa pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4735: spyod pa'ang lta sgom gyi rjes su 'brang bar nges
NK048(tshi)004:4736: pa'i phyir ro // bzhi pa la bzhi /
NK048(tshi)004:4737: gnas skabs dbu ma'i grub mtha' gtan la dbab tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4738: khas len yod med gnyis su rigs pas sgrub pa
NK048(tshi)004:4739: / mthar thug rtogs pa'i dngos gzhi thob tshe khas
NK048(tshi)004:4740: len yod med la sogs pa'i spros mtha' kun dang
NK048(tshi)004:4742: de nyid rtogs par byed pa'i theg rim nges pa mdo sngags lta ba'i lam khyad sgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)004:4743: dbu ma la ji skad bshad pa'i tshul des gnas lugs sogs gzhan yang mtshon par bstan pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4745: mnyam bzhag 'phags pa'i ye shes gzhal zhing gzhan dang
NK048(tshi)004:4746: rtsod pa'i skabs su gshis kyi gnas lugs bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:4747: khas len ci yang med tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:4748: rjes thob lam 'bras grub mtha' 'jog cing bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4749: gzhal ba'i skabs su tha snyad snang tshul bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:4750: khas len yod par sgrub pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4752: spros bral 'bras bu'i dbu ma gtan la dbab tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4753: gzhal bya khas len kun dang bral ba'i chos nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4754: gshis kyi rang bzhin ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:4755: de nyid dngos dang mthun par gzhal bas khas len
NK048(tshi)004:4756: med par grub pa'i rgyu mtshan rigs pas bstan pa'o
NK048(tshi)004:4758: des na kun mkhyen sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4759: desa na kun mkhyen rgyal ba gnyis pa klong chen
NK048(tshi)004:4760: rab 'byams bzang po'i ji ltar bzhed pa bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:4761: snga 'gyur gyi ranga lugsa rnyogs pa'i dri ma med
NK048(tshi)004:4762: pa ni 'di ltar shes para bya ste /
NK048(tshi)004:4763: zung 'jug rab tu mi gnas pa'i dbu ma thal
NK048(tshi)004:4764: 'gyur matshana nyid pa rtog ges rnyogs dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:4765: zhig yina na snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i dbu
NK048(tshi)004:4766: ma chena po'am spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4767: dbu ma chen po nyid nges par yina dgosa te
NK048(tshi)004:4768: de ni 'di ltar theg chen 'aphagas pa'i mnyam bazhaga
NK048(tshi)004:4769: gnyis snang med pa'i ye shesa dang rjes su mthun
NK048(tshi)004:4770: para don dam mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigs pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:4771: dag gis gtan la phaba nasa yoda meda rtag chad
NK048(tshi)004:4772: la sogas pa'i mtha'a rags pa dang phra ba shin
NK048(tshi)004:4773: tu phra ba rnams ma lus pa kun nye bar
NK048(tshi)004:4774: zhi ba'am nyer zhi'i ranga bzhina bden gnyis zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4775: gi gnas lugs yina pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:4776: de las gzhan du dgag bya bden grub bcad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4777: stong pa med dgag 'ab'a zhiga yul du byed pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4778: lam de nyid snang stong bdena gnyis zung 'jug gshis
NK048(tshi)004:4779: kyi gnas tshul ma yin par phyogsa gciga stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4780: mtha' la lhung ba'i phyir lta ba nye tshe ba'am
NK048(tshi)004:4781: nye tshe'i lta ba yin pas de ni snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:4782: zung 'jug dang ni spros kun bral ba'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:4783: mthar thug rnam pa kun tu mina te /
NK048(tshi)004:4784: 'di ltar snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:4785: spros pa kun dang bral ba ni yod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:4786: meda pa'am snang ba dang stong pa dbyer med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4787: chos kyi dbyings mnyam nyid yin dgos kyang nyi tshe'i
NK048(tshi)004:4788: lta ba 'di ni dona dam med dgag stong pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4789: dbyingsa 'ab'a zhiga gam kho na'i yul can yina pas
NK048(tshi)004:4790: spros pa thams cad dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:4791: // de ltar grub ste spros pa zhes bya ba
NK048(tshi)004:4792: ni yoda pa dang meda pa stong pa dang snang
NK048(tshi)004:4793: ba la sogas pa'i mtshan mar dmigas pa'i rnam pa
NK048(tshi)004:4794: gzung 'dzin can gang ji snyed pa thamsa cada yin
NK048(tshi)004:4795: pas de thams cad dang ma bral na zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4796: rab tu mi gnas pa'i spros bral dbu ma chen
NK048(tshi)004:4797: po min pas 'di ni stong pa'am med pa'i spros
NK048(tshi)004:4798: pa dang ma bral bar med dgag de la dmigas
NK048(tshi)004:4799: pa'i phyir na rnam par rtog pa'i gzhan sel gyi
NK048(tshi)004:4800: spyod yul lta ba nyi tshe bar grub bo //
NK048(tshi)004:4802: des na dbu ma sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4803: des na gnas lugs zung 'jug spros bral dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:4804: chena po'i ngora byas na dgag dang sgrub pa'i khasa
NK048(tshi)004:4805: lena gyi spros pa ci yanga rnam pa kun tu
NK048(tshi)004:4807: dbu ma chen por gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pa de
NK048(tshi)004:4808: yisa 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad snang
NK048(tshi)004:4809: stong zung du 'jug pa'i spros bral mnyam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4810: du rtogsa pa'i slad de don gyis chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:4811: kyi gnas lugs zung 'jug chos kyi dbyings yoda meda
NK048(tshi)004:4812: yina mina la sogas pa'i dagga sgrub kyi spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:4813: thams cad kun dang bral basa sam bral ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:4814: pas na gansa lugas zung 'jug spros pa mtha' dag
NK048(tshi)004:4815: dang bral ba'i dona nyid ji lta ba bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:4816: 'khor 'das kyi chosa kun kyang zung 'jug spros pa
NK048(tshi)004:4817: dang bral bar gnas pas yod med sogs gang dang
NK048(tshi)004:4818: gang du khasa blang ba de dang de nyid gnas
NK048(tshi)004:4819: lugs mthar thug dpyod pa'i rigas pasa de dang de
NK048(tshi)004:4820: ltar mi 'grub pa'i phyir yod pa dang med pa
NK048(tshi)004:4821: stong pa dang mi stong ba snang ba dang mi
NK048(tshi)004:4822: snang ba sogs gang du yang khasa ni lena par
NK048(tshi)004:4823: mi byed do // des na dbu ma thal 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:4824: ba'i rang lugs la mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4825: khas len med par shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4827: shan 'byed rgyu yi dbu ma gtan la 'bebs tshe
NK048(tshi)004:4828: khas len yod par sgrub pa'i tshad ma'i blo dang
NK048(tshi)004:4829: gzhal bya gnyis kyi rang bzhin ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:4830: de la mi 'thad pa'i rtsod pa spong zhing lan
NK048(tshi)004:4831: gyi tshul du dngos stobs rigs pa'i lam gyis gsal
NK048(tshi)004:4833: de ltar gnas lugs sogs tshigs bcad bzhi dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4834: de ltar mnyam bzhag la zlo ba'i tshe chos thams
NK048(tshi)004:4835: cad kyi gnas lugsa zung 'jug chos kyi dbyings nyid
NK048(tshi)004:4836: gtan la phab pa'i mathara thug gi dona la gshis
NK048(tshi)004:4837: la gnyis chos kyi spros pa cir yang med pas
NK048(tshi)004:4838: khasa lena meda par grub kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:4839: rjes thob shan 'byed pa'i tshe gnas skabs snang tshul
NK048(tshi)004:4840: la tha snyad tsam du bdena pa gnyis ka so
NK048(tshi)004:4841: sora yanga kun rdzob tu yod la don dam du
NK048(tshi)004:4842: med ces pa'i khas blang yoda de 'on kyang de
NK048(tshi)004:4843: 'dra'i khas len can gyi bden pa gnyis kyang bdena
NK048(tshi)004:4844: gnyis dbyer meda zung 'jug gi gansa lugsa la ltos
NK048(tshi)004:4845: na bden gnyis so so'i snang tshul gnas snang gi
NK048(tshi)004:4846: rnam pa mi 'gog pas tha snyad kyi gzhal bya
NK048(tshi)004:4848: gshis kyi gnas lugs ma yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:4849: bden gnyis dbyer meda chos nyid dona dam pa ji
NK048(tshi)004:4850: lta bar mthong ba'i tshad ma'i ye shes mthar thug
NK048(tshi)004:4851: pa la ltos na bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:4852: gnyis po de yanga nyi tshe ba'i tshad ma'am nyi
NK048(tshi)004:4853: tshe'i gansa kyi 'jal byed tsam yina te tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:4854: de gang rung gcig gisa bdena gnyis cig char 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:4855: pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:4856: desa na tha snyad dpyod byed dang dona dam dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:4857: byed kyi tshad ma gnyis po sems byung shes rab
NK048(tshi)004:4858: ste bum pa la sogsa pa'i dngos po kun tshad
NK048(tshi)004:4859: ma de gnyis kyis so sor dpyad cing gzhal ba
NK048(tshi)004:4862: dngos kun yang dag rdzun par mthong ba yi //
NK048(tshi)004:4863: dngos rnyed ngo bo gnyis ni 'dzin par 'gyur //
NK048(tshi)004:4865: rdzun pa dang yang dag pa'i ngo bo snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:4866: dang stong pa gnyis ni rnyed cing rtogs par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:4867: na yanga tshad ma de gnyis yul so so ba
NK048(tshi)004:4868: yin pas gang rung gciga gis rang yul de gzhal
NK048(tshi)004:4869: zhing rtogs pa'i tshe gciga shos kyang gzhal zhing rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:4870: pa ni yoda pa mina pasa tshad ma de gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4871: gang yin kyang rung bden gnyis cig char mi gzhal
NK048(tshi)004:4872: zhing mi rtogs pas so skye'i blo gnyis snang can
NK048(tshi)004:4873: la bden pa de gnyis resa 'joga gi tshul du
NK048(tshi)004:4874: so sor snang ba lasa cig char du mi snang
NK048(tshi)004:4875: ba'i phyir na tshad ma gnyis so sosa ji ltar
NK048(tshi)004:4876: gzhal ba'i rnyed don yod med kyi khasa lena gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:4877: kyang yoda pa nyid du grub pa yina par shes
NK048(tshi)004:4878: par bya'o // gnyis pa la gnyis /
NK048(tshi)004:4879: khas len yod med dang bden gnyis nang 'gal gyi skyon rang la mtshungs par thal ba'i rtsod spang /
NK048(tshi)004:4880: gnyis ka stobs mtshungs su gyur na dngos kun mi stong bar thal ba'i rtsod pa spang ba'o //
NK048(tshi)004:4885: 'o na khas len sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4886: 'o na de ltar khasa lena yoda meda dang bden
NK048(tshi)004:4887: gnyis kyi khasa lena nang 'agla ba'i tshul gyis skyon
NK048(tshi)004:4888: gong du rang gis gazhana la ji snyed brjod pa
NK048(tshi)004:4889: de dag thams cad rang la'ang mtshungsa para thal lo
NK048(tshi)004:4892: khas len yod med nang 'gal gyi rtsod pa ji ltar spong tshul gyi lan dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4893: bden pa gnyis po nang 'gal gyi rtsod pa ji ltar spong ba'i lan no //
NK048(tshi)004:4895: skabs kyi la shan phyes pas khas len yod med
NK048(tshi)004:4896: nang 'gal dang dpyad bzod kyi skyon rang la med
NK048(tshi)004:4897: tshul / khas len can gyi bden gnyis ltos te
NK048(tshi)004:4898: 'jog cing gnas snang yin pas gcig dang tha dad
NK048(tshi)004:4899: bral tshul lung gis sgrub pa /
NK048(tshi)004:4900: tshul des grol 'khrul gnyis kyang gnas snang du 'dod
NK048(tshi)004:4901: pas rigs pas gnod pa med par tshad mar grub
NK048(tshi)004:4903: nged kyi khyad par sogs tshigs bcad bdun dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4904: de la ngeda kyis 'di ltar skabs kyi khyad para
NK048(tshi)004:4905: phyes nasa su rjes thob shana 'byed lam gyi dbu
NK048(tshi)004:4906: ma dang dngosa gzhi 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:4907: ye shes kyi dbu ma gnyis rim par ragas pa
NK048(tshi)004:4909: phra ba chos nyid kyi dbu ma 'am rgyu dang
NK048(tshi)004:4910: 'brasa bu'i sama rnam shesa kyi spyod yul dang ye
NK048(tshi)004:4911: shes kyi spyod yul gyi gansa skabsa kyi dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:4912: che chung gi khyad legs par phyes nasa phra ba
NK048(tshi)004:4915: mnyam bzhag ye shes kyi dbu ma chen por khas len med par bstan pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:4916: rags pa brda yi dbu ma'am /
NK048(tshi)004:4918: rjes thob shes rab rgyu yi dbu mar khas len
NK048(tshi)004:4919: yod par bshad pa'i phyir na gong du gzhan la
NK048(tshi)004:4920: khas len nang 'gal dang rigs pas dpyad bzod dang
NK048(tshi)004:4921: re re ba'am gnyis tshogs la 'gal skyon ji ltar
NK048(tshi)004:4922: brjod pa de dag ga la 'jug ste skabs so
NK048(tshi)004:4923: sor phyed pa la 'jug thabs med pa desa na
NK048(tshi)004:4924: 'di ltar mnyam bzhag ye shes zung 'jug 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)004:4925: dbu ma chena po la yod med sogs gnyis chos
NK048(tshi)004:4926: kyi khasa lena ci yang meda par ji skad bstan
NK048(tshi)004:4927: pa de nyid ranga gi lugsa kyi grub mtha' yin
NK048(tshi)004:4928: pas mthar thug de ltar 'dod pa yina kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:4929: lam rjes thoba rgyu yi dbu ma gnyis snang can
NK048(tshi)004:4930: gyi shes rab la snang stong bdena pa gnyis po'i
NK048(tshi)004:4931: rang ldog so sora snang ba'i tshe snang ba ltar
NK048(tshi)004:4932: du bdena gnyis dpyod pa'i rigs pa so so'i tshad
NK048(tshi)004:4933: ma yisa gzhal ba'i dgag pa'i rnam pa med dang
NK048(tshi)004:4934: ma yin par dgag pa dang sgrub pa'i rnam pa
NK048(tshi)004:4935: yod dang yin par sgrub pa ji snyed pa thamsa
NK048(tshi)004:4936: cada kyang sgro 'dogs dang skur 'debs kyi loga rtog
NK048(tshi)004:4937: re re dagga pa'i ched du bstan pa yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:4938: khas len gnyis po yod pa yina gyi gshisa kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4939: gnas lugs bden gnyis zung 'jug dgag sgrub bsal bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:4940: las 'das pa la dagga sgrub tu khasa blang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:4941: spros pa ganga yanga meda pa'i phyir na gshisa kyi
NK048(tshi)004:4942: gnas lugs mnyam pa nyid la snang stong bdena pa
NK048(tshi)004:4943: gnyis po yanga so sor risa su chad pa yonga
NK048(tshi)004:4944: ye meda par gnas pasa dgag sgrub kyi khasa lena
NK048(tshi)004:4945: gnyis po ganga ltar yang rang gi ngo bos bdena
NK048(tshi)004:4946: par grub pa cung zad kyang meda pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:4947: dgag sgrub kyi khas len ci yang med par shes
NK048(tshi)004:4948: par bya'o // de lta na'ang rjes thob tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:4949: yul du byed pa'i tshe bden pa gnyis la ltos
NK048(tshi)004:4950: pa'i dgag sgrub gnyis gar yanga gang dang gang ni
NK048(tshi)004:4951: khasa blang bar gyur kyang tha snyad snang tshul kun
NK048(tshi)004:4952: rdzob tsam gyi dabnga du byas te khas len yin
NK048(tshi)004:4953: par bya'o // pa'i phyir dang / gansa skabsa su
NK048(tshi)004:4954: bden gnyis so sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma so sos
NK048(tshi)004:4955: rnyed don dgag sgrub gnyis ka so so na ji
NK048(tshi)004:4956: ltar bcad pa de ltar re zhig bdena de snang
NK048(tshi)004:4957: tshul tsam la 'agla ba meda cing tshad grub yin
NK048(tshi)004:4958: par bya'o // pa'i phyir dang / pa'i phyir dang
NK048(tshi)004:4959: / de yang rang lugs mthar thug pa nyid ma
NK048(tshi)004:4960: yin pas na tha snyad bden pa rigs pas dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:4961: bzod du thal ba la sogas pa'i skyon gsum po
NK048(tshi)004:4962: gang yang rnam pa kun tu mi 'abba ste 'dus
NK048(tshi)004:4963: byas snang ba'i dngosa po'ang brten nas skyes pa'i rten
NK048(tshi)004:4964: 'brel yin zhing gcig dang du ma bral ba'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:4965: don dam dpyod pa'i rigs pas dpyad para mi bzoda
NK048(tshi)004:4966: par bya'o // pa'i phyir dang / pa'i phyir dang / de / ji skad du /
NK048(tshi)004:4968: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4969: de phyir stong nyid ma gtogs par //
NK048(tshi)004:4970: chos 'ga' yod pa ma yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:4972: stong pa dngosa meda kyang ni brten nas btags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:4973: 'dus byas rten 'brel yin pa'i phyir rigs pas dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:4975: dngos dang dngos med 'dus byas yin //
NK048(tshi)004:4977: de'i phyir mathara thug gi don la /
NK048(tshi)004:4978: dgag sgrub bam stong snang gnyis ka dper na rmi
NK048(tshi)004:4979: lam gyi bu dang de shi ba ji lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:4980: bzhin du tha snyad gzhir ma grub par mtshungsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:4981: la gansa skabsa dgag sgrub gnyis bden gnyis so so
NK048(tshi)004:4982: la ltos te tha snyad du snang tshul mi 'gog
NK048(tshi)004:4983: pas btagsa pa tsam zhig yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:4984: dbu ma shes rab la 'jug par /
NK048(tshi)004:4985: dgag sgrub gnyis ka dgag 'ba' zhig /
NK048(tshi)004:4986: dngos la dgag sgrub gang yang med //
NK048(tshi)004:4989: ma brtags grags pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:4990: de yang ma brtagsa 'jig rten gragsa pa'i yoda tsam
NK048(tshi)004:4991: de yang snang tshul tha snyad du yod pa yina
NK048(tshi)004:4992: gyi gansa tshul don dam du yod pa mina la
NK048(tshi)004:4993: / bdena med don dam dpyod pa'i rigas shes kyis
NK048(tshi)004:4994: mthonga ba'i stong pa gansa tshul dona dam du 'doda
NK048(tshi)004:4995: pa de yanga snang tshul kun rdzob kyi zla la
NK048(tshi)004:4996: ltos pa'i dona dam yina gyi gnas lugs mathara thug
NK048(tshi)004:4997: bden pa dbyer med la ltos na dona dam rnam
NK048(tshi)004:4998: grangsa pa tsam mam mthun pa'i don dam zhes don
NK048(tshi)004:4999: dam mthar thug pa nyid ma yin pas de yang
NK048(tshi)004:5000: tha snyad kyi khongs su gtogs so //
NK048(tshi)004:5001: gal te de 'dra'i bden pa gnyis po de yang
NK048(tshi)004:5002: gansa tshul dang snang tshul tha dad pas phana tshun
NK048(tshi)004:5003: 'agla ba nyid yina na bdena gnyis tha dad du
NK048(tshi)004:5004: 'dod pa la skyon bzhi yod par mdo sde dgongs
NK048(tshi)004:5005: pa nges 'grel las gsungs pa rnams 'abba par 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5006: te / don dam mngon sum du rtogs kyang kun
NK048(tshi)004:5007: rdzob logs su dmigs pa'i phyir don dam rtogs nas
NK048(tshi)004:5008: myang 'das mi thob par thal ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5009: kun rdzob las tha dad pa'i don dam yin pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5010: phyir de snang ba'i chos nyid ma yin par thal
NK048(tshi)004:5011: ba dang / bden gnyis ngo bo tha dad pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5012: phyir kun rdzob rab tu ma grub pa tsam don
NK048(tshi)004:5013: dam ma yin par thal ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5014: myang 'das thob pa'i dus na'ang kun rdzob logs su
NK048(tshi)004:5015: dmigs pa'i phyir gang zag gcig gi rgyud la kun
NK048(tshi)004:5016: nyon dang rnam byang gnyis dus gcig la 'jug par
NK048(tshi)004:5018: yang gal te de 'dra'i bden pa gnyis po gansa
NK048(tshi)004:5019: snang phana tshun gzhan mina par gcig pa nyid yin
NK048(tshi)004:5020: na yang bden gnyis gciga pa'i skyon bzhisa gnoda par
NK048(tshi)004:5022: so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis kun rdzob mthong
NK048(tshi)004:5023: ba ltar don dam yang mthong bar thal ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:5024: / kun rdzob la brten nas zag pa 'phel ba
NK048(tshi)004:5025: ltar don dam la brten nas kyang zag pa 'phel
NK048(tshi)004:5027: don dam la dbye ba med pa ltar kun rdzob la'ang dbye ba med par thal ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5028: kun rdzob ji ltar mthong thos las gzhan du btsal
NK048(tshi)004:5029: mi dgos pa ltar don dam yang de ltar 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5031: des na gnas snang gcig dang tha dad du khas blang bar mi bya ste /
NK048(tshi)004:5032: 'du byed khams dang don dam mtshan nyid ni //
NK048(tshi)004:5033: gcig dang tha dad bral ba'i mtshan nyid de //
NK048(tshi)004:5034: gcig dang tha dad nyid du gang sems pa //
NK048(tshi)004:5035: de dag tshul min lta la zhugs pa yin //
NK048(tshi)004:5038: tshul des sangs rgyas sogs tshigs bcad gsum dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5039: gong du gnas snang gcig tha dad gang du'ang khas
NK048(tshi)004:5040: mi len pa'i tshul des sangas rgyas dang semsa cana
NK048(tshi)004:5041: gnyis kyang gansa tshul dang snang tshul tsam la gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:5042: pa yin gyi sems can rgyu dang sangs rgyas 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:5043: bu nyid du 'dod pa ni thega pa dman pa
NK048(tshi)004:5044: chung ngura grags pa'i 'dod tshul yin pas rang lugs
NK048(tshi)004:5045: min par shes para bya dgos so //
NK048(tshi)004:5046: des na rang lugs la gansa snang gnyis gcig dang
NK048(tshi)004:5047: tha dang gang du yang khasa blang ba meda pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5048: phyir na semsa cana rnams ni sangas rgyas yina na
NK048(tshi)004:5049: mtshan dpes brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du snang rung
NK048(tshi)004:5051: lam sgom pa dang sgrub pa thams cad dona meda 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur ba dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5052: rgyu la 'bras bu gansa pa yin pas zan za
NK048(tshi)004:5053: mi gtsang za bar khasa lena dgos pa la sogsa
NK048(tshi)004:5054: pa'i rigas pasa gnoda pa rnam pa kun tu med
NK048(tshi)004:5055: de / sems can gyi gnas tshul sangs rgyas ganga
NK048(tshi)004:5056: yina pa de yang sems can rnams rang snang glo
NK048(tshi)004:5057: bur gyi sgrib pa yisa rang sgrib pa'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:5058: sangs rgyas nyid du snang rung ma yin pas sangs
NK048(tshi)004:5059: rgyas su nye bar mi snang ba yin pasa glo
NK048(tshi)004:5060: bur gyi sgrib pa de dang bral ba'i don lam
NK048(tshi)004:5061: sgom pa dang sgrub pa la 'abda para byed dgos
NK048(tshi)004:5062: de / pa ni / ranga gazhana gnyis kasa 'doda
NK048(tshi)004:5063: dgos pa nyid de khyod rang gis kyang sems can
NK048(tshi)004:5064: rnams rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pas khas blangs
NK048(tshi)004:5065: kyang lam la 'bad rtsol byed dgos par 'dod pa
NK048(tshi)004:5066: ma yin nam de 'dra'i smra ba 'brel med kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5067: ci zhig bya ste dgos 'bras med do //
NK048(tshi)004:5069: res 'jog tshad ma gnyis kyis rnyed don bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:5070: gnyis su nang 'gal med par sgrub tshul rigs pas
NK048(tshi)004:5071: bstan pa / lung las dgag sgrub ji snyed bstan
NK048(tshi)004:5072: pa kun kyang bden gnyis kyi gzhal tshul yin pas
NK048(tshi)004:5073: phan tshun mi 'gal bar khyab mnyam du grub pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5074: bstan pa / tshul lo // dang po /
NK048(tshi)004:5075: bden gnyis 'gal ba sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5076: rang lugs la me dang tsha ba bzhin du snang
NK048(tshi)004:5077: stong bden pa gnyis la phyogs su lhung ba'i 'agla
NK048(tshi)004:5078: ba cung zad kyang meda pa'i phyir na tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:5079: du yoda ces pa dang don dam du med ces
NK048(tshi)004:5080: lta ba yi khasa lena de gnyis po'ang ji ltar
NK048(tshi)004:5082: der ma zad snang stong bden pa gnyis po phan
NK048(tshi)004:5083: tshun gciga pa'ang mina pa'i phyir na kun rdzob tu
NK048(tshi)004:5084: yod don dam du med ces pa'i khasa blang gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5085: su tha snyad kyi rnam para bazhaga pa'ang shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:5087: de yi phyir ji srid snang stong bdena pa 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5088: gnyis snang stong so sora snang ba dang bacasa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5089: semsa kyi 'jug pa thams cad dbyings su ma nub
NK048(tshi)004:5090: par mi srid yoda kyi bar de srid du snang
NK048(tshi)004:5091: stong bden pa de gnyis phan tshun ltos te bzhag
NK048(tshi)004:5092: pa tsam yin pa'i phyir na gcig yod gcig med
NK048(tshi)004:5093: mi srid par yod mnyam med mnyam yin pas rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5094: pa kun du stobsa mtshungsa su snang ba yin pasa
NK048(tshi)004:5095: gcig yod na gcig med ces mtha'a gciga kho nar
NK048(tshi)004:5096: khasa lena yoda pa min te /
NK048(tshi)004:5097: gcig du bral la sogs pa'i rigs pas dngos kun
NK048(tshi)004:5098: bden par grub pa meda cesa bdena stong gdar sha
NK048(tshi)004:5100: kun tu tha snyad pa'i rigs pas ma brtags 'jig
NK048(tshi)004:5101: rten grags pa'i tha snyad las rgyu 'bras tshe snga
NK048(tshi)004:5102: phyi sogs bslu med du yod cesa rten cing 'brel
NK048(tshi)004:5103: 'byung gi snang cha ngesa pa gnyis resa 'joga gam
NK048(tshi)004:5104: rim gyis bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5105: ni phyi nang gi dngos po kun gzhal ba'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:5106: na tshad ma gnyis po rang rang so so'i rnyed
NK048(tshi)004:5107: dona nam mthonga dona de la snang stong ngam kun
NK048(tshi)004:5108: rdzob dang don dam ste bden pa gnyis zhes tha
NK048(tshi)004:5110: bden pa de gnyis ngo bo gciga pa dang tha
NK048(tshi)004:5111: dad pa yang mina pa'i phyir na snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)004:5112: pa de gnyis phan tshun mi ltos par mtha'a gcig
NK048(tshi)004:5113: tu gang rung gciga spang nas gciga shos nyid ni
NK048(tshi)004:5114: bzung du mi rung ste dper na me la mi
NK048(tshi)004:5115: ltos pa'i tsha ba tsha ba la mi ltos pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5116: me gzung du mi rung ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5117: des na bden pa de gnyis la so sor dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:5118: pa'i tshad ma sems byung shesa raba kyis snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:5119: yod med sogs gzhal ba'i skabs su khasa lena gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5120: po so sora phye ste smra ba'i dpera brjod na
NK048(tshi)004:5121: / 'bras bu'i mathara thug skye 'gag med pa'i chos
NK048(tshi)004:5122: nyid mngon du byas te gnyis snang mtha' dag 'gag
NK048(tshi)004:5123: pa'i ye shes chosa kyi sku thob par gyur pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5124: tshe na semas dang semsa byung gi gnyis snang ma
NK048(tshi)004:5125: lus pa thams cad tha snyad kun rdzob kyi dabnga
NK048(tshi)004:5126: du 'agga cesa khas len bya dgos pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5127: gnas lugs don dam pa'i dona nyid du gdod nas
NK048(tshi)004:5128: dag pas 'agga pa'ang meda do zhes khas len bya
NK048(tshi)004:5131: mdo dang bstan bcos sogs tshigs bcad lngas bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5132: rgyal ba'i bka' yum sher phyin dang bden pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5133: sogs dang snying po bstan pa'i mdo la sogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:5134: dang bstan bcosa chen po rigs pa'i tshogs dang bstod
NK048(tshi)004:5135: pa'i tshogs / mngon rtogs rgyan dang rgyud bla ma
NK048(tshi)004:5136: la sogs pa'i gzhung kun na dagga pa dang sgrub
NK048(tshi)004:5137: pa'i rnam pa ji snyed cig bstan pa de dag
NK048(tshi)004:5138: rnams kyang la la gnas lugs dona dam pa'i dbang
NK048(tshi)004:5139: du byas nas gzhi lam 'bras bu'i chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:5140: stong pa'am med par khasa lena par gsungs pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:5141: pa'i tshogs / te / la la ni tha snyad
NK048(tshi)004:5142: snang tshul kun rdzob kyi dabnga du byas nas gzhi
NK048(tshi)004:5143: lam 'bras bu'i chos thams cad yod par gsungsa pa
NK048(tshi)004:5144: pa'i tshogs / te / ste / de yang 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5145: ltar gnas lugs dona dam pa kho na'i dabnga du
NK048(tshi)004:5146: byas na lam lnga sa bcu dang sangas rgyas dang
NK048(tshi)004:5147: semsa cana la sogas pa mdor na gzhi lam 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:5148: bus bsdus pa'i 'khor 'das kyi chos thams cad gdod
NK048(tshi)004:5149: nas dag pas stong pa'am meda cesa som nyi mi
NK048(tshi)004:5150: dgos par smra bar rung moda kyi /
