NK048(tshi)004:5151: 'on kyang tha snyad snang tshul kun rdzoba nyid la
NK048(tshi)004:5152: ltos pa meda par rnam pa kun tu med pa'am
NK048(tshi)004:5153: stong pa de gciga kho nara mi 'gyur te don
NK048(tshi)004:5154: la bden pa gnyis char ma skyes pas med pa
NK048(tshi)004:5155: yin kyang snang tshul rten 'byung 'gags pa med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5156: 'khora 'adsa kyi snang ba'i cha 'di kun gsal bar
NK048(tshi)004:5157: rang rang la snang bar mngona sum bslu med kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5158: grub cing yod pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:5159: yang snang tshul tha snyad tshad ma'i dbang du byas
NK048(tshi)004:5160: nasa sa lam dang sangas rgyas dang semsa cana la
NK048(tshi)004:5161: sogas pa gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba rab 'byams
NK048(tshi)004:5162: thams cad mngon sum bsnyon med du yoda cesa the
NK048(tshi)004:5163: tshom med par brjod para rigas moda kyi /
NK048(tshi)004:5164: 'on kyang gnas lugs stong pa dona dam pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5165: la ltos pa meda par rnam pa kun tu yod
NK048(tshi)004:5166: pa'am snang ba de gciga kho nara mi 'gyur te
NK048(tshi)004:5167: snang tshul rten 'byung gi snang cha 'gags med du
NK048(tshi)004:5168: don byed nus par snang ba'i yoda pa yin kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5169: don la de ltar ma grub pas stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5170: yin para don dam dpyod pa'i tshad mas yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:5171: par nges nus pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:5172: desa na snang stong bden pa de gnyis dus nam
NK048(tshi)004:5173: du yang chu dang rlan bzhin du gciga meda na
NK048(tshi)004:5174: gciga shos yoda pa nyid dang rnam pa kun tu
NK048(tshi)004:5175: srid pa ma yina zhing gcig yod na gcig shos
NK048(tshi)004:5176: kyang med pa mi srid par 'gal med gnad gcig
NK048(tshi)004:5177: tu shes pa ni shes bya'i khong na gal che
NK048(tshi)004:5178: bar shes dgos pa zhig yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5183: gnyis ka stobs mtshungs sogs rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5184: 'o na bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma so sos
NK048(tshi)004:5185: rnyed don snang stong bden pa gnyis ka stobsa mtshungsa
NK048(tshi)004:5186: pa'am mgo mnyam par bdena para gyur pa de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:5187: yin pa'i tshe na kun rdzob snang ba'i dngosa po
NK048(tshi)004:5188: thams cad mi stong par don dam du grub par
NK048(tshi)004:5189: 'gyur ro zhe na zhes rtsod pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5190: gnyis pa de spang ba'i lan la gsum /
NK048(tshi)004:5191: de gnyis ye shes rtogs pa'i blo yi 'jug rim
NK048(tshi)004:5192: yin pas bden dngos med cing snang stong thabs shes
NK048(tshi)004:5194: de ltar bzhag pa'i dgos 'bras bstan cing tshul de
NK048(tshi)004:5195: mdo rgyud lam gyi zab gnad yin pas rgyal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5196: bka' yang de ltar nges tshul /
NK048(tshi)004:5197: lam gyi dbu ma'i khas len gnyis ka rang lugs
NK048(tshi)004:5198: yin gyi don dam rang lugs su byas nas kun
NK048(tshi)004:5199: rdzob gzhan ngor skyel na lung rigs tshad mas gnod
NK048(tshi)004:5201: gnyis ka'ang rang bzhin sogs tshigs bcad dgu dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5202: de yang kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:5203: gnyis ka'ang ye gdod ma nas rang bzhina gyis ma
NK048(tshi)004:5204: grub pas stong pa nyid du mnyam pa'am mtshungs pa
NK048(tshi)004:5205: yin pa dang / gzhal bya'i yul snang ba dang
NK048(tshi)004:5206: stong pa gnyis po rang bzhin gyis sam dona gyis
NK048(tshi)004:5207: tha dad par grub pa nyid kyang ma yina par
NK048(tshi)004:5208: gang snang ba de'i ngo bo ye nas stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5209: nyid du chu dang rlan ltar 'bral med du gnas
NK048(tshi)004:5210: par grub pa'i phyir na dngos po rnams mi stong
NK048(tshi)004:5211: par bden grub tu 'gyur ba ga la yina te
NK048(tshi)004:5212: yin pa dang / ma yin la / bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:5213: gnyis ka mtshungsa para snang ba de'i phyir na yang
NK048(tshi)004:5214: snang ba'i ngo bo stong para grub ste snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5215: de nyid med na ngo bos stong pa'ang ci yisa
NK048(tshi)004:5216: shesa para 'gyur te shes byed med pa'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:5217: yin pa dang / ma yin la / // des
NK048(tshi)004:5218: na snang stong gnyis ka phan tshun mi 'agla bar
NK048(tshi)004:5219: ma zad phan tshun rgyu 'bras su ste stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5220: rten 'byung dang rten 'byung stong par 'char zhing /
NK048(tshi)004:5221: snang stong gang rung gciga yoda tshe gciga shos kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5222: me dang tsha ba bzhin du 'bral mi shes par
NK048(tshi)004:5223: yod pa la gting nas ngesa pa'i shesa pa skyes
NK048(tshi)004:5224: par gyur na snang stong gnyis po dus nama yanga
NK048(tshi)004:5225: 'adu 'bral meda par ye nas zung du 'jug pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5226: don la the tshom gyi d+r+wa ba ma lus pa
NK048(tshi)004:5227: mtha' dag chad de yang dag par rtogs pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5228: de'i phyir snang stong gnyis po ganga la yang ganga
NK048(tshi)004:5229: gisa ma khyab pa meda pa'i phyir gang snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5230: de stong pa nyid yin pas khyab la gang stong
NK048(tshi)004:5231: pa de yang snang ba yin pas khyab pas snang
NK048(tshi)004:5232: stong ganga ltar gzhal kyang 'gal ba med par bdena
NK048(tshi)004:5233: te snang ba de nyid stong pa dang stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5234: de nyid snang bar grub pa'i phyir /
NK048(tshi)004:5238: de yang gzugs la sogs pa'i snang ba 'di nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5239: rang stong yin para shesa pa yisa snang ba de
NK048(tshi)004:5240: nyid bdena par grub pa meda para stong nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:5242: stong pa nyid de yang gzugs sogs su snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5243: yin para shes na yanga stong pa nyid bdena para
NK048(tshi)004:5244: grub pa'i yoda pa yin par mi rtog ste stong
NK048(tshi)004:5245: pa nyid du ma bden pa'i gnad kyis snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5247: de yi phyir snang stong ye nas 'adu 'bral meda
NK048(tshi)004:5248: pa'i zung 'jug mthonga ba'i tshe na snang stong gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5249: bdena dngos su grub bar dus nam yanga slar mi
NK048(tshi)004:5250: ldog ste gang snang ba de yi gansa lugsa ni
NK048(tshi)004:5251: ye nas stong pa nyid yin zhing gang stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5252: de yi rang bzhin rang snang bar grub pa'i phyir
NK048(tshi)004:5253: na 'adu 'bral meda par mthong gi tha dad du
NK048(tshi)004:5254: dmigs pa mi srid pa'i phyir dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5255: gzugs la sogs pa ganga snang ba de spang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5256: pha rola lam gzhan du stong pa nyid 'adi'o zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5257: yana gara du cung zad tsam yang mi 'grub cing
NK048(tshi)004:5259: snang stong bden pa gnyis po 'du 'bral med par
NK048(tshi)004:5260: mgo mnyam par mtshungs pa des na ji srid bden
NK048(tshi)004:5261: gnyis so sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis po res
NK048(tshi)004:5262: 'jog gis rnyed don bdena pa gnyis so sor sgom
NK048(tshi)004:5263: pa ni sems byung shesa raba ste gzung 'dzin can
NK048(tshi)004:5265: de yang 'di ltar gnyis snang can gyi 'khora ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5266: gnas skabsa 'di na semsa dang semsa byung gi g.yo
NK048(tshi)004:5267: ba gzung 'dzin gyi rnam par rtog pa'i sgrib pa
NK048(tshi)004:5268: yisa gzung 'dzin gnyis snang gi spros pa dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:5269: ba'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa rang bzhin 'od
NK048(tshi)004:5270: gsal ba nyid nye bar mi snang zhing rtogs par
NK048(tshi)004:5271: mi nus pa'i phyir na ji skad bstan pa'i bden
NK048(tshi)004:5272: pa gnyis la so sor dpyad pa'i shesa raba 'khrul
NK048(tshi)004:5273: ba'i dri ma meda pa'i tshad ma gnyis la gcig
NK048(tshi)004:5274: spang gcig blang meda para mgo mnyam du bzung bar
NK048(tshi)004:5275: bya dgos te / de yi rgyu mtshan de ltar
NK048(tshi)004:5276: sgom pa gang gi tshe na tshad ma gnyis las
NK048(tshi)004:5277: gang rung gciga ma tshang ba'am med par gyur na
NK048(tshi)004:5278: rgyu bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma de gnyis lasa
NK048(tshi)004:5279: legs par byung ba'i 'bras bu gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5280: zung 'jug gi ye shesa nyid ngesa para mi skye
NK048(tshi)004:5281: zhing mi 'byung ste rgyu ma tshang ba'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:5282: bya dgos te / / dper na gtsubsa shing gtsubsa
NK048(tshi)004:5283: rten gyi shing gnyis las ganga rung dang bral ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5284: me ni yang dag par 'byung ba mina pa bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:5285: bya dgos te / / no // des na thabsa
NK048(tshi)004:5286: snang ba'i cha dang shes rab stong pa nyid kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5287: cha gnyis ya bral te phyogs su lhung bar gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5288: na thabs shes zung 'jug gi yang dag pa'i lam
NK048(tshi)004:5289: nyid mina no zhes rgyal ba mchog gis mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:5290: dang brgyud 'dzina mkhas grub kun gyis bstan bcos rnams
NK048(tshi)004:5291: las yang dang yang du gsungsa par mdzad pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:5292: bya dgos te / / no // no // gnyis pa /
NK048(tshi)004:5293: rgyu gnyis 'di spang sogs tshigs bcad brgyad dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5294: des na rgyu bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5295: gnyis ma tshogs par gang rung spangsa pa'am bral na
NK048(tshi)004:5296: 'bras bu zung 'jug gi ye shesa che ste chen
NK048(tshi)004:5297: po rang rgyud la skye zhing 'byung ba'i rgyu'am thabas
NK048(tshi)004:5298: gazhana ci yang mi srid pas rgyu de la brten
NK048(tshi)004:5300: 'di ltar zab zhi spros pa dang bral ba'i zung
NK048(tshi)004:5301: 'jug gi ye shesa ranga gi ngo bo ni gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5302: snang gi blo gang gis bsam pa dang ngag gi
NK048(tshi)004:5303: brjod pa'i yul las 'adsa pa'i phyir na gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:5304: ngo sprod kyi brda thabsa sna tshogs dang tshiga tsam
NK048(tshi)004:5305: daga gisa mtshona par byas te mdzub mos zla ba
NK048(tshi)004:5306: bzhin du ston par byed pa lasa ye shes rang
NK048(tshi)004:5307: gi ngo bo dngosa su rjen cer du sus kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5308: bstan para mi nus pasa na gsang sngagsa theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5309: skabs su ngo sprod kyi brda thabs dang rdo rje'i
NK048(tshi)004:5310: tshig gis mtshon pa de la dbang bzhi pa'am tshiga
NK048(tshi)004:5311: dabnga rin po che zhesa pa'i tha snyad kyis gsungs
NK048(tshi)004:5312: te / 'od gsal rdo rje snying po'i rgyud la
NK048(tshi)004:5313: sogsa pa thig le gsang skor gyi rgyud sde zab
NK048(tshi)004:5314: mo rnams su tshig dang brda thabsa kyi sgo sna
NK048(tshi)004:5315: tshogs nasa mtshon te dbyings dang rig pa zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5316: gi ngo sprod kyi nges gsang mang pos bstan par
NK048(tshi)004:5318: de'i phyir 'jiga rten las 'das pa'i ye shesa zab
NK048(tshi)004:5319: zhi spros pa dang bral ba'i zung 'jug 'od gsal
NK048(tshi)004:5320: ba de nyid de ltar tshig dang brda thabs gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:5321: la ma ltos para rang gi ngo bo 'di'i zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5322: rjen cer du gnyis snang can gyi blo gang gis
NK048(tshi)004:5323: kyang dngos su gzung bar nus pa ma yina pasa
NK048(tshi)004:5324: na bdena gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma lam gyi dbu
NK048(tshi)004:5325: ma nyid bstan pa yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:5326: de ltar lam gyi dbu ma bdena gnyis res 'jog
NK048(tshi)004:5327: gi tshul gyis dpyad cing sgom pa'i 'bras bu dngos
NK048(tshi)004:5328: gzhi mnyam bzhag gi dbu ma bden gnyis dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:5329: zung 'jug gi ye shes mngon sum nyid du grub
NK048(tshi)004:5330: cing mthong bar nus pa des na bden pa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5331: kyi gnas lugs sam yin lugs tshad ma gnyis kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5332: gtan la 'bebsa pa'i tshe na snang stong bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:5333: gnyis las snang ba kun rdzob dgag bya dang stong
NK048(tshi)004:5334: pa don dam 'goga byed kyi tshul du bden pa
NK048(tshi)004:5335: gnyis po res 'joga lta bura bstan par mdzad pa
NK048(tshi)004:5336: yin la / de yi 'bras bu bden gnyis dbyer
NK048(tshi)004:5337: med bsal bzhag dang bral ba'i zung 'jug gi ye
NK048(tshi)004:5338: shesa de nyid rdo rje theg pa'i rgyud sder bde
NK048(tshi)004:5339: yin la / ba chen po / phyag rgya chen po /
NK048(tshi)004:5340: rdzogs pa chen po la sogs pa mtshan gyi rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5341: grangsa dang mtshon tshul du mas bstan par mdzad de
NK048(tshi)004:5342: don la khyad par med do //
NK048(tshi)004:5343: des na gnas lugs gtan la dbab pas dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:5344: gzhung lugsa bka' dang bstan bcos ji snyed pa thamsa
NK048(tshi)004:5345: cada du 'khor 'das kyis bsdus pa'i chos thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:5346: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bdena pa gnyis kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5347: tshul gyis gtan la phab cing rnam para bzhag pa
NK048(tshi)004:5348: yin te / 'di ltar bdena pa gnyis dpyod pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5349: tshad ma gnyis la yang dag par ma brten para
NK048(tshi)004:5350: bden gnyis dbyer med zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:5351: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par
NK048(tshi)004:5353: kun mkhyen rgyal basa chos sgo gang ji snyed cig gsungsa pa ma lus pa yanga /
NK048(tshi)004:5354: kun rdzob dang don dam pa'i bden pa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)004:5355: de la yang dag par brten pa kho na yin
NK048(tshi)004:5356: no // de yi phyir na bdena pa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)004:5357: so so ru dpyad pa yi tshad ma yod med
NK048(tshi)004:5358: kyi khasa lena dang bacasa pa de la lam gyi
NK048(tshi)004:5360: 'bras bu'i dbu ma mnyam bzhag ye shes kyi dngos
NK048(tshi)004:5361: ming rgyu la btagsa pa yi sgo nas bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5362: res 'joga rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma chung ngu zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5364: de la tha snyad kun rdzob tu yod ces pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5365: khas len yod par ma zad don dam du'ang phung
NK048(tshi)004:5366: po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa don
NK048(tshi)004:5367: dam dpyod byed kyis rnam par dpyad pa'i stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5368: nyid dagga bya bden grub sel ba'am bacada pa'i meda
NK048(tshi)004:5369: par dagga pa rkyang pa tsam nyid yin pas dgag
NK048(tshi)004:5370: bya de la ltos nas bden grub bam don dam
NK048(tshi)004:5371: par meda cesa pa'i khasa lena kyang ni nges par
NK048(tshi)004:5374: rgyu'am lam gyi sogs tshigs bcad drug gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5375: de ltar rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma des bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5376: so sor dpyad pa'i tshad mas dngos po rnams don
NK048(tshi)004:5377: dam par stong pa'am med do zhes pa dang tha
NK048(tshi)004:5378: snyad kun rdzob tsam du snang ba'am yod do zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5379: bdena pa gnyis so so la ltos te ji ltar
NK048(tshi)004:5380: khasa blang ba de gnyis ka yang dbu ma pa
NK048(tshi)004:5381: de yi ranga gi lugsa nyid yina gyi /
NK048(tshi)004:5382: gzhan du dona dam par med pa'am stong pa nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5383: du khas len pa ranga lugsa su byas nasa su
NK048(tshi)004:5384: kun rdzob tu yod ces pa'i khas len rnams gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:5385: 'jig rten rgan po'i ngora 'jog pa'am skyel ba 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5386: nyid 'thad cing rigs pa mina te /
NK048(tshi)004:5387: gal te yina na de 'dra'i dbu ma pa de
NK048(tshi)004:5388: yi ranga lugas ni dona dam pa stong pa phyang
NK048(tshi)004:5389: chad rkyang rkyang po kho na ru gyur nasa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5390: gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba kun rdzob thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:5391: kun med pa la yod par 'dzin pas 'khrul ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5392: snang ba spang bya kho na yin pas ci yang
NK048(tshi)004:5393: med do zhesa gzhi lam 'bras bu'i snang ba thams
NK048(tshi)004:5394: cad la skur pa mi bzad pa 'debsa shinga de
NK048(tshi)004:5395: 'dra'i lam de mathara phyin te sangs rgyas pa'i tshe
NK048(tshi)004:5396: sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba'i dbyangs de yang
NK048(tshi)004:5397: snang stong ya bral bas stong pa phyang chad 'ab'a
NK048(tshi)004:5398: zhiga tsam lhag mar lusa pa'am chad stong nam mkha'
NK048(tshi)004:5399: lta bur gyur nasa 'bras chos kyi yon tan mkhyen
NK048(tshi)004:5400: pa gnyis sogas ci yang meda par 'doda pa de
NK048(tshi)004:5401: ni theg dman pas nyan ranga ranga lam gyi 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:5402: bu phung po lhag ma meda par bud shing zad
NK048(tshi)004:5403: pa'i me bzhin du myang 'adsa sam mya ngan las
NK048(tshi)004:5404: 'das par 'doda pa ji lta ba bzhina du de
NK048(tshi)004:5405: 'dra'i dbu ma'i rang lugs 'dod pa 'dira yanga theg
NK048(tshi)004:5406: chen gyi myang 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
NK048(tshi)004:5407: pa yang 'bras chos kyi yon tan thams cad snum
NK048(tshi)004:5408: zad pas mara me rgyun chada pa ltar ci yang
NK048(tshi)004:5409: med par gyur nas theg dman pas lhag med myang
NK048(tshi)004:5410: 'das dang dona la khyad par rdul tsam yang meda
NK048(tshi)004:5411: pa'i phyir na snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i dbyingsa
NK048(tshi)004:5412: mngon du gyur pa'i mkhyen gnyis sogs 'bras chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5413: yon tan ci yang meda para skur pa shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:5414: mi bzad pa 'debsa pas chad stong nam mkha'a dang
NK048(tshi)004:5415: 'dra ba'i yida cana de ni mnyam med sh+aakya seng
NK048(tshi)004:5416: ge yi bstan pa'i snying po snang stong zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5417: gi rkun po nges don zab mo'i dam pa'i chosa
NK048(tshi)004:5418: 'jiga par byed pa'i skyes bur kun mkhyen rgyal basa
NK048(tshi)004:5419: mdo rgyud du ma nas gsal bar gsungsa pa'i lung
NK048(tshi)004:5420: rnams kyis shin tu pham par byas shing yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:5421: pa'i rigas pasa kyang ni snang stong bden gnyis 'gal
NK048(tshi)004:5422: bar rtog pas snang stong ya bral ba'i stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5423: phyang chad de 'dra'i rang lugsa 'dod pa dag tha
NK048(tshi)004:5424: snyad yang dag pa'i tshad mas rnyed don yoda pa
NK048(tshi)004:5425: la meda para shin tu skur ba'i tshul can yina
NK048(tshi)004:5426: para bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma yang dag pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5427: lam gyis nges shesa mi shig pa'i rdo rje'i mesa
NK048(tshi)004:5428: snang stong ya bral zhing skur ba 'debs pa'i phyang
NK048(tshi)004:5429: chad stong pa'i lta ngana gyi ri bo rtsa sbur
NK048(tshi)004:5430: bzhin du bsreg nas lhag med du brlag para nus
NK048(tshi)004:5431: pas na rigs pas gnod pa bzlog med du 'bab
NK048(tshi)004:5434: thabs byung 'phags lam rtogs pa'i ye shes zung 'jug dbu ma chen po'i rang bzhin ngos bzung ba /
NK048(tshi)004:5435: de nyid rnam kun mchog ldan gyi ye shes blo
NK048(tshi)004:5436: 'das smra bsam brjod med yin par lung rigs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5437: sgrub pa / de yang so so rang gi rig
NK048(tshi)004:5438: par gsal snang thob nas rjes kyi nges pa mchog
NK048(tshi)004:5439: tu 'dren pas bsam min gyi byed po ltar min
NK048(tshi)004:5440: sgrub pa / par bstan pa'o // dang po /
NK048(tshi)004:5441: des na dbu ma'i sogs tshigs bcad lnga dang rkang pa gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5442: des na gnas lugs gtan la dbab pa'i dbu ma'i
NK048(tshi)004:5443: gzhung bka' dang bstan bcos kun tu snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)004:5444: pa gnyis la so sor dpyod pa'i tshad mas drangs
NK048(tshi)004:5445: pa'i shesa raba rgyu yi dbu ma nyid rigas pasa
NK048(tshi)004:5446: tshul bzhin du dpyad cing yang dag par ma grub
NK048(tshi)004:5447: para gyur pa de srid du zung 'jug 'bras bu'i
NK048(tshi)004:5448: dbu ma'am 'bras bu zung 'jug gi ye shes dngos
NK048(tshi)004:5449: nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir na re zhig dngos po'i
NK048(tshi)004:5450: chos thams cad snang stong bdena pa gnyis kyi tshul
NK048(tshi)004:5451: du ni bden gnyis dpyod pa'i rigas pa yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:5452: pasa gtan la phaba par mdzad na yanga 'bras bu
NK048(tshi)004:5453: gnas lugs bdena pa dbyer meda dam snang stong zung
NK048(tshi)004:5454: 'jug spros bral mnyam pa nyid du grub cing rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:5455: pa ni rgyu dang 'bras bu mdo sngags kyi thega
NK048(tshi)004:5456: pa'i dgongs bcud zab mo mthar thug gi gnad dam
NK048(tshi)004:5457: pa yin par shes par bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5458: de yi phyir na 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5459: gi ye shesa rdul dang bral ba de dag gi
NK048(tshi)004:5460: ngo bo dngos ni lam gyi dbu ma'i skabs su
NK048(tshi)004:5461: resa 'joga tu dpyod cing sgom pa'i tshul gyis mtha'a
NK048(tshi)004:5462: gnyis rim par spang ba lta bur ma yin par
NK048(tshi)004:5463: mtha' gnyis sam bzhi'am brgyad dam so gnyis po mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:5464: dag cig char du spang nas dgag sgrub gang la
NK048(tshi)004:5465: yang mi gansa pas blo lasa 'adsa pa'i zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5466: gi ye shes nyid du la zlo ba'i phyir na
NK048(tshi)004:5467: dbu ma yina la chena po'ang yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5468: de ltar na ji srid resa 'jog gi bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5469: sgom pa'i tshul gyis ni nam zhig res 'jog dang
NK048(tshi)004:5470: bral ba'i zung 'jug gi ye shesa de la dngos
NK048(tshi)004:5471: su ma reg para de srid du rgyal ba kun
NK048(tshi)004:5472: gyi dgongas pa'i bcud dam mthil du gyur pa mthar
NK048(tshi)004:5473: thug gi dbu ma zung 'jug ye shes chena po
NK048(tshi)004:5475: dper na gtsubsa shing gtsubs rten gyi shing gnyis ya
NK048(tshi)004:5476: ma bral bar myur du gtsubsa pa'i stobs las byung
NK048(tshi)004:5477: ba'i me yis rang gang las byung ba'i shing gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5478: kyang lhag med du bsregs pa bzhina du snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:5479: bden gnyis so sor dpyod pa'i tshad ma gnyis kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5480: shes raba dri ma meda pa zung du tshogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:5481: la gom pa'i stobs kyis byung ba'am drangsa pa yi
NK048(tshi)004:5482: bden gnyis sam snang stong gnyis su med par zung
NK048(tshi)004:5483: du 'jug pa'i ye shesa kyi mesa yoda pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5484: meda pa yina pa dang mina pa la sogas pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5485: mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa gnyis snang gi rgyu ba ma
NK048(tshi)004:5486: lus pa mtha' dag kun nye bar zhi ba'i 'aphagas
NK048(tshi)004:5487: pa'i mnyam bazhaga yul dang yul can gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)004:5488: pa'i ye shesa nyid la bden gnyis zung 'jug mthar
NK048(tshi)004:5489: thug 'bras bu'i dbu mara tha snyad du brjod de
NK048(tshi)004:5490: bazhaga par mdzad pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:5492: bden gnyis phyogs su sogs tshigs bcad bcu dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5493: de ltar snang stong bdena pa gnyis po so so'i
NK048(tshi)004:5494: phyogs su ma lhung bar 'gal med zung du 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5495: pa de la rjes thoba shan 'byed pa'i shesa rab
NK048(tshi)004:5496: kyis gzhal nas snang ba kun rdzob bden pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5497: stong pa don dam bden pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5498: bden gnyis zung du 'jug pa mtha' bral dbu ma
NK048(tshi)004:5499: chen po zhes ming ngam brda tsam gyi sgo nas
NK048(tshi)004:5500: rnam par bzhag cing bstan moda kyi dngos su na
NK048(tshi)004:5501: sgra rtog gi yul las 'das pas 'phags pa'i mnyam
NK048(tshi)004:5502: bazhaga gnyis su med pa'i zung 'jug ye shesa chena
NK048(tshi)004:5503: po'i ngora snang ba dang stong pa dang zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5504: gi ngo bo ni 'di dang 'di zhes so sor
NK048(tshi)004:5505: ci yang dmigas su yoda pa ma yina te /
NK048(tshi)004:5506: snang ba kun rdzob ni tha snyad dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i yul lam rnyed don dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5507: stong pa rang bzhin med pa ni dona dama dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i yul lam rnyed don dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5508: zung 'jug gnyis su med pa ni de gnyis rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5509: dbyer med par 'dres pa'i cha la bzhag pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:5510: pas / de rnams ni gzhan sel gyi sgra dang rtog pa'i yul nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK048(tshi)004:5511: de yi phyir na sgra rtog gi tha snyad de
NK048(tshi)004:5512: dag lasa 'adsa pa'i 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag dngos ni
NK048(tshi)004:5513: so so ranga gi rig pa gnyis su med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5514: ye shesa tsam du bzhag ste spros pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:5515: dang bral bar gyur pas mnyam bzhag snang bacasa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5516: snang meda la sogas pa'i tha snyad thams cad kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5517: snang stong so so'i phyogs su chad cing sgra rtog
NK048(tshi)004:5518: gi yul yin pa'i phyir na gong du ji skad
NK048(tshi)004:5519: bstan pa de bzhina du 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag gi
NK048(tshi)004:5520: ye shes chen po'i ngor rigsa pasa yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:5521: mi 'grub bo ste 'grub par mi 'gyur ro //
NK048(tshi)004:5522: des na ji srid snang stong so sor snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5523: dang bcas pa'i resa 'jog gi bdena pa gnyis po
NK048(tshi)004:5524: yang dag par sgom pa ni gnyis snang can sems
NK048(tshi)004:5525: byung shes raba ste nama zhiga na resa 'jog gis
NK048(tshi)004:5526: bden pa gnyis sgom pa meda para yanga 'phags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5527: mnyam bzhag zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa
NK048(tshi)004:5528: mngon sum du mthong ba'am thoba pa'i tshe na phung
NK048(tshi)004:5529: po dang khams dang skye mched la sogs pa'i dagga
NK048(tshi)004:5530: bya rnams don dam rnam par dpyad pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:5531: rnams kyis rang bzhin med par bacada pa'am gtan la
NK048(tshi)004:5532: dbab pa'i med dagga snang ba spang ba'i stong rkyang
NK048(tshi)004:5533: chu shing lta bu snying po med pa lasa yang
NK048(tshi)004:5534: dag par 'adsa te stong pa 'goga byed dang snang
NK048(tshi)004:5535: ba dagga bya yi tshul du snang stong ris chad
NK048(tshi)004:5536: du so sora mi snang bar gnyis snang thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:5537: nub na yang snang cha 'gags pa med pa'i thabas
NK048(tshi)004:5538: kyi rnam pa kun dang ldana pa yi rnam pa
NK048(tshi)004:5539: kun gyi mchoga ldana gyi ye shes stong nyid spros
NK048(tshi)004:5540: bral chena po dngos nyid mngon du gyur pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:5541: pas rigs ldan 'jam dpal grags pas /
NK048(tshi)004:5542: phung po rnam dpyad stong pa nyid //
NK048(tshi)004:5543: chu shing bzhin du snying po med //
NK048(tshi)004:5544: rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan pas //
NK048(tshi)004:5545: stong nyid de dang 'dra ma yin //
NK048(tshi)004:5548: lhan skyes phyag rgya chena po /
NK048(tshi)004:5549: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po sogas mtshon byed kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5550: barda'am mtshan gyi rnam grangsa manga po mang'a ba yi
NK048(tshi)004:5551: bdag nyid semas dang sems byung mtha' dag las 'adsa
NK048(tshi)004:5552: pa'i gnyis su med pa'i ye shesa chos nyid kun
NK048(tshi)004:5553: khyab chen po yina pa'i phyir na gzung 'dzin gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5554: snang can gyi sems sam kun tu rtog pa gazhana
NK048(tshi)004:5555: gyis te rtog pa gang gis kyang bsam gyis mi
NK048(tshi)004:5556: khyab pa ste / smra bsam brjod med shes rab pha rol phyin //
NK048(tshi)004:5558: de ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes de
NK048(tshi)004:5559: ni sgra dang rtog pa gang gi'ang yul mina pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5560: phyir na meda dagga snang ba spang ba'i stong pa
NK048(tshi)004:5561: phyang chad dang ma yina dagga rang gi ngo bos
NK048(tshi)004:5562: mi stong par dgag bya gzhan gyis stong pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5563: bden pa'i gnyis snang med kyang yul dang yul can
NK048(tshi)004:5564: du rnam par bzhag pa sogas dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5565: bden pa gnyis ngo bo tha dada dang ni snang
NK048(tshi)004:5566: stong 'dres pa'i zung du 'jug sogas spros pa'i mtshan
NK048(tshi)004:5567: ma kun dang bral zhing gang gi phyogs su lhung
NK048(tshi)004:5568: ba'am risa su chada pa meda pa ste rgya gang
NK048(tshi)004:5569: du ma chad phyogsa gang du'ang ma lhung bas shes
NK048(tshi)004:5570: brjod 'jug pa'i tha snyad thams cad dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:5571: gnyis su med pa'i ye shes rang bzhin gyis 'od
NK048(tshi)004:5572: gsal basa na / ma skyes mi 'gag nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid /
NK048(tshi)004:5574: de ni snang dang stong pa khasa lena yoda meda
NK048(tshi)004:5575: la sogs pa'i spros mtshan kun lasa 'adsa kyang ci
NK048(tshi)004:5576: yang dran med thom me ba gnyid 'thug dang brgyal
NK048(tshi)004:5577: ba la sogs pa lta bu ma yin par mthar
NK048(tshi)004:5578: 'dzin gyi lta ba ngan pa'i smag thams cad sel
NK048(tshi)004:5579: bar nus pa'i chos kyi dbyings e wam ste stong
NK048(tshi)004:5580: pa'i ye shes dbyings dang gsal ba'i ye shes bde
NK048(tshi)004:5581: ba chen po 'du 'bral med pas dbyer med dam
NK048(tshi)004:5582: zung du zhugsa pa yi ranga byung gi ye shesa
NK048(tshi)004:5583: gang de rnal 'byor pa rnams kyi so so rang
NK048(tshi)004:5584: rig pa'i ye shes kyis mthong ba med pa'i tshul
NK048(tshi)004:5585: gyis mthong zhing gansa pa meda pa'i tshul gyis gnas
NK048(tshi)004:5586: pa dang snang ba med pa'i tshul gyis rang snang
NK048(tshi)004:5587: ba ste / so so rang rig ye shes spyod yul ba //
NK048(tshi)004:5589: de ltar yod med yin min stong dang mi stong
NK048(tshi)004:5590: la sogs pa'i khasa lena thams cad lasa 'adsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5591: gnas lugs snang stong gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5592: dbyings nyid rang gi ngo bos mi stong par sgro
NK048(tshi)004:5593: 'dogs pa dang dbyings dang gnyis su med pa'i 'od
NK048(tshi)004:5594: gsal ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba nyid med par
NK048(tshi)004:5595: skur ba 'debs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i gnas
NK048(tshi)004:5596: lugs dama pa'i dona zung 'jug skye 'gag med pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5597: ye shes dbyingsa dang riga pa ye nas 'adu 'bral
NK048(tshi)004:5598: meda pa'i gnas tshul zab mo de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5599: rang gi ngo bo la ni rjen cer du 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5600: zhesa rtags dang gtan tshigs dpe dang sgra rtog gang
NK048(tshi)004:5601: gis kyang mtshona zhing brjod du meda pas shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:5602: smra bsam brjod pa las las 'das para 'doda pa
NK048(tshi)004:5604: 'on kyang bsam min sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5605: de ltar spros pa kun las 'das pa yin mod
NK048(tshi)004:5606: kyi 'ona kyang phyi rol pa'i 'dod pa'i bsam mina
NK048(tshi)004:5607: gyi byed po ltar gang zag su yis kyang rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:5608: su meda pa nyid ni ma yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:5609: 'di ltar dri ma meda pa'i lung gi snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5610: la brten te tshad mar gyur pa'i rigas pa yang
NK048(tshi)004:5611: dag pasa dpyad pa yisa raba tu drangsa pa'i 'phags
NK048(tshi)004:5612: pa'i mnyam bzhag zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ngo
NK048(tshi)004:5613: bo rnal 'byor ba rnams kyis so so ranga riga
NK048(tshi)004:5614: pa'i ye shes kyi rjes lasa thoba pa'i dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:5615: 'jig rten pa'i ye shesa kyis ngesa pa'i shesa pa
NK048(tshi)004:5616: chosa kyi dbyings snang stong zung 'jug bsal bzhag med
NK048(tshi)004:5617: pa'i gnas lugs nyid ji lta bar gsal bar byed
NK048(tshi)004:5618: pa'i mar me 'od 'bar ba'i snang ba ni the
NK048(tshi)004:5619: tshoma gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba dag rnal
NK048(tshi)004:5620: 'byor pa rnams la mngona sum du snang ba yoda
NK048(tshi)004:5623: mdo lam thabs dang sogs tshigs bcad drug dang rkang pa gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5624: de yang mdo mtshan nyid rgyu yi theg pa'i lam
NK048(tshi)004:5625: gyi skabs su thabas snang ba'i cha dang shesa raba
NK048(tshi)004:5626: stong pa'i cha gnyis phan tshun gciga la gciga gisa
NK048(tshi)004:5627: rtsisa zina pa'i rgyas gdab res 'jog gi tshul gyis
NK048(tshi)004:5628: 'du 'bral med para byed kyi rdo rje'i theg pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5629: lam mchog 'bras bu sngags kyi rang lugs 'dira ni
NK048(tshi)004:5630: thabas snang ba dang shesa rab stong pa nyid gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5631: ye nas 'adu 'bral meda para dag mnyam zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5632: gi tshul gyis mngon sum du rtogsa shing gomsa par
NK048(tshi)004:5633: byed pa'i khyad par nyid las rtogs pa rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:5634: ngo bo la snang stong zung du 'jug pa'i spros
NK048(tshi)004:5635: bral dbu ma chena po dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5636: dbyings rig gnyis med 'oda gasla rdzogsa pa chena po
NK048(tshi)004:5637: gnyis zung 'jug gnyis su med pa'i ye shes su
NK048(tshi)004:5638: don la rnam dbyer med pas gcig pa yin zhing
NK048(tshi)004:5639: de nyid mtshon byed kyi mtshan nam minga gi rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5640: grangsa tha dad pa tsam yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:5641: de lasa lhag pa'am mchog tu 'phags pa'i lta ba
NK048(tshi)004:5642: gzhan meda de ganga gi phyir na snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)004:5643: gnyis resa 'joga tu yod pa dang med pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5644: gnyis ka dang gnyis min la sogs pa'i 'dzina stangs
NK048(tshi)004:5645: ci yang meda pas mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa kun dang
NK048(tshi)004:5646: bral ba'i phyir te 'dzin stangs kun dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:5647: de lasa gazhana du gyur pa'i lta ba zhig gal
NK048(tshi)004:5648: te yod par gyur na de nyid 'dzin stangs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5649: spros dang bacasa pa nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro
NK048(tshi)004:5650: // 'ona kyang mdo lasa bden gnyis sam snang stong
NK048(tshi)004:5651: ngam thabs shes zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5652: dona gang de bden gnyis dpyod pa'i gtan tshigs kyis
NK048(tshi)004:5653: dpyad pasa rjes dpag gis gtan la phaba cing sgom
NK048(tshi)004:5655: rdo rje'i theg pa gsang sngagsa nang gi rgyud sde'i
NK048(tshi)004:5656: lugs su rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis so so ranga
NK048(tshi)004:5657: gi riga pa'i ye shes kyi dbyingsa su 'du 'bral
NK048(tshi)004:5658: med pa'i zung 'jug gi ye shes nyid thad kar
NK048(tshi)004:5659: skad cig gis btsan thabs su nyams su myong basa
NK048(tshi)004:5660: mngon sum gyis grub pa yina pas lta ba la
NK048(tshi)004:5661: khyad par shin tu yod pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5662: don de yi phyir na mtha' la mi gnas pas
NK048(tshi)004:5663: dbu ma zhesa brjod pa 'di la yanga bdena gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5664: so sora dpyod pa yi tshad ma sems byung shesa
NK048(tshi)004:5665: raba rgyu'am lam gyi dbu ma res 'jog gi tshul
NK048(tshi)004:5666: du mtha' la mi gnas pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5667: tshad ma gnyis po desa drangs pa'i snang stong bdena
NK048(tshi)004:5668: pa gnyis po rnam dbyer med par ro gciga tu
NK048(tshi)004:5669: gyur pa'i dngos gzhi 'phags pa'i mnyam bzhag rang rig
NK048(tshi)004:5670: pa'i ye shes zung 'jug 'bras bu'i dbu ma cig
NK048(tshi)004:5671: char du mtha' bzhi'i spros pa khegs nas mtha' dbus
NK048(tshi)004:5672: gang la'ang mi gnas pa gnyis po rim par rgyu
NK048(tshi)004:5673: dang 'bras bu'am rnam shes dang ye shes kyi gnas
NK048(tshi)004:5674: skabs yin la / de bzhin du mdo dang sngagsa
NK048(tshi)004:5675: kyi lta ba la'ang khyad par de ltar du rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5676: skabs yin la / par bzhag ste / snga ma
NK048(tshi)004:5677: rgyu yi dbu ma'am mdo lam gyi lta ba ni
NK048(tshi)004:5678: rjes dpag gi nges shes gnyis snang can sems byung
NK048(tshi)004:5679: shesa raba kyi cha yina la /
NK048(tshi)004:5680: phyi ma 'bras bu'i dbu ma mnyam bzhag rnam par
NK048(tshi)004:5681: mi rtog pa'i ye shes sam gsang sngags kyi lta
NK048(tshi)004:5682: ba ni sems las 'das pa'i zung 'jug gnyis su
NK048(tshi)004:5683: med par mngon sum du gsal snang thob pa'i ye
NK048(tshi)004:5684: shesa kyi rjes kyi nges pa kho na yina pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5686: de yi phyir phyi ma 'di la ni stong nyid spros bral chen po /
NK048(tshi)004:5687: lhan skyes phyag rgya chen po /
NK048(tshi)004:5688: 'od gsal rdzogs pa chen po sogs chena po'i sgra
NK048(tshi)004:5689: yisa snga ma las khyad par du 'phags par basngagas
NK048(tshi)004:5690: shing bstan par mdzad pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5692: gnas lugs la yang sogs tshigs bcad gsum gyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5693: de phyir mdo rgyud bstan bcos rnams las gansa lugsa
NK048(tshi)004:5694: zhes gang ji snyed cig gsungs pa yanga gong du
NK048(tshi)004:5695: dbu ma la gnyis su dbye bar byas pa de
NK048(tshi)004:5696: bzhina du phung khams skye mched kyis bsdus pa'i snang
NK048(tshi)004:5697: ba'i dngosa po kun stong pa'i gansa lugsa med dgag
NK048(tshi)004:5698: dang / snang stong bdena gnyis dbyer meda pa'i gansa
NK048(tshi)004:5699: lugsa zung 'jug gi ye shes gnyis la gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:5700: zhes rjod byed kyi ming gciga yin na yanga brjod
NK048(tshi)004:5701: bya'i don la ni ngo bo stong pa'i dbyings dang
NK048(tshi)004:5702: ye nas 'du 'bral med pa'i rang bzhin gsal ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5703: snang ba nyid spang ba'i stong pa phyang chad dang
NK048(tshi)004:5704: dang / / ma spang ba'i snang stong zung 'jug
NK048(tshi)004:5705: gi khyad para gnam dang sa yi mtho dman bzhina
NK048(tshi)004:5706: du mchisa shing yod pa nyid yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5707: de bzhina du chosa nyid de bzhin nyid ces pa
NK048(tshi)004:5708: la'ang dngos po stong pa'i chos nyid med dgag dang
NK048(tshi)004:5709: / bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i chos nyid zung 'jug gi ye shes gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5710: chosa kyi dbyingsa zhes pa la'ang dngos po stong pa med dgag dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5711: zung 'jug gi chos dbyings gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5712: stong nyid la'ang stong nyid med dgag dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5714: spros bral la'ang stong rkyang med dgag gi spros bral dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5715: dbyer med zung 'jug gi spros bral gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5716: 'goga pa yang dag pa'i mtha'a la'ang med dgag stong rkyang dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5717: snang stong zung 'jug gi 'gog pa gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5718: dona dam la'ang med dgag rnam grangs pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5719: zung 'jug rnam grangs ma yin pa'i don dam gnyis dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5723: chos dbyings ye shes sogs la'ang med dgag stong rkyang gi cha dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5724: snang stong zung 'jug gi cha gnyis re gnyis re
NK048(tshi)004:5725: yod pas rjod byed kyi ming ngam sgra gcig nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5726: mtshungsa par 'jug pa yin kyang brjod bya'i don la
NK048(tshi)004:5727: snang stong zung 'jug dang stong rkyang med dgag gi
NK048(tshi)004:5728: dbye ba mathara thug pa dang ni nyi tshe ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5729: khyad para lhun po dang ri phran bzhin du shin
NK048(tshi)004:5730: tu che ba'i phyir na rgyu dang 'bras bu'am /
NK048(tshi)004:5732: rjes thob dang mnyam bzhag gam /
NK048(tshi)004:5733: rnam shes dang ye shes kyi spyod yul du gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5734: pa'i skabsa don gang zhig yin pa ma 'dres so
NK048(tshi)004:5735: sora phye nasa lung rigs dri ma med pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:5736: nas ma nora ma 'khrul bar legs par bshad par
NK048(tshi)004:5737: bya ste / dper na sen+d+hu pa 'on cig ces
NK048(tshi)004:5738: brjod pa yi sgra de nyid dmag la 'gro ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5740: chu brgal ba'i tshe gru dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5741: zas byed pa'i tshe lan tsh+wa la 'jug pa la
NK048(tshi)004:5742: sogs pa yin pas gnas skabs so so la ltos
NK048(tshi)004:5743: nas skabs don gang la bab pa'i rjod byed du
NK048(tshi)004:5744: go nas don la phan tshun ma 'chol bar shes
NK048(tshi)004:5745: dgos pa ji lta ba bzhina du yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5746: mnyam rjes shan ma 'byed pa'i khas len gyi //
NK048(tshi)004:5747: som nyi'i d+r+wa bar 'phyan pa'i rmongs pa'i smag /
NK048(tshi)004:5748: dpyis 'byin ye shes nyi ma lam me pa //
NK048(tshi)004:5749: rdo rje'i rig sngags mchog 'di e ma ho //
NK048(tshi)004:5750: zhes bar skabs kyi tshigs su bcad pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5751: gsum pa dri ba po gus pa'i tshul gyis bstan
NK048(tshi)004:5752: pa mchog la basngagasa shing ngo mtshar chos kyi sgron
NK048(tshi)004:5753: me gzhan la gsal bar bskul ba ni /
NK048(tshi)004:5754: de ltar zab mo'i sogs tshigs bcad bcus bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5755: de ltar shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i don zaba
NK048(tshi)004:5756: mo'i gnas las brtsam pa'i dri ba bdun po rnams
NK048(tshi)004:5757: zaba rgyas sam zab pa dang rgya che ba'i dona
NK048(tshi)004:5758: can shin tu gsal bar lung rigs dri ma med
NK048(tshi)004:5759: pas legs par bshad pa'i tshig gi rjod byed rnams
NK048(tshi)004:5760: kyis yang dag par bkrol ba'i tshe na dri ba
NK048(tshi)004:5761: po thol byung ldom bu pa de yanga zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:5762: shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i gnas bdun po'i don
NK048(tshi)004:5763: la nges pa'i shes pa the tshom gyi smag dang
NK048(tshi)004:5764: bral bar gyur te dga' mgu yi rang nas lus
NK048(tshi)004:5765: gus pa dang bacasa te ngaga gisa 'di skad du
NK048(tshi)004:5766: / kye ma zhes skyo ba'i nyams kyis dper na
NK048(tshi)004:5767: khron pa'i chu mig chung ngu la gnas pa'i rus
NK048(tshi)004:5768: sbal gyis chu mig chung ngu de rgya mtsho chen
NK048(tshi)004:5769: por rlom pas mchog tu stems shing khengs par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5770: pa yang gzod rgya mtsho chen po mthong bas bsnyil
NK048(tshi)004:5771: zhing brgyal te shi bar gyur pa bzhin du rang
NK048(tshi)004:5772: la ma grags pa'i gazhana gzhung mdo rgyud zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:5773: chos kyis tshul zab cing rgya che ba rgya mtsho
NK048(tshi)004:5774: chena po'i 'jingas lta bu rnams ji bzhin du ma
NK048(tshi)004:5775: mthonga zhing ma rtogs par ranga gzhung tshur mthong gi
NK048(tshi)004:5776: bzheda pa khrona pa'i chu mig lta bur mchog tu
NK048(tshi)004:5777: rlom pasa snyems shing dregsa pa'i ro la myong zhen
NK048(tshi)004:5778: dang ldan pa bdag cag rnams kyis rloms sems kyi
NK048(tshi)004:5779: khengas pa cha dang bacasa pa khyed gsung ngo mtshar
NK048(tshi)004:5780: zab mo'i gtam 'disa rmang med du bsnyil bar mdzad
NK048(tshi)004:5781: pas na 'di ni shin tu yi rang zhing gus
NK048(tshi)004:5782: pa'i gnas mchog tu gyur par mthong ngo //
NK048(tshi)004:5783: de phyir shin tu zab pa dang rgya che ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5784: ngo mtshar gtam gyi 'byung gnas kun mkhyen gnyis pa
NK048(tshi)004:5785: ronga zom ma h+aa pan+di ta chos kyi bzang po
NK048(tshi)004:5786: dang rgyal ba'i dbang po kun gzigs klong chen rab
NK048(tshi)004:5787: 'byams zhes mtshan snyan gyi gdugs dkar po sa gsum
NK048(tshi)004:5788: na mngon par mtho zhing gragsa pa rje btsun ngag
NK048(tshi)004:5789: gi dbang po ngur smrig gar gyis rol par bstan
NK048(tshi)004:5790: pa'i 'jam dapala dgyes pa'i zlos gar 'aphagas mchoga rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5791: pa gnyis kyi thugs gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
NK048(tshi)004:5792: kyi rgya mtsho chen po yi klong na lung rig
NK048(tshi)004:5793: man ngag zab mo'i thun mong ma yin pa'i dpal
NK048(tshi)004:5794: la rol zhing 'khyil ba'i rtsal las legs par 'khrungs
NK048(tshi)004:5795: pa'i chos tshul zab mo'i dgongs 'grel nges don mdo
NK048(tshi)004:5796: rgyud sna tshogas pa'i zab cing rgya che ba'i nges
NK048(tshi)004:5797: gsang thams cad dngos stobs tshad ma'i lam nas gsal
NK048(tshi)004:5798: bar ston cing 'dod rgu'i snang ba yid bzhin du
NK048(tshi)004:5799: 'jo ba'i rmad byung lha yi nora bu rin po
NK048(tshi)004:5800: che dbang gi rgyal po lta bu'i chosa mdzoda dam
NK048(tshi)004:5801: pa rab tu mang po bsam gyis mi khyab pa
NK048(tshi)004:5802: la mang'a dbang bsgyur ba rnams kyis mtshon te snga
NK048(tshi)004:5803: 'gyur lung rtogs kyi bstan pa bla na med pa
NK048(tshi)004:5804: da ltar mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dag spang
NK048(tshi)004:5805: nas de dag la bskrun na gazhana gyi gzhung lugsa
NK048(tshi)004:5806: nor bu 'ching bur re zhing mchod par rlom pa
NK048(tshi)004:5807: rnams ni 'khrul ba'i gzhan dbang gis zin nas thun
NK048(tshi)004:5808: mong ma yin pa'i nges don zab mo'i nor bu
NK048(tshi)004:5809: rin po che mchog gi bgo skal las re zhig
NK048(tshi)004:5810: rang rang phyi bshol du gyur pa ni kye ma
NK048(tshi)004:5811: 'o dman pa'i gnas la phyin pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5812: des na bden pa gnyis kyi chosa tshul shin tu
NK048(tshi)004:5813: bazanga por bden gnyis dpyod pa'i tshad ma yang dag
NK048(tshi)004:5814: pa'i rigas pasa rnam par dpyad pas nges pa'i shes
NK048(tshi)004:5815: pa the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba
NK048(tshi)004:5816: mchog tu rnyed pa'i bsam pa can nam blo gros
NK048(tshi)004:5817: can lung dang rigs pa zab mo la dbang 'byor
NK048(tshi)004:5818: ba rnams ni / dus rtag tu mdo rgyud nges
NK048(tshi)004:5819: don zab mo las blo phyir bzlog pa'i bdud dang
NK048(tshi)004:5820: phal gyi rgol ba gang gis kyang mi tshugs shing
NK048(tshi)004:5821: bar chada byed pa meda pas g.yul las mchog tu
NK048(tshi)004:5822: rnam par rgyal te log smra tshar gcod pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:5823: ba rnams ni / / skal ldan rjes su 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:5824: pa la gzhan las mchog tu 'phags shing 'gran zla
NK048(tshi)004:5825: kun dang bral ba kho na yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5826: de yi phyir na tshur mthong byis pa'i ri dwags
NK048(tshi)004:5827: sus kyang bzod par dka' ba'i mdo rgyud zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:5828: nges gsang bden gnyis dpyod pa'i rigas lam senga ge'i
NK048(tshi)004:5829: sgra bo che ji skad bstan pa rab tu bsgragsa
NK048(tshi)004:5830: pasa dpal ldan sangs rgyas pad+ma skyes sam o rgyan
NK048(tshi)004:5831: mtsho skyes rdo rje'i bstan pa'i ranga lugsa snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:5832: gyi mdo rgyud zab mo khyad para 'phags pas thun
NK048(tshi)004:5833: mong min par mchoga tu gyur pa rnams la gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:5834: dring mi 'jog par yida ches zab mo rnyed par
NK048(tshi)004:5835: gyur cinga / rang mthong gis mdo rgyud dgongs 'grel
NK048(tshi)004:5836: phyogs resa khengs shing dregsa pasa mchog tu snyems nas
NK048(tshi)004:5837: 'dzin pa'i gazhana phyogs kyi grub mtha' smra ba mtha'
NK048(tshi)004:5838: dag rigs pa tshad mas sun 'byin par byed pa
NK048(tshi)004:5839: sus kyang mi bzlog pa'am mi 'phrog pa'i tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:5840: bden gnyis dpyod pa'i shesa rab kyi ral gri'i yu
NK048(tshi)004:5841: ba mchog la yang dag par brten pa'i skal ba
NK048(tshi)004:5842: bzang po'i go skabsa 'di nyid gazhana don gnyer gzu
NK048(tshi)004:5843: bor gnas pa'i blo ldan rnams la gnang zhing sbyin
NK048(tshi)004:5845: zab mo'i chos kyi phongs rgud dang bral zhing mdo
NK048(tshi)004:5846: rgyud nges don mchog la nges pa rnyed pa'i skal
NK048(tshi)004:5848: des na mdo sngags kyi chosa tshul thun mong du
NK048(tshi)004:5849: gyur pa rnams ni thosa bsam sgom pa gsum gyis
NK048(tshi)004:5850: ro bcud zhim mngar dang ldan pa bdud rtsi'i rgya
NK048(tshi)004:5851: mtsho chen po dang 'dra ba yin pas de rnams
NK048(tshi)004:5852: la zhugs shing myong bar gyur kyang thun mong ma
NK048(tshi)004:5853: yin pa'i mdo rgyud zaba mo'i dgongs dona phun sum
NK048(tshi)004:5854: tshogs pa ganga yin pa de ni bdud rtsi'i rgya
NK048(tshi)004:5855: mtsho de yi yang snying por gyur pa yid bzhin
NK048(tshi)004:5856: gyi nor bu dbang gi rgyal po bzhina du gnas
NK048(tshi)004:5857: pa yin pas de dag rang dang gzhan gyi gang
NK048(tshi)004:5858: zag ganga gi snying na nges par gansa shing bzhugs
NK048(tshi)004:5859: par mthong na de nyid ltar snang la mchog dman
NK048(tshi)004:5860: bzang ngan ci 'drar snang yanga rung ste rang mthong
NK048(tshi)004:5861: gis snyems pa med par 'bad rtsol brgya phrag dag
NK048(tshi)004:5862: gi sgo nas gus pa mchog gis blang bar bya
NK048(tshi)004:5863: ste / zab mo'i don gyis dbul na gang zag
NK048(tshi)004:5864: su yang ltar snang ci tsam du bzang yang phan
NK048(tshi)004:5865: par mi 'gyur bas ganga zaga la mi rton chos
NK048(tshi)004:5866: la rton dgos par gsung pa'i phyir grags snyan tsam
NK048(tshi)004:5867: gyis rjes su 'brang bar mi bya bar nges don
NK048(tshi)004:5868: zab mo'i don la rton pas brtson zhing 'bad pa
NK048(tshi)004:5869: rnal 'byor du bya dgos pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5870: de yi phyir na thun mong ma yin pa'i mdo
NK048(tshi)004:5871: rgyud nges don zab mo'i dgongs don zab cing rgya
NK048(tshi)004:5872: che ba rnams ni thun mong gi mdo sngags rigs
NK048(tshi)004:5873: gnas dang bcas pa mang du thos shing lung rigs
NK048(tshi)004:5874: ldan pas grub mtha' manga du smra basa kyang tshul
NK048(tshi)004:5875: bzhin du rtogs pa mina la /
NK048(tshi)004:5876: der yang ma zad sngon bsags skyes thob kyi shes
NK048(tshi)004:5877: rab che zhing da ltar sbyang brtson mi dman pas
NK048(tshi)004:5878: blo gros zab cing zaba pa ltar snang ba rnams
NK048(tshi)004:5879: kyis gtan tshigs rigs pa'i tshogs kyis dpyad par byas
NK048(tshi)004:5880: pas kyang mi phigsa pa'am mi rtogs pas tshur mthong
NK048(tshi)004:5881: gi spyod yul las 'das pa'i zab dona sa 'oga
NK048(tshi)004:5882: gnas pa'i yid bzhin dgos 'dod kun 'byung gi gter
NK048(tshi)004:5883: mdzod 'dzad med nor bu'i bang khyim dang 'dra bar
NK048(tshi)004:5884: kun gyi mthun snang du grub pa yin slad /
NK048(tshi)004:5885: ltar snang ci 'drar snang yang gang zag gang gisa
NK048(tshi)004:5886: 'di nyid yang dag par rtogs de rang gis 'dzina
NK048(tshi)004:5887: cing gzhan la spel ba de ni tshogs bsags sgrib
NK048(tshi)004:5888: pa dag pa'i blo gros mchog dang ldan pa gzhan
NK048(tshi)004:5889: las khyad par du 'phags pas skyes bu dam pa
NK048(tshi)004:5890: nyid du 'bras bu'i rtags kyis 'khrul ba med par
NK048(tshi)004:5891: shes shing rtogs nus pa'i phyir na dus rtag tu
NK048(tshi)004:5892: de la gus pa mchog gis brten cing mnyes par
NK048(tshi)004:5893: byas te gdams pa'i bdud rtsi myong bar bya dgos
NK048(tshi)004:5894: so // des na mdo rgyud snying po'i dgongs don
NK048(tshi)004:5895: zab mo ji bzhin rtogs pa'i blo gros kyi gter
NK048(tshi)004:5896: zab mo 'bum phrag nor bu'i snod mchog nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:5897: phyogs rer zhen pa'i badga gi blo 'di yang zab
NK048(tshi)004:5898: cing yangas pa rgya mtsho chen po'am cher sgrubsa pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5899: zab mo'i gdamsa pa'i legas byas rmad du byung ba
NK048(tshi)004:5900: slong ba'i dus la bab par riga nasa klu yi
NK048(tshi)004:5901: dabnga po blo gros phul du gyur pa'i dpal gyi
NK048(tshi)004:5902: rtsal las byung ba'i zab rgyas gdams pa'i rgya mtshor
NK048(tshi)004:5903: gus pa chen pos dga' mgu yi rang bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:5904: legs par 'thung zhing rol bar bya'o //
NK048(tshi)004:5905: ganga gi thugs gnyis su med pa'i blo gros zab
NK048(tshi)004:5906: mo'i mthu lasa babsa pa'i legas par bashada pa'i zab
NK048(tshi)004:5907: rgyas kyi gdam pa chu klung bzang po dag gis
NK048(tshi)004:5908: / de nyid gang las byung ba'i rnam par dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:5909: pa'i blo gros zab cing rgya che ba yi rgya
NK048(tshi)004:5910: mtsho chen po'i rgya khyon zab yangas pha mtha' dang
NK048(tshi)004:5911: bral bar ngesa par rtogs shing /
NK048(tshi)004:5912: de 'dra'i blo mchog rgya mtsho lta bu de yi
NK048(tshi)004:5913: 'byung gansa klu yi dabnga po'am rgyal po lta bu
NK048(tshi)004:5914: ni snga 'gyur rig 'dzina brgyud pa'i zhal lung mdo
NK048(tshi)004:5915: rgyud man ngag zab mo nyid du nges par rtogsa
NK048(tshi)004:5916: par gyur to // des na thun min mdo rgyud
NK048(tshi)004:5917: man ngag zab mo'i dgongs don nam mkha'a ltar pha
NK048(tshi)004:5918: mtha' dang bral ba gang nyid blo gros chen po'i
NK048(tshi)004:5919: hub kyis te hub gcig gis skad cig nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:5920: 'dren cing zosa pa'i dgongs bcud zab mo snying la
NK048(tshi)004:5921: kun tu phana pa'i bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho'i dpyid dpal
NK048(tshi)004:5922: nyid du lena pa'i mthu rtsal chena po tshul 'dir
NK048(tshi)004:5923: sbyang brtson gyis zhugs pa'i blo la nges par myur
NK048(tshi)004:5924: du thoba par madzada pa'i phyir na ngo matshara rmad
NK048(tshi)004:5925: du byung ba thun min mdo rgyud man ngag zab
NK048(tshi)004:5926: mo'i chosa kyi mar me bzang po mchog tu 'bar
NK048(tshi)004:5927: ba 'di nyid skal bzang dam pa rnams la gsal
NK048(tshi)004:5928: zhing snang bar mdzoda cig ces bskul zhing gsol btab
NK048(tshi)004:5929: par gyur to // pa'o // gsum pa /
NK048(tshi)004:5930: de skad zer zhing sogs tshigs bcad bdun dang rkang pa gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:5931: gong du ji skad bstan pa de skad zera zhing gus pa mchog gis btud de gnas pa'i tshe /
NK048(tshi)004:5932: gzu bor gnas pa'i drang srong mchog de yisa de
NK048(tshi)004:5933: la yanga blo gros chung zhing zab pa mina pa
NK048(tshi)004:5934: nyid blo gros che zhing zab rgyas su sgrub pa
NK048(tshi)004:5935: byed pa gonga du ji skad bstan pa dag gi
NK048(tshi)004:5936: dona rnams bsdus te 'di ltar gdamsa te /
NK048(tshi)004:5937: de la dang po chosa mchoga mdo rgyud zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:5938: senga ge'i 'o ma lta bu 'di ni blo gros
NK048(tshi)004:5939: zab mo'i snod bazanga po rin chen gser snod lta
NK048(tshi)004:5940: bu kho nasa 'dzina cing snod gazhana phal ba gang
NK048(tshi)004:5941: du ji ltar 'abda kyang mi gansa par snod kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5942: chag la bcud kyang zag nas chud za ba ltar
NK048(tshi)004:5943: blo gros dman pa dag gis ji ltar 'bad kyang
NK048(tshi)004:5944: mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i dgongs don blo la
NK048(tshi)004:5945: mi shong zhing mi rtogs pas 'dzin par mi nus
NK048(tshi)004:5947: chos mchog mdo rgyud man ngag zab mo'i don 'di
NK048(tshi)004:5948: shong zhing 'dzin pa'i snod ni blo gros bzang po
NK048(tshi)004:5949: zab cing rgya che ba 'di kho na yina no
NK048(tshi)004:5950: // 'o na de lta bu'i blo gros bzang po gang gis sgrub na /
NK048(tshi)004:5951: gong gi don rnams bsdus te gzungs spobs zab mo
NK048(tshi)004:5952: sgrub pa'i sgo la 'jug pa'i thabs kyi gdams ngag
NK048(tshi)004:5953: gnad du dril nas nyams su len pa ni man
NK048(tshi)004:5954: ngag gi yang zab dam pa yin te /
NK048(tshi)004:5955: 'di ltar a zhes pa'i yi ge 'di ni skye
NK048(tshi)004:5956: ba med pas med dgag yin bzhin du rang snang
NK048(tshi)004:5957: ba ste / des na bden pa gnyis char mi
NK048(tshi)004:5958: skye bar bstan pas skye ba med pa'i sgo mtshon
NK048(tshi)004:5959: byed yin pas ma skyes pa'i chosa kyi sgo zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5960: ba ste / bya'o // de bzhin du ra zhes
NK048(tshi)004:5961: pa 'di ni rdul med pas mnyam pa nyid du
NK048(tshi)004:5962: rtogs pa la rang don du srid pa dang zhi
NK048(tshi)004:5963: ba la dga' ba'i yid kyi chags rdul med par
NK048(tshi)004:5964: 'jug dgos pa'i sgo mtshon byed yin pas rdul dang
NK048(tshi)004:5966: pa zhes pa 'di ni mnyam bzhag yang dag pa
NK048(tshi)004:5967: la 'dzin stangs ci yang med kyang dran med mun
NK048(tshi)004:5968: pa 'thums po lta bu lhag mthong gi snang ba
NK048(tshi)004:5969: dang bral ba'ang min pas don dam mthar thug mthong
NK048(tshi)004:5970: ba'i sgo mtshon byed yin pas dona dama snang ba'i
NK048(tshi)004:5971: sgo zhes bya'o // tsa zhes pa 'di ni dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:5972: pa yang dag pas mtha' bzhi'i spros pa nye bar
NK048(tshi)004:5973: zhi ba'i nges shes zab mos drangs pa'i mnyam par
NK048(tshi)004:5974: 'jog tshul khyad par can yin pas rnam par rtog
NK048(tshi)004:5975: pa'i 'gyur ba'am blos byas kyi 'chi 'pho med par
NK048(tshi)004:5976: mnyam pa nyid chos kyi skur gnas pa'i sgo mtshon
NK048(tshi)004:5977: byed yin pas 'chi 'pho skye ba med pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:5978: sgo zhes bya'o // zhes bya'o // na zhes pa
NK048(tshi)004:5979: 'di ni bden pa gnyis la gtso che chung rnam
NK048(tshi)004:5980: pa kun tu med de snang stong gnyis 'bral mi
NK048(tshi)004:5981: shes pa'i phyir mdang cha ba bzhin no //
NK048(tshi)004:5982: de gnyis tha snyad du ni mgo mnyam ste tha snyad sgra rtog gi yul yin pas so //
NK048(tshi)004:5983: don dam par de gnyis dbyer med pa'i gnas lugs
NK048(tshi)004:5984: ni sgra rtog gi lam las 'das pas na ming
NK048(tshi)004:5985: dang bral te bsam gyis mi khyab par ston pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:5986: sgo mtshon byed yin pas minga dang bral ba nyid
NK048(tshi)004:5988: d+h+ai zhes pa 'di ni de 'dra'i snang stong bden
NK048(tshi)004:5989: pa dbyer med pa'i don zab mo nyid chos can
NK048(tshi)004:5990: rdul phran lta bu gcig gi steng du da lta
NK048(tshi)004:5991: nas gtan la phab ste chos thams cad mnyam pa
NK048(tshi)004:5992: nyid tshur mthong las 'das pa'i don zab mo shes
NK048(tshi)004:5994: mthun snang gi blta bya'i snang ba la dpyad de /
NK048(tshi)004:5996: snang ba de la don dam spros bral gyi dbang du khas len med pa'i tshul dang /
NK048(tshi)004:5997: tha snyad snang tshul tsam du bdud rtsi dang chu
NK048(tshi)004:5998: sogs la khas len yod pa'i tshul dang de gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:5999: mi 'gal bar sbyar nas tha snyad kyi khas len
NK048(tshi)004:6000: tshur mthong gi rnam bzhag phar phyin theg pa nas
NK048(tshi)004:6001: rdo rje theg pa'i bar du shes pa'i sgo mtshon
NK048(tshi)004:6002: byed yin pas blo gros zab mo'i sgo zhes bya'o
NK048(tshi)004:6003: // de ltar na rgyal bas gsung pa'i rgyu 'bras
NK048(tshi)004:6004: theg pa'i mdo 'gags thams cad der 'dus pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:6005: pas 'di'i gnad don tshul bzhin du shes par gyur
NK048(tshi)004:6006: na mdo sngags rgya mtsho'i 'gags mdud khrol ba yin
NK048(tshi)004:6007: pas rang gis rtogs pa dang gzhan la 'doms pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6008: spobs pa'i gter chen po brgyad kyi sgo 'byed pa
NK048(tshi)004:6009: // yin no // des na yi ge'i sgo re
NK048(tshi)004:6010: re las phyogs dus kyis bsdus pa'i chos tshul tshad
NK048(tshi)004:6011: med pa go zhing rtogs par byed pa ni brda
NK048(tshi)004:6012: mi zad pa zhes bya ba yin la /
NK048(tshi)004:6013: don gcig las brtsams te don bskal ba nas bskal
NK048(tshi)004:6014: bar brjod kyang mthar phyin par mi 'gyur bas don
NK048(tshi)004:6016: yi ge gcig gi nang du'ang yi ge kun 'du
NK048(tshi)004:6017: zhing chos sgo tshad med par ston nus pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:6018: / don gcig gi nang du'ang chos kun 'du zhing
NK048(tshi)004:6019: don gcig gis kyang chos kun ston par nus pa
NK048(tshi)004:6020: ni brda don gnyis ka mi zad pa yin la
NK048(tshi)004:6021: / / de dag kun kyang tha snyad du 'gags
NK048(tshi)004:6022: pa med cing rten 'brel zab mo rtag chad dang
NK048(tshi)004:6024: thams cad bsdoms nas mnyam pa nyid zung 'jug gi
NK048(tshi)004:6025: ye shes gcig nyid gtan la phab cing rtogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:6026: yin pas blo gros mi zad pa'ang yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:6027: tshul 'di ni chos kyi gter 'don pa'i man ngag
NK048(tshi)004:6028: zab mo yang yin te yi ge'i sgo a la
NK048(tshi)004:6029: sogs pa drug po de daga re rer yanga bdena
NK048(tshi)004:6030: pa gnyis gnyis kyi tshul gyis snang stong bden gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:6031: dbyer med zung 'jug skye 'gag dang bral bar dmigsa
NK048(tshi)004:6032: nasa su ste / 'di ltar yi ge a lta
NK048(tshi)004:6033: bu rjod byed dang ma skyes pa lta bu brjod
NK048(tshi)004:6034: bya'i don dag kyang gdod ma nas skye ba med
NK048(tshi)004:6035: pas mnyam pa nyid yin la mnyam pa nyid kyis
NK048(tshi)004:6036: mnyam pa nyid la brjod du med de nam mkha'
NK048(tshi)004:6037: la nam mkhas ri mo bris pa bzhin te /
NK048(tshi)004:6038: de lta na'ang brjod med brjod kun gyi rgyu mchog
NK048(tshi)004:6039: yin pas bskal pa nas bskal bar brjod kyang chos
NK048(tshi)004:6040: kyi dbyings la bri gang ngam zad 'phel yong ye
NK048(tshi)004:6041: med cing chos thams cad brjod pa tsam du shes
NK048(tshi)004:6042: pa de ni don dam par dmigs pa'i sgo dang
NK048(tshi)004:6043: / de bzhin du rjod byed ra dang brjod bya rdul dang bral ba /
NK048(tshi)004:6044: rjod byed pa dang brjod bya don dam 'od gsal /
NK048(tshi)004:6045: rjod byed tsa dang brjod bya 'chi 'pho med pa /
NK048(tshi)004:6046: rjod byed na dang brjod bya ming dang bral ba /
NK048(tshi)004:6047: rjod byed d+h+aihdang brjod bya zung 'jug gnyis su med
NK048(tshi)004:6048: pa'i ye shes nyid de tshig don de dag re
NK048(tshi)004:6049: re bzhin du yang rjod byed dang brjod bya gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:6050: skye ba med pas mnyam pa nyid yin pas gang
NK048(tshi)004:6051: gis gang zhig brjod de brjod du med par ye
NK048(tshi)004:6052: nas gnas pa'i gnad kyis bskal bar brjod kyang bri
NK048(tshi)004:6053: gang bral ba'i chos kyi dbyings la zad 'phel med
NK048(tshi)004:6054: cing / chos thams cad ming ngam brjod pa tsam
NK048(tshi)004:6055: du shes pa ni don dam par dmigs pa'i sgo'o
NK048(tshi)004:6056: cing / // de ltar mnyam pa nyid las ma
NK048(tshi)004:6057: g.yos mi g.yo g.yo bar mi 'gyur bzhin du a
NK048(tshi)004:6058: las gyur pa'i yi ge skye a nyid mgrin rkan
NK048(tshi)004:6059: spyi bo so mchu'i gnas lngar byed rtsol gyis bsgyur
NK048(tshi)004:6062: gnas lnga pa can a ra pa tsa sogs 'di dag dang yi ge gzhan rnams kyis kyang /
NK048(tshi)004:6063: kun byang gis bsdus pa'i chos kun shes shing go
NK048(tshi)004:6064: bor byed pa ni rten 'byung bslu med tsam ste
NK048(tshi)004:6065: / shin tu ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i cho
NK048(tshi)004:6066: 'phrul chen po kun tu nye bar ston pa'o zhes
NK048(tshi)004:6067: shes pa na kun rdzob la dmigs pa'i sgo ste
NK048(tshi)004:6068: / / de gnyis dbyer med zung du chud pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6069: ngang nas blo gros kyi gter la sogs pa'i spobs
NK048(tshi)004:6070: pa'i gter chen po brgyad kyi sgo myur du 'byed
NK048(tshi)004:6071: pa'i rgyu sgyu ma'i ste sgyu ma lta bu'i ting
NK048(tshi)004:6072: nge 'dzina mchog tu gyur pa bsgrub par byas nasa
NK048(tshi)004:6073: mdo rgyud man ngag zab cing rgya che ba pha
NK048(tshi)004:6074: mtha'a meda pa'i rgya mtsho chena po'i chu nyid blo
NK048(tshi)004:6075: gros zab myur gyi hub kyis te hub gcig gis
NK048(tshi)004:6076: lto bar 'dren cing chub par nus pa'i snying ga'i
NK048(tshi)004:6077: nora bu gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dri ma
NK048(tshi)004:6078: meda pa la gzungsa dang spobsa pa'i blo yi dapala
NK048(tshi)004:6079: phun sum tshogs pa nyid du rab tu 'abra bar
NK048(tshi)004:6080: / / 'gyur ro // de ltar snang stong zung
NK048(tshi)004:6081: 'jug zab mo'i don la rang byan chud pa'i sgo
NK048(tshi)004:6082: nas mtha'a bzhi'i spros pa thams cad khegas pa'i zab
NK048(tshi)004:6083: mo'i ngesa shesa kyi lam nasa chos thams cad kyi
NK048(tshi)004:6084: yina lugsa ji lta ba bzhin du gshisa su sona
NK048(tshi)004:6085: pa yi gnas lugs sems dang sems byung gi blo
NK048(tshi)004:6086: lasa rab tu 'adsa pa yi dbyings ye gnyis su
NK048(tshi)004:6087: med pa'i 'od gasla gnyug ma'i dbyings nges pa don
NK048(tshi)004:6088: gyi 'jam dpal rig stong dbyer med 'od gsal rdzogsa
NK048(tshi)004:6089: pa chena po'i nganga du ma bcos par mnyam par
NK048(tshi)004:6090: zhog cig dang mtha' bral lta ba'i rgyal po rig
NK048(tshi)004:6091: stong dbyer med blo bral rdzogs pa chen po kun
NK048(tshi)004:6092: mnyam yangas pa'i klong chen por ji bzhin mnyam para
NK048(tshi)004:6093: bazhaga pa'i bdena dona mthar thug yid dpyod las 'das
NK048(tshi)004:6094: pa'i chos nyid mngon sum du mthong ba lasa yod
NK048(tshi)004:6095: med la sogs pa'i mtha'a bzhi'i 'dzin stangs kyi blo
NK048(tshi)004:6096: ngana mun pa'i snang ba thams cad kun dang gisa
NK048(tshi)004:6097: dwangsa shing 'gags pa'i 'oda gsal ba'i mkhyen gnyis ye
NK048(tshi)004:6098: shes kyi nyi ma khong nas 'char bar 'gyur zhing
NK048(tshi)004:6099: ji lta ji snyed kyi dgongs pa'i ye shes klong
NK048(tshi)004:6100: rdol re mgrin pa'i rtsa 'khor gsung yi ge 'khor
NK048(tshi)004:6101: lo'i sprin du dengs nas 'chad rtsod rtsom pa gang
NK048(tshi)004:6102: la'ang thogs pa med par sus kyang mi 'phrog pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6103: rnam dpyod 'gran zla thams cad dang bral ba la
NK048(tshi)004:6104: dbang 'byor bar gdon mi za ba kho na yin
NK048(tshi)004:6106: mar dge ba mjug gi don bstan bcos rdzogs pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6108: bstan bcos ji ltar byung ba'i gleng gzhi'i mngon brjod brtsams pa'i dgos pa dang bcas pa /
NK048(tshi)004:6109: lhag bsam shes rab kyis go phyes shing gzhan phan snying rjes ji ltar brtsam pa'i mdzad byang /
NK048(tshi)004:6110: tshul 'dir brten na theg pa mchog gi lam bzang rnyed par nges pas brten par gdams pa'o //
NK048(tshi)004:6112: gzur gnas dpyod pa sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:6113: gang la dri ba'i gnas rtsom pa po rang gi
NK048(tshi)004:6114: blo gros phyogs su ma lhung ba'i gzur gansa te
NK048(tshi)004:6115: gzu bor gnas pa'i rnam par dpyod pa drang po
NK048(tshi)004:6116: nyid mkhas pa'i drang srong chen po nyid du bkod
NK048(tshi)004:6117: pa ste / gang gis dri ba po yang rang
NK048(tshi)004:6118: gi blo zab mo'i gnas la 'gal 'du'i dogs pa
NK048(tshi)004:6119: thol byung du shar bas rnam par rtog pa'i nyid
NK048(tshi)004:6120: ldom bu pa rtog ge'i brgal brtags byed pa por
NK048(tshi)004:6121: bkod de brjod nas drang srong de la ldom bu
NK048(tshi)004:6122: pa des dris shing brgal lana gyi tshul gyis ni
NK048(tshi)004:6123: shin tu rtogs par daka'a ba'i ganda zab mo rgyal
NK048(tshi)004:6124: srid rin po che sna bdun gyi grangsa dang ldan
NK048(tshi)004:6125: pa rab tu gsal bar legs par bashada pa yin
NK048(tshi)004:6126: pa ste / no // de yang blo gros na
NK048(tshi)004:6127: tshod ma smin pas chung ba rtog ge ba badga
NK048(tshi)004:6128: 'dra yisa skyes sbyang blo mchog mnga' bar grags pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6129: chen po rnams kyang som nyi'i d+r+wa bar 'phyan pa'i
NK048(tshi)004:6130: gnas shin tu zab cinga rtogs par dka' ba rtog
NK048(tshi)004:6131: ge'i rigs mdung 'bum gyis mi phigs pa'i rab tu
NK048(tshi)004:6132: barlinga ba'i dona de rnams blo gros chena po mnga'
NK048(tshi)004:6133: ba'i 'phagsa pa'i gang zag mchog rnams kyis thugsa gnyis
NK048(tshi)004:6134: su med pa'i ye shes zab pa dang rgya che
NK048(tshi)004:6135: ba'i mkhyen pa'i gter mdzod dam pa nyid nasa kyang
NK048(tshi)004:6136: yang dag par blang ba ji lta ba bzhina du
NK048(tshi)004:6137: gzur gnas dam pa yongs kyi dpyid dpal du 'di
NK048(tshi)004:6138: na legs par bkod par byas pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:6140: de skad smras pa'i sogs tshigs bcad gnyis kyis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:6141: de skad zab don yang dag par smras pa'i legas
NK048(tshi)004:6142: par bashada pa'i 'brug sgra snyan par sgrogs pa dang
NK048(tshi)004:6143: bcas pa'i chosa kyi chara rab tu bzang po 'bab
NK048(tshi)004:6144: pa 'di yang rgyal ba'i sras po mkhas mchog grangs
NK048(tshi)004:6145: med bye basa rtogs shing rol bar bya ba'i zab
NK048(tshi)004:6146: mo'i dgongs bcud dam pa bgrod pa gcig pa'i lam
NK048(tshi)004:6147: gnad snying por gyur pa yin cinga de 'dra'i zab
NK048(tshi)004:6148: rgyas chos kyi tshul la yid ches kyi dad pas
NK048(tshi)004:6149: dag'a bzhina gyis mnyan par byas pasa gnas skabs mthar
NK048(tshi)004:6150: thug gi dona gnyis phun sum tshogs pa'i lam dang
NK048(tshi)004:6151: 'bras bu'i yon tan rgya chena po thoba para semas
NK048(tshi)004:6152: pa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa rma med pa yisa kun
NK048(tshi)004:6153: nas bslang ste / gang zhig dris pa rnams la
NK048(tshi)004:6154: dga' spro yi rangas ba'i tshul gyis lan gyi khyad
NK048(tshi)004:6155: par zab don chos kyi bdud rtsi'i sman char yangs
NK048(tshi)004:6156: pa'i go skabas 'di nyid gsal zhing legs par dbye
NK048(tshi)004:6158: gang mdo rgyud zab mo'i dgongs don ji bzhin rnyed
NK048(tshi)004:6159: pa'i lam dngos yang dag par mthong ba'i mig tu
NK048(tshi)004:6160: gyur pa bden pa gnyis kyi de kho na nyid
NK048(tshi)004:6161: dpyod pa'i tshad ma'i lam nas nges pa'i shes pa
NK048(tshi)004:6162: zab mo the tshom gyi smag thams cad dang bral
NK048(tshi)004:6163: ba nyid dgos pa de yi phyir na tshad ma
NK048(tshi)004:6164: dang bral na nges shes zab mo mi rnyed pas
NK048(tshi)004:6165: lam gyi gzugs brnyan du 'gyur ba de lta basa
NK048(tshi)004:6166: na / dpal chos kyi grags pa dang dpal ldan
NK048(tshi)004:6167: zla ba'i rang lugs bzhin bden gnyis so sor dpyod
NK048(tshi)004:6168: pa'i tshad ma dang mthar thug bden gnyis dbyer med
NK048(tshi)004:6169: zung 'jug nges pa'i tshad ma'i mig bzang po dpyad
NK048(tshi)004:6170: gsum gyis sbyangs shing bgrad de mdo rgyud zab mo'i
NK048(tshi)004:6171: gnas la gzhan dring mi 'jog par yang dag par
NK048(tshi)004:6172: 'jug dgos pa 'i tshul de ltar yanga dang yanga
NK048(tshi)004:6173: du mdo rgyud zab rgyas kyi dona mchog rtogs par
NK048(tshi)004:6174: 'dod cing don du gnyer bar semsa pa'i blo ldan
NK048(tshi)004:6175: gzu bor gnas pa'i skal bzang du ma'i dona du
NK048(tshi)004:6176: yanga dag par dmigs te zab rgya'i chos kyi gzugs
NK048(tshi)004:6177: brnyan kun gsal yid kyi me long dri ma med
NK048(tshi)004:6178: pa'i ngosa la ji ltar shar ba bzhina du rnam
NK048(tshi)004:6179: dpyod blo yi rtsed 'jo'i rol pasa d+h+aiminga cana gyis
NK048(tshi)004:6180: te blo gros dri med kyis legs par spel zhing
NK048(tshi)004:6181: bris par mdzad pa yin no //
NK048(tshi)004:6183: bde gshegs chos tshul sogs tshigs bcad gcig gis bstan te /
NK048(tshi)004:6184: bde bar gshegas pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
NK048(tshi)004:6185: kyi bka' mdo rgyud kyi chosa tshul zaba mo nam
NK048(tshi)004:6186: mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa thams cad
NK048(tshi)004:6187: rnam pa kun tu sgra dang rtog pas brjod para
NK048(tshi)004:6188: mi nus shing zad par yang mi 'gyur mod kyang
NK048(tshi)004:6189: zab mo'i gnad la ngesa pa'i shesa pa the tshom
NK048(tshi)004:6190: gyi smag thams cad dang bral ba'i snang ba mchog
NK048(tshi)004:6191: tu gsal bar byed pa rina po che yi sgron
NK048(tshi)004:6192: me 'dira / yang dag par brten par byas na
NK048(tshi)004:6193: mdo rgyud thega mchoga zab mo'i lam bazanga po rang
NK048(tshi)004:6194: gis ji bzhin du bde blag tu rnyed cing rtogs
NK048(tshi)004:6195: nas gzhan la nor 'khrul med par ston para nus
NK048(tshi)004:6196: pas na gzu bor gnas pa'i blo can chos kyi
NK048(tshi)004:6197: spyan ldan skal bzang mkhas pa'i tshogs kyis legs par
NK048(tshi)004:6198: brten par mdzod cig ces yang dag par gdams par
NK048(tshi)004:6199: me 'dira / mdzad pa'o // slar rje nyid kyis gzigs gnang mdzad pa'i zhal byang ni /
NK048(tshi)004:6200: nges shes rin po che'i sgron me 'di rang lo
NK048(tshi)004:6201: shin tu gzhon zhing slob gnyer gsar bu pa'i dus
NK048(tshi)004:6202: zhig na 'phral du yid la shar rtsom stan gcig
NK048(tshi)004:6203: par bris pa yin mod don la 'gal ba med
NK048(tshi)004:6204: cing go rgyu gnad can 'dug pas ma bcos par
NK048(tshi)004:6205: de kar bzhag pa yin no zhes mi pham pas
NK048(tshi)004:6206: rang lo nga bdun par smras pa dge'o //
NK048(tshi)004:6207: zhes pas tshig gi sdeb sbyor lhur ma blang bar
NK048(tshi)004:6208: don la rton par byas pa yin no zhes tshig
NK048(tshi)004:6209: la mi rton don la rton par gdams pa'i shugs
NK048(tshi)004:6210: kyis gang zag la mi rton chos la rton pa
NK048(tshi)004:6211: dang / don la'ang drang don la mi rton nges don la rton pa dang /
NK048(tshi)004:6212: nges don la'ang rnam shes kyi spyod yul la mi
NK048(tshi)004:6213: rton par ye shes kyi spyod yul la rton par
NK048(tshi)004:6214: gdam par mdzad pa 'di ni mkhas pa yongs kyi
NK048(tshi)004:6215: thugs kyis brnag bya g.yar dam du bya ba'i gdams
NK048(tshi)004:6216: pa phun sum tshogs pa zhig lags so //
NK048(tshi)004:6218: rmad byung nges don zab mo'i 'phrul gyi sgo //
NK048(tshi)004:6219: 'khrul med lung rigs tshad ma'i legs 'dren pas //
NK048(tshi)004:6220: thabs mchog nges shes nor bu'i 'od snang 'di //
NK048(tshi)004:6221: blo ldan blo yi dpal du shar ba bzhin //
NK048(tshi)004:6222: mdo rgyud grub mtha'i lung rigs man ngag gnad //
NK048(tshi)004:6223: the tshom d+r+wa bar chud pa'i rtsod rigs brgya //
NK048(tshi)004:6224: sngon med legs bshad mthon mthing ral gri yis //
NK048(tshi)004:6225: gcod 'di 'jam dpal rdo rje'i phrin las gar //
NK048(tshi)004:6226: de slad skyes sbyang blo gros dman na yang //
NK048(tshi)004:6227: zab don nges gsang mchog gi dgongs pa'i bcud //
NK048(tshi)004:6228: yid kyi dpyid du 'gugs pa'i skal bzang la //
NK048(tshi)004:6229: sems nas dang ba'i tshul gyis 'jug khul byas //
NK048(tshi)004:6230: de 'dra na yang blo gros snang ba'i sgo //
NK048(tshi)004:6231: nges 'byed don gzigs 'phags pa'i dgongs gnad dang //
NK048(tshi)004:6232: so skyes yid dpyod tshig gi ri mo gnyis //
NK048(tshi)004:6233: gser dang ra gan mnyam par su zhig len //
NK048(tshi)004:6234: 'on kyang dam pa'i zhal skyems tshad ma'i lung //
NK048(tshi)004:6235: rjes 'brel gzu bo'i blo yis legs dpyad nas //
NK048(tshi)004:6236: smras phyir ri dwags ro las gla rtsi bzhin //
NK048(tshi)004:6237: blo skyon rnyog mas sbag pa med dam snyam //
NK048(tshi)004:6238: 'di na dal 'byor dpal gyis nyer 'khyud pa'i //
NK048(tshi)004:6239: dri med rgyal bstan mjal ba'i dpyod ldan rnams //
NK048(tshi)004:6240: gtan gyi 'dun ma ma nor dam pa'i lam //
NK048(tshi)004:6241: gang 'dir thos bsam sgom pas 'jug mdzod kye //
NK048(tshi)004:6242: tshul 'di mkhan chen mchog gi legs gsungs la //
NK048(tshi)004:6243: brten nas dgongs don sor bzhag byas na yang //
NK048(tshi)004:6244: ma rtogs byis blos 'khrul cha gang mchis kun //
NK048(tshi)004:6245: rtsa gsum lha dang chos spyan ldan la 'chags //
NK048(tshi)004:6246: 'dis mtshon dus gsum bsags pa'i legs tshogs rnams //
NK048(tshi)004:6247: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che //
NK048(tshi)004:6248: bshad sgrub 'khor lo gsum gyi mnga' thang gis //
NK048(tshi)004:6249: phyogs mthar khyab cing rgyas pa'i rgyu ru bsngo //
NK048(tshi)004:6250: de yi mthu las mkha' khyab yid can kun //
NK048(tshi)004:6251: zab mo'i lam 'dir nges pa mchog rnyed nas //
NK048(tshi)004:6252: theg gsum bdud rtsi'i sman char la rol te //
NK048(tshi)004:6253: don gnyis 'byor bas mangonapara mdzes gyur cig /
NK048(tshi)004:6254: bdag kyang dengs nas byang chub mchog gi bar //
NK048(tshi)004:6255: legs bshad 'di dang nam yang mi 'bral zhing //
NK048(tshi)004:6256: zab rgyas mdo sngags chos tshul ma lus par //
NK048(tshi)004:6257: 'jug pa'i zhi lhag zung 'brel thobs par shog /
NK048(tshi)004:6258: 'di dang gang 'brel 'jam pa'i dbyangs nyid kyis //
NK048(tshi)004:6259: byin brlabs rjes bzung tshe ring nad med cing //
NK048(tshi)004:6260: nges don snying po'i lam bzang mthong gyur te //
NK048(tshi)004:6261: phyogs dus kun tu 'dzin skyong spel gyur cig /
NK048(tshi)004:6262: mkha' khyab zhing gi rgyal ba sras bcas dang //
NK048(tshi)004:6263: rab 'byams rtsa gsum rgya mtsho'i bden mthu yis //
NK048(tshi)004:6264: ji ltar smon pa 'grub pa'i mthun 'gyur dang //
NK048(tshi)004:6265: phyogs dus kun tu dge ba'i bkra shis rtsol //
NK048(tshi)004:6266: ces pa 'di yang sku skyes thub bstan mkhas btsun
NK048(tshi)004:6267: blos gros gang gis gzhung 'di nyid thugs la 'dzin
NK048(tshi)004:6268: cing nan tan snying por byed pa /
NK048(tshi)004:6269: zla ba bcu gnyis su sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor la dam bca' mdzad cing /
NK048(tshi)004:6270: 'chi nges kyi srog bslu bdun sogs legs byas dge ba'i skyes dang /
NK048(tshi)004:6271: gzhan yang bkra shis pa'i lha reg /
NK048(tshi)004:6272: rin chen gnyis pa'i me tog ngo mtshar ba'i rtags can /
NK048(tshi)004:6273: rang la dus su mkho ba'i shar rgyal mo rong
NK048(tshi)004:6274: gi chu shog yug grangs sogs dngos po'i rdzas dang
NK048(tshi)004:6275: bcas te don gnyer spro ba'i gsung gis lan mang
NK048(tshi)004:6276: du snying nas bskul ba ldog tu ma nus nas
NK048(tshi)004:6278: ris med bstan pa'i mnga' bdag /
NK048(tshi)004:6279: mkhas btsun grub pa'i go 'phang mthon por gshegs pa'i k+aahthoga ma h+aa pan+di ta /
NK048(tshi)004:6280: 7byams chen t+aa yi si tu rin po che dang /
NK048(tshi)004:6282: mkhyen brtse nus pa'i gter chen /
NK048(tshi)004:6284: stobs bcu'i rgyal thabs la mnga' dbang brnyes pa'i /
NK048(tshi)004:6285: 7grub dbang byams pa chos 'dzin rin po che zung
NK048(tshi)004:6286: gi zhabs rdul la spyi bos reg pa'i skal bzang
NK048(tshi)004:6287: thob cing / gzhan yang spobs pa'i gter brgyad grol ba'i kun mkhyen pad+ma bi dza /
NK048(tshi)004:6288: snga 'gyur bstan pa'i srog shing kun bzang chos kyi grags pa /
NK048(tshi)004:6289: 'od gsal rig pa'i gter mdzod ngag dbang rdo rje gzi brjid /
NK048(tshi)004:6290: mdo rgyud legs bshad kyi 'byung gnas thub bstan dul ba'i sde /
NK048(tshi)004:6291: 'jam dbyangs sprul pa'i zlos gar mchog sprul blo gros
NK048(tshi)004:6292: rgya mtsho sogs dam pa du ma'i bka' drin gyis
NK048(tshi)004:6293: 'tsho ba'i rmongs rtul btsun gzugs thub bstan mkhyen brtse'i
NK048(tshi)004:6294: blo gros zhes bya ba'i gdol spyod snyom las mkhan
NK048(tshi)004:6295: des / gser smad dbang shar chos sde'i g.yas lung /
NK048(tshi)004:6296: skye med rang shar slong gi yang dben /
NK048(tshi)004:6297: bkra shis nyin mor byed pa'i spang ljongs /
NK048(tshi)004:6298: lhun grub pad+ma chos sdings kyi ri mgul //
NK048(tshi)004:6299: mthing mdog mig sman thig le'i lding khang /
NK048(tshi)004:6300: gtsug lag nor bu rgyas pa'i dga' ba'i tshal du
NK048(tshi)004:6301: dus tshes dge bar bris pa 'dis kyang snga 'gyur
NK048(tshi)004:6302: rdo rje snying po'i bstan pa rin po che phyogs
NK048(tshi)004:6303: dus kun tu dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du
